recentChanges: In this release, you can look forward to a cleaner and simpler search experience. Happy watching!
comments: I like what the app offers, but I cannot get it to stop freezing up. I've used it on my smart TV, laptop, and phone. It will freeze and the whole app has to be rebooted. Usually at least 2 or 3 times per episode. Very frustrating.

Don't get me wrong for rating the app with one star, I do love this app but, the problems are the ads, and when I tried to subscribe, it said I can't do it at the moment, so when I checked the app store for the apps that are (subscribed) the only one that showed up was viki. And guess what? I still have got few weeks until the subscribtion expires but still all the shows and movies are locked, so please tell me what is going on and what is the problem here

Im unable to fastforward drama or backward it,each time i leave the app to do something when I'm back i have to start the same episode from the begining pls fix this,i appreciate your efforts on this app but still needs to do better,it is really annoying.

I really like this app! My main concern is the advertisements. Okay, I'm actually not too bothered by how frequent they are, I'm a patient person and I understand that's how the app is able to run, but sometimes the ad has trouble loading and freezes. A 30 second ad will have me wait two minutes bc it takes so long to load. And I know I can get vikiplus to avoid ads but I'm poor. Besides that, the quality of the dramas are clear and the captions are well made!

It's really wonderful application .it's help to find lots of drama here. Am satisfied with this.but the problem is with resolution because we can't adjust what we want, sometimes network can't help to watch in that time we only can help with adjust the resolution but here there is no adjustments in this application!. can you fix with that others wise it's a good appüëç

title: Messenger for SMS
description:
Messages - the best custom Messages & call app with countless themes, fonts, wallpapers, ringtones, call features and everything you want. Fully customizable by you!  Send 3000+ new emojis, funny faces, stickers, GIFs &text messages via SMS messages. Sending funny SMS messages. Sending picture, audio, video MMS messages to share the amazing moment. Sending GIFs and emoji messages to express yourself better. A funny SMS messages app to replace stock messages app!

Messages ‚Äì Text and Send messages safely with private box, SMS blocker, even SMS backup & restore and schedule SMS! Won‚Äôt worry about losing private messages,  missing big moments, and won‚Äôt worry about spam messages waste phone storage by blocking text messages. Texting SMS messages has never been so great with countless emoji, GIF, sticker, theme, private box, SMS blocker, SMS backup & restore and schedule SMS! Enjoy sending & blocking text messages with funny SMS messages.

Messages Key Features

-BACKUP & RESTORE
‚úî Backup SMS & MMS messages to cloud, messages never get lost
‚úî Restore deleted or lost SMS & MMS message whenever

- Caller ID
‚úî Identify numbers in real time - even those not in your contact list
‚úî Get warnings for more than 1 million spam numbers worldwide

- Connect calls with Messages
‚úî One click text a contact after each call. No need to input number again
‚úî Access other Messages features directly from caller ID screen

- SCHEDULE SMS

- PRIVATE BOX
‚úî Encrypt messages or contacts & lock down with private box

- SMS BLOCKER
‚úî No worry about spam messages consume storage space with blocker

- FREE ANIMATED GIF & EMOJI ART
‚úî Share thousands of trending hot GIFs MMS via MMS
‚úî Share unique Emoji Art & funny face with friends via SMS

- CUSTOMIZE SMS THEMES
‚úî Tons of amazing messaging themes
‚úî Customize SMS background as you wish

- AWESOME MESSAGES CUSTOMIZATION
‚úî Customize texting bubble, SMS bubble, color, font & wallpaper

- DRIVING MODE & AUTO REPLY
‚úî Driving Mode disable message notifications from messages or stock messages except phone call
‚úî Auto Reply when Driving Mode is turned on, keep distractions to a minimum

- ANDROID WEAR COMPATIBLE
‚úî SMS Messages works perfectly on Android Wear
‚úî Get wear SMS Messages on your android wear

- MORE FEATURES
‚úî Send picture, audio, video MMS messages to more than one friends for once time

‚úî Pop up new message for a quick view and quick reply
‚úî Quick search to find exactly what you are looking for in free text messages

‚ù§Contact Us

Email: smsmessagesfeedback@gmail.com
We are constantly working hard on making the ‚ÄúMessages‚Äù more perfect for your SMS & MMS Texting needs. Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions/problems or just say hello. We would love to hear from you. If you have enjoyed any feature of ‚ÄòMessages‚Äô.Tell your friends if you are enjoying free funny SMS & MMS Messages.

Thanks for your support

comments: This app is awesome. All the songs you could want, no commercials. You got the videos, everything I like about YouTube minus the commercial interruptions. And you know that YouTube has got some long commercials when you're trying to listen and do other things, you have to stop, go stop the commercial so you can hear music again worse than radio!! This app is rocking!! My YouTube replacement. Did I mention you can download songs for offline listening. And its free!! What else could you ask for?

I love that I can make playlists & edit songs within the playlist(s) by adding or removing songs, plus you can sort the songs in the order you want. I love this App ..and recommend it to others; I already recommended it to F&F!

This app is definitely worth it no question. Tons of music available for any mood. And really good quality as well. But what there's more!!! Seemingly endless music and the app is very easy to use. Wide selection and user friendly what more could anyone possibly want. In the world of digital everything it's a win win.

Listen almost exclusively to this. At work, gym and car. I conveniently find all my trance favorites without interruption. I can also access other items such as Google, etc while still listening. Some of the initial advertising is odd, but I click past that and play my music. I dont have to hsve this open to a full screen to listen to. Its great for me but im not into mainstream music, I'm strictly older trance music which I find abundantly here.

This app is excellent I love it just sitting here finding all my music I'm so üíØ happy I've been looking for an app that doesn't give me a hard time about this is it, it's so easy and words can't describe what is happening to me now it's the best 5 üåü is excellent but not enough because this is more than I expected so much more to say keep it up much love and thank you ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è this app is awesome ‚ò∫Ô∏èüòòüòòüòò

title: Tiny Space Program
description:
This game is in a early release and is updated constantly. Almost every week more content is added. Everything in-game is free. If you like the genre and are willing to help and give some feedback about this game, feel free to try it out!

What would you do if you are a billionaire? owning your own space program, managing, researching and building new space ships, mining on planets and moons, bringing tourist into space for a space walk or just sending researchers to explore what is out there.  

In Tiny Space Program, like modern space companies such as Spacex, Blue origins and Virgin Galactic, you decide/manage what rockets you launch, if you want to bring tourists to Mars and The Moon, or start a mining operation on IO, Titan, Europa or Pluto. You manage and simulate the early colonization of our near future of our interplanetary society and learn what kinds of challenges exists for such an endeavor. 

Features:
- Space Program Manager.
- Building off-world colonies and outposts.
- Launch Space Ships and rockets into orbit.
- Research different technologies,
- Mine resources from stellar bodies,
- Character progression of astronauts
- Spacesuits
- Based on real orbital mechanics and ship propulsion
- Establish Off-world economies

Features ‚Äì to be implemented
- much more rockets and space ships.
- Space stations
- Drones and idle rovers
- Orbital Factories - Capital ships
- Facilitating space colonies
- Colonies to trade with
- Stellar bodies beyond Pluto
- Interstellar Travel. 
- (idle) Trade routes and automation (idle production)

In this update:

comments: It's a good game. A bit slow at first, but once you establish a few outposts the game moves as fast as you want. I enjoy that the tutorial is brief. Ads only happen if you want to make a bit of in-game cash. I would like to know what an upgrade will get me. "Improved performance" and "more crafting options" doesn't shed much light on what higher level buildings can do. Haven't found uranium yet.

This game is calm and way different from all those moneysucking mobile games. No annoying ads unless you want some extra currency or speed up some progress. It's amazing how much you can do. There's always something new to explore etc. Its only downside is that the gameplay is extremely slow, but it also has its charms: it gives a great feeling of accomplishment at the end of the road. Dear developer, if you see this, just know that i love your work and can't wait to see what comes next.

The game is a work in progress and so it has a few bugs and minor issues which do not affect the overall gameplay experience. This game is not marred by paywalls intrusive pop up ads. All of the content in the game can be enjoyed by players regardless of their budget. It is a difficut game to get the hang of and so a discord group has been created by the developer to assist players in progressing through the game and allowing them to socialize with other players.

Lots of bugs. Lacks instruction. I have everything that is says for Hydroponics (something needed for the game) yet fails to let me make it. Do I need to research something fails to tell me in the game. There is no close button when you open menus in the game. Pressing on top where close button should be works. Fun game too bad it's so clunky. Five out of five if you fix the issues...

It's a fun game and I like the idea but the reason why I'm giving it 3 stars is because of the UI. It jitters when you switch outposts and doesn't register half my taps, meaning you have to press the button twice for it to do something. Developers, if you're reading this, please improve the UI! Make it less jiterry and clunky and I'll up my review to 5 stars.

title: Choices: Stories You Play
description:
One choice can change everything! With romance, drama, horror and more, Choices has the best collection of story games in the world!
‚ú¶ Customize your main character
‚ú¶ Fall in love, solve crimes and embark on epic fantasy adventures
‚ú¶ Pick your story from our constantly growing library with weekly chapter updates
‚ú¶ Control what happens next in immersive visual stories!

Current stories include:

‚ùñ THE FRESHMAN - Welcome to Hartfeld University! In this college drama, you‚Äôll make new friends for life and find true love romancing your schoolmates. Will you date bookish James, party girl Kaitlyn, football hero Chris... or all three at once?

- Dress your character in fashion-forward outfits for events like a sorority rush.
- Choose a date for the elegant and romantic Winter Formal.

‚ùñ THE CROWN & THE FLAME - Your enemies stole your kingdom, but now the time has come for you to raise an army, master magic, and reclaim your crown! Assume the role of the hero in this interactive narrative adventure.

- Form alliances and relationships to build your army.
- Dress in elegant fashions and powerful armor.
- Crush enemies in an epic battle!

‚ùñ PERFECT MATCH - Sign up for the high-tech matchmaking services of Eros Incorporated, and master the dating game! Create your look, meet your perfect match, and fall in love in this thrilling mystery story!

- Customize your date to be your perfect match.
- Roleplay as a guy or a girl.
- Investigate a mystery with twists you won‚Äôt see coming!

You might also love:

‚ùñ BLOODBOUND - You're applying for a job with brilliant CEO billionaire Adrian Raines. Urban fantasy meets romance in this sexy vampire thriller!

‚ùñ HIGH SCHOOL STORY - It's your first day at a new high school! Make friends, find love, and attend the Homecoming dance. Relive your teen years in your very own High School Story!

...PLUS more new stories and chapters EACH WEEK!

FOLLOW CHOICES:
facebook.com/ChoicesStoriesYouPlay
twitter.com/playchoices
instagram.com/choicesgame

Choices is free to play, but you are able to purchase game items with real money. You may limit the ability to make in-app purchases by creating a PIN in the Settings menu from within the Google Play Store.

PRIVACY POLICY & TERMS OF SERVICE
- Please read our privacy policy at http://www.pixelberrystudios.com/choices-privacy-policy/
- By playing Choices, you agree to our terms of service http://www.pixelberrystudios.com/choices-terms-of-service

ABOUT US

Choices is from the team that has been bringing you narrative games for over a decade. We created the top 25 hit games, Surviving High School and Cause of Death, the first games with episodes, for EA. After leaving EA, our team regrouped as Pixelberry in a small office, set out to continue creating story driven games with heart and launched the two interactive hit games, High School Story and Hollywood U.

Our team has now grown to over a dozen of the most experienced game writers in the industry. In our 10 years of creating story games together, we‚Äôve seen heartbreak, marriages, great adventures, and even Pixelbabies.

Stay tuned for more new interactive story games to pick from in Choices!

- The Pixelberry Team

recentChanges:
RISING TIDES: When a natural disaster hits your town, your sister insists it's related to climate change. But will the town listen?

NEW CHAPTERS EACH WEEK
Prepare for a new year in high school in My Two First Loves! Then gear up and get ready for new chapters of Open Heart, The Royal Heir, and Rising Tides!
comments: The stories are really good, and the charater designs look nice. The only thing is I wish there were no gem choices. It makes it hard to play the game the way you want, and the only way to get them is from reading chapters or ads. I can eventually get enough for some choices but it takes a while. The VIP subscription is really expensive too. Still, it's a good game with no pop up ads, And therr are a lot of different stories of many genres to choose from!

Everything about this game is great ‚Äî the stories, the characters, the graphics, the music. But I am giving it two stars because the pricing model is terrible. Each chapter of each book typically contains three premium choices which tend to cost 15+ "diamonds" each. The only effective way to get diamonds is to spend actual cash ‚Äî even if you pay the $15 a month for VIP, you get only 10 additional diamonds a day. VIPs don't even get a discount on diamond packages. Sad.

I love this game, but the only problem is when it comes to keys and gems. When you don't wanna pay for these things you end up having to wait FOREVER for them to re-gen. I see a way to fix this as being able to re-gen 5 keys instead of just 2, or make the keys re-gen faster. For the gems maybe they could give out 5 gems every 12 or so hours instead of 24. Overall the game is great, and these are the only problems I have with it.

It is a fun game just costs too much to be able to make the good choices. Should have more options available at least for the closet without having to use so many. Should be more ways to get more free diamonds or make the choices with having to use less of them. There should be way more options to get way more diamonds especially for VIPs. But no there isn't. Everything costs. Or you have to wait forever to build up enough diamonds to even finish a chapter. Not right.

This game is addictive. I loved it very much but the Graphics are blurry when it comes to the real part of love making. The developers should work on it and make the conversation more lengthy and seductive instead of going directly to love making. Moreover, the sound effects and music needs improvement by adding moaning, crying and laughing and ecstasy sounds to the game so that one should feel he/she is actually itself a character and not a spectator. 18 plus version is also needs to be added.

title: Free phone calls, free texting SMS on free number
description:
Houseparty with Dingtone group chat!
Dingtone, a free calling app allows you to make unlimited free phone calls, send free text messages to anyone. Dingtone also gives you a free number as 2nd line, a real phone number with local area code for free calling and free texting. You can call any mobile/landline phone numbers in over 200 countries and regions, your friends don‚Äôt need to install the app. 

Make free phone calls and send text messages
Get real phone numbers for your phone/tablet
Cheap or free international calls to 200+ countries and regions
Local phone numbers for you to choose: US, Canada, UK, Belgium, Netherlands, Australia, France, Sweden, Mauritius, Poland, Austria, Indonesia, Puerto Rico, Czech Republic, Malaysia, Denmark, Romania 
Free calls or texts to friends and families
Group phone calls and conference calls


Get a real US phone number for free
Add 2nd, 3rd line to your phone/tablet 
Call & text to any phone numbers for free


Free Calls & Free Texting
Dingtone lets you make unlimited free internet calls to anyone over WiFi, 3G/4G data network without using any cell minutes; Invite your family members and friends to use the free phone call app for free internet calling and free SMS, and start saving money now.

Real US Phone Numbers
Get a real US phone number as a second line without adding an extra SIM card. Enjoy crystal-clear phone calls and unlimited texts on phones and tablets.
 

Cheap or Free International Calls
Call any mobile/landline phone numbers in over 200 countries and regions at super low rates. Calls between Dingtone users are free. Caller ID is supported so that your friends know it is you who are calling.

Crystal Clear Calls
Voice calls are transmitted on Dingtone's high-quality dedicated VoIP network. With HD voice technologies, most free online calls between Dingtone users have superior clarity to existing regular phone service. Free calls and cheap calls are no longer cheap quality! With Dingtone, you can make or receive calls even under bad cellular reception.

Walkie Talkie Re-invented
Tired of typing text messages on the small screen? Dingtone transforms your phone into a real Walkie Talkie - simply push a button and speak. It works like a two-way radio! Push to talk and voicemail are perfectly tied into one clean interface. 

Amazing Premium Features
Dingtone provides various Premium features including visual voicemail, call blocking, call forwarding, call recording, etc.

Why use Dingtone?

Dingtone is super simple and fast. You can use it when you have no cell minutes or under bad cellular. Just download Dingtone and you can make free international calls, send free SMS.

Free phone calls home and abroad
Unlimited text messages to/from anyone
Great call quality, hd voice over cellular data & wifi
Walkie talkie mode for instant push to talk
Group conference calls up to 8 people
Group messaging with up to 100+ people

The best free calls & free texting app ever.

Learn more at http://www.dingtone.me
Need Help? http://dingtone.me/support

With Dingtone, you can make or receive calls even under bad cellular reception.

Walkie Talkie Re-invented
Tired of typing text messages on the small screen? Dingtone transforms your phone into a real Walkie Talkie - simply push a button and speak. It works like a two-way radio! Push to talk and voicemail are perfectly tied into one clean interface.

Amazing Premium Features
Dingtone provides various Premium features including visual voicemail, call blocking, call forwarding, call recording, etc.

Why use Dingtone?

Dingtone is super simple and fast. You can use it when you have no cell minutes or under bad cellular. Just download Dingtone and you can make free international calls, send free SMS.

Free phone calls home and abroad
Unlimited text messages to/from anyone
Great call quality, hd voice over cellular data & wifi
Walkie talkie mode for instant push to talk
Group conference calls up to 8 people
Group messaging with up to 100+ people

The best free calls & free texting app ever.

Learn more at http://www.dingtone.me
Need Help? http://dingtone.me/support

Free phone calls & free texts message with free number
Free international calls

comments: Worst texting app for many reasons, first of all I earn credits but it uses them if I receive messages, but worst of all it makes bots to text you to use up all your credits, I've had over 60 credits and now all gone because they put bots to take your credits for receiving messages. You sometimes dont even get your messages on time at all. The offers never work. Worst texting app and if you wanted to text or call you might as well pay for a carrier service. Dont install or waste your time....

This app is really great if you know your email password. But, I finally found mine, and used it, and this app is great! You can call and text. obviously. But you just watch videos to get credits, and watchibg videos to talk to people isn't bad compared to paying each month. This app os great. LOVE IT!!!!

Typical Wifi texting App, filled with Ads nonstop and left to right. I forgot when I re-downloaded this you have to have "credits" that expire every 48 hours to text anything or call anyone which is so stupid. To get more credits you have to, you guessed it sit through 15 second to 1 minute adds for half a credit to 1 full credit each. I would've skipped the download button and tried remembering which other App is the REAL free one and doesn't use credits. Don't download, find other free one.

I accidentally un install the apps, I tried to install again and log in my email address but I can't log in even if I click the forgot pass word. Please help me. This is my second time, before you don't take an action about my problem on this apps. All my credit I didn't use it. Waste of time.. grrrr. I will rate your apps if you fix my problem.

I'm only giving 4stars easy to understand and set up, but I haven't tried calling with it, and have not received any calls yet, I'll be sure to edit the rating for you, ü§û,ok I have had this app for a while now and I absolutely love it, clear calling, easy to use and understand, I have shared with many friends and family, keep up the good work and THANK YOU üòâüòâ

comments: I'm on my 3rd profile since I first started with this site and I'm really disappointed in its features. When you are not a member, you get more contacts from other members but more than half of them are spam. When you become a member you get all the members that haven't been here in over a month or more. If you want this site to get better, you need to come up with a way that only allows real people.

This app its scaming people.it shows you likes to buy premium so you can see them and the profiles are fake or don't exist. It shows people online while they aren't. 3 of my female friends haven't use the app for 2 weeks and shows them online. Sending messages on its own. I received messages from people and when i talk to them they have no idea

The app is beyond garbage. Spammed with click bait that takes you to dubious porn site, you receive messages from members who haven't been online in months/years, fake profiles, blah blah you have pretty much every flaw you can expect from free to join apps. Ruins your faith in the app so much, that unless you got money to burn, it's pointless to throw them free money. Think I'm exaggerating? Download the app yourself and see how many days it takes you to uninstall! I lasted a week

Been using the app for sometime now.. all of a sudden it's not working. My messages does not deliver, people dont see my profile anymore.. what is happening the same thing happened to my last profile i even paid for premium it still didn't work, before I opened another through my Facebook account same thing still happening... pls I need to know what the problem is with ur management

You have about 5 seconds to decide on a swipe before the app automatically says no for you! Even if you've sent them a message, want to like them, eager to meet: Nope you took 0.3 seconds longer than allowed to write your message they are gone! With no profile data at all it is purely swiping on a single photo. Also populated with bots and professionals selling themselves

title: Soldiers Inc: Mobile Warfare
description:
Step into the next generation of MMO strategy in Soldiers Inc: Mobile Warfare. Train your troops, build your base and command an army against your enemies. Conquer Black Sites and outposts full of resources, and team up with friends to take total control of the battlefield!

The year is 2037, and the evil Phoenix Corporation has taken control of Selva De Fuego - the world‚Äôs only source of a new lifesaving serum. The world has declared war on Phoenix, giving every private military and mercenary force a green light to invade Selva De Fuego and do whatever it takes to crush the rogue corporation.

This where you come in. As the commander of a division of seasoned soldiers of fortune, your mission is to defeat Phoenix before your rivals - but it won‚Äôt be easy. Standing between you and victory are the most elite mercenaries and devastating weapons on the modern battlefield.

Use a cutting-edge arsenal of weapons including advanced assault vehicles, tanks and futuristic military drones to prepare for all-out warfare in the mobile sequel to the award-winning hit Soldiers Inc.‚Ñ¢.

NOTE: Please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Soldiers Inc: Mobile Warfare‚Ñ¢

Game Features

‚úî FREE TO PLAY
‚úî Available in the following languages: English, French, Spanish, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean and Russian.
‚úî Incredible graphics with motion-captured hero characters and stunning 3D maps.
‚úî Compete online in realtime massive multiplayer clan warfare.
‚úî Train and upgrade your troops and combat systems to create an unstoppable army.
‚úî Develop and deploy the next generation of military weapons across an ever-evolving battlefield.
‚úî Attack or Defend - reposition your base and customize your outposts to back up your strategy.
‚úî Participate in intense, tactical PvP against players all around the world.
‚úî Single-player PvE missions, tournaments, rewards, and achievements.
‚úî Forge an alliance, cooperate with teammates and devise strategies to defeat your rivals.
‚úî Live operations with hundreds of different events and leaderboards to play across single player and PvP.

comments: This isn't a "game", so much as it's a chat room, designed to psychologically manipulate you into spending money on it. In fact, prices for offer bundles will go UP if you buy them. And you'll need them, since they directly buy power. But that power can also be PERMANENTLY destroyed, requiring more purchases. I was in one of the top ten alliances, and I've never seen such tribalistic, immature morons, who banned me without warning for speaking out against spammed alliance-wide messages.

Very addicting!!! i can't stop playing it on my PC with Bluestacks app!!! Soon i will get a phone and enjoy it even more. Becareful for those newbies this is not a friendly game it can be really tough sometimes! Most of the time though i get lag but it's ok i am still able to play it smoothly after a few reload...

Even if you just boubht a $100.00 pack. You will get bombarded with pop ups trying to force you to buy more. So you have to log out and hope it goes away when you log back in. Still happening. It's as if it's a virus. Will send so many pop ups that it will lovk your phone and ir tablet up.
Game just locks on processing terrain data for days. Need to reboot my phone to unlock the freeze. Probably game isn't ready for brand new android operating system yet
Can't login, or if I can is not for long time. But the game is awesome.

title: The Grand Mafia
description:
Are¬†you¬†ready¬†to become the most legendary Mafia Boss?

Since¬†the¬†death¬†of¬†our¬†Old¬†Godfather,¬†the¬†Family¬†has¬†been¬†missing a strong¬†leader, one¬†that¬†can¬†unite¬†all¬†the¬†mafia¬†gangs.¬†You must¬†find¬†and recruit talented¬†individuals¬†from all corners of the¬†underworld¬†society,¬†ranging¬†from¬†thieves¬†and¬†mercenaries¬†to¬†athletes¬†and¬†businessmen,¬†to¬†strengthen¬†your¬†crew.¬†Fight,¬†dominate¬†and become the criminal mastermind who can¬†take¬†over¬†the¬†whole¬†underworld!

[Game Features]:

‚òÜTake Over the Underworld‚òÜ

Players will need to take on the law and battle other players to control the cities they reside in. Businesses will be up for grabs. Citizens seeking a better life will look to you as their savior. You will entice models and celebrities to join your life of crime with your dashing looks and mysterious charisma!

‚òÜLots of Thugs to Choose From‚òÜ

There are many different types of thugs within the game. Bruisers, Hitmen, Bikers and Mortar Cars are all at your disposal! Each type of thugs have their own stats. You will need to upgrade your loyal minions and choose the formations of your crews wisely. There will be times when you need to be aggressively offensive, times when you need to be overly defensive, and then there will be times when you need to have stealth on your side!

‚òÜTons of Faction Events‚òÜ

Once you have joined a Faction, you will be able to take part in numerous weekly and seasonal events. Want to take over the local government together? Want to clean up the streets of any unworthy punks who want to criticize your reign of terror? Stay tuned for various cool competitions!

‚òÜCustomizable Strategies‚òÜ

Every player will be able to develop their criminal empire differently. There are different skills, stats, characters and upgradable content within the game, which require your attention to strategy to individualize your army with fully-fledged mechanics. 

‚òÜConstruct, Invest and Date‚òÜ

How will you prioritize the development of your criminal empire? Will you take over local businesses? Invest in the right strategic upgrades? Improve the look of your Turf, so that it strikes fear into your enemies? Perhaps you‚Äôll just make everyone around you jealous by dating all the local hotties when they realize you‚Äôre the slickest crook in town!

‚òÜDifferent Styles of Fighting‚òÜ

This game offers various types of battles. Sometimes you will need to choose your special characters to tackle harder opponents. At other times you will have to organize massive Crews to invade the turfs of other players. There are be both interactive and idle battles to choose from!

‚òÜWorldwide Online Tournaments‚òÜ

You won‚Äôt be alone in this pursuit to live a life of a Mafia Boss! You will compete with players from all over the world to reach the top of your criminal career. Will you join forces with them to form a Faction, or meddle in their operations to take them down? Who will become the next godfather? Your actions will determine your fate!


Official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/111488273880659
Official Line: @thegrandmafiaen
Official e-mail: tgmafia@yottagames.com

‚óèTips
‚Äª The app is free to download. There is some paid content available via in-app purchases.
‚Äª Please pay attention to your gaming time and avoid addiction.
‚Äª The content of this game involves violence (attacks and other bloody scenes), strong language, game characters wearing clothing of sexual characteristics.

comments: Great game, its a good way to pass the time. Bit difficult to grasp what to do in the beginning but once you get the hang of it then its great fun. 30/10/2020 Um.... what happened guys? This last update you just did has made this game glitchy.... sometimes i cant log into the game and have to delete and re-install... so far its been done 3 times.... not cool at all. Fix the problem please. Thanks.

The game has very good graphics and it could be a lot of fun to play if it didnt have players that harrassed and bully you constantly, I have only played for 1 week and I needed to quit, my group was constantly attacked everyday for 3 days by rich players. And were harrassed in there inboxes and made to feel uncomfortable. For no reason . Alot of people quit in my group , in the last couple days because of this. I will not waist my money on game, with players like this, I am uninstalling app.

Stuck on loading screen since last update or would give 3-4 stars, but already getting bored anyway just another typical forced to join a group to play online and get attacked by other players and forced to spend real money or wait forever to advance once you get to a certain point type game. But at least they haven't forced ads on players yet like most do.

Another update 2020 Oct 29. Game is a mess. Can't open app. Upon uninstall reinstall, app opens momentarily to find others saying app very buggy. App no longer works. Wow. Very fun UPDATE: Still a fun game. I have no problem spending a lot of money to have any chance of winning. Fine. What I DO have a problem with is that the players are "bots." Support and devs are non-existent. Report a bug (which they have a button for) and get ZERO reply. Sucks. And no fixes. Total BS. Wake up dummies.

Good graphics, nice game really enjoy it ..but the big issue with it is that when you opening it ,it loads for a few seconds and goes out completely and doesn't let you in ..and this happens after a while of playing ,after you've went out the game and want to go back in to play ...had to uninstall and reinstall to continue.... overall it's a nice game but the issue of not being able to go in the game after being out has to be fixed

comments: The app is very good, it lacks many important features, such as making tasks, or linking elements to other apps. Also the button actions are very less. Add more things to the free plan. Also give a feature to add our own domain in the free plan, because it will show the app's ad and also the domain. Why ??? Also add a feature to share PDFs and documents in the groups...Please add this feature and I am sure for a 5-star review...

This app is horrible, avoid it like the plague. I know they meant good but it is a mess will just waste your MBs. 1) I can't find or access my sites.it just asks me to create a new one. 2) Takes ages to just load the help page. 3) Their solution to fixing the problem is them just telling you that you logged in with the wrong email address. I think adding an "Import/Re-import your site(s)" button would be a better solution.

This app is terrible... it takes an hour to add 1 product. Maybe. The amount of time I waste taking photos, retaking photos, upload failed repeatedly, close app, start over, etc. Is infuriating!!! As a small maker business, I have a ton of one of a kind items I just cannot list. Because I cannot get them listed! Most of my stuff is on etsy because I don't have any other choice. And to top it all off, I have to start my listings at the computer then try to upload the photos on my phone.

It's a little intimidating at first to start, but once you begin toggling with the settings and features it starts to slowly form. I honestly should watch some tips and tricks videos to see how to make my website just how I want it. I honestly have been trying to get a friend to get interested in me, but no takers yet! I have used Wix programming since 2010 for high school studio art.

Started using WIX to build websites using a computer because the online website builder is one of the best I've come across. But as many of our club members only use a smartphone, not a computer, I thought the WIX mobile app would make life easier. NOT SO! When a member builds his profile on a computer, it automatically shows up on the app version. But not the other way around. If you add a photo to your profile on the app, it doesn't appear on the website version. This needs fixing!

title: Age of Lords: Legends & Rebels
description:
Age of Lords is a popular strategy MMO game set in the Medieval Age. As a mighty lord you will build a grand castle, forge alliances and TRAIN massive armies to defeat other REAL players. A game of kings and queens who fight to become the most fierce slayer in their kingdom. 

FEATURES
‚úî Develop your castle, research new technologies and become a kingdom builder
‚úî Use diplomatic strategy to forge Alliances with other lords
‚úî Use brute force and subterfuge to defeat enemy players
‚úî Train a massive medieval army with various troops including cavalry, infantry and archers
‚úî Explore the Kingdom Map to gather resources, scout rebel players
‚úî  Experience the bearded dragon age and become a monster slayer
‚úî Chat in real time and set up diplomatic ties with other alliances
‚úî Discuss war strategies with allied lords
‚úî Form a rally march and hire lords and knights to boost your chances to win
‚úî Become part of the legends and rebels by conquering the King's throne
‚úî Reach the top of the rankings and earn the respect of the whole kingdom
‚úî Compete with thousands of player in weekly events
‚úî Level Up your Hero to be worthy of a rising empire
‚úî Learn the greatest mmo strategy of medieval times by completing hundreds of Quests and collecting massive rewards
‚úî Use FREE Speed Ups to develop faster and trump your enemies
‚úî Become a VIP player and gain game-changing bonuses
‚úî Save the day by choosing the right time to attack or retreat, to wage war or make peace
‚úî Discover countless strategies and diplomatic choices!

Passionate players from all over the world have joined to form alliances and explore together the medieval times warfare, but real friendships were craeted and those go beyond the games' borders. Meet people like you, strategise and become famous in the most popular strategy mmo with a medieval theme!

‚òÖMilitary Game
Build barracks to train medieval troops. One you have created an army worthy of great battles, equip your Hero with the invincible gear such as Ring of Desctruction and Ring of Knowledge and become another type of lord of the rings.  Send scout cavalry towards your target and, if the odds are in your favor, use brute force to destroy you enemy's Castle. Great battles put you on the top of the rankings, making you renown for your strategic skills in military actions.

‚òÖSocial Game
Fights are not everything you need to know in a game of war: communication, leadership and social ties make the difference in battles' results. Chat and plan ahead with your alliance, but always keep your enemies close by. 

‚òÖEconomy Game
Apart from getting the right people to fight in the right war, you also need the right resources. Create and develop the economic branch of the game by using tactical trades with your allies, gathering resources from the map, using strategic boosts and skills to grow your economy stats. 

Join a new age of warfare and test yourself against real players worldwide in the best MMO medieval! PLAY NOW!

 Support
For feedback, contact us at support@ageoflords.com .
descriptionHTML:

FEATURES
‚úî Develop your castle, research new technologies and become a kingdom builder

recentChanges:
- New Monster levels, now up to level 25
- Quick Search option to find the nearest Resources, Monsters & Monster Forts
- Use the translate chat option to socialize with fellow Lords from all over the world

comments: This is a "Pay to win" game. Be ware of that! Some packs are costly ! If you are ok with that, this game is enjoyable !
boring gameplay but inspiring colors

A dead game and makes u keep grinding till death. All the dev's want is money while they keep u hooked in this game and fry dopamine receptors of your mind. It takes at least 3 to 4 years to at least build something worth fighting with and by then, ppl already lose their interest in this game.The kingdom chat is filled with soyboy who keeps talking trash whole day coz they have no life. The alliance members do trash talks by level 1 castle if u mute or block their big castle profile.

Customer service is non existent... I put in over 4 months to get my castle to 19 only had the upgrade to castle 20, just to log back in later to find everything had reset to a brand new lvl 1 castle my aliance members say that the account is still there but whenever I try to sign in with Google it just loads the brand new castle I have secured my account to my Gmail... I sent a report to you guys and never got a response. I would give 0 stars. Horrible non-existent customer service

Have had issues with server dis connections for months. The monster hut event isn't well planned out. You need 90 rallies just to make points. If you are a new player, be prepared that this game is severely old school and only changes something once every couple of years. There are a load of similiar fantastic games out there who are keeping their players engaged. This is not one of them.

title: Cookie Jam‚Ñ¢ Match 3 Games | Connect 3 or More
description:
Over 100 million people are playing our deliciously sweet match 3 games! Cookie Jam is filled with thousands of fun and challenging candy puzzles! Match 3 cookies & candy in order to clear the board and beat the cookie puzzle! Cookie Jam match 3 games are free to play and tons of fun! Play now!

Candy matching reimagined in this sugary connect three game
Welcome to a match 3 saga of tasty candy puzzles and jelly games. Blast through dessert themed islands and help Chef Panda crush cookies before they crumble in Cookie Jam - the SWEETEST match 3 game online! Play thousands of candy puzzle games for free, with new puzzles every week so you never run out of challenging jelly games to play!

Swap candy colored treats and crush delicious cookies and cakes. It‚Äôs no wonder people say Cookie Jam is the BEST MATCH 3 GAME EVER! We have thousands of match 3 games and candy puzzle games to enjoy! Each cookie puzzle comes jam-packed with candy matching fun and jelly matching thrills!

Chef Panda has an order to fill and you can help. Connect three or more treats to fill orders and push through levels in this relaxing swapping game. Match 5 treats to wipe the board clean with a powerful cake crush booster. Discover countless new levels and collect awesome boosters in the ultimate match three game online.

KEY INGREDIENTS:
üç™ Free to play cookie matching fun for everyone!
üç™ Never-ending fun with THOUSANDS of unique levels with new ones added weekly
üç™ Deliciously sweet supply of candy crushing power-ups and combos

üç™ Earn rewards and sweet prizes with limited-time events

LIKE: https://www.facebook.com/PlayCookieJam

You'll love to swap, match, and crunch through ever expanding levels and events. Check back often to see all the new candy, cake, and sweet treats that we've added! You'll love to crush through each sweet puzzle. Begin your bakery adventure on this free match three game today!

recentChanges: The harvest season has arrived in Cookie Jam! Come join us with this sweet update including new levels, events, and more!
comments: Love the game but shouldn't have to pay for more coins. Should get them on the wheel sometimes. Never do. Free play time clock should stop until you get back to play. Can't play 24 hours straight. I want to, but humanly impossible. Fix that please. Thank you for responding! I got the coins on my last spin. Great! Still need to fix the free play we get. I had several hours but fell asleep before I could play. Lost the remaining time. Please fix that. Thanks!!!!

The constant attempts to sell you more lives and game time is beyond annoying. Also, games seemingly are programmed for you to lose with only one move left, trying to frustrate you into buying more moves. Update: Sure, you don't have to purchase additional game time or moves, but I could also walk from Chicago to New York all without having to pay for gas, bus fare, or a plane ticket. Just like I will eventually arrive at my destination, I will also eventually complete the game level.

I have had this game for awhile, but recently it's become frustrating that lives do not regenerate. I will play at night, run out of lives, and the next morning there are still 0 lives. Sometimes I can restart my phone and it resolves, other times, nothing works. It's only a fun game when you can actually play it. :(

Used to love this game, until it became a money eater. Not really as much fun now, especially since the pandemic, when I don't have the extra money, try to play for a stress reliever, Not more stress. Now won't even give daily bonus even if You log in Every Day, when You get so far, it cuts You Off because You won't pay for more, SAD...

Love this game! ‚ù§ ever since update, you don't receive extra spins and always get the same things. You very seldom receive the coins. Now its even harder to win the new air ships. I haven't won a new since July, just not fun like it use to be. Now you have win 30 levels to win an Air Ship. Not fun at all...you do the Cookie walk no coins, and again no extra spins. Really thinking about getting rid of the game. So disappointing.

title: Heart's Medicine - Doctor's Oath - Hospital Drama
description:
Become a doctor in a romantic medical drama with aspiring intern Allison Heart!

GameHouse and Blue Giraffe proudly present the latest GameHouse Original Story, starring your favorite doctor, Allison Heart! 
Heart's Medicine - Doctor's Oath is an intense medical drama tied to a casual game that‚Äôll move you to tears. The game has a gripping and unique storyline, original singer/songwriter music, highly detailed artwork and animation, cool addictive gameplay and an insane amount of heart. If you enjoy games that focus on great storytelling, this game is for you!

‚ù§Ô∏è Experience the life of a doctor as you rush to find a cure for an unknown disease!
‚ù§Ô∏è Your search for a cure will take you through six exciting new hospital wards, from the Clinic to the Morgue.
‚ù§Ô∏è Play the full game with no extra charges, thanks to our free-to-play model. 
‚ù§Ô∏è  More levels to play than ever before! Enjoy 240 levels at launch, with more to come!
‚ù§Ô∏è So many extras! Unlock new story scenes, level up your character to earn helpful bonuses, and purchase the upgrades YOU want to buy
‚ù§Ô∏è  Party with Oliver and his guinea pig friends, Punky and Olive.
‚ù§Ô∏è Master new mini-games like a true doctor, all in medical style.
‚ù§Ô∏è Additional levels will be added in the future, giving you even MORE of the game you love!


Follow Allison as she begins her last rotations as an intern at Queensburrow Bridge Hospital, on her path to graduating as a fully-fledged doctor! Unfortunately, things never go smoothly for Allison, and this is no exception. Dr. Ermey, the lead physician during her clinic rotation, seems to have it in for her, and threatens to fail her. Allison ends up watching her chances of becoming a doctor shrink by the minute, desperately searching for a solution, but unable to find one.
However, everything gets put on hold when a patient with a mysterious disease is admitted to the hospital. Several doctors end up becoming infected themselves, including Connor, Sophia‚Ä¶ and Dr. Ermey. When the CDC quarantines Queensburrow, it‚Äôs a race against time for Allison and the other doctors to find a cure before more deaths occur. 
Your assistance will be invaluable to Allison as she tries to beat the clock and find a cure in time! Experience love, intense action, realistic drama, crazy funny moments and the beauty of celebrating life in Heart‚Äôs Medicine ‚Äì Doctor‚Äôs Oath.

Follow Allison on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/heartsmedicinegame/

Follow GameHouse on Facebook:: https://www.facebook.com/GameHouseOriginalStories/

*Download the GameHouse Original Stories app and enjoy other amazing games like Delicious, Dr. Cares and Fabulous:* https://goo.gl/SXb8sa

comments: I absolutely love this game it gives you back story, intrigue, and a real interest in the characters. I absolutely love it!!! I love story line it makes things that much more interesting and this game has everything to keep you hooked, it definitely has me. I just wish there was a way to get energy either from friends or from watching ads more because I hate waiting until my energy fills up again maybe they can work that in some how but honestly I have no issues with the game it's GREAT üëçüëçüëçüëç

Love this game series I am subscriber. I don't mind the in app purchases I've made a few. My problem is the special events, I have the same problem with them all. Currently with the Halloween I have gotten to chest number 8 and am no longer getting credit for the skulls I've earned. So I can never finish an event. I stopped playing for awhile because of this issue and the fact that I can't get support in the game to work either. I haven't gotten credit for the skulls in the last 3 levels

I have been playing this game for a long time now and it's wonderful with the storyline and the game play it's been improved drastically. The only thing I'm complaining about is that it has a few bugs. When I just played I had a level with Ryan and a mobile clinic with tray decay and limited tray space. As soon as I pressed play, it cleared the entire level for me without me even playing with a score of zero and then I was stuck on the menu. It also crashes and I lost energy.

I have played all the Heart's Medicine games, and even purchased the monthly subscription to play them. This game however is completely different.. I hate the fact that there are now in app purchases and an energy system. I loved this game franchise BECAUSE it wasn't pay to play. Why are you shoving countless "special offers" in my face? I want to actually play and experience the story.. but now I see that money has become more of a priority. I cannot describe how disappointed I am.

Such a great game but the thing that I don't like about it, is how the couples kiss in the game. But its still a great game and I love how there is different items that you can purchase from the shop to make your docters office more better with the items! And I also love how there is speed so if you need help because your slow you can purchase speed with only 10 üíé and I use the speed alot for help when I start playing the game. ‚ô°

title: NOAA Weather Radar Live & Alerts
description:
Get a powerful yet easy-to-use weather station right on your device with NOAA Weather Radar Live & Alerts. Real-time animated weather radar images on a highly interactive map enhanced with severe weather warnings provide accurate weather forecasts that will prevent bad weather from taking you by surprise.

The app reflects accurate real-time weather conditions and provides you with the detailed meteo information you need to know: current and "Feels Like" temperature, the chance of precipitation and humidity info, wind speed and wind direction, pressure changes and more. Customize your weather report according to your taste ‚Äì choose the information you would like to receive!

Take a look at current weather conditions or take the most of the top-notch functionality of the weather radar. Get a push notification whenever an alert is issued (tornadoes, flood warnings, snow storms, and more) without opening the app!

Real-time animated meteo radar on a highly interactive terrain or satellite map enhanced with severe weather warnings and alerts will meet the needs of even the most demanding users. Rainy, snowy, stormy or cloudy weather, you‚Äôll be prepared for it all!

Short-term (24-hour) and long-term (7-day) accurate weather forecast for any location.

Units of measurement:
üåü Pressure in inches, mm, kPa or mbar,
üåü Fahrenheit/Celsius and Miles/Kilometers,
üåü Wind speed in mph, km/h, m/s, knots, Beaufort.

World Weather Map:
üö© Explore the weather on an interactive map. Weather icons will let you know what the local temperature is throughout the world. Tap on them to get more details.

Easy location search:
üö© Toggle between cities and spy on weather in other parts of the world. Bookmarked locations will help you quickly switch to your favorite spots, check today‚Äôs weather or find out the forecast for tomorrow. 

Radar, Satellite and Precipitation Forecast:
üö© Get real-time snow and rain tracking, mixed precipitation data, and cloud cover in high resolution and vivid colors by switching between radar, satellite and rain maps.

Customizable overlays:
üö© Choose background maps and the number of frames; adjust opacity and loop speed for the overlays.

Resizable widget:
üö© Add a nice customizable widget to your screen and get the live-updated weather information you want to know without opening the app.

More handy options for the best user experience!


National Weather Service watches and warnings are shown on the map as interactive warning boxes highlighting the territories they're active for. Tap any to get the card with the full alert text.

Coverage Info:
Radar images: the US (Continental US, Alaska, Hawaii, Guam, Northern Mariana Islands and Puerto Rico), Mexico (northern), Canada (southern), Australia, the UK, Ireland, Germany, France, the Netherlands, Italy (northern and north-western), Denmark, Austria, Sweden, Finland, Spain, Portugal, Switzerland, Norway, Poland, Andorra, Japan, Taiwan.

Precipitation Forecast, satellite images, and detailed weather info are available worldwide.

By downloading this application, you agree to the Apalon Apps End User License Agreement and Privacy Policy.
You can choose from different subscription options.
* A subscription with a free trial will automatically renew to a paid subscription unless you cancel the subscription before the end of the free trial period.
* Cancel a free trial or subscription anytime through your account settings on the Google Play Store and continue to enjoy the premium content until the end of the free-trial period or paid subscription!
 
Go Premium and get some nice extra features:

‚ôõ Alerts for unlimited number of saved locations;
‚ôõ Higher Accuracy precipitation forecast option;
‚ôõ Hurricane tracker for the whole duration of your plan;
‚ôõ Lightning tracker with timely lightning alerts;
‚ôõ Ad-free!

Privacy Policy: http://apalon.com/privacy_policy.html
EULA: http://www.apalon.com/terms_of_use.html
AdChoices: http://www.apalon.com/privacy_policy.html#4

comments: I had been using free version for a long time. As a truck driver, being able to look a few hours ahead to track radar was very helpful to timing travel in mountainous areas. Since i loaded an update, it's worthless. The radar only shows for a short time prior to present. It no longer shows any future projections for radar movement. Way to ruin a good resource for weather info. Certainly not considering a subscription now.

It's not free! It's an expensive trial. Don't waste your time. There are too many free apps with less ads that do way better job than this, which was obviously developed by a programmer in the first grade. use 1weather, had less intrusive ads or use the weather channel. This is for people who buy their first Android phones and don't know any better which is why they have no money

I came to this after Dark Sky's sold out, my big complaint is that it does not offer future predictions on the radar, it only offers current and past. I pay for the yearly membership since I'm a truck driver and its a tax write off and it has other benifits that are helpful to me. I'd love to see this feature added, and if it does it would change my rating to 5 stars.

After my disappointing experience w/the Accuweather and WeatherUnderground apps, I avoid paid upgrades and memberships. So if you do not upgrade and you can tolerate the aggressive pop-up advertising, then in my opinion the free version of the NOAA app is good enough to provide you w/a quick forecast and temperature reading. That's the case for now until paid membership becomes mandatory in the inevitable future. But always, keep your eyes on the skies.

I depend on this app for real time weather. Having a farm with horses it's nice to look and see bad weather that pops up real fast. Direct TV goes down and I get no info on the severity of bad weather without th[s app. The local weather channel gives no up to date even if it is up in running. I even have a NOAA weather radio that is my back up. Awesome app!!!!!

title: Peak ‚Äì Brain Games & Training
description:
Peak is the fun, free brain training workout designed around you. Peak uses brain games and puzzles to challenge memory, language and critical thinking to keep your mind active. 

With brain games made in partnership with academics from leading universities like Cambridge and NYU, and more than 12m downloads, Peak is a fun, challenging brain training experience.

It takes just 10 minutes a day to complete a brain training workout. And, with 45 brain games for adults, and new brain training workouts every day, there is always a fun challenge waiting for you.


KEY FEATURES
 
- Free brain games to challenge your Memory, Attention, Math, Problem Solving, Mental Agility, Language, Coordination, Creativity and Emotion Control.
- Learn which categories your brain excels in, and compete with friends by comparing your brainmap and brain game performance.
- Coach, the personal trainer for your brain, helps you track your progress and improve.
- Cognitive brain training with games from expert researchers at Cambridge University, NYU and more.
- Works offline so you can enjoy Peak brain games wherever you are.
- Selected by Google as Editor's Choice.
- More than 45 brain games available and regular updates to keep you challenged. 
- Get personalised brain training workouts and in-depth insights with Peak Pro.
- Get access to Peak Advanced Training modules: intensive programs that train a specific skill, including the new Wizard memory game created with Professor Barbara Sahakian and Tom Piercy in the Department of Psychiatry at the University of Cambridge.
 

IN THE NEWS

‚ÄúIts mini games focus on memory and attention, with strong detail in its feedback on your performance.‚Äù - The Guardian

‚ÄúImpressed with graphs in Peak that let you see your performance over time.‚Äù - The Wall Street Journal

‚ÄúThe Peak app is designed to provide each user with a profound level of insight into their current state of cognitive function.‚Äù - Techworld


DEVELOPED BY NEUROSCIENTISTS
 
Designed in collaboration with experts in neuroscience, cognitive science and education, Peak makes brain training fun and rewarding. Peak's scientific advisory board includes Professor Barbara Sahakian FMedSci DSc, Professor of Clinical Neuropsychology at the University of Cambridge.
 
Follow us - twitter.com/peaklabs
Like us - facebook.com/peaklabs
Visit us - peak.net
Say hi - hello@peak.net
 

For more information:
 
Terms of Use - http://www.peak.net/terms-and-conditions
Privacy Policy - http://www.peak.net/privacy-policy
Payment Policy - http://www.peak.net/payment-policy

summary: Train Your Brain Today With Fun, Challenging Brain Training Games üöÄ
developerAddress: 18-20 Crucifix Ln, Bermondsey, London SE1 3JW
recentChanges: Your brain is unique and that‚Äôs why Coach creates personal workouts just for you. But we all have specific skills we want to challenge and so we‚Äôre introducing Workout Selection. You can select from a range of workouts, each one specially created for you. Interested in language? Try our language workout! Only have 5 minutes to train? Our 5 minute Coffee Break workout is perfect!
comments: It's a solid app with a lot of challenges. Some of them pretty simple and common, other instead are very difficult, I love this balance. I used to play Elevate last year and I decided to change for something different, however there are few games (especially math ones) that I wish to have here as well! Hoping to see some new game in the future (:

The games on here are very good and I enjoyed playing them. Whether they actually do anything for your brain or whether you simply get better at playing them is an interesting and ongoing question! My only criticism is that the language is very american-based and so can be quite challenging if you are UK English speaking because you don't understand what object you should be looking for for example in the find the object game. Overall excellent.

First few weeks things were good, . Now my R√†ting has gone from 4 to 2. I have free version and am supposed to watch videos. Yeh, right! I push play and screens says "loading video" but it Never does. After 30 sec, I get bumped back to play screen, very boring ! If I was not a bed ridden senior citizen w/covid complications, it would not bother me so badly. I rebooted my ph & reinstalled your app too many, times~NO change. I enjoyed what little I saw of Peak. Hasta la vista !

I like the app. It brings me a lot of mental challenges, that are quite interesting. It really increases our IQ. The only problem I am facing is performance. Whenever a game starts or even in the middle of the same, it stutters and freezes, randomly. It doesn't occur often, but it disturbs, especially on timing challenges. OTT, the app is look good üôÇüëçüèª

Honestly, I never leave reviews, but I really do love this app! I paid for all the content and most of the time when I buy in app purchases for more content, I am left pretty bored and dissatisfied, but Peak is the only app so far that hasn't left me feeling like that! So thank you, and I really enjoy training daily to get me into the zone for using my mind for the rest of the day, as well as being able to see the progress I am making compared to other people within my age group.

title: Solitaire TriPeaks: Play Free Solitaire Card Games
description:
Cards. They‚Äôve been around for literally centuries. They have long-lasting appeal.

Solitaire. Countless hours have passed while people have entertained themselves by playing solitaire. If boredom was as life-threatening as children proclaim, solitaire would have saved tens, possibly hundreds, of millions of lives. No joke. 

TriPeaks. Arguably the most fun Solitaire game of them all. 

Solitaire TriPeaks. No doubt about it - *the* most fun TriPeaks version out there. It‚Äôs a little bit Golf, it‚Äôs a little bit Pyramid, and it‚Äôs a whole lot of depth. It‚Äôs a deep game, my friend. A very deep game. 

Here‚Äôs the deal. You‚Äôve got the basics - the game itself. Then you throw in things like unique Hazards and Boosters, Wild Cards, a whole slew of tableau setups, and you‚Äôre just skimming the surface. You keep on playing, and then you‚Äôll discover whole new worlds - tons of levels, Clubs, leagues, the ability to chat with your Club Members, a Friend Center, and events that will challenge your mind, and satisfy your soul. We don‚Äôt play the hyperbole game. We state the facts.

Oh, and lest we forget, this game is like being on a vacation with a cast of some crazy characters you‚Äôll likely fall in love with pretty quick. There are the two hosts to the game, Tiki and Poi. Tiki‚Äôs a Tiki - nobody really knows what the heck he is, and that‚Äôs just how it is. And Poi? He‚Äôs his adorable dog and sidekick. Together, they‚Äôll make you laugh and keep you inspired to take on the next level. Then there are other characters as you move through the game, like Pele, the Volcano Goddess. Don‚Äôt mess with her. And Marina, she‚Äôs as sweet as sweet can be. There are penguins, bunnies, monkeys, a parrot and a curmudgeonly old Pirate named Captain Karma. 

Also, there‚Äôs the art. You won‚Äôt believe the art in these levels - it‚Äôs like out of this world, my friend. Every level provides an enticing background. Some make you want to take a vacation on the beach. Others make you want to fly in space, or delve the deepest depths of the ocean. 

There you have it. Download this one game today, and you won‚Äôt be searching the app store for much anymore.

Privacy Policy:
http://gsngamesnetwork.com/privacy.html

summary: Free solitaire games! Like Spider, FreeCell, Klondike & Pyramid - but more fun!
developerAddress: 100 Summer St. 11th Floor. Boston, MA 02110
recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Fall into the Lost Leaves Scavenger Hunt!
‚Ä¢ Flowers are always in season for the Lei of the Orchid Luau!
‚Ä¢ Bone up for Bailey‚Äôs Bash - 6 Trials in 48 Hours!
‚Ä¢ Haunted Mini Tikis? You‚Äôll see ‚Äòem in the upcoming Seasonal event!
‚Ä¢ Bug fixes: We exorcise the bugs when we find ‚Äòem! If you see any, let us know!
comments: Don't waste your time. It will be fun in the beginning but will get frustrating as you advance. It becomes extremely difficult to win. I have played the same level over 15 times to win and its impossible. I've went from having 90,000 coins to less than 3000 just trying to solve the same level (each game cost 3000 coins to play). I usually don't post comments, but this app made me do it.

I love this game but why so much for each level? Also, 6000 coins for 5 cards?! Half the time those cards do not have the cards you need so you spent 6000 coins for nothing. I love this game but I'm finding myself spending an obscene amount of money just to pass levels I've been stuck on for days! It seems like the higher the level the less cards they give you. The boosts cost 6000 coins each which is ridiculous. No more will I spend my money on this game which is clearly what they want.

2nd review. Again, it's a beautiful game but the decks aren't legitimate and I know in my gut that the cards are changing to make you keep spending your bank and each hand costs more and more, it takes the fun away from the game. It's not honest. I just won 5000 coins and I didn't get them. I watched that corner and it never changed. Shame.

Love this game . But for some reason it's having problems loading my progress this morning. I have restarted my phone. I have restarted the game several times and it's still stuck in the mode of loading my progress. I have almost 190,000 coins that I hate to lose if I have to uninstall and reinstall the game. My Wi-Fi is up and running well so that is not the issue. You have told players to go to menu and then ask for help. If you can't get into the game you can't go to menu and ask for help.

I downloaded this game as a reward offer was promised after completing level 65. I am currently on level 70 and they refuse to grant the reward of diamonds in the game app that it advertised and offered reward in. Beware...if you are looking to install this game for a promised reward for reaching a certain level then know they do not honor that promise!

title: Smurfs' Village
description:
The evil wizard Gargamel and his ever present cat companion, Azrael, have finally found the Smurfs‚Äô village and scattered our lovable blue friends far and wide throughout the enchanted forest. Come along with familiar friends, like Papa Smurf, Smurfette, Brainy, Jokey, Greedy and the rest of the smurf family, as they guide you on a family fun adventure to build a new forest village for the Smurfs to call home.

Based on the beloved classic Saturday morning cartoon, your adventure begins with a single mushroom home and a smurflightful plot of land. Harvest your smurfberries. Build charming huts, special mushroom houses, and bridges. And decorate your village with colorful gardens, lights, flower chairs, hammocks and more!

------------------------
FEATURES:
FAMILY FUN - Build your very own Smurfs' village and create a new home for the Smurfs.

PLAY WITH YOUR FAVORITE SMURFS - Papa Smurf, Smurfette, Lazy Smurf, Baby Smurf, Handy Smurf, and Jokey Smurf

HARVEST SMURFBERRIES - Use in-app purchase to speed up the growth of your crops and your blue village.

SMURFY MINI-GAMES ‚Äì While your village is growing, play multiple mini-games like: Greedy Smurf‚Äôs Baking Game, Papa Smurf‚Äôs Potion Mixing Game, Painter Smurf‚Äôs Painting Game, Lazy Smurf's Fishin' Game and a new free Handy Smurf minigame to unlock additional bonuses.

CONNECT WITH FRIENDS ‚Äì Share your Smurfs Experience on Facebook and send gifts to your friends' villages.

PLAY OFFLINE - manage your village anytime without having to connect to the internet
------------------------
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/smurfsgames 
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SmurfsVillage
Follow us on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/bongfish

developerAddress: 402 - 1243 Islington Avenue, Toronto, Ontario, M8X 1Y9
recentChanges:
A spooky and fun Dia de los Muertos update celebration!
‚Ä¢ Sugar Smurf dances into the Village with his Dia de los Muertos themed Hut and exclusive items!
‚Ä¢ New Sugar Mask Gargamel exclusive offer costume!
‚Ä¢ The colorful Sugar Pegasus glides into the Mega Mystery Boxes!
‚Ä¢ Help your Smurfs construct the Spooky Tower Wonder!
‚Ä¢ New Dia de los Muertos items to celebrate with!
comments: This game deserves a million stars out of five. The chance to visit another village is like visiting another planet. Mindblowing those villages are. That the game goes from night to day synchronized to the actual diurnal nocturnal quotidian circadian algorithm of natural time actually brought me to tears, in a good way. The spirit of the medieval forest is present in this smurfy app. Smurfeat emptor: October 30 2020. Paid $6.81 for lunar new year dragon and did not get it. App snapped off after.

Played this game years ago and missed it, had to come back. Yes, there are glitches. Read up on how to manually save your game. The extra attention is worth it. The game is super cute, I found game support to be helpful when I had an issue. It's the only game I happily spend real money on, much to my husbands chagrin muaha! Love the development, the graphics, being able to create my village. Each day I look forward to opening up my village and working on it makes me smile.

Super cute!! Look forward to playing with my favorite Smurfs everyday. Love the new updates and graphics. One issue I don't like is somethings are worth more money than the smurf huts, like how Fairy Prince Garth is normally worth $24.99. I don't think somethings will be worth the price we're paying. Other than that, the game is so worth playing or at least taking a look at.

I wish i could do 0 stars. I had a huge village, including other locations like the grove etc. But It doesn't save anything after i last downloaded it. No new buildings, anything i place in a garden bed, it's just gone whenever i open the app again, even if it only been a few minutes.

Excellent gameplay. You will not get bored if you play online or offline. Everytime more interesting things are coming...but for suggestion i just suggest that improve gameplay for story line and make more story thinkful and adventures.

title: Design Home: Play + Save
description:
Looking for a new creative hobby? Play Design Home today - a relaxing, fun game that allows you to live the life of an interior decorator. Sharpen your decorating skills in daily Design Challenges and style visually stunning three-dimensional spaces with access to real, high-end furniture and decor brands. Unlock 'My Homes' to access bathrooms, kitchens and more customization options to bring your dream homes to life! It‚Äôs quick, it‚Äôs fun and you can connect with a vibrant creative community while learning about diverse d√©cor styles - thus improving your design skills and gaining inspiration that you can even apply in your real life.

* Relax through play and express your creativity in daily Design Challenges.
* Unlock rewards as you polish your amazing abilities as an interior decorator.
* Level up to access 'My Homes' - with dream homes of your very own to design as you wish!
* Play with real life, high-end brands as you learn about different interior design styles.
* Vote on your favorite rooms from a vibrant, creative community.
* Share your creativity and borrow furnishings from your friends when you connect to Facebook.

With new pieces added every day, Design Home lets you play with home furnishings from real-life brands - all available directly at your fingertips. Not only can you discover brands and trends, you can get inspired and build your interior decorating skills! 

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your Google account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.
- This game is not intended for children.
- Please buy carefully.
- Advertising appears in this game.
- This game may permit users to interact with one another (e.g., chat rooms, player to player chat, messaging) depending on the availability of these features. Linking to social networking sites are not intended for persons in violation of the applicable rules of such social networking sites.
- A network connection is required to play.
- For information about how Glu collects and uses your data, please read our privacy policy at: www.Glu.com/privacy
- If you have a problem with this game, please use the game‚Äôs ‚ÄúHelp‚Äù feature.

Terms of Service: http://www.glu.com/terms
Privacy Policy: http://www.glu.com/privacy

developerAddress:
875 Howard, Suite 100
San Francisco CA 94103
recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Introducing ‚ÄòDH Inspired‚Äô - an ALL-NEW shopping experience to earn savings on home decor delivered right to your door by just playing the game you love.

comments: I really love this game, it is addictive. I recommend a few changes or I need to back away from playing. To decorate the way you'd like, it cost too much money. I think once you've earned an item it should be yours to keep. You only get to use it 5 times then you have to keep re-purchasing. Also, the "My Homes" doesn't keep up with your pace, you can only collect 50 keys then you just lose them. I wish when going through items to purchase you could sort by price. 5 stars down to 3, sorry!

I absolutely like this game. The designs and inventory are pretty. I like the fact that they give you diamonds every day and have a chance to earn money on a design with out having to spend any money. This comment was when I first started playing the game. I have been p!aying for a few months now and I sense the frustration as others do about the voting process. It really needs to be rethought. It is not fair and gives stars when not due and no stars when due. People see differently!

Love this app, but I would love some real review so I can learn how to.get the 5.0 scores all the time. Also, the app expects you to buy too much all the time with what is required. It makes it hard to just play in the app. We need more daily challenges. Update: I really like this app but it is so hard to do more than 1 challenge because everything costs so much in diamonds. Too expensive.

Design home is my daily stress reliever. Although I love this game, I have to say that it is always taking forever to load and it is not my connection though it says I have a bad connection. For the few years I have been playing it I haven't complained but I'm at level 51 and just trying to load an option takes forever and sometimes I'm told item can't be found right nowü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è. It's a little frustrating but still absolutely love this game. Please let me know if there is a way to improve this?

Game is great.. expensive if you want to keep up...but it never ever connects for me the 1st time . and it's not my interent it's your server...One time I have to use my interent then I have to use my data..and most times I have to go back and forth 3 or 4 times to see which it will take...and this is every single day a few times a day .it never is the same and takes forever to load when it finally gets working.. but I do love the game! I am addicted just wish you would fix those 2 things...

title: SimCity BuildIt
description:
Welcome, Mayor! Be the hero of your very own city as you design and create a beautiful, bustling metropolis. Every decision is yours as your city gets larger and more intricate. Make smart choices to keep your citizens happy and your skyline growing. Then trade, chat, compete, and join clubs with fellow Mayors. Build your way to extraordinary!

BRING YOUR CITY TO LIFE
Build skyscrapers, parks, bridges, and much more! Place buildings strategically to keep the taxes flowing and your city growing. Solve real-life challenges like traffic and pollution. Provide services like power plants and police departments. Keep traffic moving with grand avenues and streetcars.

PUT YOUR IMAGINATION ON THE MAP
Build Tokyo-, London- or Paris-style neighborhoods, and unlock exclusive landmarks like the Eiffel Tower or Statue of Liberty. Discover new technologies with the Future Cities while getting athletic with sports stadiums. Decorate your city with rivers, lakes and forests, and expand along the beach or on the mountain slopes. Unlock new geographic regions such as the Sunny Isles or Frosty Fjords, each with a unique architectural style. There‚Äôs always something new and different to make your city unique.

BATTLE YOUR WAY TO VICTORY
Defend your city against monsters or compete against other mayors in Club Wars. Plot winning strategies with your Club mates and declare war on other cities. Once the battle is on, unleash crazy disasters like the Disco Twister and Plant Monster on your opponents. Earn valuable rewards to use in battle or to improve your city. In addition, take on other players in the Contest of Mayors, where you can complete weekly challenges and climb the League ranks towards the top. Each new contest Season brings on new unique rewards to beautify your city!

CONNECT AND TEAM UP
Join a Mayor‚Äôs Club to trade supplies with other members and chat about strategies and available resources. Collaborate to help someone complete their personal vision and get support to complete yours. Build big, work together, lead other Mayors, and watch your city come to life!

-------
Important Consumer Information. This app:
Requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply). Requires acceptance of EA‚Äôs Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Includes in-game advertising. Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13. The app uses Google Play Game Services. Log out of Google Play Game Services before installation if you don‚Äôt want to share your game play with friends.
