Privacy and Cookie Policy: http://privacy.ea.com
Visit https://help.ea.com/en/ for assistance or inquiries.

EA may retire online features after 30 days‚Äô notice posted on www.ea.com/service-updates.
descriptionHTML:
Welcome, Mayor! Be the hero of your very own city as you design and create a beautiful, bustling metropolis. Every decision is yours as your city gets larger and more intricate. Make smart choices to keep your citizens happy and your skyline growing. Then trade, chat, compete, and join clubs with fellow Mayors. Build your way to extraordinary!

BRING YOUR CITY TO LIFE
Build skyscrapers, parks, bridges, and much more! Place buildings strategically to keep the taxes flowing and your city growing. Solve real-life challenges like traffic and pollution. Provide services like power plants and police departments. Keep traffic moving with grand avenues and streetcars.

PUT YOUR IMAGINATION ON THE MAP
Build Tokyo-, London- or Paris-style neighborhoods, and unlock exclusive landmarks like the Eiffel Tower or Statue of Liberty. Discover new technologies with the Future Cities while getting athletic with sports stadiums. Decorate your city with rivers, lakes and forests, and expand along the beach or on the mountain slopes. Unlock new geographic regions such as the Sunny Isles or Frosty Fjords, each with a unique architectural style. There‚Äôs always something new and different to make your city unique.

BATTLE YOUR WAY TO VICTORY
Defend your city against monsters or compete against other mayors in Club Wars. Plot winning strategies with your Club mates and declare war on other cities. Once the battle is on, unleash crazy disasters like the Disco Twister and Plant Monster on your opponents. Earn valuable rewards to use in battle or to improve your city. In addition, take on other players in the Contest of Mayors, where you can complete weekly challenges and climb the League ranks towards the top. Each new contest Season brings on new unique rewards to beautify your city!

CONNECT AND TEAM UP
Join a Mayor‚Äôs Club to trade supplies with other members and chat about strategies and available resources. Collaborate to help someone complete their personal vision and get support to complete yours. Build big, work together, lead other Mayors, and watch your city come to life!

-------
Important Consumer Information. This app:
Requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply). Requires acceptance of EA‚Äôs Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Includes in-game advertising. Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13. The app uses Google Play Game Services. Log out of Google Play Game Services before installation if you don‚Äôt want to share your game play with friends.

User Agreement: http://terms.ea.com
Privacy and Cookie Policy: http://privacy.ea.com
Visit https://help.ea.com/en/ for assistance or inquiries.

EA may retire online features after 30 days‚Äô notice posted on www.ea.com/service-updates.
summary: Build and manage your very own city, and watch it come to life.
developerAddress: Geneva, Switzerland
recentChanges: Get inspiration from history and build an old town in the heart of your city. Bring new life to ancient homes by restoring them to their former glory. Compete in the new Mayor's Pass Seasons to unlock buildings that survived since the middle ages, such as Guild Houses, Armory and much more. Fortify your domain with City Walls, Gates, and Towers. War Players can now enjoy Vu Pass, a new way of earning tailor-made rewards. Unlock new unique looks for your city in the war map. Happy building!
comments: Loved this game at first, but when you get to the higher levels the tasks are too complex, takes along time to gather resources that you need and why is it whenever you need a particular item, it is NEVER available in the market... I know, so we have to spend (actual) money to progress in the game. Good game, but designed so you have to purchase to further your game. Uninstalling...

I've been playing for 4 years and playing city wars. Now I'm not because there's too much items to make of too many varieties that takes hours to produce. It will make a player lose interest real fast especially in wars. A lot of time for little payoff. You have to make too many items to receive war items and get out of shield. I'm level 50 and have 335 storage. So this is more of a complaint than anything I guess. Just chasing the dragon. Good game but extremely time consuming. Extremely!

The game is pretty fun, once you get the city hall and trade depot you can get simoleons faster. One problem I have is that it keep asking me to sing in to my Google play games account Everytime I enter the game. I don't know why this is a think but I would love some help with this problem. But to you new players out there, remember not to build residential too fast or you might run out of things like power and water. So make sure you built power plants and water plants.

The game goads you into building more than you can afford before you realize you can't afford it, and then you have to wait for money to come in ‚Äì very slowly ‚Äì before you can build things you didn't know you needed at the time. And you can't scrap everything and start all over, unless you haven't connected the game with your Google account or Facebook. The only way to start over in that case is to demolish everything in the existing City. If they could fix those things, the game would be great.

This game is a very exciting game I enjoyed it in the past few years to the extent that I reached level 62. But I'm sorry for not given you guys 5 stars because my storage on my phone became low so I had to delete some apps and files on my phone. But I did it because I knew that when I install it again my progress would be restored but it did not happen that way. Because I didn't understand I always saved my progress. But without any doubt this game is an interesting game and uses a lot of time

title: Verizon Messages
description:
Stay connected using Verizon Messages sync features for your Smartphone, tablet, and computer. Keep the conversation going even when you‚Äôre switching between devices. Connect with family, friends, teammates, and more through personalized group chats, texts, photos, videos and gift cards worth up to $100 at stores like Starbucks, Dominos, and more. Now anyone can download and chat with Verizon Messages, even non Verizon customers (available on compatible devices).

GROUP CHATS ‚Äì Create larger group chats with up to 250 people. Send and receive photos/videos in seconds. Personalize your chat experience with avatars, backgrounds and more. You can even mute a conversation or add or remove members or without creating a new group.
YELP INTEGRATION ‚Äì Tap the plus menu and easily access Yelp from within the app. Search for restaurants, entertainment and directions. Make plans and share the details all within your chat.
SHARE YOUR LOCATION ‚Äì Glympse‚Ñ¢ lets you share your location with the people you choose for the length of time you set. Perfect for meeting up, or letting people know you‚Äôre running late.
SEND AN eGIFT ‚Äì Tap the plus menu and select eGifts icon. Easily send an eGift card right through text message. eGifting has been expanded to include eGift cards from more than 30 brands
SYNC ACROSS DEVICES ‚Äì Download Verizon Messages on all your devices, and sync messages across your smartphone, tablet and computer. Switch devices whenever you want. Make calls with your tablet anywhere.
DRIVING MODE ‚Äì Turn on driving mode to send an Auto-Reply message and disable incoming message notifications so you don‚Äôt get distracted on the road.
HD VOICE CALLING ‚Äì Eligibility rules apply. Link your phone number to the Verizon Messages app on your tablet and make and receive calls wherever they want on any network (cellular or Wi-Fi).

Other features:
# Schedule messages to be delivered at a specific date/time, even if your phone is turned off.
# Search the web for images and gifs to include in your chat with Yahoo search.
# Express yourself through colorful Emoji‚Äôs by tapping on highlighted keywords when composing messages.
# Send and receive messages over Wi-Fi from your smartphone, iOS device, tablet, PC, MAC, and web browser.

Need Help? Visit our Support Pages at
http://support.verizonwireless.com/clc/features/data_services/verizon-messages.html
View the complete Terms & Conditions at:
https://www.verizonwireless.com/support/verizon-messages-legal/
View the Verizon Messages privacy policy at:
https://www.verizon.com/about/privacy/verizon-messages-app-privacy-policy

comments: On 9/14 /2020 my phone stopped sending and receiving picture, audio, video, and group texts. The other line on my account did the same thing. Same time. We have done the software and app updates and it still isnt working. Edit: It's now 10/29/2020. It has been 6 weeks and we still can't send or receive any media. This is ridiculous. I've reported it several times and no one seems to care to fix it.

The app was great until my last update. Now it doesn't alert me with a sound or a number to indicate how many messages I have, when I get a notification. I went into setting to make sure my permission is on, & it is. I have to tap on the icon & open it to see if I have any messages. I'm missing, important information & meetings if I don't keep looking!

Latest version is NOT as good as previous. When I upgraded phone to Galaxy s20, I expected the app to work better;thinking the software was not updating on an older model. Looking at other reviews, the new version of the app seems to be the issue. Since this is a new phone, I am stuck with non working version Auto Reply and scheduling features are now missing and not functioning over multiple devices. I preferred this app because it also worked with other service providers. No longer the case.

Recently switched to a new phone and I am not getting txt messaging unless I open the app. I have gone through all the settings and uninstalled/reinstalled the app but still no fix. I have reported the bug several time. Apparently, a lot more people are having the same issue of not getting txt messages on time unless app is open. Please fix this issue.

The app is great. Have used it for years, but just got a new phone and it uses the phones default notification sound when new texts come in. The only way to change it is to customize it in each text. You used to be able to change the notification sound in the main customization and all texts would come in with the sound you selected. That option is still there, but doesn't work anymore. I like different sounds for texts, emails, and regular notifications.

title: Empire: Four Kingdoms | Medieval Strategy MMO
description:
Empires in a medieval civilization will witness rise of four kingdoms with clans clashing in this MMORPGüí¢. Empires are forged by allies & cunning kings in the stone age where kings build empiresüèò & fortresses with townsmen. Empire Four Kingdoms is an MMO experiencing rise of four civilizationsüåá & empires where castles are built & kings clash for victory , an experience in the ages of medieval empires. This empire game is a legend that will give glory & victory to the true war lord who will rule from the iron designed throne, the bling kingdom, with honor.
Build Empires & Strike Wars in Kingdoms - True War Game
üè∞Build an Empire with strategic trading of stone age resources in the medieval era
üèØTeam fortress & castles to defend your kingdom in wars from dragonsüêâ & ruling kings
‚úåAlliances with kings & other multiplayers to help you conquer rival clans & gain territory on an interactive world map
‚ôûTrain your knights for the reign of fire as the king of kings as a war of dragons is eminent
Strike kingdoms with archers & shoot arrowsüèπ to the mobile escaping lords
Enemies advancing towards your palace? Chat with friend or foe empire kingdoms or join the MMO community & active forum for advice to make your kingdom of empires the most powerful of all
üë∑Build over 60 different constructions & trade resources to gain wealth in gold üúö& silverüúõ for swords, shields‚õ®, wood & fireüî•
Witness an Age of Rising Empires and Civilizations
United we stand, Divided we fall - Build alliances & conquer rival kings in MMO battle. Defend your castle from enemies & fight a medieval war with epic PvP strategy. Conquer kings & defend your kingdom in this epic PvP strategy game. Do you have what it takes to rule an empire, fight enemies, defend your castle & build a growing army to dominate the Four Kingdoms? With this epic MMO game, you can employ cunning strategy to defend your kingdom, wisely choose your alliances to fight with you in battle & create a resourceful army.
Forge Empires with Alliances
Join millions of players in this award-winning multiplayer strategy & medieval war game - Empire: Four Kingdoms. With powerful rulers, fierce battles & strategic masterminds, your best PvP battle skills will come to the fore.
Battle War Ground Strategy Game
With the imperialist rulers ruling the townsmen in despair & capable of striking a war of dragons, you must protect the earth empire from various clans of kingdoms in the medieval stone age. The throne is forged by deceiving warriors from massive royale clans. Are you ready to attack these empires and claim victory?
Empire Building Games with War Lords
Social empires are not won by just attacking. There is strategy & planning involved, resources are collected & empires are built in villages by constructing buildings, mining stone, smelting weapons, building town halls, training soldiers, knights & archers. The earth empire must be able to defend itself from the cunning war lords.
Rise of Castles in Kingdoms with Fortress
Fight clan wars & clan battles to achieve victory over forts & knights. Possessing state buildings of several empires to become the king of all kingdoms is the mission for this strategy war game. 
* Grow from a novice to a knight with decorative war items
* Quests with objectives for different levels of experience, become a fierce warrior
* Different wars zones from multiple countries, go on national wars by making alliances
* Collect taxes from the villagers & enrich the royal wealth of the empire

Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/EmpireFourKingdoms
Privacy Policy, Terms Conditions and Imprint: https://www.goodgamestudios.com/terms_en/
* This app is completely free to play, requires an internet connection and offers optional in-app purchases.

recentChanges:
THE KING OF REWARDS

Alliance leaders are now able to define a preferred language for their alliances, while players can also search for an ideal alliance according to their own preferred language. Venture into the Great Empire to see what other exciting new additions await!
comments: Overall its great, addictive and cool but even though a lot has been done to decrease the power void between players that use money and players that don't there is still a lot to be done there's lots of bugs but the recent outer realms entry cost of 50 million coins is absurd so that's why I'm giving two starts only but otherwise its the best out there in strategy pvp games.

Bring your wallet 50 million rubies to play outers ridiculous and absurd to keep my comments civil. Been playing for 3 years .your going to lose a lot of dedicated players. Good luck "good game" you might want to change your name to rich people game. The latest update fixed this problem still a buyerd game . Unless u get with a good alliance like mine.

GG not nice about counts expiring unless you financially support them. Went through period of no access. Finally resolved with full deletion and reinstall of game. Finally after multiple months of updates not fixing issue. When game runs it is a pleasure. Good time passer. Always something to do
The game is fun but the loading and connectivity issues continue to be quite frustrating. Be prepared to spend almost as much time loading as playing.
Initially gave a four star but now at 2 due to the outer realms update and the aligning everyone towards more purchases. Fix it and the rating will go back to 4

title: Expedia Hotels, Flights & Car Rental Travel Deals
description:
Exclusive savings on hotels, flights, cars, and travel for the ultimate travel experience. 
Book your hotels, flights, rental cars, things to do and bundle deals on the app and get Double Expedia Rewards points! Over 500,000+ hotels worldwide  including some of the best hotels in the US, including boutique hotels, luxury hotels, airport hotels, hostels, B&Bs and resorts. Free cancellation on most hotels. Because flexibility matters.

From planning to booking, the Expedia App is designed to enhance your travel and hence acknowledged as Webby for People's Voice: Best Travel App. Save with mobile-exclusive hotel deals and stay one step ahead with flight, hotel and car alerts and view your trip details anytime, anywhere.

Save big when booking bundle deals:
- Select your perfect hotel and ideal flight 
- Keep an eye out for Unreal Deals
- View your flight and hotel details together and marvel at all you‚Äôve saved 

Save big on hotel rooms:
- Save up to 25% with mobile-exclusive hotel deals for tonight, or any night
- Sort by price, free cancellation, deals or reviews to find a hotel perfect for you
- Read real reviews from verified hotel guests

Find your perfect flight:
- Choose from hundreds of airlines
- Sort by price, no change fees flights, duration or departure and arrival time
- Book all class types, from economy to first class seats

Get going as soon as you land:
- Enjoy round-trip car rentals from any airport ‚Äì with no cancellation fee
- Reserve a car rental up to 30 minutes in advance
- Choose from our selection of standard car rentals, luxury autos, SUVs and more

Discover and book things to do:
- Browse and book activities for hundreds of destinations worldwide 
- Get tickets for tours, shows and theme parks, museums and more 
- Reserve airport shuttles and ground transportation

Book in a flash and get rewarded for your travel:
- Already signed in? Complete your booking in less than 30 seconds
- Earn double Expedia Rewards points on all your purchases

Your trip companion, no matter the device: 
- View upcoming trip details, hotel address information and get maps for directions 
- Receive alerts for flight delays, hotel check-out times and more
- Share itineraries with family and friends via email or text message
- Get inspired with our curated tablet travel collections

Download the Expedia App for hotels, flights, cars rentals, activities and bundle deals today! 

*Limited quantity, while supplies last. Terms and conditions apply. Only available for customers residing in the US.

*Savings based on all vacation package bookings with Flight + Hotel on Expedia.com from September 2013 through February 2014, as compared to price of the same components booked separately. Savings will vary based on origin/destination, length of trip, stay dates and selected travel supplier(s). Savings not available on all packages.

The Expedia app uses information for analytics, personalization, and advertising. By using our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies.

recentChanges: We make regular updates to improve your travels.
comments: As others have said, the app is currently broken. You can only sign in after you reset your password, and even if you do, the app fails to load upcoming trips. Other things are customer unfriendly. For example, if I want to cancel a trip, you now have to chat with a bot (versus just being able to do a simple "click-and-cancel" request). I understand that it may help Expedia's contact deflection measures, but it feels needlessly complicated.

As of October 2020, the app has gotten much worse. Don't bother with it. Original comments: Works, but limited. You get a lot more choices on the webpage than you do in the app; so shopping for travel is mediocre. However, great to have your itineraries on the app. It would be nice if it stored full itineraries locally in case no connection.

Was a pretty good app. Now will not show trips after you book them.. dates change between starting seach and booking. Have had several booking only to show up to hotel or car rental place to find out my booking dates are wrong sometimes days weeks and even months away from the dates I chose. Expedia points not worth the hassles of miss placed bookings maybe time to use a new service if they don't fix this soon!!! Ridiculous that these bugs lasted more then a few days....

The app is very broken. When I open it I am greeted to a screen that is flashing and not responsive. When I go to close the app it opens back up and I have to fight with it. It was a good app before all this mess. Best part is my trip is in 3 days and I'm stuck using the browser on my cell phone. Just fix it.

I rated this app earlier 5 star because it used to work really smooth. Now whenever I try to log in, it makes me do the image authentication plus makes me log in again. I liked it when it was simple and kept me logged on. I want to give it 5 star, so please help me with this so I can update this rating.

title: Weebly by Square
description:
Over 50M artists, makers and creative entrepreneurs around the world have already created a website or online store using Weebly.  Enjoy the freedom to create, launch and grow your online business or website directly from your phone or tablet, wherever, whenever.  Enjoy a simplified process of building your site with our easy drag and drop builder.  Tell your unique story and build your brand with Weebly.     

"Weebly's clear, usable interface, attractive themes, strong commerce features, mobile capabilities, and site portability earned it a PCMag Editors' Choice for modern site builders." - PC Mag

‚ÄúThey have extended their reach into a full-service platform that provides not only organization and design, but ecommerce, a new robust app center for third party plugins, analytics, cloud hosting, and most recently, completely new mobile apps for site editing on the go.‚Äù - Forbes 


Android Mobile and Tablet Features:

Create your online store:
‚Ä¢ Use the intuitive drag-and-drop builder designed specifically for touchscreen
‚Ä¢ Add products to your site using images directly from your photo library 
‚Ä¢ Customize your site with fully responsive online store themes offered on Weebly desktop

Create your website:
‚Ä¢ Use the intuitive drag-and-drop builder designed specifically for touchscreen
‚Ä¢ Upload images directly from your photo library, select from a wide range of text, media and design elements
‚Ä¢ Customize your site with the same free, responsive themes offered on Weebly desktop

See all your activity in one place

‚Ä¢ See more detailed stats on site traffic, store orders, form entries, and more from the Insights tab

Run your business from anywhere

‚Ä¢ Process and fulfill orders, add products, check inventory, and receive notifications when a new order is placed

Create a blog and stay connected to your visitors

‚Ä¢ Instantly respond to blog comments and form entries, reply to customer inquiries and stay connected to your followers from anywhere

descriptionHTML:
Over 50M artists, makers and creative entrepreneurs around the world have already created a website or online store using Weebly. Enjoy the freedom to create, launch and grow your online business or website directly from your phone or tablet, wherever, whenever. Enjoy a simplified process of building your site with our easy drag and drop builder. Tell your unique story and build your brand with Weebly.

"Weebly's clear, usable interface, attractive themes, strong commerce features, mobile capabilities, and site portability earned it a PCMag Editors' Choice for modern site builders." - PC Mag

‚ÄúThey have extended their reach into a full-service platform that provides not only organization and design, but ecommerce, a new robust app center for third party plugins, analytics, cloud hosting, and most recently, completely new mobile apps for site editing on the go.‚Äù - Forbes


Android Mobile and Tablet Features:

Create your online store:
‚Ä¢ Use the intuitive drag-and-drop builder designed specifically for touchscreen
‚Ä¢ Add products to your site using images directly from your photo library
‚Ä¢ Customize your site with fully responsive online store themes offered on Weebly desktop

Create your website:
‚Ä¢ Use the intuitive drag-and-drop builder designed specifically for touchscreen

‚Ä¢ Customize your site with the same free, responsive themes offered on Weebly desktop

See all your activity in one place

Run your business from anywhere

Create a blog and stay connected to your visitors

‚Ä¢ Never travel far from your loyal readers, customers and fans


Weebly's privacy policy: https://www.weebly.com/privacy

San Francisco, CA 94103

recentChanges: - Bug and Stability fixes.
comments: "Always Keep Me aigned In?" -Needed. This would be a 5 star review if there was an option to always keep me signed in. That way I'd be able to receive real time notifications which would result in a faster response time on behalf of me to my customers. I understand it's trying protect the information of my customers, however at least the option should be there. I like to instantly know when I have inquiries! Otherwise, this is a very helpful & convenient App!
Can't even get past the CAPTCHA even though I 100% got it right. It just says try again over and over. Edit: I registered from google and logged in from the app. But 3 stars for the initial problem.

Just downloaded but i'm very disappointed with this app. I could'nt even sign up with the app i had to sign up using the browser and for me to login through the app it brought me to a blank page. Same thing with Squarespace. Very bad
Nice site maker. It takes time to get used to because the massive amount of features. But overall, very good.
I just got on Weebly and like it so much that I signed up for a year. I like the ease of editing and not having to track someone down to help me work on it.

title: Waitr‚ÄîFood Delivery & Carryout
description:
Waitr
Food Delivery & Carryout

Welcome to the Wonderful World of Waitr ‚Äî where great local food meets convenience!

Breakfast, brunch, lunch or dinner; have your favorites delivered.
Whether it‚Äôs a small coffee or a four-course meal, you can have it delivered for a flat fee, or order Carryout and pick it up for free. Browse restaurants in your area to find new favorites or order from the ones you already know and love. See your food like never before with our professionally photographed menus. Order the way you like with our customizable menu items and special requests feature. Start a Group Order to eat more conveniently with family, friends, and coworkers. Track orders in real time, receive alerts when your food is on the way, and so much more!

Do dinner a favor, download Waitr today!

Features:
‚Ä¢ Delivery and Carryout options
‚Ä¢ No minimum or maximum order size
‚Ä¢ Flat delivery fee
‚Ä¢ Photographed menus
‚Ä¢ Search by restaurant, cuisine, or item
‚Ä¢ Web and mobile ordering
‚Ä¢ Simple, secure mobile and online payment
‚Ä¢ No hidden fees
‚Ä¢ In-app Help & Support
‚Ä¢ Real-time order tracking
‚Ä¢ Group ordering

Waitr
You‚Äôre going to have a hard time finding an easier way to eat.

summary:
Experience Waitr!
Delicious local food delivered to your door!
recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: I like that this app accepts a lot of different forms of payment. Please add a GPS feature to allow customers to view drivers progress. A couple of recent drivers went to the wrong address. If I was able observe them, I would have been able to redirect them to my home and my food would certainly have been warmer when it arrived.
This was my first time using this app and service and I was pleased. My food was great, I had an estimated time for food arrival. Only drawback was that I couldn't track, otherwise I like this app!

The app is very usefull. At times the gps goes crazy while your driving. Not being from mississippi and relying on the gps makes it difficult sometimes. The gps is not always accurate and i have to use the waze app. To find my destination
App usually works very well, sometimes shows restaurants are available when they aren't. Overall, I use this way more than I should.

I use Waitr quite often, most of the time with no complaints. I do wish there was an easier, more streamlined way to deal with orders that finally arrive at the house-- incorrect -- though. I can't deal directly with the restaurant and the app is very time consuming when dealing with having paid for the food, tip, tax, fee, and delivery for something that isn't acceptable.

title: Farm Heroes Super Saga
description:
The makers of Candy Crush Saga and Farm Heroes Saga are back with even bigger Cropsies and more switcher fun in Farm Heroes Super Saga! Help the Farm Heroes defeat Rancid and win the Country Show in this adorable match 3 adventure.

The Farm Heroes know Rancid Raccoon is up to his old tricks again and it's up to you to help them defeat him in this puzzle quest.  Grow and harvest the biggest Super Cropsies and stop Rancid from ruining the fun for everyone!

Adventure through this Farmtastic puzzle game while collecting as many Cropsies as you can! Help Fidget the squirrel collect his nuts, harvest adorable Super Cropsies and go on a puzzle quest to meet exciting new Farm Heroes. Be careful on your adventure and watch for Rancid Raccoon, he will pop up and try to stop you when you least expect him...

Farm Heroes Super Saga features:


Match 3 Games - Easy to Play, Challenging to Master
‚Ä¢ Fun game with Farmtastic puzzles with new game modes 
‚Ä¢ Match 3 games with hundreds of levels for hours of fun! 
‚Ä¢ More fruit and veg to harvest; grow the biggest Cropsies and will the Country Show

Farming Fun ‚Äì Switch, Connect & More
‚Ä¢ Switcher gameplay ‚Äì Match 4 fruit or veg to grow Super Cropsies!

Connect to Online Leaderboards
‚Ä¢ Connecting online through Facebook lets you compare scores with friends on the leaderboards and save your farm adventure on mobile and tablet devices

‚Ä¢ Connect to the internet to unlock the full game features and keep collecting Cropsies

Take on this Croptastic Saga and help the Farm Heroes bring harmony back to rural farm life in this fun match 3 puzzle game! Defeat Rancid Raccoon‚Äôs sneaky plan and grow Super Cropsies!


Download today and start collecting Cropsies!

Visit https://care.king.com/ if you need help!

comments: Cannot send lives to all of the players they are not showing up in the list. Takes forever when I do send the lives to pull up facebook list. Not sure if it is the game or facebook screwing around with permissions again. Really aggravating. Still having sane problem.Updated phone and game. unable to enter weekly game/contest for over a month. Says try next week...every week.

I was enjoying this game but unfortunately they make you stay on the same level for ages. It's no fun when you come so close to winning then rearrange everything and you lose. I'm might uninstall this game cause it causes more stress than help you to relax and enjoy the game. üò°üò°

Its fun but frustrating to a level that I have to restart the game numerous time to update my level since I'm playing between my phone and tablet, even the power ups will not sync! I don't want a gold bar, can't you just let me play the game?!

Been enjoying playing this game for the last few months, but for past couple of days there has been an issue when tapping watch ad for extra moves/free life. Keep being exited out of the game that's why I have dropped 2 stars. Please sort this

Liking the new changes . Still very hard levels. Keep you interested in what's to come. Good game. Fun to play, they're so cute too. Great game... new animals are awesome. I have to think out the moves to get pass the very hard levels.

title: BAND - App for all groups
description:
Organize your group on BAND! It‚Äôs the perfect group communication app, with features like the Community Board, Shared Calendar, Polls, To-Do Lists, Private Chat & much more!


BAND is BEST for:

‚óè Sports Teams ‚Äì Keep track of game days and team practices with the Calendar, send quick notifications about canceled practices, and share team videos and photos, all in one place.

‚óè Work/Projects - Share files and keep everyone in the loop with the community board. Have a quick group call with remote teams. Hold everyone accountable with shared to-do lists.

‚óè School Groups - Plan all your school events easily with the group Calendar. Use Polls to plan activities and food options. Send group messages to keep everyone updated.

‚óè Faith Groups - Organize activities with weekly notices and event RSVPs. Support each other throughout the week by privately sharing prayer requests through chat.

‚óè Gaming Clans and Guilds - Set up a raiding schedule with the group calendar and share important information about any game with all your members. Use multiple chat rooms to find groups, manage recruitment and share strategies.

‚óè Family, Friends, Communities - Stay connected with your family and friends. BAND also has Public groups! Use the Discover feature to find communities with similar interests.


Why BAND?

BAND is the best way to stay connected with your group! BAND is trusted by group leaders as the Official Team Communication App for Varsity Spirit, AYSO,¬†USBands,¬†and Legacy Global Sports.

‚óè Be social & stay organized in the same place
Community Board / Calendar / Poll / Group File Sharing / Photo Album / Private Chat / Group Call

‚óè Create or join a space that meets your group‚Äôs unique needs
Adjust privacy settings (secret, closed, public), control notifications, manage members (admin & co-admins), assign privileges, and make a vanity URL or home cover design dedicated to your group. Customize your group and use it how you want to!

‚óè Accessibility
You can chat wherever you are. BAND can be used on any device including your phone, desktop, or tablet by going to¬†http://band.us.
We value your feedback! Send us your feedback and/or suggestions so we can make BAND better for you & your groups.
 

Help Center: http://go.band.us/help/en
Facebook: www.facebook.com/BANDglobal
Youtube: www.youtube.com/user/bandapplication
Twitter: @BANDtogetherapp @BAND_Gaming
Instagram: thebandapp
Blog: blog.band.com

recentChanges:

comments: Band has been fantastic! I've been using it for the last 3 years since I became cheer director for our local youth league. It keeps me organized and everything in one spot. Its so helpful with parents. You can add everyone to your band and set things how you want them. They even have a live streaming option, polls, attendance and sooo much more. I will always use band for any group stuff I may have.

I love the original Band App. It works so well from. My team at work and our daughters softball team to communicate with the parents. I recently downloaded the BAND FOR KIDS for my daughter to talk to her teammates, it hasn't worked yet. I have paid 2 different times, $.50 and I still can't make it work.

Great app--has essentially transformed our group's communication. Feature request: Please allow toggling the visibility of calendars within a Band. If we have multiple calendars created for different purposes, it would be nice to be able to declutter the agenda view by hiding events from irrelevant calendars. Also, please let us specify an individual calendar (when there are multiple) from a specific band when we are creating a widget. Thank you, developers!

This is a excellent app. I was able to listen enjoy and be a part of a church service that was active. Thank you Pastor Rodrick Reeve of New Creation family worship center. Also the staff and congregation. Love the way it works. I will tell others how good it is. Thanks.ü§©

Perhaps the best application to manage a sports team activities and keep everyone coordinated and on the same page. Same is true for the recording project, as it is a platform to have all the materials shared and updated between the participants.

title: Visual Voicemail by MetroPCS
description:
MetroPCS Voicemail keeps getting better and better! With Visual Voicemail you can listen to messages in any order, respond in one click, update your contacts, and easily manage your inbox without ever dialing into your voicemail. 

No need to change your MetroPCS voicemail number or to reconfigure your voicemail forwarding - Visual Voicemail activates for free at first launch. You can also upgrade to Voicemail to Text for a small monthly fee and receive all your voicemails transcribed into text directly in the application inbox or via SMS message.

MetroPCS Visual Voicemail may use infrequent, free SMS messages to communicate with the Voicemail server.

An Unread Messages widget is now included with MetroPCS Visual Voicemail.  On most Android devices you can add the Visual Voicemail widget by long pressing on any free space on your home screen, selecting 'Add Widgets', and choosing the Visual Voicemail widget from the alphabetical list.

summary: View and Listen to your Voicemails
developerAddress: 3655 131st Ave SE, Bellevue, WA 98006
recentChanges: Our latest Visual Voicemail release provides bug fixes, stability, and performance improvements.
comments: This app was good a couple years ago. But in the last couple years it has gotten worse and worse. It's always trying to sync and never does. This app needs to be redone. I like that I don't have to listen to every single message. I can visually see who the message is from. I like being able to erase certain messages without having to listen to them every time. This could be a great app if you would FIX the problems. Seems like everyone has the same issues. I've been with metro for about 10yrs.

Keeps sending me messages that say the app is "running" and the app will not synchronize properly. VERY ANNOYING. Metropcs can't figure it out. Tried getting them to fix the problem three times but they don't know how to do it!!! Will probably have to uninstall the app, lose all of my archived messages and pic's and reinstall to see what happens. Also, NEVER set your permissions to ALL! Doing so will let messenger change your contact list, phone call information, distributes private info also!!

I n hoping this update haz fixed all its snags, it wont sync, it leaves a tickertsape note acrossmy phobe staging it " keeps trying to connect to uou ,but cant get thru"! Now i tried getting on the app on my phone but after setting my new passcode per the apps request , and using my phones last 4 numbers like suggested by app! Then it wouldnt accept the phones numbers, i have to call my phone to get into my VM"s so the app really is worthless! Lets jooe it has been fixed or im dropping it!

I used to be able to delete old VM's, multiple at a time. I don't have to listen to them but I have to click on each one individually and delete it. Why can I no longer select more than one and delete messages I know I don't need to listen to?
Always been great visual voicemail. Where can I locate the 2020 update version? I received a text message from Metro to get the update. Thank you. Susanne

title: Bubble Witch 2 Saga
description:
From the makers of Candy Crush Saga, Bubble Witch Saga & Farm Heroes Saga comes Bubble Witch 2 Saga!

Stella and her cats need your help to fend off the dark spirits that are plaguing their land. Travel the realm bursting as many bubbles as you can in this exciting bubble shooting puzzle adventure. Win levels and free Witch Country piece by piece. Play this epic saga alone or with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Bubble Witch 2 Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Bubble Witch 2 Saga features:

‚Ä¢ Hundreds of magical bubble shooting levels ‚Äì more added every 2 weeks!
‚Ä¢ Easily sync the game between devices when connected¬† to the Internet
‚Ä¢ Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
‚Ä¢ Collect stars to unlock special items to help you on your quest 
‚Ä¢ Special boosters & bubbles to help you pass those tricky levels

comments: I did an update last night causing me to lose lives I had stored up, gold bars and even though I beat level 734 over 6 times it will not let me move past. On the Bingo like game it will not give me credit when I clear a space. Unloaded and reloaded no help. Had this game for a long time and this is the first time i had this big problem.

I've been playing ALL the Bubble Witches for years now and I COMPLETELY fell in love with all of them! ü•∞ I have a panic disorder and these games help so much to soothe my anxieties and let me focus on the fun! I absolutely LOVE the sounds and watching all the super colorful bubbles fall into the cauldronsüíû EXCELLENT JOB, KING'S BUBBLE WITCHES! YOU ARE ABSOLUTELY MAGICAL üí´üîÆ

I love this game yet, level 136 can't be passed! The game doesn't give enouh bubbles and with no boosters, it's not passable! Three days trying to advance, is just irritating! I am fixing to uninstall if I don't pass it after today. Ridiculous!

I love bubble witch saga games. However I've wrote twice now about being screwed out of extra bubbles I've purchased and I'm unable to send or receive extra lives from anyone. None of my friends even show up to send lives to and I know a bunch of my friends who play. Fix these issues and give me back the gold I was cheated and ill change my rating.

I love this game but got to level 812 and can no longer pass this level I do not understand what happened either nor where to go to find out why I can not move forward in this game..worked hard to get this high so do not want to start over.but had a blast getting to this level

comments: I have used this app for years and loved it. I loved the background themes the most. But since the update, nothing works right. I've been noticing that I'm not getting messages in real time. They come much later and sometimes only if I open the app to check. When I get off a call, which should have nothing to do with the text app, there's a blank text screen on the page with a huge ad at the bottom. I'm looking for a new app. This one no longer suits my style.

The new update is horrible. I try to text and it blacks out my text window so its hard to see. It shoves a ad the size of a third of you screen which tries to get you to accidently hit it, which then erases your current text. Between the ad strip on top and the large banner ads on the bottom this app no longer is fast and easy to use. To slow dodging ads.

Not sure what happened since the last update, but now when i send a message, i get a failed to send error, after the green dots go back and forth for a while. I never get the green check. I have had to go back to my old sms client to keep from getting this error. Back to the same issue after this update.

I used to love this app, but I HATE the new style that came with the most recent update. Now, now matter how small the font is, when you're typing a text it will only allow two to three words on each line and it breaks up long words even though there's plenty of space in the bubble. This makes it really hard to proofread your texts. Also, I can never reply to 5 digit text numbers and the developers have not helped me fix this. Currently looking for a new app.

To walk from, or even past an app like this I couldn't do so. How awesome it definitely is, does remain on five with me. But only do I request one thing; if having either a modified or simply rain-based theme. Alongside the hopes of having a rain theme, I also was going to mention that while typing the texts, why our words don't cover the entire area while doing so now? Could that be fixed as well. Thank you.

title: TSheets Time Tracker
description:
Manage time & log hours with ease! TSheets time tracker for work is a cloud-based time tracking and scheduling app for employees that allows them to clock in and out each work day from their smartphones. With TSheets as the work clock, employees can easily track work hours, create a work log and even track PTO - More than your usual time clock app.

ONLINE TIMESHEETS ‚è≤Ô∏è
 Time logging has never been easier - The TSheets time clock app allows you to replace paper timesheets with accurate, electronic time data and makes payroll and invoicing faster and more affordable. The TSheets time tracking app also accurately tracks time and GPS locations. So, why track work hours manually? Install this time clock app, calculate timesheets automatically and manage time for quick bookkeeping with the best time tracking software. 

SOPHISTICATED TIME RECORDING ‚è≤Ô∏è
Here are some features that make TSheets the best app for tracking work hours: use TSheets time clock features - clock in and out to track work hours, change job codes, edit digital timesheets, view time tracking reports and changes to the work schedule and even track PTO. Time recording is easy with this time tracker app.
‚Ä¢ Track time against multi-level job codes, projects, locations, clients, and more.
‚Ä¢ Track employee hours accurately with a real-time online time clock.
‚Ä¢ Easily switch between job codes, pause time tracking, or take a break.

MANAGE TIME ‚è≤Ô∏è
The TSheets time tracker makes time management a breeze for employers. Save, on average, 6% on gross payroll costs and save three hours per week managing employee time.
TRACK TIME: 
‚Ä¢ Edit, delete, or approve timesheets online to create a time log.
‚Ä¢ Track vacation time, sick time, and holiday time accruals for employees.
REPORT TIME:
‚Ä¢ View time tracker timer history with map.
‚Ä¢ Easily access a breakdown of employee hours by employee, job, customer, or location.
‚Ä¢ Get notifications if employees don‚Äôt clock in to a job or shift as scheduled or approach overtime limits.
‚Ä¢ See day and week totals at a glance.
‚Ä¢ Keep a black-box history of all timesheet edits and deletions, in case of an audit.

SCHEDULE ANYWHERE ‚è≤Ô∏è
The TSheets time tracker also features in-app employee scheduling that allows employers to manage a schedule anywhere and anytime. Features include: drag and drop shifts, assign jobs, and send alerts to managers if employees haven‚Äôt clocked in as scheduled.
‚Ä¢ Schedule builder: Schedule by job or by shift.
‚Ä¢ In-app work scheduling lets employees easily clock in and clock out of assigned jobs or shifts right from the schedule.
‚Ä¢ Notifications let employees know when a new work schedule is published or if a shift is changed.

SIGN UP ‚è≤Ô∏è
This time tracking and scheduling app requires a TSheets account. Sign up now on the app or at https://www.tsheets.com for a free trial with no credit card required. (Or if you have just 1 user, sign up for a free account!)

ALSO INCLUDED ‚è≤Ô∏è
‚Ä¢ Seamless integrations with QuickBooks Online and QuickBooks for PC (Pro, Premier, and Enterprise) for quick bookkeeping.
‚Ä¢ QuickBooks, Square, and Gusto integrations (and more!) to simplify your back office processes.
‚Ä¢ Sync your schedule with Apple iCal, Microsoft Outlook, or Google Calendar for seamless time management.
‚Ä¢ Integrations with popular payroll, accounting, invoicing software.
‚Ä¢ Powerful, real-time reports in multiple formats (PDF, CSV, online, HTML).
‚Ä¢ Safe data storage and detailed time logs protect you in the event of a labor dispute or audit.
‚Ä¢ Configurations for DCAA/DOL compliance.
‚Ä¢ Developer-open API.

SUPPORT, CUSTOMER RATED ‚≠ê ‚≠ê ‚≠ê ‚≠ê ‚≠ê
TSheets offers free unlimited phone, email, and chat support to all of our customers. Have a question? We‚Äôre happy to help! 

Customer Reviews: http://www.tsheets.com/reviews 
Phone: 888.836.2720
DIY Online Support: http://help.tsheets.com
Email: help@tsheets.com 
Webinars: Register for TSheets free, weekly webinars at https://www.tsheets.com/webinars

recentChanges: We squashed those pesky bugs that were causing the app to crash for some of you.
comments: Freezes up every time try to check week time clock and scroll through jobs. Makes checking in a pain in the a$$ Update... 3 updates in the few weeks and still bugs. I'm not able to balance out my crew because I cant check week totals. All these changes to this app are making me want to find a new program.

Ever since they updated with qb security, it takes way too long to log in. Why do I need a verification code EVERY TIME I log in! It's as bad as QuickBooks now. My bank doesn't require a verification code every single time and they are infinitely way more important than QuickBooks or Tsheets. You guys act like you need this much security. Qb is a terrible company. I hope I find another service soon so I can dump them.

After the Tsheets has joined with Intuit it has locked myself and most of my staff out. As we use it for payroll you can imagine the headache. Periodic downtimes, schedule duplication if you have it on separate devices, or making changes that simply disappear are all common issues. Not clocking out or back in or from job to job is an issue for the field as well. I and my office spend more time on this app than needed to. Use another service.

So far this app has been great. Only had it crash once, but once the update came in it was fixed. The only tiny issue i have now is when i clock in it delays a minute before clocking me in causing me to be a minute late. However i'm not entirely sure if that's the app or just my phone.

Horrible since Quickbooks bought the company. I have been a Tsheets user for 3 years. Before QB, it was wonderful and had immediate phone support. QB's made changes to login and have to generate a QB account and even then they email you a verification code every time you try and login. There is no longer any telephone support and have pushed everyone to online chat. My last chat experience took 38 minutes to get a hold of someone.

title: Hero Factory - Idle Factory Manager Tycoon
description:
***New feature : Boss Raid Updates!

Dive into the epic world of Hero Factory and unstop the massive hero production from your own factories to challenge powerful bosses.

Dispatch your heroes from the factories to hunt epic enemies down and earn plenty of golds to become a rich enough to expand your hero production lines. 

Various kinds of epic weapons and helmets! Collect unique items and discover new epic gear combinations to define your own hero style.

Merge an enchant stone and make your items more epic and powerful for the heroes

Collect golds from the monsters and upgrade the hero factories for stronger heroes.

Customize your heroes with epic skins and merge them into a united team. 

Hero Factory is an easy-to-play idle tycoon RPG where you can experience incomparable pleasure by managing your heroes and factories to stand against the enemies. Upgrade your heroes and factories with enchant stones and golds to create stronger army and send them to the battlefield for more epic rewards.

Download for free today and begin to make your own heroes and factories!


‚òÖ Hero Factory Features ‚òÖ
 
* Various types of Heroes from different factories
Swashbuckler, Hunting Queen, Dagger, Witch, Axe King, Gunslinger and more heroes
 
* Strategical game play on the battlefield

* Managing and Enhancing Your Heroes and factories
Go on vacations countless times to increase your heroes‚Äô stats and the factory production
 
* Tile-matching Mini-merge game
Merge enchant stones to find out more mysterious and powerful stones to upgrade your heroes and gears 
 
* Exciting Adventure

recentChanges: A bug where Bomb Girl's Lava Weapon Skin (Flaming Bomb) could not be equipped has been fixed.
comments: I find it over all a very enjoyable game and would put 5 stars if not for one really big issue. The ads many time over it has (without asking) download whatever its advertising. It will do it when I dont press anything or when I'm hitting the x button! I've had the weather app 6 times and solitaire 4 times and a few others. I've undownload them all but makes it very tempting to also undownload this game with it sometimes. But I dont want to. Its fun reaching level 365 and playing a great game.

Updates are almost non existent...they haven't added new end game content in over 6 months. They also changed the boost system (watch an ad on demand for a 30m boost to gold and power) to a garbage rng p2w gear system. In doing so, they screwed over the player base that bought the ad-free pack, because the 30m boosts were the main use for the ad-free purchase. The graphics are great, but that's the only good thing I have to say overall.

I was enjoying the game for the first 24hr but now it will not go past 91%. I have to Uninstall it and start over to get it working again. I did that 3 times now and sick of starting over. Please fix!!! I do believe it has something to do with the Google play games log in for that normally displays around 91%.

2.3.3 nerfed high level medal farming into oblivion (96% nerf). 2.4.9 backed it off to a more reasonable 30% nerf. 2.5.2 added in a new raid and new raid gear, and if you get the new medal acquisition set you can now actually farm medals faster than before the first nerf. So if you were holding off on updating to farm medals, no need to do so anymore. Bug: My daily reset seems to randomly creep to later hours of the day when the app crashes sometimes, but that was a problem before the update.

Well can't find a way to contact support so I'm doing it here. Game is fun I keep playing it constantly when I'm not playing my computer. Anyway there's an issue with Bomb Girl on the super legendary bomb to spawn a larger version of herself for more damage. She spawns and dies instantly. Very annoying to waste all those tokens on.

‚Ä¢ PRIVATE FOLDER with PIN-protection for your sensitive content
‚Ä¢ ORDER PHOTO PRINTS & GIFTS using your favorite photos in app
‚Ä¢ CREATE MOVIES AND CUSTOMIZE PHOTOS Make masterpieces with music, filters and fun stickers to share
‚Ä¢ FLASHBACKS ‚Äì Relive your memories from past years with weekly photo flashbacks
‚Ä¢ CAST TO YOUR TV ‚Äì Share your pictures, videos and music with family and friends on the big screen
‚Ä¢ SHARE select media content from your Cloud using your favorite native apps
What's New in Version 20.10
‚Ä¢ Enhanced Stories for Fall. Highlighting Halloween and Thanksgiving
‚Ä¢ Backend updates, bug fixes and performance improvements

Get started with Verizon Cloud today to securely back up, access & share photos, videos, contacts & more!

The Verizon Cloud app can be downloaded and used on any smartphone or tablet running Android software. Go to www.vzw.com/cloud for the complete list.
New Verizon subscribers: Download and install the Verizon Cloud app on your Android Smartphone for a 30-day premium trial of 600GB or 2TB of storage. You will automatically be billed $5.99/month or $12.99/month, respectively, once the trial ends. You can opt out of the trial through the Verizon Cloud app at any time during the 30-day period and enjoy free 'Contacts Only' support.

* Data charges apply.
View the complete Terms & Conditions at: http://www.verizonwireless.com/support/cloud-legal/
summary: Safeguard your precious content, even if your device is lost, stolen or damaged
developerAddress: One Verizon Way, Basking Ridge, New Jersey
comments: Absolutely no issues to report. MotoZ4, running Android 10. It's a basic app but, that's exactly what you want in cloud storage. Simple and to the point. Transitions are a little slow but, I'm fine with it; this app is doing what it's supposed to üëç. Total app size: 114 MB. No issues with this. Hey people: a 128 GB Samsung EVO memory card is $20 on Amazon. If your phone is "full," clean it out and expand the storage if you can.

So far good. Will need to see down the calendar a ways. 10/30 - still can't access cloud account. 'Sign in and password valid. We can not verify you have a valid account'. (Paraphrasing). When I purchased this tablet, I also purchased a 1TB account. Why can't I get in?

The latest update (10/9/2020) on my Samsung Galaxy J3V is quite a space hog. The amount of space used has gone from around 40 MB to over 400 MB. The creepy part is that it continues to grow with no end in sight like some weird tumor. The growth is classified as data rather than cache. I was told could delete data but it would then have to re sync. It is now the largest app in memory. Asked if I could safely uninstall this update still waiting for an answer. Less than 3 GB left in storage space.

Upload speeds to cloud server are extremely poor (1-5Mbps), files in the Verizon Sync folder fail to upload and will just repeatedly try over and over (which I suspect is the cause of reviews saying this app used up all their data), desktop app is clunky and outdated, can not log into my account via app from a second phone (my work phone), connections to the cloud service often time out. Competing services have never given me any of these issues and are far more price competitive. This service was included in my cell plan but I would rather pay to use a different service than fight to make this one work for free.

Have never even used this app yet since the latest update my phone has completely run out of space. I have deleted hundreds of pictures and videos (DAILY), deleted apps, and am still unable to use literally anything in my phone. Can't so much as make a call or even try to open any app, including cloud, because they close instantly as it still says it's 100% full. Last night I just happened to notice that this app, that has never been used, is now taking up 10gb! That is completely unacceptable.

title: monday.com: Team Collaboration & Work Management
description:
Make monday.com your central work hub and 
join 70,000+ teams who get more done, together!
 
No. 1 Productivity App (2019 Webby Award Winner)
 
‚ÄúWith thousands of customers...it‚Äôs becoming a major 
player in the collaboration and project management space.‚Äù

‚Äúmonday.com is a great addition and a direct extension of our team today. The mobile app is also really excellent.

comments: It's a great app. But it has a serious problem that some of their screen types do not rotate on Arduino devices, including on Samsung Galaxy Tab S5e and S6 that I'm using, or on the A71 and S20. It's extremely important that all Monday screen types do rotate landscape & portrate properly to make it usable. Yes I have already sent you screen shots. In apps such as Calendar, Zoom, Office, WhatsApp, Gmail etc etc all screens rotate properly, but not in Monday. Hope you'll fix it soon.

Update: Previous issues have been resolved, thanks! I'm having a few other problems though - when adding new items to the board I can't subscribe other members to this item (I can do this on my computer so I have the permissions), also tags not activating on updates, and I can't find the option to edit updates. Thank you!
Just when I was setting up the boards and telling my team to download this amazing app. Barely 30 mins in, it decides to delete my board and stop working. All my work down the drain.

By far the best project/team management app I've used. The way it integrates the columns together and the ability to switch between different views are excellent features I have yet to see on any other platform.

The inability to customise the date format is very frustrating and leads to confusion as the ROTW uses dd/mm/yyyy but the app is locked into American style. Please add this feature, it's available on the desktop.

title: Mobile Security, Antivirus & Cleaner by Lookout
description:
Lookout Mobile Security and Antivirus provides premium mobile security and identity protection for all of your mobile devices. 

Lookout is now the only all-in-one security & antivirus app that protects your mobile device, your data and your identity. Stay ahead of any virus with our antivirus features, phishing attacks or other mobile theft breach with the Lookout Mobile Security & Antivirus app.

We‚Äôre excited to introduce Safe Wi-Fi and System Advisor, two brand new security features to keep you and your personal data safe and secure.

Safe Wi-Fi
Protects your mobile data from phishing and other Wi-Fi attacks. Get peace of mind as you connect to Wi-Fi networks on the go, knowing that your connection is safe and secure.

System Advisor
Checks your device for root detections to make sure the operating system on your device is working properly.

Lookout Basic Includes:
‚ñ∫ FREE Mobile Security & Antivirus
‚ñ∫ App Scanning: Continuous, over-the-air antivirus protection from viruses, malware, adware, and phishing
‚ñ∫ NEW! System Advisor: Checks your mobile device for root detections to make sure the operating system is working properly
‚ñ∫ FIND MY PHONE
‚ñ∫ Locate & Alert: Map the location of your device and make it sound an alarm - even on silent!
‚ñ∫ Signal Flare: Automatically save your device‚Äôs location when the battery is low

Lookout Premium

‚ñ∫ Includes all the functionality of Lookout Basic, plus additional mobile security & antivirus features to protect your mobile device, data and privacy. 
‚ñ∫NEW! Safe Wi-Fi: Be alerted when a Wi-Fi network you join is dangerous or under attack
‚ñ∫Breach Report: Get timely alerts whenever a company, app or service you use has a data breach along with how best to secure your data 
‚ñ∫Theft Alerts: Get an email with a photo and location whenever suspicious behavior is detected that could mean your identity has been stolen
‚ñ∫Safe Browsing: Scan every URL link you visit to help detect online threats with antivirus technology and alert you of sites that can infect your device and steal your personal information
‚ñ∫Privacy Advisor: See what personal information can be accessed by your apps
‚ñ∫Lock & Wipe: Remotely lock your device, post a custom message and erase your data

Lookout Premium Plus comes with all of the Premium functionality, plus identity theft protection.

LOOKOUT IDENTITY THEFT PROTECTION
‚ñ∫ Cyber Watch: Monitor your personal and financial information and get alerted whenever anything is found exposed online
‚ñ∫ Social Security Number (SSN) Watch: Get a history of names, addresses, and other records associated with your SSN and proactive notifications of changes.
‚ñ∫ Social Media Watch: Protect your online reputation and monitor your social media accounts. 

IDENTITY RESTORATION & INSURANCE
‚ñ∫ 24/7 Restoration Assistance: In the event of identity theft, certified ID Restoration Experts are available 24/7 to assist with the time-consuming process of recovering and restoring your identity
‚ñ∫$1M Identity Theft Insurance: Premium Plus subscribers are backed by Identity Theft Insurance that covers up to $1M in damages and legal fees with $0 deductible**
‚ñ∫ Lost Wallet Recovery: If your wallet is lost or stolen, restoration experts will work quickly with you to contact document issuers to cancel and reorder credit cards and identification contents

About Lookout Inc.
Visit our website https://www.lookout.com to learn more about us and our mobile security, antivirus and identity protection products.

Note: This app uses the Device Administrator permission. This app uses Accessibility services.

Insurance coverage is provided by a third-party and is subject to the terms, conditions and exclusions of the insurance policy available at www.lookout.com/legal. Lookout is not a licensed insurer or insurance agent.

recentChanges: This version of Lookout includes support for Android 11. It also includes enhanced root detection capabilities.
comments: Great App it works in the background and this appears to be done randomly. I say that because every so often I will get a report on my phone stating the number of Apps which are safe. Last report I had 518 Apps I didn't realise I had that many Apps! I feel secure with Lookout running in the background and you can do a manual scan whenever you want to. All this is free unless you want to go one better with Lookout Premium. I have thought about maybe moving to Lookout Premium with all the scams.

Constantly crashes. Please do something about this. I have sent many feesback reports and still no help. I really like the app but i dont want to waste my money and time on an app that does not work. I also think someone is monitoring my phone and I can not receive messages from certain people. Please help. Update Oct. 30, 2020:: When I tried to go to the link you gave me, I was redirected to ebay. WTH

I have the full version of this app, so it doesn't contains ads. Additionally, I'm running the app on a Samsung Galaxy S9+, with no problems! It has already helped me to find my device several times, (as I have misplaced it several times, or simply forgotten where I placed it)! However, you should know that the location, lock, and wipe your phone doe come as a built in features of the basic Google suite that comes with your Android phone! I got this app for it's Additional features!

This app is garbage. In about the last 6 years and 3 phones, the scream feature worked only once. The website always says its not going through bc of lack service or permission or it's off but it always goes off like 30 min after I find it myself in an area where it has full service and battery. Would give 0 stars if I could. Giving breach updates isn't "security", working features are. Uninstalled.

I haven't had any negative experiences with this app. I like that it scans apps as you install them and let's you know whether those apps are safe. I also like that it does background scans of all my apps periodically. Overall great app for security.

title: Verizon Call Filter
description:
Your phone is your door to the world, and you shouldn't open it for just anyone. With Call Filter, you can screen incoming calls, auto-block spam and report any unwanted numbers. Or, upgrade to Call Filter Plus with Caller ID for added security. Put a name to the unknown numbers, make your own personal block list, and even assess the risk level of incoming calls. Enroll today and start answering with confidence.

 

Key Features:

‚Ä¢ Get real-time alerts on your incoming call screen so you can better avoid spam calls

‚Ä¢ Automatically send spam callers to voicemail with the spam filter

‚Ä¢ Report a number as spam so you can help improve our algorithm

‚Ä¢ See each spam call‚Äôs level of risk so that you can learn more about the caller

‚Ä¢ Manage other unwanted calls with a personal spam and block list

‚Ä¢ Block all incoming calls from international numbers

‚Ä¢ Search our spam database to see if a number has already been identified as spam

‚Ä¢ Identify unknown numbers by name on the incoming call screen, call log and eligible messaging apps, even if the caller is not saved to your contacts

‚Ä¢ Seamlessly update your contacts with newly identified numbers

 

Eligible customers get a 10-day trial of Call Filter Plus. Customers can choose to enroll in Call Filter to get just the basics (spam detection, blocking and reporting) for free, or subscribe to Call Filter Plus for all that and more for $2.99 per month, per line. Accounts with 3 or more eligible lines can subscribe to Call Filter Plus (Multi-line) for $7.99/mo by logging in to My Verizon. If you choose to enroll in Call Filter or Call Filter Plus via the app, the spam filter will be automatically set to block high-risk spam callers, but you can change your block settings at any time. Data charges apply.

 

Please reference https://www.vzw.com/support/how-to-use-call-filter/ and https://www.vzw.com/support/call-filter-faqs/ for step-by-step instructions on how to use the app and answers to frequently asked questions. For additional details on Call Filter and Call Filter Plus, please see https://www.verizonwireless.com/solutions-and-services/call-filter/.

developerAddress: One Verizon Way, Basking Ridge, New Jersey
recentChanges: Bug Fixes
comments: Absolutely the worst...DOES NOT filter the "unknown name" calls which are usually spoofed numbers anyway, and are scammers, even though there is a feature to filter "unknown name" calls....IT DOES NOT WORK!!! Verizon and all of the other cell service providers have yet to figure this s**t out, yet expect YOU to pay your f***ing bill every month. PISS POOR SERVICE!!!

This app is horrible, If I could give it Zero stars I would. I pay every month to use this app, but blocked calls still continue to come through, I get the notifications of the blocked calls, and they are able to leave voice mails. Every time this app updates it gets worse. All the damn money I pay a month for the service would think it would be a little but better but no Verizon is rip offs! This app was great until 10 updates ago, now it's junk! If it ain't broken, don't fix it!

Piece of Junk. The thing is enabled and I still get calls daily saying I won a free stay at a Marriott hotel. This call comes from a different number every day so blocking one number (on my phone) doesn't help so I thought this app would do a better job. I'd have better luck teaching my dog long division.

I seem to get more spam calls since they implemented this than i did before it existed. Half the time, calls marked "possible spam" are my actual health insurance trying to contact me. Worst part is, they charge for a version they claim is better. Anyone risking money on this app has lost their minds!! Blocking spam calls/texts should be the DUTY of the provider; NOT a service they charge extra for.

this app works okay but it doesn't truly block calls they will burp in to let me know I'm getting a block call that certainly defeats the purpose of blocking the calls. It also allows the block calls to leave voice messages. Unknown calls and restricted calls should automatically be blocked but they aren't. Calls it do not ID the callers should be blocked also automatically.

title: The Sims‚Ñ¢ Mobile
description:
Express your creativity as you customize your Sims‚Äô distinct appearances and unique personalities, giving them traits and having fun with fashion and hairstyles. Effortlessly build your Sims the perfect home, choosing favorite designs and d√©cor, with more detail than ever before on mobile. Experience the rich and entertaining moments of your Sims‚Äô lives as they accomplish career goals, pursue hobbies, develop relationships, and improve their Lifestyle. Party with friends, socialize around town, attend special events, and give Stickers to your favorite Sims. What stories will you tell? 

CREATE UNIQUE SIMS
Customize Sims‚Äô appearances, hairstyles, outfits, makeup, and accessories. From nose to toes, there are endless possibilities! Then put together an unforgettable wardrobe when you team up with Izzy Fabulous in the Fashion Shop. Choose personality traits for each Sim, like Active or Musical, and add more as your Sims gain life experience.

BUILD THE PERFECT HOME
Design your Sims a home where they can experience all that life has to offer. Effortlessly personalize home layouts and designs, selecting from a variety of furniture, appliances, decorations, and even themed collections. Then take your Sims out to discover awesome, customizable venues like a fashion studio, restaurant, and nightclub. 

SHAPE YOUR SIMS‚Äô LIFESTYLE 
Guide the stories of your Sims‚Äô lives from careers and hobbies to relationships and families. Pick exciting careers like Fashion Designer and Doctor, and hobbies like Cooking and Guitar playing. Have friendly and romantic relationships with other Sims and take Risky Actions like trying for a kiss or inventing an experimental recipe. Start a family and create a path for future generations by passing down powerful Heirlooms. 

PLAY TOGETHER
Host and attend parties with other Sims where you can socialize and earn rewards. Show off your amazing house, develop romantic relationships, and even decide to move in with other people‚Äôs Sims. Join special daily events like Speed Dating in the Park or the Market Square Music Festival. Plus, meet other players‚Äô Sims at parties or around town and use Stickers to let them know if they‚Äôre Cute, Hot, or Fabulous!

There are endless ways to connect when you craft big and small moments for your Sims, and see where life takes them in The Sims Mobile!
____________
Important Consumer Information. Some images shown may contain in-app purchases. This app: Requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply). Requires acceptance of EA‚Äôs Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Includes in-game advertising. Collects data through third party analytics technology (see Privacy & Cookie Policy for details). Allows players to communicate via the in-game party chat feature. Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13. The app uses Google Play Game Services. Log out of Google Play Game Services before installation if you don‚Äôt want to share your game play with friends.

User Agreement: http://terms.ea.com

Privacy and Cookie Policy: http://privacy.ea.com

Visit http://help.ea.com for assistance or inquiries

EA may retire online features after 30 days' notice posted on www.ea.com/service-updates.

Do Not Sell My Personal Information: https://tos.ea.com/legalapp/WEBPRIVACYCA/US/en/PC/

contentRatingDescription: Fantasy Violence, Sexual Content, Crude Humor
recentChanges:
Sul Sul! Get in the spirit of sorcery with your Sims in our spellbinding Halloween update in The Sims Mobile. You‚Äôll also enjoy:

-We've changed the way your Sims do Actions! You no longer have to wait for the green 'tick', so you can earn rewards faster.

-The ‚ÄòFright Night‚Äô Treasure Hunt event! Discover enchanting rewards filled with witch-inspired attire and magic potions!

-The rerun of Sweet Treat Showdown event ‚ÄòTreatsylvania Haunt‚Äô!

Follow our Twitter for the latest news!
comments: I loved the game at first I even made it to level 50. However, after months of playing the game investing my time and money it rebooted and made me start over from level 1. They took away my home and Sims family. I was so disappointed. They have since fixed this problem and returned my level and items. I love this game.

Ok. I like this game. But one thing that i really don't like is that they don't notify us of new updates in the game. I would have to go to playstore everytime i suspect there's new updates. Sometimes i would have missed more than a week during an event before i update and i miss good products. So I really hope they would change that and notify us within the game. Otherwise i love it.

I love the game but some things are still quite annoying in it, like the challenges, some are impossible to get unless you make use of real money to purchase sim cash. It think they should make the challenges quite easier to win reward becos some people can't always afford that. I am also hoping to see pets and cars in the game. By the way nice one EA and Maxis

Quite good mobile adaptation of The Sims game. Enjoyable. -- Problem though: My Sim is female but Izzy designed male clothes for me on the first try, and still male on the second try. My starter Fashion Gems all wasted since females can't wear male clothes. Suggestions: 1) make Izzy able to detect the current Sim's gender or allow us to choose. 2) State the requirements of player's name so that we don't have to keep guessing why it gets rejected.

Have all sims in collection. All great only complaint in this game is the loading and the none selling of items in storage.Be good if could add more sims. Over all great game. Am enjoying it. If the situations were resolved i would give a 5 stars. cheers..

title: Emma's Adventure: California
description:
Hey, adventurers! Welcome to gold rush California. Here you will be exploring the rich and dangerous land and building your own farms and city together with Jim, the Gold Miner, and Emma, the country girl. As you know, no matter how careful you are, dangers may happen on the way to gold mining in the wild west. Let's try to get it over and find the rare treasure!
Features:
‚Ä¢ Build your dream village, town and city with unique farms, gardens, factories, production buildings and decorations!
‚Ä¢ Complete all kinds of challenging quests to discover the secrets of California!
‚Ä¢ Take good care of your own farm where you can keep pets and animals, harvest crops and make food!
‚Ä¢ Meet strange people and fascinating events during the adventure in the mysterious land!
‚Ä¢ Build your own commercial empire by selecting appropriate quests and completing farm orders from the locals with collection and production!
‚Ä¢ Explore the wild lands and enjoy the invaluable scenery of nature!
It's Gold Rush time! Let's enter the fun game now with beautiful natural landscapes and start a legendary adventure through the valley, desert, and snowfield in this amazing land.
California at the gold rush era has the best seaside and farmlands, where you can raise animals and harvest crops, collect resources and craft tools, and build your own village, town, and city, buy and sell properties, and explore hidden treasures and gold mining on your expeditions to the far mysterious wilderness. Escape from the real life and be an adventurer in this paradise!
Play Emma‚Äôs Adventures: California now and enjoy farming and harvesting.
If you have any problems and questions during your adventure, or if you'd like to share your special story with us, please feel free to contact us in the following ways:
- Send E-mail to: emmaadventureca@gmail.com
Or
- Comment on FacebookÔºöwww.facebook.com/AdventurCA
