comments: Edit. This is a fantastic game, good story, excellent graphics. But. If you are after a game that you can play free more than a few mins a day avoid. I have spent money on gems, a significant amount and they don't progress you though even one level as you get further in the game. If you have massive patience then this game will suit you. If you have unlimited money to spend on germs this game will suit you. Otherwise, avoid. The gem cost increased recently too.

It costs too much (takes too much energy) to complete a task.. when you have a limit or time frame to get certain things done you have to wait until your energy fills back up because to chop a tree takes most of your energy and you can't finish the challenges in enough time I used to love this game until it became more of a job to do everything on time..

I think the concept of the game at least varies somewhat compared to many simulated games around. The issue I have is the payment walls, early on and throughout. I understand this is a business however people need to get into this game before they pay anything if they choose. I feel your payment walls are fast and frequent. The game itself I would give 4 1/2 stars. The payment walls are frustrating, thanks....

I used to love this game, but since the last update, it crashes every time I try to load it. It was fine when I was on the home screen, but once I tried to reach the new map area, and it installed the new update, it crashed and won't load since. There is no way to contact support that I can find, so I guess after a year of playing every day, it seems I'm done.

Its been good so far. The cap for energy is way too low. You can basically only clear one thing before you have to wait for more energy and if its something big you have to wait for energy to hit it 2 or 3 times. After the latest update its taking an hour just for the game to load!! Im about to delete it and find something better. How am i supposed to contact you through the game if i cant get in the game?

title: Malwarebytes Security: Virus Cleaner, Anti-Malware
description:
Malwarebytes Security: Virus Cleaner, Anti-Malware.

Block scams and protect your privacy. Our powerful app scans for viruses and malware, and aggressively detects ransomware, PUPs, and phishing scams.

Your Malwarebytes for Android or Malwarebytes for Chromebook free download comes with a 30-day trial of the Premium version. When the 30-day trial is ended, Malwarebytes will only detect and clean, but not prevent, infections. It‚Äôs ad-free, forever.

Note: Malwarebytes for Chromebook is an Android app engineered specifically to protect your Chromebook. Google Play automatically detects if you are viewing this page on an Android device or a Chromebook, and will install the appropriate Malwarebytes product.

Benefits
Premium ($1.49 per month, or $11.99 per year)
‚Ä¢	Detects ransomware before it can lock your device
Real-time protection shields your device from infection. With mobile malware threats on the rise, advanced technologies deal with dangerous newcomers like ransomware before they can become a problem. 
‚Ä¢	Safer browsing experience
Scans for phishing URLs when using the Chrome browser and alerts you when any are detected to ensure you have a safer experience while surfing the web. Only available for phones and tablets
For Chromebook, we recommend adding our free Chrome extension for faster page loading and protection against risky sites, such as phishing and tech support scams.
Free download on Chrome Web Store

Free (the Premium version also includes these benefits)

Identifies the access privileges of every app on your Android device so you know exactly what information you're sharing. Keep tabs on which apps can track your location, monitor your calls, or cost you extra in hidden fees. 
‚Ä¢	Finds and removes adware and malware
Searches all files and apps quickly and effectively for malware or potentially unwanted programs such as screen lockers or adware, freeing your Android device from bloatware.


Why Malwarebytes? 
Imagine a world without malware. We do.
‚Ä¢	More than 4 million threats detected or blocked by Malwarebytes every day
‚Ä¢	More than 93 million scans by Malwarebytes every month
‚Ä¢	290,000+ installations of Malwarebytes technology every day

comments: It was amazing! I've been dealing with this problem where ads were popping up and it was taking me to Google when I wasn't even on Google. I tried to download Norton Malware but I had to pay, but then I downloaded this and it was completely free (except for the premium version). I scanned my apps and there was a hidden adware file. It really helped me out, so I advise you to download!

Paid for premium and within 24 hours I have an error popping up saying 'We've detected a problem with your premium, pleaee contact support'. Contacted support and they've not recognised what I'm trying to say is the problem, wasting money now really. Very upsetting because on all of my computers I'd never recommend anything but Malwarebytes.

Does not run all the time. Sometimes loads at startup sometimes not. No error message so you don't necessarily notice until you see the icon is not showing up in the status bar. This is not good for an AV product. I also run the Windows version with no issues. This is the only issue I have with the product.

This is the very best company and app in existance! Even on the free version these guys are absolutely awesome. I started using this years ago and my Microsoft account on my laptop and they never miss a Beat. The customer service is also excellent. But the app itself does not fail to find any and every problem I've ever had... I'm so glad I found them again!!ü¶â‚ô•Ô∏èüåû‚òÑ‚ö°üíöüíôüíúüí• P.S. I tried AVG, and also InCognito, none of them compare. These 2 above, while they are great apps no contest.

Installed due to pop up ads (no, I do not want to meet a hot milf tonight lol) and pleased so far. Used the free trial of the premium version to do a scan, it identified the malware and with a single click it was removed. My phone even seems to be running faster than it was before I noticed the issues. Overall, easy to use, very impressed and if it continues to impress I'd be more than happy to pay for the full version (which is also very reasonably priced, just over ¬£10 for an entire year!)

Bad, phone number not current no doctor names. Yellow pages good for the locaton.
Atleast 50% of the #'s are not even close. This app. Needs to be updated atleast annually or bi- annually.
This app is inaccurate on times that places close they need to be updated if they can't updated it close the app

title: Photo Studio
description:
Photo Studio is a powerful multifunctional photo editing application for photographers of any level. It contains the vast editing kit of tools for basic and advanced retouching of your photos. Make each your shot a perfect complete art-work using a wide range of effects, filters, text editing and color enhancement tools and a lot of other ready-to-use features.

Main features:

1. More than 200 unique filters, amazing special effects, a big collection of picture-in-picture effects, rich set of various frames for any event of your life, huge amount of stickers, textures, shapes and correction tools ‚Äì lighting tune, color correction, sharpening, lens boost, tilt shift, blur and more.

2. Use manual correction tools to highlight, fix or improve any part or object on your photo. Use mask correction tool to apply filters, effects or tune your photo selectively.

3. Collage editor allows to combine several photos into amazingly looking photo collages with a wide variety of adjustable frames, shapes, customizable backgrounds, templates and stickers.

4. Magic tools comprising the following outstanding features:¬† Blend feature for combining of two images together using a big collection of masks, backgrounds and blend modes; Color Splash is aimed to highlight objects on a photo; Clone stamp is intended to copy objects, change or erase a background; Shapes editor helps to combine photos with multiple variations of shapes, textures and backgrounds. 

5. Impressive text editing tool is designed for creation of nice-looking messages on your photos with rich collection of customizable fonts, color, textures and shapes.

6. About 50 additional content packages expanding the photo editing process with new effects, frames, textures, fonts and templates. Our team's constantly working hard to implement new stunning features to gain the #1 photo editor title. 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kvadgroup/
Facebook: http://facebook.com/kvadgroup
Twitter: http://twitter.com/kvadgroup
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMfsIMOqr-FKZnb6yQAltIA/videos

comments: I really like this editing app. It has lots of features and I have found it mostly easy to use. I have used other editing apps but always come back to this one. It would be a great feature in this app to be able to save, search, or favorite certain presets... like the preset texts. Overall, Great App. Good job. Plus, thanks for all the cool things available with this app for free.

This app is really easy to use, and has a lot of options to choose from when editing photos from various filters, to effects. There are so many things to do with this app, even with the free version. The only issue I have is sometimes a picture will become pixelated however majority of the time, the outcome is great. Definitely my favorite photo editing app

You can do alot of customisation and there are presets available for free which are enough to get you going, you can make realy nice edits with what's there you just need to get creative with it. and there aren't any ad pop-ups, insted they're on the side of your editor and don't get in the way of anything which is great. But most importantly you get full detail on the type of image you want to export and it gets saved in high quality. This is the best editor for free and highly recommend it!

App keeps crashing I have been using this app for a long time now, have had problems in the past but now it keeps crashing as soon as it's opens. So I uninstalled it and downloaded it again and it still keeps in crashing. I have purchased a LOT of effects, so I really need this to work. I gave 1 star because of this problem, if you can get this working for me I will upgrade the rating.

Bestest ever... Amazing app with ennumber of filters & effects. I've been using it for 3 years now and I love it! my all time favorite app. Easy to use and very impressive and the great part is that its almost add free. I strongly recommend it to everyone.

title: Kill Shot
description:
Welcome to your new First-Person Shooter assignment.

FIRST-PERSON MISSIONS
You are a covert special ops soldier ready to play your part in dangerous military FPS attacks and silent assassin missions.

CHOOSE YOUR FIREPOWER
With access to powerful guns you will rely on your marksman skills to finish the job. Upgrade your sniper rifle to improve accuracy, damage and range.

TAKE THE SHOT
Your job as sniper is to travel deep into enemy territory to locate and eliminate hidden targets. Stare down your rifle scope, zoom in to find and identify the target. Take a breath...and pull the trigger to make the Kill Shot.

CONFIRM THE KILL
We need confirmed kills soldier. Good luck out there.

HIGH VELOCITY GAMEPLAY
- Over 800 first person shooter missions to complete.
- Awesome 3D graphics.
- Unforgettable bullet cam kill shot moments.
- Global Ops event system with prizes to be won
- 50 unique maps and stunning locations.

DEADLY WEAPONS
- 100+ different weapons to choose from
- Maximize your firepower with 4 weapon classes:
+ Sniper Rifle,
+ Assault Rifle
+ Shotgun
+ SAW Gun
- Unlock powerful upgrades for every weapon.

KILLER POWER-UPS
- Spotter - quickly find all enemies.
- Slow-Mo - slow down time to line up the perfect Kill Shot.
- Armor-Piercing Bullets - if you can hit it, you will kill it.

GAME CENTER SUPPORT
- 4 Leaderboards to challenge your friends.
- 50 Achievements to complete and earn in-game rewards.
 
Kill Shot is rated 17+ and contains frequent/intense realistic violence. By downloading this app you are agreeing to be bound by the terms and conditions of Hothead's Terms of Use (www.hotheadgames.com/termsofuse) and are subject to Hothead's Privacy Policy (www.hotheadgames.com/privacy-policy).


¬©2018 Hothead Games Inc., Hothead, and Kill Shot are trademarks or registered trademarks of Hothead Games Inc., all rights reserved.

comments: Gave 3 stars for 2 reasons. I may have posted this previously. 1. It costs WAY too much to buy weapons, 2. It takes WAYYYY to long to receive upgrades. What's up with having to wait almost 2 hrs for an upgrade already paid for; even if it is game coin. Some of us are on budgets and can't be spending out of pocket. I'm sure I'm not alone inthis thought. How bout making it a little easier on us players. Thanks. I'll add stars accordingly.

First time I've given any game 5 stars...it's probably closer to 4.5 stars but close enough. Has the annoying ads but all games do so can't criticize it too much for that...about .5 stars. This is the first sniper (shooter) game I've played...and that's quite a few...that gives you reasonal means to upgrade and buy weapons. There are missions that are easy enough that you can play them to build up the monies needed for upgrades or new weapons. IMO this is the best sniper game to date.

I always enjoy this game and have never had problems with it before, but it is super glitchy right now. I shoot the target and then the game glitches and I have to close and restart the game a few times before I can move past that level

It's good game but only few things sucks 1the friendlies too are soldiers but they are not shooting instead they are running 2 update costs are too much 3 there is only one type of scope 4 there is no different mission like shooting a target in moving vechile

When i played this game i fell good but there was 1 problem that the game was saying for upgrading the weapon for kill the black opps Bye the way this game is best only areason i will give 4 stars tnks .i never played that tye of game i was very good game .

title: The New York Times
description:
Understand the world through award-winning independent journalism, expert reporting and multimedia storytelling with the NYTimes app.

Favorite Features:

‚Ä¢ A redesigned Top Stories provides a more consistent experience across all our apps and  website. Our new home page groups similar stories together so you can easily return to sections that interest you.
‚Ä¢ Breaking News alerts that link directly to developing stories.
‚Ä¢ Save articles for offline reading on any device.
‚Ä¢ Share articles, photos and videos through your favorite sharing platform.
‚Ä¢ Watch exclusive videos and browse our award-winning photography.
‚Ä¢ Experience NYT stories through innovative formats, like augmented reality and 360¬∫ video.
‚Ä¢ International coverage of current events and cultural stories from our 50 bureaus around the globe.
‚Ä¢ Podcasts: Listen to audio series including ‚ÄúThe Daily‚Äù and ‚ÄúModern Love.‚Äù
‚Ä¢ The Mini Crossword: Enjoy wordplay every day with the daily mini puzzle.
‚Ä¢ Read our Spanish-language coverage with NYT en Espa√±ol.
‚Ä¢ Reading at night? Turn on our experimental Night Mode for a dark-friendly app theme.

The NYTimes app for Android is built responsively and is formatted from 4" phones to 12"+ tablets. The app works on all devices running Android OS (5.0+).

The New York Times offers the following subscription options: 

‚Ä¢ Basic Digital Access, which includes unlimited article access. Cancel anytime.
‚Ä¢ All Digital Access: Basic + access to The New York Times Crossword and NYT Cooking. You also receive one bonus subscription to give to anyone you‚Äôd like. Cancel anytime.

The NYTimes app requires certain permissions to provide you with the best possible reading experience. Here‚Äôs a little bit about what each one does:
‚Ä¢ In-app purchases: This allows you to make purchases within the app.
‚Ä¢ Location: In exchange for the free content provided through the NYTimes app, we compile demographic information about our readers in accordance with our Privacy Policy. This information is no more specific than the state in which you are located.
‚Ä¢ Photos/Media/Files: This permission allows the app to cache images locally, reducing load times for pages you revisit.
‚Ä¢ Wi-Fi connection information: This item gives the app permission to use available Wi-Fi networks rather than your mobile network. In the absence of trusted Wi-Fi networks or if Wi-Fi is disabled, the app will make use of your cellular network (if available). Normal bandwidth and usage charges apply as detailed in your service agreement with your wireless carrier.


Privacy Policy: https://www.nytimes.com/content/help/rights/privacy/policy/privacy-policy.html
Terms of Service: https://www.nytimes.com/content/help/rights/terms/terms-of-service.html
California Notices: http://www.nytimes.com/privacy/california-notice

As of version 9.18 of the app will save and honor your privacy preferences across devices when logged in to a New York Times account

Feedback? Suggestions? Issues? Please contact our support team at android@nytimes.com. We‚Äôll do our best to assist you. Your feedback is important to us.

summary: Download the free NYTimes app to read the latest headlines from today‚Äôs news.
developerAddress:
620 Eighth Avenue
New York, NY 10018
recentChanges:
In this version, some users might see a new Election 2020 tab.
Keep current with the latest news, voting resources, updates about misinformation and more.

More improvements coming soon.

Reach out at android@nytimes.com with any questions, comments or other feedback.
comments: This isn't supposed to be a review of the news itself. The app works well for the most part, but does have bugs loading images and sections when in landscape on my tablet (i.e. it won't load some randomly but does load others). I would also love something like "Download print issue" where you could digitally see exactly what the print newspaper looked like that day, which is a feature for some other papers. Overall, it's a good app, but it does need some improvements.

I love the app interface on my cell phone. Home page is basically just stacked articles w/o any real organization, but every article has a byline and they squeeze a lot of pictures and graphics on the homepage. Still, somehow they make it look very clean. It does lead to more scrolling than most other news apps, but I think the trade-off is worthwhile. And content aggregation is quite good. This is definitely my go-to news app, even over multi-source aggregators. What keeps this from being a five-star review is notifications. Frequency and importance are fine, but often when you expand the notifications they will all (or mostly) be duplicates, even when unexpanded they are different articles. Occasionally the notifications will point to different articles. This used to be a much larger issue, while this has been fixed for the most part it still happens on occasion. I'd also like the search to be included on the main page action bar. But if they fix the notification thing I'll update to five stars.

Love the journalists but hate the app. They put up notifications with interesting leads, but when l click on the notice I am sent to an entirely unrelated story. Of course by then the notification that peaked my interest is gone. The only way to find the story is to locate search (which is buried) and then remember some key words from the notification. Washington Post does not have this problem. Why can't the Times get it right?

App performance issues have improved over the last year or so. But is this app actively under development? I don't see many new features. One request: Night mode has to be manually turned on and off. Can this be done automatically, similarly to the Android system feature that can detect when it's nighttime?

Love this app & The N Y Times. Keep it going. The apps are a fantastic addition to newspapers and may be their salvation. We cannot allow the newspaper industry to die. TV is fine but deep insights can only be gained from quality journalism. Were key newspapers to disappear then very soon the quality of TV journalism would plunge and become less than worthless.

title: Walmart Shopping & Grocery
description:
Our award-winning shopping app helps you save time and money. 

The Walmart app is the most convenient way to check off your shopping and your groceries list. Get it done all at once from our store to your door. 

The essential Walmart app offers many great ways to shop for everyone: 

Shop millions of items, available for delivery and pickup 

With Walmart as your local grocery store, getting groceries have never been easier - do your grocery shopping through the app and select the best option for you: curbside pickup or delivery 

Our pharmacy makes ordering a prescription or getting a flu shot quick and simple, too 

Walmart+ is here!   It‚Äôs the membership that helps you save even more time and money.   

With the Walmart app, you can easily access your member-only benefits. 

Free unlimited delivery  
This is grocery shopping made simple - save time by getting groceries while you shop for electronics, home goods, and more, from our store to your door 

1-hour delivery windows as early as the same day on fresh food 
Same everyday low prices you love. 

Member prices on fuel  
Save 5¬¢ per gallon at Walmart and Murphy stations.  
Available at over 1,500 convenient locations.  

Mobile scan & go 
Shop and check out with your phone in-store. 
Contact-free checkout.  
 ‚ÄØ 

Do Not Sell My Personal Information 

‚ÄØPlease scroll down to the footer of our Privacy Policy below to find the "Do Not Sell My Personal Information" link.‚ÄØ 

https://corporate.walmart.com/privacy-security‚ÄØ

summary: Easy shopping, plus grocery delivery or pickup.
recentChanges: This version contains stability fixes, making your shopping experience more seamless.
comments: The newer versions have a lot of glitches and is extremely slow. For example, sometimes I add items to my cart and then they all disappear. Sometimes the app will suddenly have every item listed as out of stock and you have to restart. When you add items and hit + to increase the number of items it takes forever. Hopefully they fix these issues.

This new update is buggy and I can't check out. It took me an hour to fill my cart due to all the bugs and when I finally clicked check out of course that failed too and I lost the last pick-up slot of the day and have to go grocery shopping in the snow now... I have a Samsung Galaxy. The bugs were: search wouldn't work, browse by category wouldn't work, the app kept crashing and removing most of the items in my cart, and when I clicked check out it said "failed to fetch payment."

This app gets slower everytime I use it. It's more like a glitch generator, and an anger creator. But, compared to going inside of that level of hell, there's really no difference, other than not dealing with the public clowns and Karen's. I continue to use this app though. Am I a glutton for punishment, or a slave of this corporate world that is left no other options?......yes.

This ap is FRUSTRATING and is getting worse! The screen constantly freezes, it won't allow you to side swipe when you are supposed to be able to and right in the middle of looking at something the screen will go blank to "update" the page and sometimes it will come back up to the page you were on and sometimes take you all the way to the very beginning of opening the ap. And it's not my internet because it's very reliable and the ap does this no matter what service I'm using.

I thought it was me!! I literally bought a new phone to see if it would fix the issues. When uninstalling and reinstalling the app I just happened to take a look at the reviews, lo and behold every single person in the world has the same problem I do since they combined the websites,hece it completely sucks. I like everyone on here I'm going to have to use a different online shopping app for a different store because this app is useless.

title: Zillow: Find Houses for Sale & Apartments for Rent
description:
Take control of your next move with the Zillow app. Our best-in-class features help you unlock life‚Äôs next chapter by getting into a home you love. 

BUY A HOME ‚Äì Find your place with immersive photos, virtual tours, and the most listings, including things you won‚Äôt find anywhere else.

SELL A HOME ‚Äì Whether you sell directly to Zillow with Zillow Offers‚Ñ¢ or take a traditional approach, we‚Äôll help you navigate the path to a successful sale.

RENT A HOME ‚Äì From shopping on the largest rental network to automating applications, we‚Äôve created a seamless online experience for renters.

The Zillow app gives you resources and tools you won‚Äôt find anywhere else, so you can shop smarter for your next home:

‚Ä¢ The most listings and constant updates so you never miss out¬π
‚Ä¢ 3D Home Tours so you can picture yourself in a home and narrow down which houses to visit in person 
‚Ä¢ Self Tour for Zillow-owned homes, with no appointment and no pressure. Stop by when it‚Äôs convenient and unlock the door with the app
‚Ä¢ Zestimate¬Æ, the industry-leading independent home valuation tool, calculated daily
‚Ä¢ Robust filters for school districts, views, pricing, pets, HOAs, and more
‚Ä¢ Easier co-shopping: Tag your favorite home features and share your favorites to coordinate your search with a partner or roommate
‚Ä¢ Push notifications to let you know when houses come to market, have a sale pending, or drop in price 
‚Ä¢ Neighborhood details including restaurants, grocery stores, parks, and coffee shops
‚Ä¢ Easy access to Zillow Premier Agents, local real estate experts who meet Zillow‚Äôs bar for quality customer service
‚Ä¢ All the pricing and details you need to compare homes & apartments for rent 
‚Ä¢ A personal renter profile so you can visit a house rental and engage directly with potential landlords and property managers who rent homes

1. Most listing based on direct site comparisons

summary: Buy Homes, Rent Apartments & Sell Real Estate: Open Houses & Homes for Rent
developerAddress:
1301 Second Avenue, Floor 31,
Seattle, WA 98101
recentChanges: We are always working hard to improve our apps. This is a small update to fix a few bugs. Please continue to send your feedback to androidfeedback@zillow.com. We appreciate it.
comments: Its ok. Its best for home window shopping. If you're seriously looking, it's less convenient. It assumes how much you're going to put down and what interest rate you've been approved for. There's no way to set those things so it gives you a more accurate idea of what you're paying each month. Plus, in my area theres a lot of 55+ communities and theres no way to filter those out, which is irritating.

I like this app, overall, but would really love to have the ability to hide or dismiss a property from my search, if it's not one that meets my needs. I like that I can save homes, but when searching later, homes keep popping up that I would rather not look at again! Also, if there is a way to get HOA/Space rent to be mandatory when there is one for the property, that would be great. I've looked at many that stated there was none, but that wasn't true. Thanks!

Zillow gave the option to turn off cookies, but did not bother to mention that it will erase all of your data when you do this. I went ahead and typed everything in once again, and it erased it AGAIN. Also, you can't add photos, videos, or tours with any Android phone -only i0s I want to know what kind of incentive apple is giving developers to leave these flaws in their designs..

I use this app almost daily, it keeps me up to date on homes that I am very interested in. We will be buying or building in the next 5 months, we are looking forward to building or buying our dream home. I love Zillow, I have found it to be more up to date than a Real Estate office. I highly recommend Zillow. Thank you, carolintallahassee

While the interface is the best I've seen out of all the other real estate options, the information is not accurate or up to date. If you try to get information from the listing agent on the app, a third party starts messaging you and sending your information to unrelated agents. I simply messaged asking about an open house and some random dude was trying to get me a new buyer's agent even though I already have one.

title: AndrOpen Office
description:
Celebrating 4 Million Downloads!!!

AndrOpen Office is the world's first porting of OpenOffice for Android and it's powerful and complete office suite for OpenDocument format.
You can view, edit, insert and export office documents using full features of the OpenOffice.
AndrOpen Office is office suite of 5 components:
- Writer (a word processor)
- Calc (spreadsheet / worksheet)
- Impress (presentation graphics)
- Draw (drawing)
- Math (equation editor)
* AndrOpen Office is a forked project from the Apache OpenOffice project.
AndrOpen Office is not affiliated with the Apache OpenOffice and LibreOffice project.

Supported File Formats
You can import and export following formats:
- Microsoft Word (DOC / DOT / RTF)
- Microsoft Excel (XLS / XLT)
- Microsoft PowerPoint (PPT / POT)
- OpenDocument (ODT / ODS / ODP / ODG / ODF)
- Portable Document Format (PDF)
- OpenOffice.org1.0 / StarOffice6.0 (SXW / SXC / SXD / SXI / SXG / SXM)
- Text (TXT / CSV)
- Adobe Photoshop (PSD)
- Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG)
- Windows Metafile (EMF / WMF)
- Tagged Image File Format (TIFF)
- Data Interchange Format (DIF)
- SYLK (SLK)
- Portable Anymap Format (PBM / PGM / PPM)
- OS/2 Metafile (MET)
- Sun Raster Image (RAS)
- Mac Pict (PCT)
- X PixMap (XPM)
- StarView Metafile (SVM)
You can import following formats:
- Microsoft Word 2007 (DOCX / DOTX / DOCM)
- Microsoft Excel 2007 (XLSX / XLTX / XLSM)
- Microsoft PowerPoint 2007 (PPTX / POTX / PPTM)
- AutoCAD (DXF)
- T602 Document (602)
- Computer Graphics Metafile (CGM)
- Truevision Targa (TGA)
- X Bitmap (XBM)
- Zsoft Paintbrush (PCX)
- Kodak Photo CD (PCD)
You can export following formats:
- HyperText Markup Language (HTML)
- PlaceWare (PWP)
- Macromedia Flash (SWF)
- JPG / GIF / PNG / BMP

Features
- View / edit / insert / export docs
- Export / Import PDF
- High fidelity
- Formatting paragraphs
- Support for embedded object
- Save docs to extensive file formats
- Support for password
- Internationalization
- Localization
- Support for macro
- Support for Google Drive / Box (Android 4.4+)
- Support for Dropbox / OneDrive / NAS / WebDAV (Paid version only)
- Support for spell checker, hyphenator, thesaurus
- Support for printing (Android 4.4+)

Motion Event Assigns
Device's motion events (mouse, pen, finger, trackball) are assigned to mouse events of X Window System.
- Single Tap = Click Left Button
- Double Tap = Double Click Left Button
And some gestures are assigned to application actions.
- Swipe = Scroll
- Pinch In / Out = Zoom In / Out
- Long Tap = Click Right Button
And you can general mouse operations by virtual mouse pad.

Supported Languages
French / German / English (US) / Italian / Spanish / English (British) / Russian / Polish / Dutch / Japanese / Indonesian / Portuguese (Brazilian) / Turkish / Czech / Swedish / Portuguese (European) / Finnish / Hungarian / Chinese (Traditional) / Catalan / Greek / Romanian / Danish / Arabic / Slovak / Norwegian / Bulgarian / Serbian / Vietnamese / Thai / Slovenian / Korean / Chinese (Simplified) / Hebrew / Hindi / Bengali / Persian / Basque / Gaelico / Galician / Central Khmer / Lithuanian / Tamil

Links
Twitter
https://twitter.com/andropenoffice

Bug reports
Please report bugs below e-mail address;
support@andropenoffice.com

About Apache OpenOffice
"Apache OpenOffice" is a trademark of the Apache Software Foundation.
(http://openoffice.apache.org/)

Special Thanks
This product includes many open source codes.
Thanks to Open Source!!!

recentChanges:

Support for SMBv2 and SMBv3 of NAS storage.
Remove supporting for ARMv5/v6 devices.
comments: I paid for the "Pro" version after it kicked me out of my file I was working on (my budget file) and now it will not open on anything because the password will not work. I open this file daily and I know the password is correct. Thanks, the free version worked fine but now Iam locked out of a year worth of financial work and a robust spreadsheet I created. I now have to start over, I just paid for loosing my data. I would like my money back.

Does not install fully without taking steps to install components, like language packs, for dictionaries to work. My odt files do not look or format the same on Chromebook (this app) as they do on desktop Open Office, but that might be result of lack of fonts on app. However, advanced users, who pay for full version, can probably make use of this app. Also, if you just need a word processor/office suite on Android for basic documents, this app is perfect. I'm an author and publisher

Great alternative to WPS who has non-existent support. Using on Kindle Fire. Having some minor issues but this is a new port from Open Office so not complaining. Is much easier to use than WPS. Looking forward to future improvements.
This works better than any other Office clone. My only complaint is you have to use a keyboard. I can not use the Virtual keyboard at all. But that is very very minor compared to its functionality.
Purchased 10/24, refunded 10/28 w/out explanation. WAS showing I upgraded, now have "basic/free" again. The price has gone up, apparently, suppose to RE-PURCHASE ? This is weird & wrong !

title: Wordscapes
description:
üíïPlaying Wordscapes 10 mins a day sharpens your mind and prepares you for your daily life and challenges! üíï

This text twist of a word game is tremendous brain challenging fun. Enjoy modern word puzzles with the best of word searching, anagrams, and crosswords! Immerse yourself into the beautiful scenery backgrounds to relax and ease your mind.

Challenge yourself to connect letters and find as many hidden words as you can! Unlock stunning landscape backgrounds to escape from home and relax your brain.

You‚Äôll never experience a dull moment after you try this addicting word puzzle game! Play this crossword puzzle once and just you won‚Äôt be able to put it down. Enjoy word connect and word find games? This is your final destination!

‚ñ∫Escape and relax your brain by visiting the beautiful destinations of Wordscapes!
‚ñ∫ Show your vocabulary power by connecting letters and finding all the hidden words.
‚ñ∫ Get your word hunt on with over 6,000 crossword puzzles!
‚ñ∫ Challenge your brain and vocabulary ‚Äì this crossword puzzle starts easy and becomes challenging fast!
‚ñ∫ Think you can beat these anagram word puzzles? They start simply but ramp up fast!

comments: Fun game, but the tournaments and the teams ruin the whole thing. In order to place high in the tournaments, you have to spend practically entire weekends on the game because of the poor tournament design. It's also impossible to find an active team, but nobody will join a brand new team. The game should hide inactive teams. If the leader hasn't been on in a while, the team should no longer show up. The tournaments should be unique puzzles, not just how fast you can run through levels.

I love this game. However last week it started crashing every time I tried to open it. There were no updates available and I tried restarting my phone and nothing worked. I uninstalled and reinstalled the app because I didn't know what else to try and it works BUT I'M BACK AT LEVEL ONE!!! I have been playing this for years and was at level 1600 something!! Is there any way to restore at least some of the progress I had made??

Was a great game that I'd play every night to pass the time. Then suddenly the game would hang and freeze for no reason. So I uninstalled and installed the app again, only to discover that not only does it continue to hang and freeze, but now I lost all of my coins and helpers. I contacted support through the app a few days ago and still no response from them. Very frustrating.

The game is good. Only problem is that every other game, you get bombarded with adverts. Now I could let this slip by, if the adverts featured weren't the banned ads of Gardenscapes and Fishdom! While every other game has removed those ads, you've left them in. They were banned for a very specific reason, and that is false advertisement, which is a breach of the false advertising standards. When the ads are removed, I will consider upping my rating.

My longest played game. The visuals are soothing, and not too many ads to distract from the play. Mostly you play against yourself, then occasionally you get a tournament if you are feeling competitive. Very few repeated games, and I've played tons of them. The best thing about the game is the soothing photos though. Ty

title: Fallout Shelter
description:
** Google Play Best of 2015  **
Mobile Game of the Year - 2016 DICE Awards
Winner 2015 Golden Joystick Best Handheld/Mobile Game

"Might just be the best free-to-play game out there" - GamesBeat
"Probably the best game of E3 2015‚Äù ‚Äì Gizmodo 
"Fallout Shelter is simple to play and addictive as hell." - GameZone

BUILD THE PERFECT VAULT
Create a brighter future‚Ä¶underground! Select from a variety of modern-day rooms to turn an excavation beneath 2,000 feet of bedrock into the very picture of Vault Life.

OVERSEE A THRIVING COMMUNITY 
Get to know your Dwellers and lead them to happiness. Find their ideal jobs and watch them flourish. Provide them with outfits, weapons, and training to improve their abilities.

CUSTOMIZE
Turn worthless junk into useful items with Crafting! Customize the look of any dweller in the Barbershop.

PROSPER
A well-run Vault requires a variety of Dwellers with a mix of skills. Build a Radio Room to attract new Dwellers. Or, take an active role in their personal lives; play matchmaker and watch the sparks fly! 

EXPLORE THE WASTELAND 
Send Dwellers above ground to explore the blasted surface left behind and seek adventure, handy survival loot, or unspeakable death. Find new armor and weapons, gain experience, and earn Caps. But don‚Äôt let them die!

PROTECT YOUR VAULT
From time to time, idyllic Vault life may be disrupted by the dangers of post-nuclear life. Prepare your Dwellers to protect against threats from the outside‚Ä¶and within.

Vault-Tec has provided the tools, but the rest is up to you. What are you waiting for? Get started building your Vault today for FREE.

contentRatingDescription: Alcohol Reference, Mild Violence, Suggestive Themes
recentChanges:
Spooky fun from Vault-Tec as Halloween returns to the Vault!
Can you solve the ‚ÄúMystery of Vault 31‚Äù Halloween quest?
Customize your rooms with Halloween d√©cor.
Dress your dwellers in Halloween outfits ‚Äì now that‚Äôs the spirit!
Spooky fun from Vault-Tec as Halloween returns to the Vault! Update today!
comments: I really enjoy this game! I love the fallout series as well as the elder scrolls games, Bethesda is by far the best. Now this game has some things it could use, one of those is the ability to move rooms around without destroying them, or even widen the vault a bit so you can fit three full rooms along with 2 or 3 elevators. I also wish the rarity chance was a teensy bit higher for legendary dwellers, there are more things, but I only have 500 letters to use. Fix those two and I'll update this :)

Good graphics, good gameplay, no "it is free-to-play, but pay us or wait for years to finish building", no "you will play forever no matter what mistakes you do" (you can lose and it makes you think what to do). You do not have to play each day (do not afraid of missing something or losing state). You can even select difficult level! It is something I missed from old time. One of great games for smartphone, I like it!

It feels like a game to download just to kill time, but I'm addicted to it. I love the graphics and the humor. And the only time you get ads is when you want to skip something for free, there is not a ton of ads like most other games. I love to name the characters and RP what life in the vault would be like and turn on fallout music on youtube in the background. It's the best free game I've played in a long time. Thank you so much to the developers for making us this game for free. ‚ù§Ô∏è

I love this game. And have for years. However upon getting into contact with the developer, days later they've ignored me on multiple accounts. Ive emailed them around a half dozen times and they've only responded 3 times. All of which was not helpful. And now, not only do I feel completely scammed, I feel disrespected as a player. Take this into consideration if you make a purchase. They will suck at communicating back with you.

Would be 5 stars but there's a glitch that adds 270+ hours to the daily reward and that isn't great. Edit: I have now changed my review from 4 stars to 1 star because as of the new update I am unable to actually load the game. It asked for access to media and files, which is fine, but then it started a weird download and once it finishes the game gets stuck in a frozen loading screen. Closing and reopening the app just restarts the download. Please fix and I'll change my review back to 4 star.

title: Lyft - Rideshare, Bikes, Scooters & Transit
description:
Count on Lyft to take you wherever you need to to go. Got an early flight? Need to get to the office to prep for the morning meeting? We‚Äôll match you with a driver, help you find the quickest bus route, or show you the nearest scooter ‚Äî you‚Äôll be on your way in minutes.  If it gets you there, it‚Äôs in the app. 

Save time (and your sanity)
We‚Äôll match you with a driver in seconds.  Your time is your money ‚Äî having to tackle traffic and hunt for parking is a total pain. With Lyft, you can just sit back and relax.

You‚Äôve got options
Choose from 9 different ways to go*, they‚Äôre all available right from your app. Whether you‚Äôre looking for an affordable ride, the most direct route, or a way to treat your crew ‚Äî we‚Äôve got the mode to suit your needs and mood.

Adventure all day and night
Have peace of mind knowing you can always request a Lyft ride 24/7 ‚Äî and share your route with friends. Our Community Safety Program is designed to bring our riders and drivers greater protection ‚Äî from in-person trainings to in-app features.

* Lyft ride types may vary by region. Check the app to see what is available in your city.

recentChanges: Thanks for choosing Lyft! To make your rides even better, we update the app regularly. It‚Äôs like housekeeping: squashing bugs, cleaning up code, and other small-but-mighty improvements.
comments: I have been trying to use my lyft account for about 2 years. When I type in my debit/credit it doesn't not accept it error when I have triple checked it and still won't take it. I typed it in right. It pretty frustrating when you need a ride and can't even access your lyft account for a ride. This has been going of for 2 years now.

Up until tonight Ive loved the app, but as of tonight it charges me for the ride but after I go and order it it just goes back to the select destination screen it doesn't look for a car then it tells me I found a car and be ready in 18 minutes but there's no trace of it inside the app I don't know what's going on right now, I'm very disappointed and kind of stranded not because of this possibly unless this guy just shows up mysteriously in 18 minutes I have no clue if he's going to or not

I have had an account for years but have not used it since 2015. I moved to a new state recently and had re-download lyft and tried to attach my payment methods. I tried to attach every option that is offered and the app wouldn't let me. I even Uninstalled and reinstalled several times. There's is no proper customer service set up. I finally found a number that would keep me on hold then eventually hang up. This is why I prefer uber, I never have these problems with them.

Changed my address a week before downloading. My card didnt match my new address when adding it yet. Understandable. But now that my address is up to date, i still have to use a completely different card. I contacted support who told me my card wasnt working or they dont accept it _. I tried explaining it was my address, they sent me to a link that told me I need to use a new card. Its just very frustdrating. I gave it two stars because the drivers are always awesome and the prices are fair.

Terrible. Added my credit card a day prior and thought it was set to go. Now I request a ride and they want a second credit card that has matching address, provided this unnecessary info and rejected because could not validate, your problem not mine. Dishonest, unreliable, do not use if your ride is a necessity. Unbelievable. 0 stars if I could

comments: I don't review apps, but this one's special. I didn't and don't know anything about editing videos, but this made it super simple to learn... Step by step instructions and a tonne of features even without the pro version. This and the GoPro video editing apps are the best I've found for mobile. Going to buy pro... I think they deserve the revenue. I'm using it a lot with zero issues... Very happy. Thank you very very muchüôè

I really love this editor, it's simple enough to work with, and yet sophisticated enough to make awesome videos. Other editors have their watermark on the free version but this app doesn't and it's light enough for older phones to edit long full HD videos. It perfect for simple videos for YouTube/Facebook. Only thing missing is adding a fading effect at the end of the video, maybe it's only in the pro version? but it would be nice to have in the free version as well.. well deserved 5 stars..

This is absolutely extraordinary. I have tried many other video-editing apps such as "Kinemaster" and "VivaVideo" but this is by far the best. The others contain alot of ads, glitches and are generally messed up. However this app has no video ads, (only small ones that are rare) it is very neat organised with the icons so that you can easily access and find your needed edit, I have been using it for a long time now and yet I have found no bugs or pay to win problems. I highly recommend this app.

Great app but I already paid the one time fee and it just made me pay it again. When I tried to restore my premium it just kept giving me a fail error. I didn't even uninstall the app. Welp, now I realized I paid 12.99 for nothing because every time I open a photo or video I get an error message 4106 failed to open file?!? Now I can't even use this app.

It's great. But sometimes It can be a pain to fix the mistake. But so far it has not done anything to me. Plus on top of that there is no watermark and you can fade the music in and out. Which would be perfect. Even though we may lost a few file.....it does not go well. Anyway I prefer this app to help me some few edit.

title: June's Journey - Hidden Objects
description:
Nothing like a mystery! 

Find the hidden objects to crack every case. Solve mind teasing mysteries in the glamorous 1920s! 
Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of opulent mansions and romance as you search for hidden clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! 

* ARE YOU READY FOR THE JOURNEY OF A LIFETIME?* 

‚≠êKEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED ‚Äì Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues 

‚≠êYOUR 1ST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS ‚Äì Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter take you? 

‚≠êMYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR ‚Äì Relax through hundreds of dazzling hidden-object scenes and customize your very own luxurious mansion and garden island 

‚≠ê25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT ‚Äì Don't miss out on the latest hit from the makers of the mythical hidden object classic "Pearl's Peril" 

‚≠ê ALL-NEW EPISODES ‚Äì Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new chapter, and a new chapter every week 

--------------------------------------------------------------- 

June‚Äôs Journey is free to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game, for instance to upgrade your mansion. You can disable in-app purchases in your device‚Äôs settings. You may require an Internet connection to play June‚Äôs Journey and access its social features. June‚Äôs Journey may also contain advertising.

VOLUME 4 CHAPTER 3 - "Covert Operations" is next up for you to tackle! The team works hard to bring you an exciting new chapter every week. Uncover a new mystery in June's Journey every Thursday.
comments: I enjoy the game, the storyline and graphics. Like other have noted, not having stored items count towards your flowers seems odd. It's difficult to get compasses at times to open land - sometimes I have literally played about 1500 in points and got only one compass - particularly when having to play a completed scene over and over to just get enough stars to buy something. Which is another thing - I thought 36000 was a lot, then it was 38000, now 72000! Have to spend a lot of money to advance.

Love the many different aspects of the game...*the 'seek n find to gain points, increasing your coin level so you can *buy (houses, animals...), to increase your PRESTIGE, (the flowers you earn level up), *creating your own island! The *story line, following June from level to level! You don't have to make in app purchases; alternative ways to raise your coins to keep active until you meet your goals! You can also *follow JJ on Facebook!! My favorite game!!!

I like the varied parts to the game- mystery, puzzles, hidden items, building. The characters are realistic, not cartoon-like. I have had no glitches/bugs and the buttons to change scenes work easily. I was a bit confused about game play at the first scene but I went to the information and it became more clear. There are many layers to this game.

The game is fun but I have spent too much money to gain power ups, energy and gems go get farther in the game. The % you win for each seen you play to earn stars isn't equal to how well you play. It only gives you 10% increase when you "finish" a "scene" even if you get a perfect. If I get a perfect I should be earning more than 8-10% for playing great. Lots of improvements are needed.

I enjoy this game. The graphics are well done (I did find one typo but in this day and age that isn't bad) and the game play enjoyable. It is relaxing for me. I was also very impressed at the quick response to my inquiry about something that was actually me forgetting an aspect of game play about storing items. I had my answer in one day. I honestly wasn't that confident that something like a game maker would be that attentive to my dumb question. Good job!

comments: I understand that the refund is under process and will probably take 14 days to reflect into my account. I will wait for 14 days and check with the bank. However, I would like to feedback that there is no option to choose for wish cash for the pay later option. It would be more convenient for this function to be available. And also, the refund details only state the full purchase to be refunded and not the 1st installment that was actually paid. Kindly update that into the order details. Thank y

May be easy to use and some prices are great! But some charges are hidden and when they say they can't use your card as payment but end up charging you a fee for services they cannot provide this turned me off and is beyond wrong! If I'm paying for something I expect something and I don't pay for something with no product. I ordered a few times but after I was charged for services not rendered I will not order from wish again!!! I don't pay for nothing and I pray you won't either!!!

This app is getting better and better but the pickup nearby system is in need of much improvement! If you forget to pick something up on the exact date or something happens which makes you unable to pick it up on that date you get a partial refund and no product because the store doesn't know what's in the packages and can't scan it for you anymore! So the store is left with products they can't deliver and the costumer has to reorder the product or is simply left empty handed. CS is sh*'t too..

Updated "blitz buy" is BROKEN. I don't know what they did, but the new Blitz Buy is constantly crashing and not working.... Maybe y'all can call it "glitch buy" because it glitches more than it actually works. Other than that, I've found some unique gifts and good prices. You just have to watch the cost of shipping in order to decide whether the price is "good" or not.

Love everything except that the promos they offer always sound better than they are. It's always like "save up to 90%" but then it's only 5% off. Also the shipping is worded in a way that makes it sound like it's going to be quicker than it is. BUT the prices are low low and the product selection is HUGE!! so the issues are not too important. I love wish!

title: Pocket World 3D - Assemble models unique puzzle
description:
„ÄåPocket World 3D„Äçis a fun and relaxing 3D puzzle game. All the models are based on world's famous buildings. While assembling the parts into various of models, players are also feeling the exotic atmospheres around the world.

Game feature:
* Assembling by yourselfÔºåhands-on and build it up, experience assembly fun.
* 3D visionÔºåa new 3D puzzle game that trains your brain, open your imagination. 
* Hundreds of famous scenarios here, take you travel the world in the smart phone.
* Enjoy listening to classical music while managing your model.

recentChanges: -bug fixed
comments: I absolutely LOVE this game. The only criticism is that some pieces dont fit into the puzzles and when it's part of a timed event, it can get a little frustrating. Otherwise, the puzzles are really fun and the graphics are pretty good. I really like the events, and find myself playing this game every day. If you like Puzz-3D you'll LOVE this game. I enjoy learning about all of the different places created, and that new places are a available every week. I hope it is supported for a long time.

I wish there were more room to describe in painful detail how much this game relies on ads. I like ad-based games. Do NOT get me wrong. But when you need to play a 30sec ad to start AND finish a level and to move from screen to screen and to play in the timed events, it takes away from the greatness of the game. My major prob is with being given a choice: ad at the end of a lvl to get more coins or no ad for fewer coins. Easy, right? Except you get an ad either way. This app is dreadful.

The puzzles are fun but the ads are pretty insufferable in the free version. Even when clicking on a puzzle without the ad sign next to it you will have to watch an ad. When closing a puzzle you will have to watch an ad. I'd give it 5 stars if only there were fewer or less irritating ads.

I love this. I don't even care about the adds. I LOVE THIS !!!!! I just wish that I could update more often. Thats how much I play. It says " bug fixed ". Sometimes it will say that it updated when it didn't. I do play it ALOT, PLEASE FIX THE UPDATE BUTTON. I am addictive to these puzzles. I also learn alot about the places that i did not know. Keep giving me more. CAN I GET AN UPDATE PLEASE DAMN.

I love this game it is amazing how it challenges your brain to fix the puzzle. There is one problem though. The events are hard to do as the cost in game money. And to usually get that is to do puzzles or to get the amount to do the event is real life money. That is all that needs fixed don't make events to expensive. All in all great game.

title: Ruzzle Free
description:
- Top 10 word game in 145 countries
- Over 70 million players 
- So addictive, it has been played for a total of 100 000 years
- Now with Team Play!

Ruzzle is a fast-paced and addictively fun word game. Challenge your friends or random players to find as many words as possible in two minutes. 

Swipe over the scrambled letters to form the words and use bonus tiles to collect more points than your opponent. The game is played in three rounds, each played whenever suits you. 

Have two minutes to spare? Challenge yourself and your friends in Ruzzle! 

Ruzzle can be played in 14 languages.

--

Ruzzle has been lovingly created by MAG Interactive, where we take fun seriously.

Join a global audience of more than 100 million players and check out some of our other chart-topping hit games like WordBrain, Wordalot, or WordBrain 2!

We really value your feedback, go to https://www.facebook.com/ruzzlegame and say what's on your mind!

More about MAG Interactive at www.maginteractive.com

Good Times!

comments: Very good game but they need to make some changes as it's gotten tedious & boring over the years. The store hasn't had anything new added to it for years; the team game doesnt reward players fairly relative to their input so there's no incentive to participate unless you intend to do little; the tournaments are fun to play but there's nothing in the store to acquire with the rewards anyway so why play. It'd be nice if they'd get creative with the store & add features like stakes for coins in 1v1

Really enjoy playing this game... Game improves speed of thinking, accuracy and concentration... Ads might be little bit annoying while playing, but it is worth it, since they are providing this game for free, with good and simple graphics. Frequency of ads reducing as we proceed to higher levels.
I like Ruzzle, but since the format for earning coins was changed, the game isn't as much fun. Doing surveys for coins is ittitati g, to say the least!!! The added games yield very few coins also.

It takes several mlnutes to get on. Once playing the game often stops and will not let me put any letters in. I do not have this prob!em with other games. I enjoy playing this game with a friend or would unsubscribe.

I usually don't write reviews. But I feel like have to this time. Even though it's a fun word game it's unfair when it comes to the competitions. It is not equal to all. You need coins for upgrades in the competitions. Some players can get 1000+ coins per day by pressing coin rewards and watching adds. While others have a limit to how many adds they can watch. I may only watch four adds per day, rewarding me with 60 coins. There seems to be no interest to solve the problem from the creators.

title: LINE: Free Calls & Messages
description:
LINE reshapes communication around the globe, allowing you to enjoy not only messaging but also free voice and video calls wherever you find yourself. 

Download LINE and discover the reasons for its global popularity and number one ranking in 52 countries.

LINE's latest features

‚òÖ Intimate conversations or large round tables can happen anywhere with group video calls
Chat with up to 200 friends in your group simultaneously! Enjoy face to face video chats with friends as well!

‚òÖ Use polls to quickly see what your friends think
From where to meet to what to eat, avoid lengthy discussions and make decisions easily by creating a poll.

LINE's main features

‚òÖ Free voice and video calls anywhere, anytime 
Enjoy great quality calls at no charge, no matter where you are. Even international calls with up to 200 people at the same time are completely free! Use effects and filters for even more fun during video calls. (Note that this feature may not be available on certain devices.)

‚òÖ Convenient chats where anything is possible 
Share messages, photos, videos, stickers, voice messages, and locations easily with friends. 

‚òÖ Fun and easy-to-use social networking features 
From messages and photos to videos and locations, share your daily moments with friends on Timeline! 

‚òÖ Find the world's most popular characters at the Sticker Shop 
Browse hundreds of popular free stickers plus adorable stickers of the world's favorite characters! Choose from a variety of LINE sticker sets to liven up your messages in your own unique way. 

‚òÖ Auto-sync your device and PC 
Whether on the go with the mobile version or connected to the desktop version using your PC or Mac, your LINE chats are always up-to-date and synced automatically across all versions. 

‚òÖ Your own personal storage space: Keep 
Store messages, photos, videos, and more in Keep where you can easily share them with friends.  

‚òÖ  Stay informed with LINE official accounts
Connect directly with your favorite celebrities and companies by friending their official accounts.

‚òÖ Get connected to new apps
LINE provides a gateway to entertainment and lifestyle apps that will keep you entertained and bring new convenience to your life.

‚òÖ Make international calls with LINE Out
Place international calls to mobile phones and landlines at low rates. You can even call friends who aren't on LINE.
Plus, enjoy free calls after watching ads with LINE Out Free.

‚òÖ Face Play: May the best face win!
Get ready to stretch those facial muscles! Rack up new high scores in solo mode, or battle it out with your friends in duo mode for double the fun. Don't forget to collect your special trophy and skin when you complete a mission or become the season champion!

‚ñ† We recommend using a data plan or connecting to Wi-Fi as you may incur data usage fees otherwise. 
‚ñ† Please also use LINE with Android OS versions 4.4 and above to enjoy LINE to the fullest extent.

**********
If your network speed is too slow or you don't have enough device storage, LINE may not install properly.

If this happens, please check your connection and try again.
**********

comments: I was working perfectly until yesterday. I opened it this morning to send some stuff but the message still isn't delivered. It doesn't work on both devices i used it on. I tried everything, deleting and reinstalling, updating, restarting my phone, logged out and in. Still doesn't work. My wifi is also perfectly fine with other apps and webs.

This works ok. I been getting annoyed because I don't always get a notification that I got a message. For example ill randomly open it and than it will tell me I got a message a few hours back im like WTH it's supposed to tell me when I get it. You guys need to fix that issue it happens too often

It works most of the time, what irritates me is the lack of fluidity of the performance given by the app when using it even on the highest-end devices. Other third-party apps on my phone works fine, smooth like butter except LINE, it stutters frequently without any explanations or whatsoever. I hope this can be fixed in the future. And I also hope that it will be more optimized for tablets because, I cant use the app on landscape mode except in chats....which is.... odd.

Please fix the verification problem. When I log in on my laptop, the phone won't show box to put in the number. Used to work regularly until yesterday. Perhaps it's because I chance my email and it's a bug? QR code log in is fine but I don't like to do it every time I turn on my laptop. Please fix this and I will rate back to 5 stars. Thank you.

The reason why i gv 3 stars,it becoz when we login in other device all chat disappear. Line gv an option to save the chat to google drive,unfortunately every time I try to sv in drive,its not works. Eventhough if it works sv in drive,still faces an isssue which is we cant open it,or its not appear directly like in other apps did. It would be great if Line can make all chat not dissapear,like messenger on FB did,which is the chat appear same like when the last time i see in other device. Thanks!

title: Solitaire
description:
Solitaire by MobilityWare is the original Solitaire game for Android devices!

Klondike Patience has never been better! 

Join over 100 million users playing our Solitaire for Android! Our version of Solitaire is free and is the most popular in the Play Store! Train your brain with our Daily Challenges for a new Solitaire experience each & every day. Download now to play the best classic Solitaire card game on Android now!

SOLITAIRE BY MOBILITYWARE FEATURES:

Fun Addicting Games of Classic Klondike & Patience Solitaire
‚ô† Play different versions of Klondike solitaire, including draw 1 card Klondike Solitaire or classic draw 3 card Klondike Solitaire!
‚ô† Winning Deals: Never let the challenge of the game get too great! But beware, you will still have to find the right moves to beat the challenge!
‚ô†Try all the addicting unique ways to train your brain with the classic game of Klondike!

Play Challenging Games & Unlock New Challenges Each Day 
‚ô• Challenges keep the classic game of Klondike solitaire new every time. Never run out of new puzzles and ways to train your brain!
‚ô• Always Free - Play unlimited games every day for a unique, challenging game!
Classic Games, Modern Options
‚ô£ Statistics tracker: track your progress across several games of Klondike, and study your play style to get even better at solving puzzles!
‚ô£ Customize the cards & tables to play with your own style!
‚ô£ Play online or take the challenge offline with random deals. No WIFI required to play anywhere for free! 
‚ô£ Remove the Menu and Status bar to make navigation easier on Devices which utilize Android‚Äôs Navigation Bar (requires Android 4.4 or above)

Multiplayer & Leaderboards
‚ô• Brag about your scores and show off to your friends with the leaderboards included in game!
‚ô• Race against the world when you play with others in multiplayer! 

Train your brain and solve each Daily Challenge to receive a crown for that day. Earn trophies each month by winning more crowns! Play our Daily Challenges and Solitaire free!
 
The game is ad-supported, but only between deals. We don‚Äôt put ads on your playfield. 


LIKE US on Facebook
http://www.facebook.com/mobilitywaresolitaire

recentChanges: In this update, we‚Äôve addressed numerous bugs and implemented backend updates to improve your overall experience.
comments: Love the game. I'm only giving it a mid rating is because of the ads. Recently there is a repetitive ad for weight loss that looks sketchy, people talk but there's no dialogue, just an annoying soundtrack. There's no product name. I think it's a phishing scam. There used to be a small icon with an ! that gave you the option to hide an ad that was either repetitive or irrelevant, but that has disappeared. Instead now you have to actually close the app and restart it to get rid of the ad.

The game is top notch! A couple of major detractors though. 1. Advertising is way out of hand. Most ads now require two dismissals before going away. The advertisers are also working very hard to disguise the dismissals for the sole reason of keeping their page up as long as possible. And, sorry Mobilityware, there are many instances in which the ad cannot be dismissed after 5 seconds, such as Disney and Purina. 2. The daily goals needs to have a 'turn-off' feature. The speed penalty is too hi

I truly love playing this strategic game!!! It really makes you think outside the BOX!! Not only that, it relaxes your entire mind, body, and soul!! It's a comparative game; in which, it gives you a GREAT!! Brain- Work-out, knowing that you can actually select the RIGHT- COMBINATION OF MOVES and go from one level to the next. I relax with this strategic game daily. Carolyn Reese Atlanta, Georgia OCTOBER 14, 2020

Like game not the ads. I have been playing for over a year. You needs the ads for revenue, I got that. However, pictures of a women's ass in tight clothes is not what I am looking for. If I wanted that I would go to a different site. So select less explicit ads or I go elsewhere. PS children play these games. So you are contributing to the delinquency of minors.

Another great app ruined by ads and greed... I'd happily pay to remove the stupid ads but they're greedy, they want a subscription! üòÜ just charge a one time charge like everyone else. I'm not paying for a subscription that's just nuts.. I've been playing for years and now I'm leaving, plenty of other solitary apps. Also notice all the people complaining about the ads and the developers done NOTHING.

recentChanges:
NEW LEVELS have sprouted on the Burgeoning Beanstalk!
Climb your way up 3050 treacherous challenges.
comments: My favorite game, I literally deleted my other games because this is the only one I play now, I love it so much. Everything from how positive it is, to the perfectly fitting audio that plays. I love how simple and easy going this game is and I love how this games helps you succeed. The levels where you can locate items are super fun as well, recommending this game to everyone I know literally!!

Caution. This game is really nicely crafted, very visually rich, and enjoyable to play from levels 1-10. After this, things start to go absolutely mental. There is pop-up after pop-up, harassing you about another new feature. You quickly get to a point where you're bamboozled - everything on the screen is shouting at you. This appears to be by design, hyper confusion and attention hijacking to nurture addiction. This app is nefarious and should be enjoyed only with huge restraint.

Never log into Facebook. It causes you to lose the prizes from any contest you won. I had tons of things coming from a dots race and they vanished the second it connected to Facebook. Also, the game freezes and crashes a lot when watching videos to get a bonus box. You have to be patient when you open the app. It can take over five minutes to come up.

Honestly was obsessed with this game for awhile, but they made a bunch of updates and now every time you view the map about four or five different windows pop up to tell you about the different games. It used to just be the daily bonus. Tired of exiting out of a bunch of stupid notifications just to be able to click on the game I want. They ruined a good thing.

You get to a certain point and you can't win anything without spending money. With prices on everything else in life steadily increasing the last thing I wanna spend money on is a silly phone game. If you could just spend money once or twice, maybe no big deal. But you have to constantly spend money to get perks to help you thru the levels and clearly this is by design. It's a really cool game, and very disappointing to have to delete, but I'm just not up for money hungry games like this.

comments: Updated 10/31/20: The app is totally unusable. I uninstalled and reinstalled it, but I can't hit a single button on it. Completely useless. Original Review: Used to work great, but lately it has all kinds of bugs whether it suddenly decides it won't accept my payment method anymore or errors out when I try to place an order. It freezes and often forgets to clear my order bag after I've successfully picked up an order. So many headaches lately, I don't know what went wrong. Ued to love this app.

Constantly buggy and glitches. I've used it successfully but it typically requires constantly uninstalling and reinstalling the app or religiously clearing your cache. The deals screen often says you've already used a deal and have to wait an hour even when you haven't ordered in weeks. Overall, a frustrating experience for something that should be a convenience.

Updated 10/2020: I've done everything including uninstalling and re installing. The app doesn't work at all. love this app when it actually works. More than half of the time, I can't pull anything up on it, or it is frozen and nothing on it will work. "Connectivity issues" is what it stated. Those issues are not with my phone, because i have service and wifi. Please fix!!!! It's pretty hard to use the app while there when I can't even get in to it.

Fantastic app, works every time. Orders being automatically submitted and requiring "reopening" every time I switch apps is annoying but no big deal. One of the best developed fast food pre-order apps. The restaurants, maybe 1.5 star. They must be hiring illiterates, or they glance at the screen and throw in guesses for anything forgotten. The "hot&spicy" chicken patty isn't very spicy going down but DON'T LET IT BACK UP. Seems it turns into the fire of hades in your guts. Omg I cried, no joke.

Well, a couple years later, new phone, different Android version, still freezing on the opening screen. so unreliable (CLEARING CACHE DOES NOTHING!) - your food isn't that great that your app should be so problematic. Business 101 - don't make it difficult for people to do business with you. BK works great EVERY time - BYE!

title: Pyramid Solitaire Saga
description:
Pyramid Solitaire Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Saga & Farm Heroes Saga!

Magic and mystery await in this Solitaire strategy puzzle game.

Join Helena and her loyal friend Kingsley the gerbil on their journey to reveal the wonders of the Ancient World.

Find the clues by catching the Scarabs hidden beneath the cards. You can match a card that is one higher or lower than the one on your deck. Beat the levels and the Scarabs will reveal hidden lost to the ancient world and the magic that‚Äôs locked within!

Plan your strategy and begin completing the episodes to unravel the mystery and secrets left behind, your adventure is all stemmed by a quest to reignite Khepri's prophecy and Helena needs your help to do it.

Explore the forgotten places of the world where epic adventures await, discover The Hidden Tomb, The Emerald Dream and beyond!

Solving the puzzles will require strategy and skill and all of your Solitaire magic! Cast spells to aid you in your quest helping to overcome obstacles such as the Mummy Card! Keep your cards close in this Solitaire mystery, who knows what you might uncover?

Take on this Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score! Keep a close eye on the leaderboards and see which of your friends are at the top of the pyramid!

Pyramid Solitaire Saga is completely free to play but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Pyramid Solitaire Saga features:
‚Ä¢ Solve the puzzles and discover new Solitaire strategies with rich and exotic graphics!
‚Ä¢ Transport to magical and forgotten worlds lost to the ancient times on an adventure with Helena the Treasure Hunter and Kingsley the cunning gerbil
‚Ä¢ Powerful magic boosters to help with challenging levels
‚Ä¢ Play your cards carefully throughout the exciting levels to unlock boosters and hidden treasures!
‚Ä¢ Easy and fun to play, challenging to master 
‚Ä¢ Hundreds of magical puzzles and levels to complete ‚Äì more adventures to come!
‚Ä¢ Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
‚Ä¢ Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the Internet
‚Ä¢ Available to play on mobile and tablet devices 

Already a fan of Pyramid Solitaire Saga? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news: 
facebook.com/PyramidSolitaireSaga
twitter.com/PyramidSaga

Start laying the cards down today! 

A big THANK YOU goes out to all of our friends who have played Pyramid Solitaire Saga!

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy.  If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in game help centre or by going to https://soporto.king.com/
