comments: I've played this game for years; since first introduced. I literally had accumulated over a 1000 of the various boosters. The update at the end of Sept completely screwed up my game. It set me back 12 levels, & every single booster I had was gone. They sent another update a few days later with 10 gold bars. Big deal. I tried reaching out multiple times, with no reply. I uninstalled the app, & tried logging back in with FB, but it had saved me at the "bad" version, so no help. Garbage developers.

None of the cards in the feckmatch the cards in the playing field and the key is always gone always ! This used to be a good game to play ,now you have to buy joker's and other boosters just to pass the level , not so much fun as it is aggravating . really just really ! ! ! Guess that it's time to uninstall this game. Once again ,the cards in the deck math none in the playing field ,been on this level for 2 week's F$&k this game !

I have to say that after I voiced all my complaints and problems the Pyramid folks have really stepped up to the plate & listened. I have never had such great interactions and speedy fixes. I hope that this continues and that they continue with the fun and challenges by continuing to create more levels. Thank you Pyramid folks, keep up the good work. ‚ù§

Fun game but would be nice to receive daily boosters. Some of the levels are pretty difficult and once you've used what boosters you had to pass you're basically out of luck. I've deleted the game several times for that reason. I do come back in hopes that maybe they've changed so that a person can receive a daily booster but nope. Thinking of deleting again. When you have issues they don't get back to you either.

Was really enjoying this until it insisted I updated. When I tried playing it again it had wiped out everything I'd done including saved levels and gone back to the first level. Really not impressed. Won't be bothering to start again, so wont play it again. Have it three stars as I did enjoy the game and would have given it more but would give it a big fat nought for wiping everything out.

title: Kill Shot Bravo: Free 3D FPS Shooting Sniper Game
description:
Welcome to Kill Shot Bravo! Free online FPS sniper shooting game on mobile! 
Go to war online and prove your sniper shooting skills in the king of multiplayer 3D sniper games.

Arm yourself with deadly sniper weapons, machine guns and the latest military gear to complete covert missions! All of this in a free online FPS multiplayer action shooting game. In Kill Shot Bravo, it‚Äôs your duty to save the world. That means hunting terrorists, killing zombies and waging war on evil armies. 

Call yourself a sharp shooter with pixel precision? Then put your skills to the test in the top free online multiplayer sniper game on mobile.  

*OVER 2400 MISSIONS*
As a Special Forces soldier your duty will be to navigate secret missions across the globe, shooting hostile army forces that stand in the way of a peaceful world.
If you love FPS sniper 3D killing games you'll love this.
‚Ä¢ From guerrilla combat in jungle mountain ranges, to recon missions on Mediterranean islands, to modern warfare in city streets you‚Äôll travel the world to gun down terror threats as an elite sniper. 
‚Ä¢ Commandeer vehicles to turn the tide of battle! Navigate close quarter combat down narrow alleys in the back of a jeep, or take out hostile threats by air in hazardous helicopter missions! 
‚Ä¢ Complete breach missions to enter occupied buildings and clear them of any threat! Survive a full on enemy attack in multiplayer assault games and shoot more enemies than your opponent. 
‚Ä¢ Move through stunning 3D environments to find the best sniper vantage points and take the all-important Kill Shot! 

Download the app now for free and enjoy regular updates with new regions and missions. This is one fps game you won‚Äôt get bored of. 

*GO TO WAR WITH THE ENEMY*
‚Ä¢ Shoot different enemy types each with their own strengths and combat objectives. Prove you can adapt to different shooting game styles. 
‚Ä¢ Unleash your fury and shoot down Flying Drones, Exo-Suit Soldiers, Zombies, Mechs, Heavy Gunners, sniper assassin Enemy RPGs, Marksmen, Riflemen, Commando Bombers and finally kill the boss.

*LIVE PVP SNIPER DUELS*
‚Ä¢ Clash against snipers in live online multiplayer Player Verses Player shooting matches in PVP mode!  
‚Ä¢ Be the hunter before you are the hunted!
‚Ä¢ Use your heat meter to zone in on the enemy threat. 
‚Ä¢ Find your target. Take aim. Shoot!
‚Ä¢ Online Multiplayer shooting games have never felt this real.

*JOIN ALLIANCES AND BOUNTY EVENTS*
‚Ä¢ This time you won't be fighting alone! Build powerful alliances with other shooters and help each other to complete the high-risk missions. 
‚Ä¢ Hunt and collect bounties from enemies.
‚Ä¢ Take out hordes of zombies in exclusive events. Work with your alliance to stop the Virus and start killing some zombies. New Zombie Shooter Game modes!
‚Ä¢ Friends can join you in multiplayer missions, spotting the targets and assisting you to shoot enemies.
‚Ä¢ Full Chat function in game to allow tactical discussions with other snipers.

*CUSTOMIZE*
‚Ä¢ Customize your avatar and get Perks to help in the battle! 
‚Ä¢ Unlock and equip cool army gear, including helmets, military uniforms, body armor, goggles, facemasks, gloves, boots, and more.
‚Ä¢ Get a fresh Kill Shot moment with every victory! Now YOU get to control the Kill Shot. This is a free online multiplayer fps sniper game with premium customized content. 

* GOOGLE PLAY SERVICES LEADERBOARDS AND ACHIEVEMENTS*
‚Ä¢ Compete for high scores alone or with your Alliance against opposing Alliances.
‚Ä¢ Earn Achievements for showing off your deadly sniper skills.
‚Ä¢ Take on weekly Quests to win additional prizes and achievements

OTHER FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Free online multiplayer games and offline single player experience
‚Ä¢ 3D Guns, tons of sniper weapons

Play the Best Fun free FPS Sniper 3D Shooting Game on Mobile for Free!

¬©2020 Hothead Games Inc., Hothead, and Kill Shot are trademarks or registered trademarks of Hothead Games Inc., all rights reserved.

comments: SUPPORT experience is horrible. The response is always like "we are not able to process this", "unfortunately we cannot help on this", "we have reviewed your case but unable to offer anything further" etc. It's very difficult to Earn Golds and majority of items in game (about 80%) requires Gold to buy while the other 2 currencies (Cash and Medals) are hardly in need but are offered plenty through various Events. Overall you have to put in lots of money and time into this game for nothing.

This is very good game. If you want to top in this game you must have gold and bucks. You have to collect gold by tapjoy and also need some purchase. This game grafics are good. And control is also good. Gun upgrading is necessary. When you purchase a weapon you have to upgrade full. This is a good game.üëçüëçüëç

I played the game for 2 years and spent a lot of money in it, literally you have to buy everyhting from here even energy to play when it should be free, each target is 2 or 3 energies and it cost money too if you go to alliance war you have to shoot almost 22 hours straight non stop to get in a good place and you get rewards rhat after 3 or 4 weeks you dont anymore and you have to keep buying guns to level up. I only give this game 1 star rate because all of the money you have to spend

Lots of micro transactions to go with all the ads. You need to upgrade your weapon almost every mission and they get a delay before going into effect. I saw 40 minutes with a rank 2 weapon, can't imagine what it would be with higher ranked weapons. Unless of course you use more micro transactions to skip the time. Seems like you spend more time waiting than playing

Wow. My old phone is logged in using my Facebook and my Google account. I got a new phone and my new phone won't allow me to sign into my existing account even when I sign in with the same Google and Facebook account. I am not starting over on this game. Very frustrating your system won't allow me to get my account back between phones!

title: Farm Heroes Saga
description:
Farm Heroes Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Soda Saga & Bubble Witch 3 Saga! 

Rancid the Racoon is trying to spoil the precious Farm Lands, stealing as many Cropsies as he can along the way. Join forces with the Farm Heroes and help collect the Cropsies to save the day! Play through hundreds of levels solving puzzles by switching, matching and collecting Cropsies across the farm! 

Match 3 or more Cropsies to collect them, plan your moves for bigger and better matches to reach that all important high score! Explore farmtastic adventures across a variety of game modes and puzzles including Rancid boss battles!

Farm Heroes Saga has a wealth of boosters and power ups to help you out along the way! Make the most of Hero Mode when you have moves to spare, Hero Mode lets you earn extra points which makes those big matches even more worthwhile! 

Take on this fantastic Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score and compete to become number 1!

Farm Heroes Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Farm Heroes Saga features: 
‚óè Collect all kinds of Cropsies to win the level before you run out of moves
‚óè Relaxing match 3 gameplay
‚óè Hero Mode: Earn extra points when you have moves to spare!
‚óè Play levels and win magic beans to help you activate Farm Club 
‚óè Reach for the stars in the Tractor Dash, challenge friends to collect stars for rewards
‚óè Rechargeable boosters, special power ups and Farm Club animals to help you win those challenging levels
‚óè Easy to play but challenging to master
‚óè Acres of luscious levels and puzzles to complete - more added every 2 weeks!
‚óè Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
‚óè Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the internet

Visit https://care.king.com/ or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Follow us to get news and updates:
facebook.com/FarmHeroes 
Twitter @FarmHeroesSaga 
youtube.com/user/FarmHeroesOfficial 
farmheroessaga.com 

Start matching and collecting Cropsies today! But most importantly have fun playing Farm Heroes Saga!

comments: challenging & interesting game. Certain levels are too challenging for the simple minded like me! Tempted to give up many times as it's too time consuming! üò¢Don't understand why the gold bars are not available for use even though the piggy bank has been full many times. Getting too difficult to complete a level, impossible in fact for hours on end. Very tempted to give up all together & try other games. Getting to a stage where it's too time consuming to complete a level. Losing interest.

This game is fun sometimes, until you have one left and you lose. This game is rigged. Cause they can give you what you need if there is only one left, but they want you to spend money, and when you do spend a little money, you would expect to get cheaper prizes and better prizes. Y'all need to do something about it because im getting annoyed when that happens after I've spent $30 or $40, im expecting better results with my spending

Been Playing for 10 years and I'm obsessed with this game. I love the animals and the challenges, I have gotten all of the animals in the game w/o really putting 5$ in and playing on/off for so many years. So Its a great game with great side games you can play for hours. To the Developers I would like to see more of the level streak boost. For every level you pass you get boosters on your next like the candy crush sagas have. Thank You if you made it here!

Great game until you reach the pay wall level. Move the sheep to the hay.. yeah when the game decides that you're allowed to. No information provided on how to move the sheep, thought I'd got the last sheep to the hay with my last move but NOOOO.. game decides that the same move I'd made with the previous sheep was not allowed. 100% designed like this so you spend money. Well not me. Deleted. As with candy crush take your game and SHOVE IT!!!!

fun till it started cheatingüò°When it starts cheating again I will uninstall it again. It is ok for awhile then it cheats. Funny that the cheating starts when a player reaches higher levels. I am not going to pay for gold bars I have "WON." A lot of time is wasted on ads and other nonsense. I spend mote time watching dumb ads than playing...boo!

title: AfricaWork: Job Offers in Africa
description:
AfricaWork is the No. 1 App for Job Search in Africa.

AfricaWork accompanies you every moment in your search for employment and in your career through its jobboards in 37 countries in Africa. 9,500 companies use our services to publish their job ads and recruit their future employees.
View more than 20,000 open positions, create your profile and apply in one click to the job opportunities that interest you.

Save time! The AfricaWork App is free, secured, simple and efficient:

‚Ä¢	Easily and quickly search for the latest job offers;
‚Ä¢	Apply in one click to the job offers that correspond to you. Your application will be sent immediately to the recruiters;
‚Ä¢	Make yourself noticed by recruiters: Post your CV and be visible to recruiters who can contact you directly for a job;
‚Ä¢	Create email alerts and be the first to receive new job offers that meet your criteria;
‚Ä¢	The AfricaWork App is a 100% free service. We are here to help you find a job. We authenticate the genuiness of companies that publish their ads on our jobboards.

Our mission: To accompany you throughout your career!
Our values: Customer Satisfaction, Courage, Respect, Authenticity and Listening.

The AfricaWork App allows you to find a job in 37 African countries:

Algeria (algeriejob), Benin (emploibenin), Botswana (botswajob), Burkina Faso (emploiburkina), Burundi (emploi .bi), Cameroon (emploi .cm), Central African Republic (emploi .cf), Chad (emploi .td), Congo (emploi .cg), DRC Congo (emploi .cd), Egypt (3amal), Ethiopia (ethiopiawork), Gabon (emploi .ga), Ghana (ghanajob), Guinea (emploiguinee), Ivory Coast (emploi .ci), Kenya (kenyajob), Liberia (liberiawork), Malawi (malawijob), Mali (emploimali), Mauritania (emploimauritanie), Morocco (emploi .ma), Namibia (namijob), Niger (nigerjob), Nigeria (nigeriajob), Rwanda (rwandajob), Senegal (emploisenegal), Sierra Leone (sierraleonejob), South Africa (zajob), South Sudan (southsudanjob), Sudan (sudancareers), Tanzania (tanzajob), Togo (emploi .tg), Tunisia (emploitunisie), Uganda (ugandajob), Zambia (zambiajob), Zimbabwe (zimbajob).

Your opinions help us serve you better. Thank you for sending us your comments, suggestions or concerns by email to support@africawork.com

comments: Not allowing CV to be uploaded. Only shows picture files not doc, docx or pdf.
Takes a long time to load a request Each click on a link reloads the page which gives me a feeling that I'm in a web browser instead of a Mobile app
Exceptional app for both job seekers and recruiters or companies. I recommend it to any of my friends who is looking to hire new staff.
Quite simple to navigate through.
This new app is easy to use and I tried it and it's fine.

title: Taps to Riches
description:
Build your empire one city at a time in this new tap idler sure to make you money hungry! Tap to make money, tap to upgrade your city‚Äôs business buildings, and tap some more! Unlock, hire, and collect as many Advisors and Bizbots as you can to upgrade your business value, build your cities faster, and earn a stash of cash as you rise from rags to riches! Valuable Adviser bonuses will have you tapping even faster! Can you become a billionaire business tycoon or will you fail as a capitalist?

From the creators of Coin Dozer and Brick Breaker Hero, Taps to Riches will have you tapping everywhere you go!

- Expand your empire into multiple cities with unique challenges
- Hundreds of hilarious Advisers who add valuable business bonuses! Collect them all!
- Dare to reset your progress and take advantage of Bizbots, a precious resource that give you even more money bonuses per tap!
- Buy and upgrade your businesses to see them evolve into architectural masterpieces!
- Tons of Bonuses and Achievements for you to discover with all of your tapping frenzy!
- More features to come!

Taps to Riches is a unique city building simulation game with tap and click mechanics. Upgrade businesses in game to make money and earn extra cash as you venture into new cities.   

Start from the bottom as a newly freed villain with big dreams of once again achieving world domination. Tap your way into riches and money by upgrading buildings and investing in your city. The more cash you invest in businesses the more money they produce for you. Hire valuable Advisors to unlock special business bonuses, and use Bizbot resources for even more cash bonuses!

Taps to Riches is a free game that is supported by the ads we and others display. To do this, we work with a variety of online advertising partners who collect data from users of our games and other games to show you ads that are relevant to your interests. Do not install or launch our games unless you consent to this use and sharing of data, as further explained in our Privacy Policy (http://gamecircus.com/privacy-policy/).

recentChanges: Bug Fixes and Improvements!
comments: This games is very fast paced and keeps you moving, moving, moving. I end up losing track of time because of the fun I'm having.

I HATE games that force you through an extremely slow tutorial without the option to open settings. I'm listening to my audiobook and have been tapping for 20 minutes and still there is no option to turn off the sound. It's also incredibly dumb that you can't tap tap and upgrade at the same time, and there is no "buy max" button. This tutorial is going on forever, I hate being railroaded by a game Edit: apparently the railroading never stops. Uninstalling

It keeps you busy at night and it's just a game to keep you distracted when you need it in the game you save up money and you tap to Rainbow and the more you tap the more buildings you can buy the house gets upgraded it's really fun and I've already playing it for 2 hours

Wants to give us random ads during play but when it comes time for ads to double prizes like being offline for 9 hours and double that income suddenly ads no longer will load and you lose the double income. Had daily reward and went to watch ad to exchange only to get no reward at all

I don't know why there's no close button after spinning for an advisor. I tapped all over the screen and nothing happens and basically you're forced to close the app and restart after every spin because there's nothing else you could do.

title: Venmo
description:
Why use Venmo?

Because it‚Äôs the money app for splitting the cost of almost anything‚Äîright then, right there.
Because it makes settling up feel like catching up. 
Because you can add a note to each payment to remember the moments, not the money. 

What do people use Venmo for? Plenty of things, like:

Meals
Split the group dinner tab without the napkin math.

Rent
Transfer money to roomies for your share of rent and utilities.

Activities
Settle up for fun stuff like concert tix and road trips.

Surprises
Send a penny to say hi, or 5 bucks for good luck.

Still reading? We‚Äôll let you in on a little secret: we‚Äôre more than just a way to pay friends.
- We offer the Venmo Debit Card, so you can shop with your Venmo balance everywhere Mastercard¬Æ is accepted in the U.S., plus earn cash back rewards at select retailers. Terms apply: https://venmo.com/rewards/
- Get your Venmo money in the bank, fast. Use Instant Transfer to get your cash in minutes using an eligible debit card or bank account. 
- Check out with Venmo on some of your favorite apps, like Uber, StockX, Grubhub, and Zola. 
- We‚Äôve got your back‚Äîsecurity is very important to us, and we prioritize making you feel safe and secure by taking security measures to protect your account. Plus, we‚Äôve got a stellar customer support team, ready to solve any issues.


Card is issued by The Bancorp Bank pursuant to license by Mastercard International Incorporated. The Bancorp Bank; Member FDIC. Mastercard is a registered trademark, and the circles design is a trademark of Mastercard International Incorporated.

recentChanges: We worked on various improvements and bug fixes
comments: This app used to be good. I tried to add another bank account to use to send money and it did not accept my amount to verified. I never had problems sending money before. Then I tried the original bank account to send money. It keep saying cannot process try later. It's been three days and still now working. What a shame. I loved this app before, now I dont. Have to find another way to send money.

There isno feedback on payments and I had to exit and re-open the app to see my payment was sent. The settings suck, if something is on and you want it off, the app starts linking your accounts instead of being an off or on option. Whatever you do, don't accidentally break their rules or they will ban you for life and not give you an appeal option. The parent company will persecute you of you treat anyone the way they treat their customers.

I have had venmo since they started. I have not had any issues, I use it to accept payments. It makes budgeting easier for me as I use my venmo to make misc purchases that I don't want to use for my main account. No issues for me ever. I found venmo because originally I was with cash app. Someone hacked my acct and cash app penalized me and closed my account with no option to open again. Venmo saved the day! i love this app, my favorite part is the emojis!

App keeps freezing and crashing out of nowhere. It still runs fine, but at least 2 or 3 times now I've sent money to someone and the app freezes while the money is sending. Only way to escape is by exiting the app through task manager. The money always goes through to the other person but this shouldn't happen. Also often the app will just freeze while I'm scrolling through transactions. Sometimes it resolves itself, sometimes it doesn't. Otherwise, I would rate this app 5 stars.

The app keeps freezing randomly all the time, while navigating through it. It doesn't matter what I'm doing, it could be scrolling, tapping on something, etc., I have to restart the app each time. I also don't get notifications until I manually open the app. After which I keep getting the same notification again after I've closed the app!

comments: Can't log into my account anymore. I've played for 6 years with no problems, now in the last 3 weeks I've had more issues than I can count trying to log in. I've rebooted my phone, I've cleared my cache, I've turned off my VPN, I've cleared my junk files and my residual files with Norton Clean, and I've deleted the game and reloaded it, NOTHING WORKS.

At first it was okay, $4.99 packs then $19.99 packs to help you advance, now mostly everything is $100 packs. I also notice that they were giving more hero energy and loyalty points to help you out in the game now you barly get loyalty points and you hardly ever get hero energy. They don't sell shields so you have to buy them with loyalty points but how can you buy them with loyalty points if you hardly win enough to buy the shield so you constantly get attacked and have your hero taken. üëé

Have played this game for a number of years getting very discouraged game will load for a day then close spontaneously during the loading process. They tell me its my phone but when others have the same issue. I'm seeing they only want money not fix the issues I'm down grading my stars to a 2 because of technical issues without fixes and it has evolved to a pay to play, pay to win game.

Use to be a Good game but you can't advance without buying a pack now. The developer has to lower those prices not everyone can afford $99.00 a pop for a Pack especially nowadays Put up some $5 or $10 deals like other game do so the rest of us can advance too... Its a google play game guys Stop being greedy for money listen to the reviews players not happy with the game anymore.

I played this game all the time on my samsung phones. Very fun game to keep up with. Now I'm on my oneplus 7 pro and nothing loads other than the all text boxes and buildings. I can't transfer my account because I don't know what I'm pressing. This is one of few games I have spent money on, I'd like to not lose that account.

title: SignNow - Sign and Fill PDF Docs

Regardless of whether you are a company or an organization, large or small business, with a lot of customers or just a few, the application can still serve your needs perfectly well. Learn the list of advantages you will experience via employing the app:

comments: I have been using this for years. Tried many others as I am a perfectionist and I will be staying with sign now, it is the best.
Extremely simple to use. Great for quick signing.

It been a blessing to have this app especially during this COVID-19 pandemic. I've been able to sign school forms and also documents for the purchase of our new house. The app makes it easy, convenient, and safe to continue getting things done. Thank you ‚ù§Ô∏è
I had a hard time using the sign is App. I had to have the Company I needed to sign with send the documents twice. This last time it was completed correctly.
Very user friendly and a vital app in this day and age of technology.

title: Kiloblocks Lite
description:
Build your own base, mine, castle or whatever you imagine!

Kiloblocks is a game - editor which allows you moving, building and transforming the terrain in the 3D environment.

*** NOTE ***

1. Kiloblocks Lite is a free version of Kiloblocks game.

2. The full version of the game allows save and load game state.

comments: I got so many memories in this. Before my mother had new phone in 2020. Go back to 2019 or 2018 I do not remember. At that time Iwas going to play Exploration Lite, then (Because I was a kid and this was new for me) when I opened Exploration Lite, it's Kiloblocks Lite and I am scared becsuse it is not Exploration Lite anymore. Then I played dis and it is so fun. I like this and played, so many new blocks and dis game does know what it needs and not. I build so many. Thank you forso many memories

Alright, I'm rating this 5 stars for giving me so many memories. I remember asking for my moms phone to play "Exploration Lite". If you didn't, this game used to be called that. But I remember different terrain and more blocks to use. I don't really know why they removed these features. It made the game fun when you don't have the real Minecraft. But seriously, this game has given me so much nostalgia just by playing it. Thank you for the fun memories.

I love this game! It does need to update it. There should be a save button. I should not worry about closing the tab by accident and my build being gone. They also need to have more inventory to build with. This game would also be really fun if you could play with others, for example put in a code and your friend could join.. Overall it is a good game but PLEASE ADD A SAVE BUTTON AND A FRIENDS MODE!

The game brings back memories back when this game was called Exploration Lite. I remember the time I made a big square house and then I pressed recent tab and all my progress was gone lol. I loved this game... Still do. This was when Google Play was called Play Store - The good times. I had a lot of games - Moshi monsters, glow hockey, Temple Run 1, 2 and every OG game. Now Google Play is riddled with good games that are ruined because of in-game ads and marketing ads. (99% fail etc)

When I was scrolling down my library page on my phone I found this and just gave me a wave of nostalgia this was the Minecraft when you can't afford it I remember building a wal mart and it was so satisfying when I completed it but it didn't have a save feature so it didn't last for very long anyways it was a good game.

title: Weather & Hurricane Tracker: The Weather Channel
description:
Weather your way: face severe weather with The Weather Channel, the world's leading weather provider*. Get live radar updates, severe weather alerts, and check weather conditions on the go. Hurricane season and tropical storms are here, so be prepared with local weather maps, storm radar news and your local weather forecast.

Live weather radar, weather maps, forecast, and an accurate storm and hurricane tracker - available wherever you are! Get the local weather info you need to prepare for what's ahead: a tropical storm, a hurricane, or bright blue skies. Living in an area prone to severe weather? Our storm radar and severe weather alerts have got you covered. We provide an accurate weather forecast to help you plan up to 15 days in advance, with NOAA alerts and severe weather recommendations.

Enjoy the weather and don‚Äôt worry about getting caught in a storm. Check our forecast with a detailed weather tracker and accurate weather maps. Track your local weather and live weather radar to prepare for what's ahead - rain or severe weather like a tropical storm or hurricane. Our practical GPS weather maps, storm radar & hurricane tracker help you face whatever the clouds may bring.

Track extreme weather alerts thanks to our live weather radar! Discover The Weather Channel‚Äôs top 4 features:

1. Weather your way! Get a personalized weather map and check weather conditions in a new way. Discover a live weather radar, a storm tracker, and our Feels Like feature.
2. NOAA severe weather alerts - Get push notifications for all severe weather updates with our storm tracker. From a tornado to a hurricane or tropical storm, we help you stay safe.
3. Track weather alerts & conditions - Stay alert with our hurricane tracker, and get weather alerts with our storm radar.
4. Smart videos! Discover visuals of NOAA alerts and track on a GPS map the development of a storm.

Stay alert: track local weather and plan outdoor activities with confidence.
‚Ä¢ Weather maps & weather forecast news give you what you need to know. See what to expect before setting foot outside, from temperature to wind chills.
‚Ä¢ NOAA alerts, a hurricane tracker, weather forecast up to 48 hours and live radar ensures you‚Äôre not caught in a storm!
‚Ä¢ Daily temperature, a UV index and weather maps let you know if you need to bring a light jacket or your umbrella!

Keep informed on the latest weather news.
‚Ä¢ Stay prepared during extreme weather and earthquakes.
‚Ä¢ Live radar and alerts from our tornado and storm tracker: all you need to stay alert.
‚Ä¢ Tornado and storm tracker: our live radar helps you track extreme weather.

Enjoy our Premium version! Get the information you need regarding local weather & temperature.
‚Ä¢ New and improved radar, featuring a precipitation start/stop timeline and 24 hour future radar.
‚Ä¢ Get 96 hours of extended forecast.
‚Ä¢ Forget about ads.

-----
Privacy & Feedback
‚Ä¢ Our Privacy Policy can be viewed here: https://weather.com/en-US/twc/privacy-policy ‚Ä®
‚Ä¢ Our Terms of Use can be viewed here:http://www.weather.com/common/home/legal.html‚Ä®
‚Ä¢ If you have any questions or suggestions, please get in touch at android.support@weather.com

The Weather Company is the world‚Äôs most accurate forecaster, according to the most recent, comprehensive study available (2010-2017) from Forecast Watch https://www.forecastwatch.com/static/Three_Region_Accuracy_Overview_2010-2017.pdf

*The World's Leading Weather Provider: Apps from The Weather Company, parent of The Weather Channel, are the most used weather apps worldwide based on average monthly active users via smartphone in 2019. Comscore Mobile Metrix¬Æ, Worldwide Rollup Media Trend, News/Information ‚ÄìWeather category incl. [P] Weather Company, The and [M] Weather Channel, The, Jan-Dec. 2019 avg.

App Annie: The Weather Channel app combined had over 50 million monthly active users worldwide each month from January through December 2019, over 2M total 5 star ratings and was downloaded 155 million times.

recentChanges: Complications
comments: This was my go-to app until about a month ago. I have to go out and then reload it frequently to get the current info. It often gets stuck at a time hours earlier. It's raining and it does not note that. Another app has 37% chance of rain in my current location (which is about right), and this app says 6% while it rains. I'm uninstalling it in favor if a better, more accurate app. I rely on relative accuracy with updates because I plan outdoor activities.

The widget has started routinely saying "weather data not available". When it does actually show the weather, it is usually not current, actually showing the weather from hours & hours ago. Also, it takes a really long time to start up, which it didn't used to do. Whatever "improvements" have been made to this app have been horrible, & have made it much slower & much worse than it used to be. I'm looking around for other options, so I can unload what has unfortunately become a major turkey.

I had this app for years and it began to have really low speed opening up. I uninstalled it and went with another app. The speed on it was fine, just had a lot of ads. I went back to The Weather Channel app hoping it had improved. IT HAS NOT!!! It just keeps spinning and draining my battery. It's been 15 minutes and still spinning. Poor, poor performance. Not pleased with this at all.

TOO MANY ADS!! There is a ad that you are forced to watch after every video!! Also the sound quality is VERY POOR on almost every video, then the ad comes on and is extremely loud. It's annoying to have to constantly adjust the volume level for every video and ad! This app has been getting worse with every update!! The other weather apps are much better and more detailed. Sorry Weather Channel but I think I will be uninstalling your app now and I don't recommend it to anyone.

Wish I had never updated this app. My old weather channel app was so much better. Every time I try to shrink the map, there's very little to no response. I have to tap the screen and then try to shrink the map so I can see a broader View, but almost every time I do that, the app has to restart. The old map showing national weather would respond very well to the touch of my fingers. Not so anymore.

title: Yahoo Mail ‚Äì Organized Email
description:
Thanks for checking out the Yahoo Mail app‚Äîthe best email app to organize your Gmail, Microsoft Outlook, AOL, AT&T and Yahoo mailboxes. Whether you need a clutter-free mailbox, added customization, different views for deals, receipts, and attachments, or even more storage, we‚Äôve got you covered. 

Favorite features:

Use any email address
Don‚Äôt make your other inboxes jelly. Add your Gmail, Outlook or AOL account and keep everything in one place. Custom settings, colors and notifications make it a breeze to keep your accounts separate.

Unsubscribe
Go forth and unsubscribe from the spam and junk mail you don‚Äôt want to see in your inbox. Yahoo Mail shows all the mailing lists you're subscribed to on one screen and makes it easy to opt-out in one tap.

Today view
Rain or shine, you‚Äôre one tap away from what‚Äôs happening. Find weather and news highlights right from your email app.

 Attachments view	
Looking for that one doc from that one person? Or, a photo from brunch three Sundays ago? Don‚Äôt panic, It‚Äôs right here. See all of your photos and files attachments in one easy view.

Customization
Your inbox, your vibe. Customize the bottom nav bar with the folders and views you care about most. Then, pick custom sounds, themes, swipes to add your own flavor and unboring your inbox. 

Travel view
Travel stress-free. This view keeps all of your flight information in one organized spot. Smart Updates, from gate changes to delays and cancellations, will instantly appear in the app, so once you check in‚Äîyou can check waaaaaay out.

Deals view
Expires today? Challenge accepted. See the deals from your inbox in one quick view or enable location permissions to see a map of deals near you and get notified in real-time as you walk into your favorite stores.

Groceries view
Win at groceries, every time. Add your grocery store loyalty cards to save coupons that will automatically get applied at checkout. 

People view
Only see emails from your favorite people. Ignore the robots.

Receipts view
No more crumpled receipts in your pocket. Find them neatly organized in your inbox. 

Sounds + notifications
Choose from several categories of notifications, custom sound alerts and visual settings‚Äîso, you get the reminders you need. And none you don‚Äôt.  

Accessibility
Features high contrast themes, dynamic text resizing, and optimized for use with VoiceOver screen readers. Plus, folders at the bottom of the Inbox allow assistive technology users to navigate with less effort.

1000 GB storage
You can‚Äôt see your whole world without room to roam. Download the app and you‚Äôll never have to delete memories to get your mail again.

Yahoo Mail Pro
Get ad-free mail on Yahoo Mail for Android and priority customer support.

+	Available as an in-app purchase at $0.99/month or $9.99/year
+	Subscription will auto-renew each month or year within 24 hours of your renewal date
+	Manage or cancel your subscription via Account Settings

Terms of service: https://policies.yahoo.com/us/en/yahoo/terms/product-atos/comms-mailadfree/index.htm

Privacy policy: https://policies.yahoo.com/us/en/yahoo/privacy/products/mail/index.htm

https://policies.yahoo.com/us/en/yahoo/terms/product-atos/comms-mailadfree/index.htm and privacy policy at https://policies.yahoo.com/us/en/yahoo/privacy/products/mail/index.htm

Please note: This app features Nielsen‚Äôs proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen‚Äôs TV Ratings. Please see www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information. You may also visit Settings in the app to opt-out of Nielsen measurement.

recentChanges:
This latest release includes a brand new Videos tab where you can:
‚Ä¢ Watch live local and primetime NFL games for free on your phone all season long
‚Ä¢ Access other sports video content on demand when there are no live games scheduled including highlights, predictions, recaps, and more
comments: I hate that ads are automatically placed at the top of my email every time I open the app. Then, when Im scrolling down through my emails, there is this wierd break in the list to show me yet another advertisement in the background. Also, deleting large amounts of email is tedious and takes forever. Half the time, it crashes before deleting anything. That being said, apart from the advertising forced on me, the app looks good and I like that I can change to color of the bar at the top.

This app is harder to use after I updated. The files no longer display a constant subfolder. I have to select from the main folder every time. Also, it takes longer to move from one folder to another. It still has the issue of not allowing me to move a subfolder, so I have to create a new subfolder, move contents from one to another, then delete the old one. The improvements have not improved it. I am a bit sorry I updated.

Really bummed after recent updates. Before, when you wanted to move a number of emails to the same folder and opened up the folders list, it displayed the folder you were using. Now, whenever you open the folders list, you're at the beginning of the list and the first folder. So each time you have to repeatedly scroll to the proper folder. I also don't like the links to similar emails that appear at the top of each email. You have to scroll down to see the email message. Put em at the bottom.

What's happened with this app? It constantly freezes up. I have to keep closing and opening it in an attempt to read my mail. I've used this app for a long time with no problems but lately it is just a horrible experience. I am using a Samsung S2 tablet. I've had similar problems on my S9 phone. My Internet is fine. I have no issues with anything else. What's up?

Nothing but problems since having to reload app on the 20th of October. Been a loyal subscriber for 20 years, but will change if improvement isnt seen in the next day or so. App is taking forever to update and replicate on Samsung S2 Tablet. Never had this issue on the 'old' application. The S20 phone doesn't seem to have a problem other than continually trying to load. It's is not a network or wifi issue.

title: Toon Blast
description:
WELCOME TO THE FUNNIEST CARTOON PUZZLE ADVENTURE!

From the creators of Toy Blast comes the ultimate puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun!

Enter the crazy cartoon world starring Cooper Cat, Wally Wolf, Bruno Bear and enjoy loads of whacky and challenging levels! Blast cubes and create powerful combos to pass levels. Solve puzzles to help the Toon gang as they travel around magical worlds! 

Join the wildest adventure of your life and have a BLAST!

FEATURES:

‚óè Complete tons of challenging levels and unlock new episodes!
‚óè Play with unique game objectives and dozens of entertaining obstacles!
‚óè Unlock whacky boosters to blast your way to the next level!
‚óè Collect stars by completing levels to win awesome rewards!
‚óè Create your own team & compete with others to rule the puzzle world! 
‚óè Receive lives from your teammates to keep on playing! 
‚óè Sync your game easily between your phone and tablet!
‚óè Easy and fun to play yet challenging to master!

developerAddress: Turkey
recentChanges:
PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS!
Toon Blast introduces the Gelato Runaway episode with 50 new levels!
Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content.
Come and join the fun!
comments: It starts out as a really fun and challenging game, until you advance to higher levels. It becomes nearly impossible to win certain levels without money, boosters or making purchases. No one likes impossible odds. You continually lose on a level just 1 or 2 moves away from winning. So very frustrating! The more you play, the more you realize, there's no skill or strategy, there's not even chance. The game is anything but random: it's totally controlled and manipulated by the game's programming.

I like the game and how challenging the levels are, but the reason for the rating is that it sucks that the only way to save progress is by signing in with Facebook. I'm not a fan of Facebook and wish there was other options to sign in like Candy Crush has. The rewards could be way better the higher you move up the level not the same as the first 20 levels.

Loved playing this game and did so for quite some time. I got permanently banned because of I was accused of cheating. I was using 2 names. I however, wasnt using both. My grandchildren were. So my advice to all is dont use more than 1 name. Lesson learned. Never would have done that if I knew. Read the rules folks. This is an awesome game though and I will miss it horribly.

A little advice about this game. I have been playing for 2 years now.Been hearing how difficult this game is. I have learned to take my time on difficult level's. Their is no time line to complete a game. With knowing this I am able to figure out the difficult level's. I find this game challenging but rewarding. If it becomes hard just take a break and return when ready. Don't give up. The hard levels aren't impossible. Maranatha!!

This game is addictive because of the teams. When it gets too difficult; and it does; you'll find it necessary to buy boosters with real money. ...It sucks when you can't contribute to your team during the tournaments. Don't fall for the free coins, and unlimited lives scam, that will show up in team chat. I'd give this game five stars, but it's too difficult (to do soüòâ).

title: Cell to Singularity - Evolution Never Ends
description:
Tap into the extraordinary tale of evolution in this cosmic clicker game. 

Once upon a time, over 4.5 billion years ago, there was no life in the Solar System. And then, almost in the blink of an eye on the geologic time scale, everything changed. Deep in the primordial soup on Earth lay the organic compounds that would give rise to life‚Äôs humble origins. All it takes for this epic evolution game to unfold is you. 

Turn to the next page of evolution with every click. Gain entropy to unlock the next chapter of the evolution of life. Uncover twists and turns that led to the great milestones of life evolution: the extinction of the dinosaurs, the discovery of fire, the Industrial Revolution, and more. See chapters that have yet to be written -- a future evolution beyond the modern day.

The epic story of evolution, technology, and humanity is yours to tap. It‚Äôs a breathtaking evolution game! 

The most accurate human evolution game on Earth!
- Countless hours of addictive--but very informative--clicker gameplay
- With every tap, earn Entropy the evolutionary currency for life in the universe
- Simple, intuitive controls--click anywhere for Entropy for new animal Evolutions!
- Later climb civilizations Tech Tree by spending ideas on countless scientific and technology upgrades
- It‚Äôs a science game about the development of life on Earth. View the fruits of evolution in beautiful 3D habitats. Unlock animals like Fish, Lizards, Mammals, Monkeys.
- Unlock the future of evolution and the mystery of the technological singularity.
- Discover and learn scientific facts about evolution of life and natural history as you play
- Enter a space odyssey into speculative science fiction as you click past modern civilization
- Get into a life creation mood thanks to an epic soundtrack of classical music
- Upgrade the evolution of a single cell organism into a civilization on the brink of a technological singularity
- Simulate the science of life on earth.
- Upgrade tech to Survive on Mars and Terraform Mars 

A science evolution game where you upgrade life, from a Single-Cell organism, to multi-celled organisms, fish, reptiles, mammals, monkeys, humans and beyond. Play the evolution of Life on Earth, all it's past, present and future. Will humanity survive the next phase of evolution?
descriptionHTML:
Tap into the extraordinary tale of evolution in this cosmic clicker game.

Once upon a time, over 4.5 billion years ago, there was no life in the Solar System. And then, almost in the blink of an eye on the geologic time scale, everything changed. Deep in the primordial soup on Earth lay the organic compounds that would give rise to life‚Äôs humble origins. All it takes for this epic evolution game to unfold is you.

Turn to the next page of evolution with every click. Gain entropy to unlock the next chapter of the evolution of life. Uncover twists and turns that led to the great milestones of life evolution: the extinction of the dinosaurs, the discovery of fire, the Industrial Revolution, and more. See chapters that have yet to be written -- a future evolution beyond the modern day.

The epic story of evolution, technology, and humanity is yours to tap. It‚Äôs a breathtaking evolution game!

The most accurate human evolution game on Earth!
- Countless hours of addictive--but very informative--clicker gameplay
- With every tap, earn Entropy the evolutionary currency for life in the universe
- Simple, intuitive controls--click anywhere for Entropy for new animal Evolutions!
- Later climb civilizations Tech Tree by spending ideas on countless scientific and technology upgrades
- It‚Äôs a science game about the development of life on Earth. View the fruits of evolution in beautiful 3D habitats. Unlock animals like Fish, Lizards, Mammals, Monkeys.
- Unlock the future of evolution and the mystery of the technological singularity.
- Discover and learn scientific facts about evolution of life and natural history as you play
- Enter a space odyssey into speculative science fiction as you click past modern civilization
- Get into a life creation mood thanks to an epic soundtrack of classical music
- Upgrade the evolution of a single cell organism into a civilization on the brink of a technological singularity
- Simulate the science of life on earth.
- Upgrade tech to Survive on Mars and Terraform Mars

A science evolution game where you upgrade life, from a Single-Cell organism, to multi-celled organisms, fish, reptiles, mammals, monkeys, humans and beyond. Play the evolution of Life on Earth, all it's past, present and future. Will humanity survive the next phase of evolution?
summary: Evolution Never Ends
developerAddress: 689 Fort Washington Ave #4N, New York , NY, 10040
recentChanges:
Hello, Universe Architect. The simulation has been upgraded!
- Enjoy the new colorful meadow and lush jungle of the Land Garden!
- Purchase Nanobots to do the tapping for you!
- Discover 3D Vipers, Gharials, Kiwis, and more in the Main Simulation!
Please enjoy these improved features of your Cells universe.
comments: Very very very very slow. I only need to complete two birds and six dinosaurs. Figured out how long it would take. Gave up. I haven't got years to dedicate to this game. 30 seconds ads are annoying too. I wanted to enjoy it. Don't want to feel I must spend to proceed. To complete this, you'd be looking at spending either 3 years of your life or over ¬£200.

What I love about this game, is the concept. The concept of this game is fabulous. It is like a time machine which brings us back in time with the primary evolution and the dinosaur tree, and brings us in future when we finally purchase the 'singularity'. I think it is one of the best offline games. It is a dream for the science lovers and the people who aren't interested in science, also become interested due to this game. | Evolution Never Ends |

The game was very interesting in the beginning. Felt the progress system was very good. But later in the game it becomes kind of a grind. I usually play games till I finish whole game. But this one got too boring to max out. It feels like the developers just kept adding levels without content just to make the game longer. The satisfaction of achievement was taken away. Or else I would have rated this game 5 stars.

Very great and fun game. I love how much research you guys also put into it, everything here is true and happening except the fact that it's a simulation. But going into the future with martians and stuff is a great twist. I recommend this game to everyone! One question though when is the beyond update coming out?

Great game...but it's very frustrating that advancement of the main simulation depends on the level of the dinosaur simulation which is ridiculously slow!! They yield way (and I mean WAY) less than they cost!! Having to wait for level 25 in the dinosaur simulation to get further in the main simulation is silly...it means I'm over a week away from getting any further!!

title: free video calls and chat
description:
Agent for Android ‚Äì easy-to-use free messaging and calling app. 
Group chats, video calls, social networks VKontakte, Odnoklassniki support.

Always be in touch with such Agent's features as securely encrypted calls and high-quality video calls, speech-to-text for voice messages and an ability to create your own stickers. 
Customize your communication and use animated 3D masks in video calls, create group chats with unlimited participants and channels!

recentChanges: Error correction
comments: This app is good. Because when at work I use this app to text my children I have 3 boys and 2 girls. And they have phones.
How do you say use this app over and over and change app doesn't even look the same it doesn't mean go to the group reading and it's just a bad out it won't even accept my passwords

I Use this app/service to keep in touch with my two young children on their Tablets using my Phone while I'm away to work, etc. It's honestly been considerably hassle-free, and reliably dependable. I would be lying to say that I wasn't a bit Grateful that it's aroud/available.

Was asked to test this app and I can't even sign in with my email ( originally set up).. stating my email address does not exist!? Or when I use my phone # it says it's Spam?!!!! When I write the Devs here I even get a server error from Google! -100*s in my book!
love video chat with family far away. and my kids too... and there's like every once in a while there's like a high-pitch static noise thank you

title: TextNow: Free Texting & Calling App
description:
*NEW FEATURE* Now you can use TextNow without WiFi! Get unlimited calling and texting in the US over the Nationwide Sprint Network -- for FREE.  Check if your phone is eligible, and get phone service without the phone bill by clicking on "Free Coverage" in the app menu.

Local US or Canada Phone number
Give your friends your very own phone number they can call!

Unlimited Text & Picture Messaging 
You can send as many text messages as you want to US & Canada - FREE!

Unlimited Calling to USA and Canada 
Make unlimited free phone calls to any phone number in the US & Canada!

Cheap International Calling
TextNow offers low-cost, international calling to over 230 countries. Stay connected longer with rates starting at less than $0.01 per minute. Add money or earn free money by completing offers to your account and make low-cost international calls.

Features:
- Make and receive voice calls
- Emojis, stickers and gifs
- Full picture messaging : send, receive and save pictures!
- Video messaging: Send videos to your friends and family
- Voicemail Transcription: transcript of your voicemail
- Caller ID
- PassCode: keep your messages under lock and key
- Google SmartLock: no need to remember your password
- Call Forwarding
- Conference calling
- Signatures: add your own personalized signature to each text
- Customizable text-tone, ringtone & vibration
- Customizable backgrounds
- Assign individual contacts their own ringtone & background
- Quick Reply to easily (and quickly) respond to friends
- Home screen widget to launch TextNow, compose a new message or quickly make a call
- Unified inbox: send and receive your texts, SMS and GIFs directly via TextNow - use TextNow as your one-stop SMS texting app!
- One number, multiple devices ‚Äì Send messages and make calls on your computer or tablet, then access them from your phone while on the go.
- TextNow.com - text from your computer too! All messages seamlessly synchronize with your mobile device.
- Turn your Wi-Fi enabled tablets into a phone.
- Elastic calling to protect you from dropped calls. Elastic calling is TextNow‚Äôs unique ability to have our calls choose the best possible route for your call to improve quality

Is it really free? 

There is no catch. No yearly or monthly fees! It is completely free! Download today and start sending and receiving your unlimited texts, pics, videos, and SMS messages.

How can all this be free?

The app comes with a few ads. If you don't like ads, you can purchase a subscription to remove them. Join the 100 million people who have already found a better way to talk & text free.

comments: Ever since the update it made it worse. It rings again, that's good. Problem is, people can't hear me but I can hear them. I have to use LINE for the time being until it gets fixed. Dont tell me to get the latest update either etc. I did all that. You guys need to update this again because my callers can't hear me when talking. It works then I stops working.

Its great! Actually free. Ive had it for a 2nd private line since like 2016. But you have to pay attention to your account. Because I didn't use mine for a while, lapsed & I still had an account sort of. But I lost my phone number. But its totally not a big deal! For real only actually free. When I lapsed I didn't renew right away because textnow had changed with how it had always been. But now that I renewed, its like it was before and even better! Katy

Totally free for calling, texting and calling landlines and toll free # also when I traveles overseas I could call landlines and office numbers with ease and for free. I use this as a number to give out to people who i buy stuff from online or when companies ask for my # to send ad text, as wel. If it is not used, you will lose the number. I do not recommend using for sensitive data as it is easy to lose the number assigned . that said it is easy to get any # in any area code within the US. üëç

I love this app. Been using it for about 3 years now. I always tell people about this app. It's a great way to have a secondary phone but on same device. Plus it works really well and offers great plans and If you cant afford a plan you can still use it and keep your # for free if needed. Even free for all incoming/outgoing calls with voicemail and text messages also. So you can stay in touch with friends, family, and/or work anytime needed!! Awesome app!!

Beautiful app. I have been using this app for several years and find it very useful and stable. My only reservation is the possibility of losing your phone number if it is not used for a while. The time needs to be extended as sometimes people are unable to use the phone for extensive periods either because of illl health or because the device the number was loaded on has become temporarily unavailable.

title: Papa Pear Saga
description:
Papa Pear Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Saga & Farm Heroes Saga!

It's a Papa Fiesta! Bounce your way through this unique puzzle game.

Take aim and unleash Papa Pear to bounce and boing around a wacky world of fruity pegs, hazelnuts and crazy chillies. Exciting adventures await you in the Fruity Forest, Pearsylvania and beyond. BOING!

Take on this epic Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Papa Pear Saga is completely free to play but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

------------------------------- 

Papa Pear Saga features: 

‚Ä¢ Pearfect graphics that will have you bouncing for joy¬†
‚Ä¢ Boosters and power ups to help with those challenging levels¬†
‚Ä¢ Special items to unlock by completing levels¬†
‚Ä¢ Easy and fun to play, challenging to master¬†
‚Ä¢ Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
‚Ä¢ Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the Internet

------------------------------- 

Already a fan of Papa Pear Saga? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:¬†
facebook.com/PapaPearSaga¬†
twitter.com/PapaPearSaga¬†

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Papa Pear Saga!¬†

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy. recentChanges:
Enjoy a fast, fun and smooth gameplay! We have been improving the game so that nothing keeps you from having a pear-fect Papa Pear experience! Our goal: bring a 100% glitch free game!

We are constantly working on improving the game so keep on commenting and rating Papa Pear Saga after each release. Thank you tons for your support!
comments: Needs events or something to make power ups easier to get Some levels are damn near impossible without them and the gold is expensive af. ** love the game overall! Have been playing for a long time! I've made it past over 300 levels but this entire time it's kind of been a lackluster game compared to some of 'your' others

Its always challenging to figure out how to defeat a level. The only levels I really dont enjoy are the ones where there are chains over the buckets and you have to hit a matching color "face" thing to open it and the "face" changes color and changes which bucket it opens.That one is too confusing trying to figure out the pattern without wasting pears to shoot.

Simple and fun,but there are some REALLY hard levels that can take even days to beat,such a simple and long game shouldn't have such hard levels. There should be an option to skip levels for free if,for example,you fail to beat it in 10 - 15 lives or maybe even less.

I click the little circle on the top right corner and it says to put my fb information and when I do , says invalid token access .. what does that mean? why can't I see which level my friends are on ? Please fix

It's an entertaining and addictive game, but it has some major cons. You only get 5 lives and you have to wait a certain amount of time before they regenerate, even though this game is clearly designed to make you constantly fail and replay levels. 5 lives is not enough, a game like this shouldn't even be using the "lives" format, it just ruins the experience and makes me stop playing since I have no more lives. This game is all about luck, not skill, which is extremely annoying and lazy.

title: Cash App
description:
Cash App is the easiest way to send, spend, save, and invest your money. It‚Äôs the SAFE, FAST, and FREE mobile banking app.

SAFE: Protect all of your payments and investments with a passcode. Pause spending on your Cash Card with one tap if you misplace it. All of your information is stored securely.

FAST: Sign up and make your first payment in minutes. Instantly send and receive money from friends. Transfer money from Cash App to another bank account instantly instead of waiting days. Use your Cash App account and routing number to receive deposits up to two days earlier than is standard with most banks.

FREE: Send and receive money at no cost. Get a completely free virtual Visa debit card in minutes, and we‚Äôll mail you your custom physical debit card for free in about a week. Invest in your favorite stocks commission-free with as little as $1. 

* HERE‚ÄôS HOW IT WORKS *
Download and sign up for Cash App in a matter of minutes. The signup process is simple and fast so that you can start using Cash App right away.

* SEND AND RECEIVE MONEY INSTANTLY * 
Receive, request, and send money from friends and family instantly with only a few taps. Cash App is the easiest way to pay a friend back for dinner or split rent with your roommates.   

* GET A FREE CUSTOM VISA DEBIT CARD *
Order your Cash Card (a customizable Visa debit card) directly from Cash App. You‚Äôll be able to instantly make online purchases using your virtual card or in-store purchases by adding your Cash Card to Google Pay. We‚Äôll also mail you your physical laser-etched Cash Card about a week so you can swipe, dip, or tap at any merchant.

* RECEIVE YOUR PAYCHECK UP TO TWO DAYS EARLY *
Deposit paychecks, tax returns, unemployment benefits, government stimulus payouts and more directly into your Cash App balance using your account and routing number. Receive deposits up to two days earlier than is standard with most other banks. Use the same account and routing information to pay bills using your Cash App balance.  

* GET INSTANT DISCOUNTS WITH CASH BOOST *
Cash Card is the only free debit card with instant discounts at your favorite stores, websites, apps, and restaurants. These instant discounts - Cash Boosts - are easy to use and are applied to Cash Card transactions instantly. Just select a given Cash Boost in your app and then use your Cash Card to pay. It‚Äôs that simple. No points, no waiting, just instant savings.

* BUY, SELL, DEPOSIT, AND WITHDRAW BITCOIN * 
Cash App is the easiest way to buy, sell, deposit, and withdraw Bitcoin. Track the BTC price in realtime in your app and get started by buying as little as $1 of Bitcoin. Your BTC arrives in your app instantly. You can then decide to keep it safe in Cash App or withdraw it to a different wallet.

* BUY & SELL STOCKS COMMISSION-FREE * 
Instantly begin investing commission-free with Cash App. You can buy as little as $1 of stock in top US companies. Track stock prices in realtime in your app and monitor the performance of your overall investment portfolio. Create a list of companies to follow so you can stay up to date on performance. Brokerage services provided by Cash App Investing LLC, member FINRA / SIPC. Investing involves risk; you may lose money. Investments are not FDIC insured.

comments: I have used the app with the same bank and information for over a year only changing my phone number. Initially I had no issues. Three last the months however, I haven't been able to use the app for anything as it can't seem to verify my information. I am unable to receive payments, send payments, add money or cash out money that's in my cash app account. I've reached out to support numerous times with no response. I love there convenience of the app and the boosts I was getting but not anymore.

I hate this app! It's useless. Can't do anything like you're suppose to be able to. Linking cards and accounts never works like it should or even like it did one time before. I had to replace my card, same card and company just a new numbers but it won't link the new information?! The card is allowed and supported but now I can't load money. Hate using this app unless it's completely my last resort!

This app is a scam to me now unlike before that it's working well. When you download it it will be asking for your SSN. Its really frustrating. Some guys are patronizing themselves as customer care representatives all they do is hack your bank accounts and all your hard earned money is gone. The money sent to me can't be accessed too for the past 2 weeks. I don't encourage anyone to download this app

Cashapp is GREAT! That is, until you have ANY problem with your account! Support is useless! I've sent FIFTEEN (15) emails in the last 2 days because I had to order a new card and I've been sent TWO (2) that don't match the new card info on my account, with only 2 responses, neither of which got the problem fixed, and nothing further from them. CASHAPP DOES NOT HAVE RELIABLE SUPPORT. IF YOU NEED TO HIRE MORE PEOPLE, I WILL APPLY FOR THE JOB AND SHOW YOU HOW TO MANAGE A BUSINESS AND KEEP FANS!

This app is horrible in scanning id. There is no button to use when taking a picture of front and back of id. The front i had to click on flash sign, the back side i had to close app and reopen to even see a flash sign and then when i clicked for back side, the functions changed ot just lit up id. The app took a picture on its own of back side as i was moving my id arpund for 30 min annoyed. And then it only took when i put super close, taking only an 8th of whole back side, twice!

title: OfferUp: Buy. Sell. Letgo. Mobile marketplace
description:
Buy. Sell. Letgo. - OfferUp and Letgo are now one big mobile marketplace.

Buy, sell and shop deals on thousands of unique items nearby! So whether you want to make some extra money by selling your used furniture or want to do some clothes shopping the choice is yours with OfferUp. 

OfferUp makes it easy to find great deals on the things you want and make money on the things you want to sell. Ditch the Classified Ads and garage sales -- this is the best way to buy and sell in your community or neighborhood with a mobile marketplace you can trust.

Cars, clothes, shoes, vintage fashion, and more! Here‚Äôs how shopping and selling with OfferUp works:

‚Ä¢ Buy or sell anything; easily offer up your items for sale in 30 seconds.
‚Ä¢ Find great deals and discounts on clothes, shoes, furniture, vintage fashion, cell phones, electronics, baby & kids items, sports equipment, used cars, home goods and more.
‚Ä¢ Use reputation features like ratings and profiles to see who you‚Äôre dealing with and build trust.
‚Ä¢ Shop local items for sale with thousands of new postings daily.
‚Ä¢ Message buyers and sellers securely from within the app.
‚Ä¢ Build your reputation with your unique seller profile page.
‚Ä¢ Browse and shop items by image and sort by category or location.
‚Ä¢ Join millions of people using OfferUp across the country.
‚Ä¢ Skip the garage sale! OfferUp is the simplest way to buy and sell locally.

Fun facts about shopping and selling with OfferUp:

1. With OfferUp you can easily sell anything like clothes and shoes, used cars, electronics, vintage fashion, and furniture.
2. OfferUp shows you what‚Äôs selling nearby in your local community.
3. Communication between buyers & sellers happens through the app via secure messaging.
4. OfferUp is better than a garage sale; you can do your shopping right on your phone or tablet.

Be part of the community:

We‚Äôre making local shopping and selling an experience that everyone can try and trust. The community at the heart of our marketplace is what makes that possible. When you join OfferUp, you‚Äôre joining millions of people helping each other make money and save money around the nation -- and right in the neighborhood.

From shoes to cars, vintage fashion to furniture - unearth unique items that you can‚Äôt find anywhere else with OfferUp. Download OfferUp today and enjoy the mobile marketplace with plenty of hidden gems just waiting to be discovered.

The two leading mobile marketplaces in the U.S., OfferUp and Letgo, are joining forces to create a new powerhouse. OfferUp acquired Letgo on July 1, 2020.

comments: This app seems to be littered with dozens, if not, hundreds of ads that have been up for, in some cases, over 2 years. I sent one a message asking if it was available, and didn't receive a reply. After seeing that the ad was still posted, I also noticed that it was posted 2 years ago. I saw a few other listings that had the same story. I liked how LetGo didn't leave listings over a couple months old without asking the lister if it was still relevant.

This app is far less usable than Letgo was. The second I click on one thing to see what it is, I am immediately bombarded with listings of similar items from ebay. If I wanted to look on ebay, I would use that app. Don't assume I need to see 20 of that item. Prices aren't listed in the browse page so I have to click to find them. And when something sells, it doesn't disappear. It just stays with the other listings and says "Sold". I dont need to see all the things I cannot buy.

Over 70% of the messages you will get will be fraudulent scams (they are quite obvious, but it's annoying to deal with). There is not much support for when you have issues with the app and I kept getting my posts removed for items being "intangible", which was not true, had photos and descriptions of actual items and there was nothing I could do about it, so it just became pointless and frustrating to use. Stick with FB marketplace or CL or other platforms

Titles, descriptions, and prices of items are not shown in search results, leading me to click a bunch of images only to see that the item is not what I want or out of my price range. PLEASE add titles and prices to search results page. Also the gallery of pictures that are not in any order or in one grid make it confusing to look through listings. I don't get what the intent is... To have me looking through the app forever and never finding what I am looking to buy???? Please fix the UX.

The app already sucked, but now it's worse. Why would you combine 2 apps and not take the good from the other app? To many old listings, nothing expires. Messaging is a joke, you're better off talking to the wall. An speaking of messages, how can I sell something if I dont get notified? To many times I've had to open the app just to see multiple messages, days old, and the buyer long gone, thanks offer up. I remember when this app came out, that was its prime, now it's just garbage.

title: HD Camera for Android
description:
This is an native android system camera app. HD Camera utilized all advantage of your phone or tablet. Let you snaps quick and easy photos and videos.

Key features:
- camera and video features
- 3 modes: camera, video recorder & panorama
- Pinch to zoom
- smart panorama shooting 
- Countdown Timer
- Dynamic user interface (phone/tablet)
- Wide screen pictures
- Picture quality setting
- White balance settings(Incandescent, Fluorescent, Auto, Daylight,Cloudy)
- Screen mode settings(Action, Night, Sunset, Play)
- Exposure
- Location targeting
- Configurable volume keys
- Photo Callage 
- Photo crop and photo editing.

Although in the current market, there are have many kinds of camera applications, but we still think this android native application is the most efficient and able to meet a user needs. Here only as a supplement for those devices are not installed android native system provides an additional option. 

Notes:
The special permissions for use
1, android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
HD Camera can remember your photos and videos location if you wish. Other apps can access this information along with your saved images.

2, android.permission.READ_CONTACTS
After you take a photo,  you can share with others. HD Camera need to read the contacts information and help you share photos via email, SMS, or other apps.

------------------
DisclaimerÔºö
This app is based on native android camera code, and licensed under the Apache License.
code: https://github.com/CyanogenMod/android_packages_apps_Camera2
Apache Licens: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html

comments: 30 minutes ago I rated it 5 stars and I took my second picture after 20 minutes trying to get away from the ads it totally sucks. I have never seen anything like this, on average of one minute of camera time you have to endure five minutes of ad time and you can't get away from them.

I just love it that's all I've been looking for a really good camera for a long and my friends have been complaining that the pics I post to them are not clear but when I used this camera it was more than I expected Thank u for this app, and more development in your devices

Overall it's a brilliant app but after some time I've noticed that it always opens with the photo size 19:9 which is a very annoying and random size to use. Have to redo the settings everytime I open the app which is frustrating so I'm uninstalling
This app is really enjoyable, just that they should try and improve the audio quality when shooting video with music ON, other things are perfect.
It's a very good and easy to use app and it doesn't contain so much ads but if you could lesser the ads it would be even more easier to use the app for the user.

title: Mind map & note taking tool - MindMeister
description:
Whether you're using it for mind mapping, project planning, brainstorming/idea management, note-taking or presentations, MindMeister can help you organize, prioritize, and even generate new ideas. MindMeister lets you share your mind maps with as many friends or colleagues as you want and collaborate with them in real-time.

Designed from the ground up as an extension to our award-winning, browser-based interface, the MindMeister app stores your mobile creations and seamlessly syncs them with your online account.


Feature highlights:
‚úî Create and edit graphical mind maps
‚úî Seamlessly sync maps and folders with your free online account
‚úî Share maps directly from the device
‚úî Multi-touch support for drag & drop, zoom, pan 
‚úî Add icons, colors, styles, boundaries and map themes
‚úî Edit and view notes, links and tasks on ideas
‚úî Draw connections between topics
‚úî Export as RTF
‚úî Manage Favorites
‚úî Play map-based presentations on your device

Additional features for a paid MindMeister account:
‚úî Export as MindManager, Freemind, PDF, image, MS Word and MS PowerPoint
‚úîUnlimited mind maps
‚úîAttach files and images
‚úîPriority Support

Additional features through www.MindMeister.com interface:
‚úî Unlimited undo/redo
‚úî Import from MindManager, Freemind, Mind and text files

What can you use Mind maps for?
‚úî Idea Management
   - Capture, manage and implement ideas
‚úî Brainstorming
   - Visual real-time brainstorming for teams
‚úî Project Planning
   - Design plans together and put them into reality together
‚úî Note Taking
   - Take meaningful and efficient notes
‚úî Knowledge Management
   - Manage the collective intelligence of your team
‚úî Meeting Management
   - Visualize your agenda, take notes, assign tasks to the persons responsible and work together

NOTE: Requires a free account registration. 


Privacy policy: https://www.mindmeister.com/privacy
Terms of use: https://www.mindmeister.com/legal
