comments: I love how easy the steps are and the voice that gives you helpful tips during your exercise. Also love that it is a fast exercise. Im a busy mom of 3 kids. Hard to find time to workout. Especially with a 5 month old baby. My only issue is that there are reminders that go off 2 times a day to do the buttocks workout and you cant delete them. There is only 1 workout per day so why does the reminders go off 2 times a day to work out? Are you supposed to do the same workout twice?

I love this app. Ever since I went to 7th grade I felt more down then now. Now that I'm in 8th grade I have shown a big improvement in my lower waist. Hour glass got it. Better curves got it. This app can do everything thats right for your body weight. I way 78 pounds and soon more Because I use a calorie app but this isn't about that. So I advise you to just download the app, I promise you won't regret it. üòÄ

When I first installed the app, it was great. You can access to any excercise just by looking at an ad. After 3 or 4 days, I can't unlock new excercise anymore. No ads popping up. What does that mean? That indicates me to buy premium version? Edited : Turned out to be because of my weak wifi signal. It's all good now. Thank you.

Simple design. Extremely user friendly. Love the video links for the exercises are unsure of and the tips that are given to help add difficulty or diet improvements. Graphs easy to understand so you know your progress and you will see progress. Results are guarantee. Love app so much would downloaded any app from this developer (& do!!) Whatever they're doing, keep it up. I tell everyone who will listen or follows my Facebook. Word of mouth is powerful thing and priceless when have good product.

Big fan of my new big booty. I love how easy this app is to use! It's for all levels of exercise, if you feel it's too easy, just double the work outs to make it more effective. The workouts change daily to help challenge muscle memory and work all the muscles. There's daily reminders that can turn on/off, there's a work out guide that explains how to do the skills, keeps you on track so you do the exercises at an effective rate, & intermittent tips to remind you to fix your posture /position. ‚ù§

title: Words with Friends Classic: Word Puzzle Challenge
description:
Come enjoy The Original Word Play! Grab your mobile device and prove you have what it takes to best your friends and family in this addictive multiplayer game. Whether you need to relax after a long day, or are looking to train your brain, Words With Friends Classic is perfect for you! Make sure to keep your mind sharp as you choose the perfect move on the board, as one word can be the difference between victory and defeat!
Are you looking for a way to build your vocabulary by yourself? Our Solo Challenge is the answer! There is no better way to train your brain than against our fiendish word masters. Looking for new friends with whom to play puzzle games? You can practice your crossword skills with our random opponent matchmaking. No matter if you play with friends old or new, stay connected with our in-game chat, and track your progress with unlockable stats.
Think you're the best at word games of all your friends? Prove it by racking up points and beating your Weekly Challenge!

For more information, see our Terms of Service: https://www.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service and Privacy Policy: https://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy"

Compete with friends and family or find the perfect match to complete your Daily Goals!

Smoother gameplay than ever before with new updates and bug fixes.
comments: Love the game. 30 sec ads after each and every single play is frustrating. Found a way around it. Use it every time. Terminate the game as soon as the ad starts. Starting the game back up only takes 16 seconds! Many games are 15 seconds. Wish the newest similar game was not a constant ad at the top of the list of opponents to play. Tried the new one, did not like it at all! Maybe it is good for the new generations. Came back to this original version even though all kinds of stuff added.

Full page ad after every single move. Every.single.move. Also, there is nothing to keep the screen from going dark during gameplay. You have to manually set it yourself and then reset it when you are done. Also, person with most points doesn't win, so I don't see the need for points at all. First person out of letters wins. So it's really just a game of who can use all their letters first.

Used to be fun and my favorite time passer. Now it's just so overwhelming buggy and full of ads. The developers obviously care nothing about the game play and have become nothing more than money grabbers. I know it's stupid but my own protest is to specifically go out of my way to never buy anything I see in one of these ads here.

The ads freeze so the game must be closed and reopened. This happens after every turn and your version of ad-free is a $10/mo subscription? If there's a cheap, one-time, ad-free purchase....I'm not seeing it. Fix this please. I'd be more than willing to pay a very small one-time fee to just remove ads.

I cannot view the ads to gain more coins, BUT am over run with ads after each move. Some dont finish, so close game. Have repeatedly complained to no effect. Will not buy coins for power ups! People complain about creeps lurking - don't answer them, then when finished game, block them. Turn volume off to block loud music or noise.

title: Cricket Visual Voicemail
description:
Some voicemails are important. Others are a waste of time. We designed Cricket Visual Voicemail to help you see your way to the messages that matter.
Visual Voicemail lets you:
¬∑         View a list of your voicemail messages
¬∑         Play, delete, or save messages in any order
¬∑         Pause, stop, replay and fast forward messages while playing
¬∑         Reply to messages by returning the call or text message
¬∑         Easily change your recorded greeting
¬∑         Save important messages to your phone or memory card.
¬∑         Easily export voice messages
 
Important to know: Receiving voicemail on the Visual Voicemail app will not count against your high-speed data quota. Downloading this app and responding to voicemails using email will count against your high-speed data quota. 
During initial setup the app may send a free one-time SMS to your Cricket Voicemail service to authenticate your account.

Problems Upgrading?

Don‚Äôt sweat it! We‚Äôre here to help. Contact us on Facebook (m.me/cricketwireless) or Twitter (@cricketsupport) for the fastest reply. You may also chat online at www.cricketwireless.com/contactus or call 1-800-CRICKET.

recentChanges: Bug Fixes
comments: App no longer works. I am having the same problems as everyone else: The app notifies you of the message but upon clicking on it, the message time says 0:00/ out of nothing and does not play and is not transcribed. I keep force stopping and deleting the cache but these messages don't load for hours. I don't use the standard call-in voicemail and haven't had a password set up for years. Really frustrating because obviously voicemails tend to be time-sensitive.

ADS??? Are you serious?! Why on earth would you "update" this app to include ads? Not to mention, I haven't been receiving my voicemails lately. This is not a good look for me. I love Cricket Wireless. Been a loyal customer for years, but I don't like where this is going.

Flaky is the best way to describe it. Sometimes a VM will show up in the app within a minute of a message left. Sometimes hours later, like 6-12 hours later. Sometimes not at all. I cannot figure out when it'll flake out. And now you jerks PUT ADS in there too? Time to dump you turds.

doesn't work anymore. updated and half the time the messages aren't transcripted and i can't listen to any of them through this app anymore. have to call my voicemail like it's 2005. üëçüèº excellent 15 steps backwards all around here in 2020.

This app used to work great... but since the update I can't get ANY of my messages to play and it takes 20 minutes for the messages to even transcribe. I mean... what happened. If I have to use the vm that came with this phone then I might as well delete this app.

title: Norton Mobile Security - Antivirus & Anti-Malware
description:
Norton Mobile Security & Antivirus is an award winning mobile [4] phone security service and virus protection app. This virus detector and remover for androids helps protect your devices against malware, viruses and threats such as malicious apps, theft, and websites designed to steal your information and money. Norton has years of experience in providing anti virus protection for your PC and now it is a trusted name in mobile phone security apps.

Android Security Features (including 30-Day Trial [1])

---------------------------------------------

Did you know that 75% of mobile apps fail basic security tests?
(Gartner report, 2014)

‚òÖ App Advisor powered by Norton‚Ñ¢ Mobile Insight, automatically checks apps for potential privacy risks, high battery and data usage or intrusive behavior before download. [3]

‚òÖ Android Antivirus: A malware scanner that helps to remove apps that have malware, spyware, or an Android virus that can harm or slow your device. Proactive virus detector, virus cleaner and antivirus protection.[3]

‚òÖ WiFi Security helps your device stay safe when connecting to public Wi-Fi. Wi-Fi Security alerts if an unknown party on the same Wi-Fi network is spying on your online activity, known as a man-in-the-middle (MITM) attacks.

‚òÖ Surveillance App Protection helps protect your online privacy and security by letting you know if an app is sharing your device‚Äôs location, contacts, photos, and messages without your authorization.

‚òÖ Web Protection offers comprehensive phone security while surfing online to help protect you against visiting malicious and phishing sites.

‚òÖ Safe Search: In-app search engine connects to NortonLifeLock‚Äôs global threat database to flag unsafe sites right in your search results.

‚òÖ Call Blocking allows you to automatically block calls from specific phone numbers or anonymous or unknown numbers (smartphones only).

‚òÖ Android System Advisor: Helps scan your device and Android OS to identify points of attack that can leave you exposed to cyber threats

‚òÖ Privacy Report Interactive Map shows where in the world apps send personal information and photos



---------------------------------------------

Another trusted app from Norton. Norton Security & Antivirus provides proactive anti-malware, spyware and antivirus protection. This virus detector and remover will ensure that your phone security is as tight as it can be.

comments: Look. It works and is effective. However. For the sake of going in educated, know that if you don't know how to unsubscribe via Google Play, Norton is going to make finding out a bad time. They deliberately force you to make an account, force you to share details to contact support, and deliberately provide no information on how to unsubscribe from the service. That type of behavior says a LOT about the ethics of a company. Be aware before making a commitment.

I mainly got this Norton app for the excellent call blocking features... everything else was just a plus. Now, a message on the app indicates the call blocking feature will be discontinued in a future update so that Norton can add some "exciting new features." Nothing could be exciting enough without being able to block calls! I'll finish out the year I paid for and then move to something else....for free!

I have never had the real time fraud and spam call alerts since I've installed the Norton 360 app, I wish it would block telemarketers and robocalls, not only in the calling but also in the messaging. I'm forever getting calls from what I know I've reported to the blocking app, which I have to manually put in the blocking app. I love the safe search feature, I love the play store features that works you of an unsafe app before you download it. I love so far the identity safe features also.

Perfect Mix of Mobile Security & Antivirus Combo For Galaxy Note 4 Running On Android 6.0.1 Everything seems to run well with no issues. I think I'll stick with this current updated version 4.8.0 on my phone since updating to much further might start to have a negative effects on my old operating system. Keep up the good work.üëà

LOUSY! VPN constantly has to be logged into over & over ... AND the app doesn't recognize login info so you are returned to the login screen. The antivirus can be running at the same time but the VPN is a separate app. Very poor design. Added 10/29/20 - just rec'd notice Norton is removing Call Block feature. RUFKM?? That's one of the MOST important features!! Time to find a BETTER security app. Sorry Norton. Your app is not worth the cost anymore.

title: City Mania: Town Building Game
description:
Welcome to the best new city builder game in town!
Now is your chance to be the owner of the awesomest city ever! Build, expand, plan your strategy -- the decision is in your hands!
But don't stop there! Recruit dozens of funny characters, add them to your collection and watch as they populate the streets and bring your city to life!

Build the BEST. CITY. EVER.
- Craft hundreds of unique, gorgeous buildings in your city and expand it from a tiny peaceful town to a big bustling metropolis.
- Don't forget to decorate your skyline by building famous landmarks, like the Eiffel Tower, the Tower of London and the Leaning Tower of Pisa (there's something for every tower fan) to elevate your city to the top of the tourist destinations list.

Meet Your New Family
- Cartoon fans rejoice! Meet and collect tons of funny characters with their own unique personalities, like the portly Sergeant Morecake, and the uber-macho builder guy, Forest Manley (whose real skill is the tiny-bit-too-suggestive eyebrow raise).
- Build a water tower. Check! Build a fire station. Check! But who's going to drive the fire truck? Assigning Bizzies to jobs will help you optimise your city, but you can go even further! Send them on missions and they won't come home empty-handed, or do favours for them so they invite their friends to fill your city!

Fusion Is the Way to Go
- The future: age of smart forks, exploding hover boards, even selfies! But now the 21st Century lives up to its promise, with the ability to merge buildings into advanced skyscrapers and unlock specialisations.
- Unlocking each allows you to develop your city in different directions and expand your collection with specialised buildings such as Sustainability, Commerce, Education and Entertainment. Choose which one suits your strategy best!

The Grass Is Always Greener...
- But is it really? Find out by visiting your friends' cities. Is your friend the best builder you know? Well, you can always ""borrow"" a bit of their ideas to improve your game... Sshhh, we won't tell anyone...
- In case you find yourself short on some crucial resources, visiting the Marketplace should be a major part of your strategy; it's where you can collect some extra cash or find missing upgrade items.

_____________________________________________

Privacy Policy: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/privacy-notice
Terms of Use: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/conditions-of-use
End-User License Agreement: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/eula

developerAddress: 14 rue Auber 75009 Paris
recentChanges:
Greetings Mayors, here‚Äôs what the new update includes:
- New City Rank 8 now available! Complete City Tasks for Mayor Badges to level up your city and earn buildings as rewards.
- Watch out for the upcoming limited-time Rare Item Hunt event, all Rare Items Bizzie Missions will have 2x chance of success during this event.
- City Mania on Google Play is now Notch-Friendly, check it out!
comments: *TOO MUCH ADS ON GAMEPLAY* I was playing around 1 hour and game showed mo than 10 ads, it was displayed on banners when you tap on a factory or a store, ad videos showed every 3 minutes and makes this game unplayable. I didn't like this game, i thought it will be a nice game, but no, it doesn't. Guys don't download the app, it's just a waste of time. Sometimes, graphics quality get down, and i don't know why.

Fun game but some items are quite expensive (especially Bizzies). I've been trying to save up enough game bucks to get certain ones, too, but unfortunately have lost a few hundred due to accidentally tapping on a button which causes instant production a number of times. There should be a warning asking to confirm when you're about to spend a lot of bucks. I'd be willing to spend some actual money in this game if things weren't so ridiculously overpriced. $100 for a robot Bizzie? Ha!

Great game, but how I wish the creator make this offline after downloading 300 plus mb in the game, the 300mb is enough to sustain the game but making it online after that will increase the the use of data . And also the game is so aggressive in some minor internet problem, that's why really I recommend to just make the game offline after downloading the resource.

This game is absolutely incredible..the graphics are awesome and the ameplay is amazing! The only bad thing is you need SOO much money to actual buy a new person in your city and I don't really have digital money because I'm 12 and I know you guys are trying to profit off this game..but please make it easier to get new people

I love this pixlated city building game. But this game needs a airport, cargo ship port and the futuristic building like omega build. Also what would be good is to have upgradable streets. City mania is the best city building game that I play. City mania would be amazing if these thing would be added to this game. Thanks.

title: iHeartRadio: Radio, Podcasts & Music On Demand
description:
Your Music, Your Stations, And #1 For Podcasts. All Free.

Stream unlimited music, thousands of live radio stations, podcasts and playlists for any mood or activity, all in one app. The iHeartRadio app for Android Phone and Tablet is easy to use and best of all, it's FREE.
 
Download the iHeartRadio Android app today and start listening to your favorite live radio stations, podcasts and music playlists!


The Best Live & Local Radio Stations
‚Ä¢ Discover thousands of local AM and FM radio stations live near you and from cities across the globe.
‚Ä¢ Our Radio App allows you to tune in to top radio stations, music, breaking news, sports, talk and comedy radio shows.
‚Ä¢ Hear sports radio stations like ESPN Radio, Fox Sports Radio, FNTSY Sports Radio, and more.
‚Ä¢ Listen to top sports personalities discuss the latest news around the NFL, MLB, NBA, NHL, NCAA, Soccer, Golf, and Tennis.

The iHeartRadio Podcast App - now #1 for Podcasts
‚Ä¢ Our Podcast App features the most popular podcasts from NPR, Gimlet, How Stuff Works, ESPN Podcasts, Big Money Players Network, TED, Wondery, and from popular personalities like The Ron Burgundy Podcast, Anna Faris Is Unqualified Podcast, The Herd with Colin Cowherd Podcast, The Joe Rogan Podcast, Ben Shapiro Podcast, Bobby Bones Podcast, Armchair Expert with Dax Shepard, Chelsea Handler Podcast, and more.
‚Ä¢ Follow your favorite podcasts and download podcast episodes to your Android device to listen offline, without the need for WiFi.
‚Ä¢ Explore popular and trending shows with our iHeartRadio Podcast App charts. The Top 100 Chart refreshes every Monday.
‚Ä¢ Our podcast app and podcast player allow you to experience podcast playback at your desired speed of 0.5x, 1x, 1.25x, 1.5x, and 2x.


Free Music Playlists - perfect for any moment
‚Ä¢ Listen to thousands of hand curated song playlists on the free iHeartRadio Playlist App. Organized by mood, activity, decade and genre to make it easy to find something that‚Äôs the perfect soundtrack for any moment.
‚Ä¢ Enjoy the sound of 'Your Weekly Mixtape' - music discovery made easy. A weekly playlist of songs we‚Äôve curated based on the music you love and the music you‚Äôre listening to right now. We‚Äôll refresh your mixtape every Monday with a new batch of tracks we know you‚Äôll vibe to throughout your week.
‚Ä¢ Explore our Cloud based audio options directly from your phone.

Play Free Artist Radio Stations
‚Ä¢ Use our library of millions of songs to create personalized music stations based on your favorite artists and  genres like Country, Top 40, Pop, Hip Hop, R&B, EDM, Rock, Alternative, Classical, Indie, Folk, Gospel, Christian, Dance, and more.


The Ultimate Station Made Just for You
‚Ä¢ 'My Favorites Radio' collects all of the songs you love in one free personalized station.

Premium Features
Listen absolutely free with ads, or take control of your listening experience with iHeartRadio Plus‚Ñ¢ and iHeartRadio All Access‚Ñ¢.
‚Ä¢ Search and play any song, album and playlist with our library of millions of songs on demand
‚Ä¢ Save and replay any song with our music app from the radio
‚Ä¢ Enjoy unlimited skips
‚Ä¢ Download music to your Android Phone or Tablet to listen offline from Google Play
‚Ä¢ Create unlimited music hits playlists

Join our community!

For Feedback and Help
Tell us how we can improve by sharing your thoughts at https://help.iheart.com

comments: The app works most of the time but does get hung on occasion. The worst part is that even though it recovers, every time it happens it replays extra commercials instead of continuing the audio stream. I did read response from the author, and brief connection interruptions may be occurring. The interruptions occur most frequently during a popular segment so might be backend. My main point still stands, a less than 2 sec interruption should not have the app replay extra ad, just recover stream.

This app doesn't work at all. It keeps on giving me a message saying try again later. This was my very first time installing this app. I tried to purchased the "All Access" version, but I kept on getting a message that said try again later. So this is the reason I gave it one star. I wished I couldn't get it no stars. Fix asap!

I use the app a lot and have enjoyed it for many years. One of the stations I enjoy listening to is The Tchaikovsky Large Symphony Orchestra. It used to be amazing and play a great variety of classical composers. Lately, it has started playing a lot of other genres, like classic rock, Lynard Skynard, rap, Snoop Dog and Dr Dre, and country, Johnny Cash, just to name a few. I believe someone adjusted the algorithm, it would be great of it could be fixed.

The version on device is up to date. The device is less than a year old. It crashes often - like just stops in middle of broadcast. Often cuts top of the hour news short - usually during the weather it just jumps to a commercial. Constantly asks user to upgrade to premium. Since this review originally posted, it has crashed about a half dozen times. All these problems are relatively new. Needs quite a bit of improvement.

app is good but avoiding the subscription pop up is annoying and video ads playing 30 secs every time you switch stations is a bit much. Ads already play on the stations so it's overwhelming and is much less enjoyable than listening to a podcast show on other apps. I only use free versions of news and talk apps. I'll use more if app becomes better.

title: Smart Recorder ‚Äì High-quality voice recorder
description:
Free and easy to use audio recorder for Android. It has been specifically designed for high-quality and long-time recording with a clean and simple user interface.

With a skipping silence on-the-fly feature you can shorten recordings by omitting relative silence. It allows you, for example, to catch night sleep talks or maybe some snoring, whatever comes first. üò¥ It is by the way how the idea to make this app was born: my wife wanted to prove that I talk at night. It turns out, I do. ü§î

Since 2012 this app has been installed on more than 40 million devices worldwide and proven to be a reliable everyday tool. From it's early days it has been known as Smart Voice Recorder, rebranded later to a bit more generic name. Because, you know, it's great not only for voice. üé∏

Regarding phone calls: üì≤
This app is not designed explicitly for recording phone calls. Some manufacturers block the ability to record the other party of a phone call for privacy or legal reasons. For the same purpose, the app will even pause the recording during phone calls, but it can be turned off in the settings. Check your local laws and make sure it works on your handset first.

More features:
‚Ä¢  Automatic and manual sensitivity control for Skip silence mode (Beta)
‚Ä¢  Live audio spectrum analyzer
‚Ä¢  Wave/PCM encoding with adjustable sample rate (8-44 kHz)
‚Ä¢  Recording in the background (even when a display is off)
‚Ä¢  Save/pause/resume/cancel recording process control
‚Ä¢  Efficient and easy on battery
‚Ä¢  Recording time limited only by available space on your storage (and tech. limit 2GB per file)
‚Ä¢  Straightforward recordings list and many sharing options
‚Ä¢  Launcher shortcut to start recording in one tap
‚Ä¢  Microphone gain calibration tool.

developerAddress:
1037 NE 65th St #80412
Seattle, WA  98115
recentChanges: With the latest fixes and improvements, Smart Recorder is an even more reliable tool than it used to be. We will keep polishing it and will add more features soon. Just keep it up to date and go create.
comments: This is the best app of its kind. I go into the settings to manually set the skip silence and I have the best experience for multiple projects. I use this for music, capturing dreams when I wake up, recording important conversations, and sorting out ideas. I've downloaded this on multiple phones, I just wish there was an apple version of it.

It's Great! Does what it says it'll do and so far and especially with as much as I use it, no crashes, glitches or stall outs, (which used to happen a couple of years ago with older version of both app and phone). I've always re-downloaded this app specifically because of its definitive reliability for all that I need it for. It's also a definite 'must have' for interviews, appointments, sessions, and lectures whenever needed. (Only thing I might ask is for more updates playback options) Thanks

Great, simple app that opens quickly, is easy to navigate, and does exactly what it proposes to do and nothing more. When a native recorder was added to Android recently I considered switching to it, but it has a fatal flaw: it's difficult to get your recordings out of it. This app records things to a well-known place that it shows you via its settings.

I've been using this app for a few years now to record song ideas and stuff and they finally asked me to rate it so I decided hell yeah why not this app is a free high-quality recorder and has helped me out immensely and they don't constantly bombard with ads and and ask you to rate all the time I noticed this was the first time they asked maybe they just do that now but anyway I said "let's do it." Hope u like that sentence. üòé This is my primary recording app and I prefer it over the others.

Why all the high ratings for this I just ran the app and tested the recording quality of talking with my phone locked and my phone was directly next to me and all I got was muffled inaudible garbage. Perhaps it is good for speaking directly into the mic recording but if you need to record a class or something with your phone closed it seems this isn't the app for it. I had high hopes for this app back to the drawing board.

title: Digital Secure
description:
Protect your private information from digital threats. 
Digital Secure is a one-stop suite of privacy and security tools for your mobile devices and home computers. Safeguard your internet connection and personal data with antivirus, anti-malware and identity theft protection so you can browse with peace of mind. 

Here‚Äôs what you‚Äôll get with Digital Secure.
You‚Äôll get free security and privacy tools, plus you can get advanced protection for $5/mo per line or $10/mo per account.

1. Security and Privacy
Protect your device from online threats and get around-the-clock peace of mind. 
Get warnings when connecting to an unsecure network, visiting risky websites or attempting dangerous downloads. Plus, you‚Äôll be able to see how installed apps are currently using your personal information. 

2. Safe Wi-Fi 
Connect with confidence to any public Wi-Fi. 
With Digital Secure, it‚Äôs easy to make any Wi-Fi connection private. You‚Äôll get an on-the-go secure VPN connection so you‚Äôll be able to keep personal data and online activities to yourself. 

3. Identity Theft Protection (IDTP)
Take control with always-on IDTP and social media monitoring, dark web surveillance and theft alerts.
24/7 cyber monitoring means you can be notified if we detect any personal information you‚Äôve asked us to monitor is shared online. You‚Äôll also get step-by-step guidance from recovery and replacement specialists if essential items such as credit cards and IDs are lost.

comments: I straight up didn't install this app. I've never used it or opened it either but it was taking up lots of my battery (about 1% which is a lot for an app that I have literally never opened). I'm assuming my provider (Verizon, surprise, surprise) downloaded this app automatically during an update to my phone which is fantastic, since I was never alerted of this (read: sarcasm).

Complete Battery Hog. I have to disable the web protection settings or it chews up my battery life in a matter of hours. According to my battery usage stats, Verizon's "anti-virus scanner" uses up more battery than Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and Mobile Games. On some days, Combined. Samsung Galaxy S10.

I have been a subscriber with VERIZON for about 14 yrs. I have been more than satisfied with the cell svc, their products they sell, the support teams, and most of all the protection products they offer. This particular app is of the highest quality out on the market. Can't go wrong with this one!!!

This is trouble some to me I have a 1 in the app window all of the time I do not know what to do of the 1 in the app window need help clearing the 1 in the app window . Cause of this happening to people much in proving is needed to correct the problems with this app here????? Unknown if app window problem location/link & intternet problem double check from your end.

Since the app was installed i cannot access my printer to print emails from my phone. This app sucks. I originally thought it was my printer now I am finding out it is my phone. I have been a Verizon customer for years. I am considering a switch to another company.

title: Volcano Island: Tropic Paradise
description:
Explore an uncharted island, build a beautiful sanctuary and discover a fiery new world!
 
A maritime misadventure leaves you stranded on an uncharted island ‚Ä¶ with a volcano! But you and your brave crewmates are undaunted in your quest to build the island civilization of your dreams!
 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
A SCORCHING ADVENTURE
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Brave adventure, treasure, and pirates await as you explore the uncharted island, discover hidden secrets, and build a stunning island colony underneath the volcano.
 
Things to do in this volcano adventure:
‚óè Explore the daunting jungle and find uncharted territory.
‚óè Be careful to avoid the lava!
‚óè Unlock lost cargo on the beach to find secret treasures.
‚óè Turn your secret sanctuary into a thriving colony safe from the volcano!
‚óè From castaway to brave leader, guide your comrades and colony to uncharted heights.
 
Now with Team Challenge Seasons!
‚óè Build your team, compete together, and earn rewards!
‚óè New challenges every weekend!
‚óè Can you reach the top of the ranks?

Enjoy the original of all role play, multiplayer PopReach games (Shipwrecked, Westbound, Goldrush, Volcano Island, Skull Island & New World). Supported on most smartphones and tablets. 
 
Note: You must be at least 13 years of age to play or download this game. For more information, please refer to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

There are no cheats for this shipwrecked game.

~~~~~
NOTE
~~~~~

IN-APP PAYMENTS: The game is free to play, but you can buy special items to use in the game.

Phone Permissions: This permission is required to save the game state of users and also to restore game data in case of a reinstall or clearing of data by the user.

NOTE TO PARENTS: This game may include direct links to social networking sites that are intended for an audience that is at least 13 years of age; direct links to the internet with the potential to browse any web page; and advertising of PopReach products and products from select partners.

I would have givven 5 stars but i have given only 3 because in the game it is vvvvvv hard to earn gold and also the sword the workers are verry slow soooo iam sorry but i would like to uninstall this game And because of the game my phone hangs sometimes

title: Pet Rescue Saga
description:
Pet Rescue Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Saga & Farm Heroes Saga! 

Match two or more blocks of the same color to clear the level and save the pets from the evil Pet Snatchers! Moves are limited so plan them carefully.¬†Your puzzle skills will be tested with hours of block busting fun!

Take on this puzzling Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!¬†

Pet Rescue Saga is completely free to play but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Pet Rescue Saga features:
‚Ä¢ Eye-catching graphics and colorful gameplay¬†
‚Ä¢ Lovable pets of all varieties, puppies, bunnies, piglets and many more!¬†
‚Ä¢ Diamonds, exploding bombs, colorful paint pots, locked animal cages and much more¬†
‚Ä¢ Spectacular boosters and bonus rewards unlocked after many levels¬†
‚Ä¢ Easy and fun to play, challenging to master¬†
‚Ä¢ Hundreds of pet puzzling levels - more added every 2 weeks!
‚Ä¢ Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
‚Ä¢ Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the Internet

Already a fan of Pet Rescue Saga? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:¬†
facebook.com/PetRescueSaga¬†
twitter.com/PetRescueSaga¬†

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Pet Rescue Saga!

comments: Used to be a brilliant game and loved playing. However within the past week app constantly crashes, especially when trying to use Boosters. Thinking it was an issue with my phone I uninstalled and reinstalled apps, lost all my boosters, silver coins etc the only thing that saved was the level I was at. Instead of being a relaxing game it's now really frustrating to play.

It's a fun game but you have to admit you cheat. How do I get all but 1 pet off the board and you don't drop pets or the color blocks. If my booster is able to be used you cannot bc it kicks you out of the game. Why do you have us fill the piggy bank and then want us to pay for get the gold bars? They should be free. Why is there no way to win tickets to the circus? This game needs to be tweaked a lil bit and the cheating should stop. Just my opinion though.

This game is becoming a total nightmare for a lot of its Players... it has gone cheat crazy ! I have played it on several devices since 2013.. at first the game was fun & enjoyable...how ever over the past 18 months..it has Had sooooo! Many flaws...cheats...unresponsive ! constantly lags. If you notify the team.. u simply get A very automated! Sorry & ur told to sign in & out of Facebook. .this will solve the issues... well it dose NOT! Solve the constant issues & nor dose it help. üò°

This my favorite game but I have to start over I just wish there's was a way to get back to place I was at this is so easy but I was in the hardest part it helps your mine stay focused and you don't think about nothing because you will want to come back to this game
Updated and glitches all over. If you play a previous level in another section, when you finish and don't check "Next", it takes you back to your current level. FRUSTRATING

title: Easy Taxi, a Cabify app
description:
Easy is now a Cabify app. In one app we offer you various ways of getting around the city: taxi, car with driver, scooters‚Ä¶ with more options being added all the time. Download our app and ride around the city quickly, affordably and safely. 

Why choose Cabify?
Our users highlight:
- Safety: in the app you‚Äôll find various different safety functions such as seeing your journey details, sharing your journey with a friend in real time or activating automatic notifications to advise someone when you‚Äôve arrived at your destination.
- Availability:with more services in just one app, you‚Äôll have more cars and taxis available to you and therefore it‚Äôll be even easier to get a journey. 
- Price: discover the various transport options we offer in your city, with a range of price and services. And don‚Äôt forget to activate your notifications to receive our best promotions. 
- Carbon neutral: CO2 emissions in your journeys with Cabify are offset via a project that protects part of the Amazon rainforest. Ride environmentally responsibly!
- Quality: we strive to offer you the best service and we have dedicated passenger and driver support team.
- Transparency: we show you the estimated price before you order your journey, so that you can travel totally relaxed. In some categories taximeter may apply.

What services are available?
Download our app to see our various services and discover which are available in your city.
- Cabify Lite: the ideal option if you want to ride with a private driver at a good price. You can select your preferences such as radio station or car temperature.
- Easy Taxi: the taxis from Easy are now in Cabify. An ideal option for those who want to get around quickly and affordably.
- Cabify Executive: ride with the same options as Lite but in a superior type of vehicle. 
- Easy Economy: get around in taxi at an even more affordable price. 
- MOVO: we‚Äôve integrated MOVO‚Äôs options, such as scooters, into our app. 
- Cabify Pets: for those who never want to be separated from their furry friend!

And many more categories! Get the app and see which ones are available in your area.

How can I order a taxi or private car?
Riding with Cabify is very easy. Follow these steps and you‚Äôll soon be exploring every corner of your city:
1. Download Cabify and register.
2. Choose which payment method fits you best: cash payment, card payment‚Ä¶ the app will show which options are available in your city.
3. Tell us where you want to ride and which service you prefer: Cabify Lite, Easy Taxi, MOVO‚Ä¶
5. We‚Äôll show you the estimated journey price. 
6. Ready! A taxi will come to pick you up.

Where is it available?
Easy‚Äôs taxis and Cabify‚Äôs cars are available in more than 90 cities across Latin America and Europe. You can find us in: Argentina, Brasil, Chile, Colombia, Ecuador, Mexico, Peru, Spain and Uruguay. 
See the full list of all our cities and fares on our website: cabify.com

comments: Keeps telling me that something is wrong with my payment method. I have added every card I have.

"Price not available - something went wrong in calculating the journey price." I always receive the same message no matter if I choose short or long trips. I tried in different and several days, routes and times. Why should I insist to be a customer with you? And don't ask me to explain more since it is very clear. S√£o Paulo city, south area.

A safe option for rides at reasonable prices. The problem is that it has difficulties finding user's location, which means you have to wait longer until the app finds you, and it won't let you choose your address manually as in other similar apps or simply write it. I haven't been able to use it lately, because it doesn't find my location and while waiting for it, it uses a lot of your data. Please fix it!

The app is safe and great most of the times. But sometimes, in the peak hours, looks like the app assign a service without the authorization of the car driver, when I had called those call drivers to ask why are they moving in other direction, they said they didn't accepted the service and the app assigned it. This makes the person to lose time waiting for a car that is not going to arrive.

I tried to use the app to get a ride home on New Year's Eve and it kept on closing on me. Now I'm trying to change to a new credit card but no matter what I do it won't let me confirm the new card. Prior to this it worked fine, but not much use now if I can't even get the app to work.

comments: I love this game! They send free credits throughout the day. Of course using premium level and 4 cards is the best. But I've gotten bingos off of one card. Really have to try this one ü•∞ 10/29/29 Grumpy Cat is the best ever room. You definintly have to try it. Win clothing items, dress him up, take pics I share them in my FB story. GRUMPY always makes me smile. Seriously give him a try you'll be glad you did!!

I loved this game, play it everyday sometimes 2 or 3 times but after the update its always crashing on me. I had over 100 chips this morning and every game I tried to play it let me buy the game, start playing then freeze until it comes up game over. Im not playing again till this is fixed - a shame as it would have been a 5 star review last week ‚òπ

Wonderful game. Tired of having credits taken away every single day lately without the benefit of actually getting to play. Frustrated! Looking for new favorite game if support can't fix this issue. ü§¨ I reach out to support and all I get is information on how the game works. No refund whatsoever on my credits. What a joke.

Great game for bingo lovers, I play every morning with my cup of coffee and some Bingo Bash, love the game but getting annoyed with the gifts every night it comes thru get your gift and you hit the icon and no free surprise its been going on for weeks now, i play every day and do spend a good bit of money on chips, please tske a look or fix or I'll have to lower from 5 stars, i do love the game but very annoying

I find it boring now. I love playing mini games as Rapid bingo or Grand tour. I always loose all my chips in rapid bingo. Very few times I won otherwise always loose chips.From last 6 months playing Grand tour but not won 300 chips reward. So stop playing that also. I find your team is only interested who put money. Those who play with free chips, your team don't bother. Now I feel depressed while playing this game, while loosing the chips. Earlier this game was my favorite.

title: Call me a Legend - Game of Battle & Love
description:
Playboy x Call Me A Legend

12 beautiful Playmates are trapped in the zombie world. Rescue all the Playmates before they are gone!  
Time is limited for all legends to finish the rescue-missions and set them free from the zombies. They promise to thank you and you won't be disappointed.
Meet the Playmates of the month including Gia, Audrey, Raquel, Stephanie, Sophie, Monica....etc, they are waiting for you to rescue them. 

Call me a Legend is a free RPG game simulation with plenty of love affairs and politics! Become a Legend in the game, which enables you to get rich and gain power! But beware of zombies, because they are lurking behind every corner!

Main features:
‚úî Love affairs - Increase intimacy with girls by dating them and giving them gifts. Become a Legend among girls!
‚úî Raising a family - Take care of your wife and she will take care of your life and your children. Groom your heirs!
‚úî Political games - Get rich and powerful!
‚úî Forge Alliances - Recruit heroes which will help you defeat the zombies! 
‚úî Develop the camp and upgrade your heroes to make them stronger. Be the top of the legend!
‚úî Go on Quests - send expeditions to explore new territories and find more survivors.
‚úî Chat online with other players - exchange your experiences! Who is the Legend at the end?
‚úî Set the record - We challenge you to try to become the best-ranked player on our worldwide ranking list! Are you the Legend?

Play Call me a Legend for FREE now! Get Rich, Gain Power Now!

¬© 2020 Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. Playboy and the Rabbit Head Design are trademarks of Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. and used under license by Empire Studios Inc.

comments: Downloaded the game to see what it was about. Waiting for it to load which was exceptionally long load time, only to get to the main background screen and nothing else. Nothing to click on to proceed any further. Just the main screen. Read the reviews for the gane and seems to me like the devs for this gane arent sure what they are doing. Waste of time.

Very challenging game. Excellent girls, can build soldiers to whatever strength you want according to your resources. Would recommend this game if your diligent. The bad, it's a little glitchy, have had 2 uninstall and reinstall several times this last week in order for the game to load. Also likes to disconnect from the server, occasionally it won't reconnect. Once required a reinstall. Fortunately no game play was lost and no penalties. Kudos to the DEVS for the mini game and variety.

The is a good game but it sucks that you have to collect 800 puzzle pieces for most girls and sucks that the girls never get put in the rotation, so I have alot of puzzle pieces and never get the chance to get them, unless they start putting back into rotation then I'm going to delete the game

Beware, extremely low probabilities and undisclosed gacha odds. Did over 150+ searches and did not gain a single point in progression towards a character. Needs more work and bug fixes. Half of the content says "Coming Soon," and even a screen still shows as "Beta testing." Servers are pretty much dead, no social aspect and lacks co-cop related content. Also don't like that some events run at 4am in the morning and only last 2 hours.

Fun enough game if you're patient. The beauties are ridiculous but entertaining and at least they aren't Anime style. There's enough to do to keep you coming back and figure out. Like that if you miss out on something it will come around again in a few months. PTP helps but you don't need to if you're patient and don't mind grinding it out.

title: Disney+
description:
Disney+ is the streaming home of your favorite stories. With unlimited entertainment from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars and National Geographic, you‚Äôll never be bored. Watch the latest releases, Original series and movies, classic films, throwback TV shows, and so much more.

Stream and download Original Series like The Mandalorian, and fan favorites like The Simpsons, Marvel‚Äôs The Avengers, and Frozen. There‚Äôs always something new to discover.

comments: It has everything I want to watch from Disney! I love it sooo much. I had this service since Day 1 and there used to be multiple issues but now it has been a year and it is perfect, no issues whatsoever. I do wish the algorithm for movies recommended to you were on the level that Netflix and Amazon Prime Video has, but I'm sure that will be more finetuned in the future. Overall, I'm very happy with this app and service, and will continue its patronage into the foreseeable future.

Slow. Doesn't load. Says it's my internet but all my other streaming services work great. Hulu, Amazon, Netflix. Wish they would work on that. Also not everything comes up on my watchlist that I have saved. If I manually look for it. It shows in my watchlist but when I go to my watchlist. It isn't there. Downloaded movie to watch on the plane. Didn't work. I like the old Disney movies but not all of them are on here. They say they switch them up but never do.

The app worked great for the first 10 months but over the last month when we're at home watching a movie, the movie will freeze up and then the app will reset. After that, we have to navigate back to the movie. UPDATE.. PLEASE FIX THIS F@UCKING APP! We're paying for a monthly service in which we can't even watch the programing. A corporation like Disney should have a flawless app. The app was perfect and now it sucks.

I love watching my favorite shows on here, but this only works on my laptop and will not work on my phone. I have tried everything to get it to work and the only thing that keeps coming up when I try to watch something is "sorry cannot play if error keeps happening please contact disney support with code 39". But like I said works perfectly fine on my computer. I want to watch it on my phone as well, please fix the problem!

This app is pretty good I have enjoyed it so far. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is the app runs a slow sometimes but that could be on my end so I wouldn't take that into consideration too much. I also like the shows that are on there now but I was watching the marvel movies and they don't have Spiderman or The Hulk which isn't that big of a deal but if you wanted to watch those you would need another app +subscription. Overall its a good app and is cheap compared to other streaming services.

title: Metro Name ID
description:
Stop unwanted calls with Metro Name ID and say goodbye to scammers, telemarketers, and other questionable callers. With Name ID, you can block these callers, and block or manage any other phone number. Name ID also identifies callers‚Äîeven if they‚Äôre not in your address book‚Äîletting you choose who you talk to. Reverse number lookup is included as well, so you‚Äôll never have to wonder who called you.

Metro Name ID features:

- Identify and block likely scam calls 
- Identify and block unwanted callers
- Identify and send call categories to voicemail‚Äîtelemarketers, surveys, political callers, and more 
- Identify unknown callers
- Report call violations 
- Reverse number lookup

comments: Sept 28, 2020 MetroPCS by T-Mobile changed to the Scam and Spam app . Updated January 6, 2020 from 2/25/19 Absolutely the best $2.50 a month ever! No more Telemarketing, scams, or annoyingly winded people. Blocks Telemarketers! This particular app has worked for me over a year now. Still working like a charm. Ha, Make it year 3!The best company in the States for service is MetroPCS by T-Mibile. Service, connection, and the people are great. X üíöüê¢

I have appreciated this name id blocking unwanted calls until today when it blocked a contact of mine. Now I'm wondering how many other contact calls have been blocked without knowing...I hope this glitch gets fixed!!!

I like it very much, however the 1 thing I don't like is the list of numbers stay forever. Also the old way 1 could check a number if one got thru. Is there anyway to clear the numbers in the activity sectipn? I have a list that goes back over 8/9 months. I use it often however still have the same problem with the ph. nbrs. Is there a way to delete some of the old nbrs?
I'm so glad I have this! With so many scams I've gotten where I dont want to answer any calls but now, stopping them has been easy. Although, I wish it included text messages as well.

I am a maintenance supervisor and I'm busy all through the day and it's really nice to not be getting a lot of unnecessary phone calls to interrupt me while I'm doing things I truly appreciate this app and all that it does for me thank you so very much.

title: Hustle Castle: Medieval games in the kingdom
description:
Become the lord and master of a real medieval castle! Accept new subjects, assign them to their duties, train and protect your men and women! Defy your rivals and laws of physics as you build and upgrade your fortress! 

Your pudgy warriors look great in their shining armor! Nourish and train your troops, and they‚Äôll crush the armies of Grav the Mighty Brainpan, put the Abyss Lord back in his place, and also burn down a couple of enemies‚Äô castles! 

All day long your scribes scratch their heads with quills, treasurers spill coins on the floor and blacksmiths drop anvils on their feet for the sake of your prosperity! Prepare true specialists, become wealthy and influential! Build a dating room and watch your subjects have children who‚Äôll soon grow up and serve you too! 


Assume command, my lord! Here are some of the opportunities you get in the game: 

- Story-driven campaign. In hundreds of missions your heroes fight orcs, giants, skeletons and even dragons! Battle magic, cold steel and cunning strategy ‚Äì the end justifies the means! 
- Castle construction. Build new rooms for your stronghold and upgrade the existing ones. You‚Äôve got all you need to create a dream castle! Begin the construction now! 
- Developing the villagers. Each of your subjects can learn new skills and wear any equipment. Train great warriors and scribes‚Ä¶ and then swap them with each other! 
- Multiplayer. Get medieval! Burn and plunder the castle of someone you don‚Äôt like‚Ä¶ And you don‚Äôt like all of them, right?

comments: Used to be good, but after the recent update you can't collect enough resources to advance the game unless you pay. Edit: the reply from the game rep is innacurate. I had plenty of resources, almost enough to upgrade and the next day, everything was gone and have never been able to save any resources to play the game, let alone make the game easier.

I was enjoying it but I'm tired of always being lowest might in arena. Everytime I upgrade drastically, magically when I join another arena match, everyone else doubles and triples my might. I literally took all my gear off and my might was 35k and everyone in that room were 100 to 300k, I waited for rounds to end and equipped my gear which had me at 326K and then everyone was 550k to 725k. Complete bs. Yep, definitely a money grab game.

Odds of winning items and the rewards given are getting poorer as the GREED for money grows. I play but have lost interest. I quit spending hundreds to get everything. If money is no object you will enjoy. Support services are the worst. Robots with no helpful info...just scripted responses. . I lowered my review for the lame scripted response you added to my comment. It doesnt work.

1. The game glitches way too much 2. The game crashes every 20 - 30 minutes while playing it 3. Its a pay to win game 4. Its so slow loading and loading 5. The game sucks U should have a 2builders from the start and the limit of 5builders, And have a competetive fight only your level can fight you, because i play it then i challenge some raids, after it resets there is a 1.5m powered guy And I only have 200k power, how am i supossed to beat that?!

Mobile Crusader kings meets building combat games like SoS. The gameplay is a mix of those two, really grindy and very much aimed toward wallet warriors. Can still progress f2p but really slowly. My game experience is hindered by long loading times and lag, didn't matter if I used my phone or gaming rig with bluestacks was still slow. Takes forever to load in and any pvp. Frequently, my commands aren't even done due to lag.

title: Diamond Digger Saga
description:
Diamond Digger Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Saga & Farm Heroes Saga!

Can you dig it?

Join Diggy as you dig through diamonds and unearth special treasures. Epic adventures await you in the lands of Diamond Dale, Turquoise Meringue and beyond.  

Diggy finds a treasure map, sparking his underground search for gems! Lead Diggy through a world full of diamonds in this wonderful digging adventure! 

Dig a path by clearing away a group of 3 or more diamonds to reach a target score. Use the water to make your way through the rooms and discover treasures!

Unearth gems and rescue fireflies in this beautiful game of wonder and delight.

Take on this delightful Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!¬†

Diamond Digger Saga is completely free to play, but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

‚óè Bright and colorful graphics

Take on this delightful Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!¬†

Diamond Digger Saga is completely free to play, but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Diamond Digger Saga features:

‚óè Bright and colorful graphics
‚óè Friendly and fascinating characters living in a fantasy world
‚óè Color bursts, line blasts and dynamite to lend a helping hand
‚óè Unlock boosters and special treasures hidden beneath the ground tiles!
‚óè Easy and fun to play, challenging to master¬†
‚óè Over 700 levels to complete filled with wondrous delights!
‚óè Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
‚óè Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the internet

Already a fan of Diamond Digger Saga?¬†Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:

facebook.com/diamonddiggersaga
twitter.com/diamond_digger

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Diamond Digger Saga! ‚Ä®‚Ä®

comments: Was fun for awhile but get to the end it takes weeks to get more levels. The daily gifts never get better the longer you play. Last update has the banners across game almost impossible to move and stuck on 1872 with last phase there are no diamonds to actually pass the level. Now they added this stupid help others, instead of adding levels.
I like this app. Actually I am playing this game since 2017... What I like the most is there is NO ad that will pop up... even your Wifi is on... there will never be an irrititation in this gameüòç
The game is relaxing and cute, and so far I haven't been bombarded with ads!
It's not good when the computer will not give you a match to make anywhere near the goal. I don't spend money on games. Some companies are money grubbers!!!

This game is a random game, I like it for the fact that it makes you think but as an offset it drops stuff you can not think about. If you win the game you can discover hidden layers to the game. I just ask the folks from this game to make it more of a thinking game and less random. Casino games are like that and this one is cute:) Colab with some good games and give out free stuff. I'm not included. I kick this games levels daily./Make it less like a casino slot machine and more like a thought game:) much funner:) OUCCCHHHHH my daughter told me about the money games, Make it real not fake!!! Your game is awesome I love it:) Anyway giving people good things for playing are awesome. Just don't promise 1k in a week for nothing. I love your game and will continue to play:)

title: Skillz - Logic Brain Games
description:
Want to test your memory skills or give your brain an exercise? Try this fun memory game to improve your memory, speed, get better accuracy, distinguish between colors and much more. This is a fun logical game that gives a good test to your brain.

With this brain game, you can help players to learn to distinguish between different colors and improve their skills. The players sharpen their minds while having fun playing this game. This logical game is a skill test game. Also, you can test your reflexes. There are some fun game puzzles in the game of different kinds. You score points and advance levels. Very fun and addictive game that you will completely enjoy.

***********************
APP HIGHLIGHTS
***********************
To add to playing a logical game and training your brain, you also have a lot of fun with the game. It is packed with different kind of tests that improve your skills and abilities. Here is how ‚Äì 
‚úìImprove your memory
‚úìTrain your reflexes
‚úìIncrease your accuracy
‚úìProve your touch ability
‚úìIncrease your speed
‚úìLearn color coordination

Each level tests your skills and abilities to their peak. After each level, your results are ranked between 1 and 5 Stars and you will be rewarded with a number of Brains. For every Star earned you will be rewarded with one Brain. Using a brain, you can retry from the current round, pass a round or pass a level with 5 stars.
	
Every level is designed to help you improve your skills, memory to sharpen your mind with this addictive game. So, are you ready to take up a brain challenge now? Download this free app ‚Äì ‚ÄúSkillz Logical Brain Game‚Äù now to get started.

The logical game is introducing a Multiplayer feature. Here is how it goes ‚Äì
- Play with your friends or with random players
- Start a game with minimum 2 players. Max limit is 4.
- If you finish the game in Multiplayer mode on the 1st place, you earn a "Win" and 5 Brains. If you finish the game but on the 2nd place, you earn just 3 Brains and no "Win"
- Your Multiplayer Ranking depends on the "Wins"
- Play in Multiplayer mode and unlock Achievements
You will love the feature, so start sharing with your friends.

title: Fruit Clinic
description:
Fruits need your help!

Prepare your tools and heal the fruits.
Be careful, as an official fruit operator take your job seriously and let the fruits leave your clinic happy.
The more fruits and vegetables you help the more you will earn.

Use your money to rank up your clinic and become the best fruit clinic in the planet.

Have fun and keep operating!
descriptionHTML:
Fruits need your help!

Prepare your tools and heal the fruits.
Be careful, as an official fruit operator take your job seriously and let the fruits leave your clinic happy.
The more fruits and vegetables you help the more you will earn.

Use your money to rank up your clinic and become the best fruit clinic in the planet.

Have fun and keep operating!
summary: Become the master Fruit Surgeon!
developerAddress:
1100 Page Mill Road
Palo Alto, CA 94304
recentChanges: +Bug Fixes
comments: The game is bugged. I've been stuck on the same level without being to progress for several weeks. Ads are terrible. They're between every round and then some. I paid to remove them because the game is entertaining enough to want to be able to play but not 45 minutes after I paid to remove ads I haven't been able to play the game anymore. The ad I saw and downloaded it from showed the game being more complex than it actually is. It's just repetitive of the exact same things.

Ad before a level. Ad during a level. Ad after a level. Ad to get tools. Then after you get the too, yep you guessed it, ANOTHER AD!! The ads are nearly twice the length that the levels are! This isn't a game but a place for adverts. If you want people to actually enjoy this game then perhaps have an ad after every two to three levels. Ads ads ads. This game is not enjoyable! Uninstalling!!

I don't get ticked off by ads, the game is great but I have two requests. One: More decor, furniture, and the other one. One stopped at 20 , the other 21 and I haven't finished the other one. Another thing: Level 43. When I started, I cut open the aubergine and saw nothing. It's still screaming, there's no tweezers, and when you touch it, it zooms in. Please fix this!

There are way too many adverts for this game to even be playable. I think I got four levels in and on all four levels there was an advert before, during and after the level, then to get new tools, guess what? Another advert. Then to get decor for your office? Another advert. I get in, free games have adverts, but I should spend more time watching them than playing the game. And I only got to level 4 because I kept telling myself not every level will be like this. EVERY LEVEL IS LIKE THIS.

I got up to level 46 but I cannot go further for a bug won't let me get into my next tool. However there are many bugs that are good as well. Turning your internet off will not only get rid of all ads, you can still press "watch ad to claim" on all tools and bonus prizes and not have to watch an ad to get your reward. You will instantly get it. However you need to restart the games a few times after restarting your game in order for this to work.

title: Groupon - Shop Deals, Discounts & Coupons
description:
Download Groupon and save up to 70% on the things you need every day. Find great deals on all the best stuff to eat, see, and do near you and around the world.

Save on everything you‚Äôre looking for. Whether you‚Äôre craving a new restaurant in town, or daydreaming about tropical travel, a daily replenishment of deals delivers all the discounts you like.

Every deal is available to use immediately, so you‚Äôre never more than a few taps away from a relaxing massage, tickets to the night‚Äôs hottest event, or a great pizza joint.

With the Groupon app you can:
‚Ä¢  Get promo codes and special savings alerts for deals near you, instantly on your mobile device
‚Ä¢  Buy and redeem Groupon deals directly from your mobile device, no need to print vouchers or clip coupons
‚Ä¢  Read customer reviews and write your own
‚Ä¢  Share deals with friends and family

And there‚Äôs more:
‚Ä¢  Instantly redeem on-demand deals on food, fun, fashion, and wellness, without having to print a voucher
‚Ä¢  Get up to 30% cash back at participating Groupon+ restaurants
‚Ä¢  Travel to exotic destinations and stay at the fanciest hotels with Groupon Getaways
‚Ä¢  Shop for fun themed collections for holidays and events

Put down the coupon book and pick up the Groupon Android app‚Äîyour ticket to explore the best your city has to offer at savings of up to 70% off.

Need help? Contact us at https://www.groupon.com/customer_support

recentChanges: Thanks for using the Groupon app! Here at Groupon, we strive to deliver the best deals to you by improving your experience every time we release a new version of our app. Our updates include many new features, improvements and bug fixes.
comments: Used Groupon at launch, when it was actually a bargain site. Nowadays I hardly use it. If you search for goods on eBay/Amazon, 9/10 times they'll be ¬£3-4 cheaper. I only use the app. Was offered 20% off next order, no code, link, or details. Pressed accept and it said it would be applied at checkout, it wasn't. Spoke to four agents on chat, all copy/paste template replies. When I started complaining, all four pretended they couldn't see my replies and that I'd gone idle and disconnected me.

I absolutely LOVE GROUPON! It is the only app I use for my great deals! I get on there atleast 3 times a day sometimes more! The notifications are awesome! && I love how is a variety of things. The up to 97% off some things blows my mind! Such great deals. If you don't have this app its an amazing app and a great way to save money

There should not be this many daily notifications for the little amount of content on this app. The search is garbage. It routinely shows "deals" in my area, amd o then find out my area is apparently two states away. Very few business use this anymore. While these are strange times, this was still the case last year. No worthwhile deals. All the goods sold herr are also pretty garbage deals. They can regularly be had on amazon on elsewhere for the same price as their sale price on groupon.

Total waste of time. First, there were not many deals in my area. Then when we traveled with it, there was not much savings. Then it started charging my card when I did not authorize the charge for a "groupon select" there is no customer service to call, only email and online chats. I contacted them for the last year telling them to unsubscribe me, each time I was told it went thru. Is an act of God to get them to answer email or the online chats. They are like a bad case of the herpes.

Some good deals, but not all what they seem and customer service is a joke. I paid $21 for 3 days of airport parking and was charged another $40 when I left. According to the Groupon, regular price would've been $30, so I paid twice as much as I would have without the "deal". I tried to chat with customer service twice and got no help, then disconnected in less than 1 min while I was typing a short reply, clearly because they didn't want to be bothered, and this is just one example of MANY.

title: Waze - GPS, Maps, Traffic Alerts & Live Navigation
description:
Always know what‚Äôs happening on the road with Waze. Even if you know the way, Waze tells you about traffic, construction, police, crashes, and more in real-time. If traffic is bad on your route, Waze will change it to save you time. 

Why Waze?
‚ó¶ See what‚Äôs happening - Alerts about traffic, police, hazards and more on your drive
‚ó¶ Get there faster - Instant routing changes to avoid traffic and save you time

‚ó¶ Play music & more - listen to your favorite apps for music, podcasts & more right from Waze

98 Yigal Alon
Tel Aviv
Israel
recentChanges:
Saving time & avoiding traffic is even easier with this update:

Fixed a bug so it‚Äôs easier to sign into your Waze account
comments: Really disappointed, I used to use this all the time driving but recently it has stopped working properly. The route line marker would have odd gaps. Only the parts of the map that was previously loaded would appear. Locations that were never encountered prevously would not load map data, so I'd be driving on a regional highway and suddenly loose the map with no idea where to stop and change to google maps. I thought reinstalling the app would fix my problems but now there is no map at all.

Why does after the recent updates..Gps is always difficult to detect? Always took very long to show the navigation route. After many times force close the app..then only will the navigation route line appear. Works so fine in the past..just open the app..enter the address..navigation route appears..then off u go. Now..so frustrating. Is it bug or something? Pls do something to make it as effective and effecient as before.

This used to be my go to app for driving but it stopped working properly a few months back. I keep checking in on it to see if things have changed and they haven't. Uninstalled and reinstalled, still not working correctly. It shows me driving down the road sideways and the map glitches.

Love this app. It's fairly easy to use and once your whole route is loaded In you can turn off data to save it and save battery. If I had one complaint that it would be it runs in the background when your done using it, if there is a way to turn this off please let me know.

I was going to give this app three stars because it is better than google maps but I have to type while I drive every time it forces me to use Google Voice recognition Instead of their own voice recognition, but now I can only give it one star because it decided to get in my face about voting; something that has nothing to do with navigation.

title: LinkedIn: Jobs, Business News & Social Networking
description:
LinkedIn has open jobs for every profession.

Find a career and stay up to date on the most relevant openings with the LinkedIn app, the most trusted network. Job search is easy with the most up-to-date job listings and business news, with millions of connections in every industry.

Grow your network with business contacts, stay up to date with companies, and follow thought leaders. Apply for jobs easily and get recommendations for jobs where we think you‚Äôll be a fit. LinkedIn is here to help you land your next job.

Job seeker looking for new employment? Business networking? Business news and industry buzz? Do that and more with the free LinkedIn app.

Filter through millions of openings and customized recommendations to find your perfect career. Safely apply for your perfect position with your resume or professional profile in a few taps, straight through the app. The LinkedIn job search app lets you build a profile highlighting your professional experience, so you can show your successes, skills and network.

Start business networking to keep in touch with connections and other professionals. Find a job hiring near you and use LinkedIn to ask your business contacts for referrals. Check online jobs, share posts and converse with fellow professionals to boost your odds of getting hired.

No matter where you're at or what you're looking for, LinkedIn makes job searching easy. Grow and connect with friends, colleagues, companies, industry experts and the rest of the LinkedIn community.

5 reasons why you‚Äôll love the LinkedIn app:

- Job search & recruiting: Find positions suited to your skills and apply
- Career finder: Research companies you‚Äôre interested and see if their open roles
- Business networking: Network, request referrals, and stay up to date on your contacts
- Business news: Get relevant news delivered to you via your Daily Rundown and write your own 
- Social network: Create your profile, keep an up to date resume online and highlight your skillset

Search jobs, develop business contacts, connect with recruiters, and apply for your next job LinkedIn helps you start and finish your job search!

LinkedIn App Features:

JOB SEARCH APP & CAREER FINDER
‚Ä¢ Find jobs now hiring & apply using your LinkedIn profile and/or resume
‚Ä¢ Apply for jobs for every type of profession ‚Äì salaried, hourly, part-time, remote and more
‚Ä¢ Find jobs through recruiters & find new contacts
‚Ä¢ Job alerts for any new openings you might be interested in
‚Ä¢ Set job alerts to get notified when new jobs from your followed companies are posted

BUSINESS NEWS
‚Ä¢ Share articles with the LinkedIn community & your business contacts
‚Ä¢ Business news from related industries to help you stay up to date
‚Ä¢ Write posts and connect with your community

BUSINESS NETWORKING
‚Ä¢ Network on the go; connect with new contacts and easily find industry experts
‚Ä¢ Follow companies, influencers and professionals
‚Ä¢ Social networking for businesses: showcase your company or product to find new opportunities

RESUME & PROFILE
‚Ä¢ Apply for jobs using your LinkedIn profile
‚Ä¢ Easily submit your resume for any job
‚Ä¢ Keep your LinkedIn profile up to date as a virtual resume highlighting your experience
‚Ä¢ Share accomplishments, job responsibilities and skills on your professional profile

SOCIAL NETWORKING
‚Ä¢ Connect to the largest social network of professionals from around the globe
‚Ä¢ Import contacts for a quick & easy way to grow your network

Find a job with job search tools, recruiters, industry experts and career opportunities at your fingertips. The LinkedIn app is a perfect way to network, apply to jobs and find new contacts - straight from your phone, wherever you are.

Want to make the most of LinkedIn? Upgrade to a Premium subscription for exclusive tools.

We ask for a few permissions when you use this app. Here‚Äôs why: http://linkd.in/1l0S8YZ

summary: Job search & business news, directly through the most trusted network, LinkedIn.
recentChanges: Thanks for using LinkedIn! We regularly update our app to fix bugs, improve performance and add new features to help you connect with your professional network and advance your career.
comments: My experience has been awful. After the 1 month free premium trial I tried to cancel my subscription it would not let me. Day 6 of trying to get a refund, countless hours spent on the 'live chat' feature which kicks you off every 3 minutes. Emailed them with link below. Haven't heard anything yet. This is incredibky disappointing and shows that I cannot support this company with my money as it seems impossible to speak to someone or get an issue resolved. Utterly disappointing customer service.

For a professional tool, there are way too many bugs. For instance, when someone sends us a connection request, we can't click to see their picture. It simply doesn't open. Same thing happens with replying to their message. Unless we accept the connection, go back and enter into the person's profile properly, many features don't work. Sometimes the app needs to be restarted in order for it to start working again. A month after this review still no info from the developers team... Disappointing.

I really like LinkedIn app but I guess your app is couple of steps behind your website. Watching live events on the app is just like being tortured! Comments cover the screen in landscape mode, and if you want to turn it back to portrait mode, the screen becomes too small that makes it impossible to read a single word! Would you please fix it ASAP?

The app is useless for the last few days. I'm following a highly active community on LinkedIn. But same posts from 3-4 days back is always there on top of my feed. No matter how much I refresh the feed, new posts won't appear. I tried everything from clearing cache to reinstalling the app. The feed is like my profile now. There are posts I've liked and commented. Even if there are no new activities on the post by my connection, it's still there.

It will be nice if you were able to edit a conversation piece that you accidentally sent that had mistakes, and that you wanted to correct or unsend. Example if you were sending date each text message (case in point this a speech to text) and there a lot of errors in it. Then you accidentally send it. You can't unsend it. It should be a way to fix an error after it's been sent or unsend something.

title: Alibaba.com - Leading online B2B Trade Marketplace
description:
The Alibaba.com app is a leading wholesale mobile marketplace for global trade. Buy products from suppliers around the world, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Buy & Pay with confidence
Alibaba Trade Assurance fully covers your purchases when suppliers do not meet the product quality and delivery schedule specified in the agreed contract. 

Customized products
Suppliers have years of experience in customizing products, fulfilling the demands from sellers on Amazon, eBay, wish, etsy, mercari, lazada, etc.

Easy sourcing
Browse millions of products from industry-wide categories. Post Request for Quotations (RFQs) and receive price quotes quickly. 

Fast shipping 
Alibaba partners with major freight forwarders to provide sea, air & land shipping solutions with on time delivery , tracking information and fair pricing.

Popular Categories
Alibaba.com covers a wide range of popular categories including hot and trending consumer products, also features industrial and raw materials categories 

Product quality under control

Discount & Promotions

Stay in the loop

Languages & currencies supported
Alibaba.com supports 16 popular languages and 140 more local currencies. 
Now you can use Alibaba Real-time Translator to communicate with sellers in mother tongue.
