comments: The app doesn't allow me to log in with my existing account. I've even changed my password many times to try and get in of which I still cant. The app usually says my email is not registered with the app. When I attempt to "register" the the app says the email already exists. I dont understand what is going on. Even with trying to get through to the help centre I have to "log in" but I cant coz I keep being kicked out

Absolutely Horrible, my personal email is sent or something when I view items and I am getting responses for things I have not enquired about. That notification bar is a nuisance, I have turned it off 10times and it keeps coming back. the notifications bar just doesn't stay hidden it just keeps taking up real estate on my screen for nothing. How do you delete your account?

Ok this is my example of how things work they post an add off an amplifier pricing it from 100-1000 ! But whenever you try to buy ! Its always $1,000 most sellers lie on the add and some are rude after you question the ! Plus app doesnt work ! I cant open it keeps telling me to go to a desktop ! Useless app.

I am do tired of uninstalling this app (6 times so far this week), it is worse than a virus. I never asked for it, dont want it and cant apparently get rid of it. So my advice - avoid it like the plague. If I could find a good way tp complain about this unwanted invasion of my phone I would. Another 2 uninstalls later. Google should ban this app.

Messenger doesn't work after the last update, keeps giving "sign in failed" error. I have to use my laptop browser to access the website instead, which is frustrating. 29/10/2020 we are back to the "sign in failed" issue again. Works ok on browser but app is still having problems.

title: Exploration Lite Craft
description:
An amazing infinite blocky open world to build, craft and explore. Exploration Craft lets you be the reality crafting god! 

As a miner and adventurer, you need to build constructions out of textured cubes in this 3D block world. You may also need to combat against evil monsters in the evening using the weapons mined and crafted in the daylight. Explore, mine resources, craft tools and weapons, grow plants, raise you own mounts and cast magic spells. There are no limits to your creativity and imagination in this lite and pro version of the game!

Game Features:
- Deep tutorial and tons of 3D elements
- Procedurally generated open world sandbox environment
- Create your own castles using blocks and other elements
- Train and raise mobs/mounts to help you fight against monsters

developerAddress: Start Chambers, Wickham‚Äôs Cay II, P. O. Box 2221, Road Town, Tortola, British Virgin Island
recentChanges: Fixed some crash bugs of the game. Thanks.
comments: Really good game, I been playing it for two days already and I love it. But something happened: it lagged in my home and it's seems I can't move. The screen moves, I can craft and destroy blocks but I can't move. I made a new world and it works just fine, I'm kind of sad that I'm losing everything from the first one, since I made a lot of progress and I had a lot of things. I will try to play again in the new world but if the problem happens again I will rate it lower

I FOUND THE GAME FINALLY. This game was my whole childhood. When I couldn't afford Minecraft, I would play this, and I remember spending hours building things. If for some reason you can't spare 10 bucks to get Minecraft, this is definitely one of the better rip-offs out there. If I could recommend one thing however, maybe implement a feature that would allow you to transfer worlds? I would be very curious as to what the world I spent hours making looks like.

Very good game, good graphics. D game is cool cuz u can go to other dimension its so cool like this is d best game ever. But am rating it a 4 star bcuz in other mine crafts u can fly but this one u can't fix that and also make a setting to on/off d zombies and creepy things so u won't be scared when playing. If ur reading this download d game cuz its cool download u won't regret it.

Excellent Game . But there are some problems- 1. The blocks are disappearing whenever i am visiting the snow fields 2. Today i have brought a empty milk bottle from the shop at day and went to get some milk from cow , but after going a distance from my house the game had automatically cutted ‚ùåüö™ when i again start the game it is night ,I was in my house and there is no bottle with me ! Please let me know why it is happeningüôèüôè

Old Minecraft gamer- Needs auto filling in the chests so you don't get left with 5 things that can go in one stack, the bow is pretty useless even if you get amethyst bow... It doesn't shoot far enough and takes too long/awkward to draw. Other than that it's pretty awesome, although a world map would be very very useful along with having the compass.

‚òÖ PCMagazine says the Babbel language app ‚Äúexceeds expectations‚Äù 

======

Babbel is the best language-learning app.

Our language learning experts build every course tailored to your native language. So whether you want to learn Spanish, learn Italian or learn French ‚Äî or even German, Portuguese, Russian, Polish, Turkish, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Dutch, Indonesian or English ‚Äî you‚Äôll learn quickly and effectively.

BITE-SIZE, INTERACTIVE LESSONS - Easily fit language learning into your busy schedule with lessons that take only 10-15 minutes to complete (some Spanish lessons are even shorter).

LANGUAGES FOR ANY SITUATION - Find language lessons for travel, work, everyday life and much, much more

LISTEN, SPEAK, READ, WRITE - Practice all the elements of language learning and start speaking real-life conversations

OVER 6,000 LANGUAGE COURSES - Learn Spanish and 13 other languages with in-depth content, including more than 60,000 language lessons

With Babbel, you‚Äôll be on your way to mastering the ultimate goal of language learning ‚Äî having real-life conversations with confidence. Whether you need a Spanish learning app or a French learning app, you‚Äôve always wanted to learn Italian, you‚Äôre looking to dive into German language learning or improve your English, Babbel is the choice of millions of people looking to enhance their language education.

comments: So over all it is a very good learning experience. The courses are planned wel and it seems that the developers put a large amount of work into this. But as a subscription app that is not that cheap. I has some very frustrating bugs. In the Dutch course you don't have the char ' that is very important for spelling and there is no way around it. And the speaking practice is really bad sometimes that I have gave up using it in the last 2 months. Without those few bugs I would give it 5/5

I had a weird issue to where it wouldn't let me log in saying "Try again later". I uninstalled the app and reinstalled it, it seems to have done the trick. I hope this isn't a recurring issue with the app apart from the voice recognition that others were talking about. It's kind of funny what it thinks you say. It thought I said "Skin store" instead of "Stimmt so". I'll use the other options of reviewing German until voice recognition is fixed. Others should do the same to save any frustration.

This is an awsome app! You are able to learn any language, and you are able to choose if you wanna talk or not, it also tells you if tou should start learning again, or when another level is unlocked! Again like I said the best app ever, I have learned both Spanish and French with this app!

FIXED!!! App doesn't sync lessons completed on the browser. The app itself is great and I've already learnt a lot more in a short time in comparison to other apps because Babbel mixes different topics so it's not boring. That was the thing that slowed my progress before. This app has realistic conversations so you get used to actual language, not just repeating isolated phrases like "Brot und Wasser" twenty times like a drill exercise.

Great app but the lessons are too long and sometimes have 2 halves that are seemingly unrelated. Today I learned about trying on clothes and numbers by the hundred. If these had been 2 seperate lessons in the same course, I wouldn't have minded. But it takes so long to do them at the same time and I can't save my progress. Please either split up the lessons or add an ability to save position in a lesson

title: Todoist: To-Do List, Tasks & Reminders
description:
üèÜ 2020 Editor's Choice by Google
ü•á "Todoist is the best to-do list app right now" - The Verge

Todoist is used by 25 million people to organize, plan and collaborate on projects, both big and small.

Use Todoist to:
‚Ä¢ Capture and organize tasks the moment they pop into your head.
‚Ä¢ Remember deadlines with reminders and due dates. 
‚Ä¢ Build lasting habits with recurring due dates like "every Monday".
‚Ä¢ Collaborate on projects by assigning tasks to others.
‚Ä¢ Prioritize your tasks with priority levels.
‚Ä¢ Track your progress with personalized productivity trends.
‚Ä¢ Integrate your tools like Gmail, Google Calendar, Slack, Amazon Alexa and more.

Available on any device, Todoist will quickly become your hub for getting work and life organized.

Why you‚Äôll love it on Android:
‚Ä¢ Stay organized from your phone, tablet and watch.
‚Ä¢ Drag the Plus Button anywhere to insert a new task.
‚Ä¢ Simply type details like "tomorrow at 4pm" and Todoist will recognize it all for you.
‚Ä¢ All the power from Android: lock screen widget, Quick Add tile, Assistant, and notifications.

Happy organizing!

‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢

Questions? Feedback? Visit get.todoist.help or reach out on Twitter @todoist.

*About Premium billing*:
If you choose to purchase Premium, payment will be charged to your Google Play account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. You can choose to be billed monthly or annually. You can turn off auto-renew in your Google Play settings any time after purchase.

recentChanges: üêõ You‚Äôll once again see a note at the bottom of your screen when you check something off in task view ‚Äî if there was a mistake, you can quickly undo it!
comments: It really lacks a calendar view or better integration with Google Calendar (e.g. sync more than one project, add colors to tasks in Google Calendar according to labels or projects, etc.). Otherwise it has been great, I'm really enjoying the app! Sub tasks should show their parent in "Next 7 Days" and "Today", this would be super powerful for splitting a task over several days, it would be a game changer for me!

The new widget does not allow me to open the app directly, like it could before. Updates should never remove features. Knocking my review down - rest of the app is still great. Edit: this feature has indeed been fixed, however I can't raise the score because what drove me here was another bug/update. It seems that my tasks/items aren't visible on the widget. I tried a restart and everything. You can still interact with them, but the widget is just a white blank canvas where tasks should be.

Been using for years, and it worked great until 1 day ago. Lists using widgets on Android all have white text on white background now... So obviously unusable. Must have been in an update as multiple Android users are experiencing the same in the last couple of days.

I bet it would work for someone who mainly needs a list, but personally I need alarms and reminders to keep me on track. I was looking for one when I found todoist that was advertised as having a reminder setting. I was disappointed to find out that the reminder function was a paid function, so I uninstalled the app. I bet it would work for someone else, but not for me

Just downloaded the latest update, to find everything on the widget completely clear. All my project lists gone ! Luckily it's all still within todoist but not on the widget. Still nothing after deleting and setting the widget back up. Looks like I'll have to use the icon again !

title: Final Fantasy XV: A New Empire
description:
Alexis Ren is waiting for you! Join the adventure! Be the hero of your own Final Fantasy XV adventure in the brand new mobile strategy game Final Fantasy XV: A New Empire! Build your own kingdom, discover powerful magic, and dominate the realm alongside all of your friends! 

Final Fantasy XV: A New Empire is a mobile adventure that lets you rewrite a favorite classic to fulfill your unique destiny. Journey through vast kingdoms, gather magical resources, and build the strongest Empire in Final Fantasy history! Fight fire with magic to defend friends and defeat foes alongside millions of players from around the world! Do you have the strength and strategy to control the Crystal and rule the Realm?

‚úî Experience your very own epic FFXV adventure on your mobile phone
‚úî Jump into the action with Noctis, Cindy, and all of your favorite FF15 characters
‚úî Fight alongside friends and against foes in legendary battles against millions of players from around the world!
‚úî Build up your large army and best strategy to win in real-time action-packed battles
‚úî Create the ultimate Guild or join up with already-powerful forces
‚úî Strategize with your guild to crush enemies and beasts in real-time battles
‚úî Compete for the Crystal against players from all over the world
‚úî Travel the Realms and collect rare resources to build an epic Empire
‚úî Become a legend by taking control of the Crystal and ruling the Realm

An epic world with no rules: only magic. Will your magic grow to stand the test of time or will your empire be defeated?

Embark on your own Final Fantasy XV mobile adventure alongside Alexis Ren. Your legend starts now in the new MMORPG: Final Fantasy 15: A New Empire.

Privacy Policy: https://www.finalfantasyxvapp.com/privacy-policy?lang=en
Terms of Service: https://www.finalfantasyxvapp.com/terms-of-use
Game Page: https://www.finalfantasyxvapp.com/

Dive into Final Fantasy XV: A New Empire! Join the adventure with your favorite Heroes to battle new Monsters, Enemies, and protect the Realm from imminent darkness! LOG IN NOW to see the LATEST UPDATES!

* Face off against other Guilds & Realms, or fight for the Crystal!

comments: Great game but guild chat is lacking and not linear. It should be obvious and on top of that, the game does not support landscape view, which is a bummer. I am going to have to uninstall because I am using Android on laptop without touch and playing on a phone is hard on the eyes. If you fixed these things, I would give 5 stars and continue to play.

New developers are listening at least. Now this is so far a temporary 5 stars, they have to continue to make the game playable. It's in a fairly good state for active players currently. If you find yourself with Google play cards laying around and nothing seems to interest you, this game is very social and has several communities to join. Will things burn, probably, but that's slowly becoming less of an account destroying experience. If the new developers screw it up, I'll re-review again.

The game is all about pay to play. If you try to play it for free, you'll get so far behind that it is ridiculous. The cost to level up of resources and scrolls is unbelievably expensive. The events don't even tailor to your level (that's how they get you to pay to stay caught up). This game is absolutely horrible. Oh, if you try to contact customer service, you'll get a copy and paste response. They don't care about their players. FYI, the packs go up to the $100's.

It's rated PEGI 7 , but requires purchases that cost more than the average persons weekly shopping. Getting kids to spend ¬£95 on a pack is criminal, (they claim it's free to play) that's also false advertising. You can spend ¬£95 on one hero, then a few days later a new hero will be available which is much better than the one you just bought, that makes your purchase useless. The releases are fast which encourages you to spend more, not much good to say . üëç

I've spent my fair share of money on this game. Developers have no control or care. They allow lvl 50-60 wipe out lower lvl players and allows them to do whatever. If they intended this game to be fun for all they have fail miserably. I've sent tickets in for them to limit 50-60 level players to attack no lower than level 35 so the rest of us can compete. This is a pay to play kind of game, if you don't pay dont play because there's no use.

title: Country Friends
description:
Get ready for a fresh farming adventure in the wacky world of Country Friends ‚Äì a friendly farm simulation where your animals dance and friends from all over the world come together to help each other in the super-social Community Farm!
Pack your bags, because the country‚Äôs the perfect place to cast off your Big City Blues and relax with the funniest, friendliest goats, sheep, pigs, chickens and cows you‚Äôll ever meet!

CREATE YOUR OWN SLICE OF HEAVEN!
‚Ä¢ Plant, grow, harvest, and trade organic corn and more with your friends ‚Äì the farm of your dreams is about to get made‚Ä¶ BY YOU! 
‚Ä¢ Fall in love with the hilarious, lively 3D animals. Your chicken will chill, your sheep will sing and your pig will party.
‚Ä¢ Customize your land to create the perfect farm paradise for you and your animals to enjoy! 
‚Ä¢ Grow the freshest products and fight back against the industrial corporation, SMOG Inc.! Show them that organic produce is the only way to grow!

SOW THE SEEDS OF FRIENDSHIP!
‚Ä¢ For the FIRST TIME EVER in a farming simulation, grow delicious fruits at the Community Farm from the awesome apple to the outrageous orange, craft exclusive products together with your friends, send them around the world with Bradley the Whale and share the rewards! 
‚Ä¢ Work with friends in a super social Community Farm where you form a clan to harvest and water each other‚Äôs delicious, organic crops. Help your friends and grow together!
‚Ä¢ Create your own social farming clan with your friends!
‚Ä¢ Compete with other social Communities in the weekly events and help your farm become the cream of the crop!

THE ANIMALS ARE HERE TO HELP!
‚Ä¢ Mischievous moles help you harvest faster!
‚Ä¢ Playful pigs help you at the market! 
‚Ä¢ Beautiful birds fly your orders all over the world!
‚Ä¢ Munch, your gregarious goat, is always there to offer you fun, helpful advice (when he‚Äôs not chowing down on one of your delicious apples‚Ä¶)! 
‚Ä¢ Each animal, from the chickens to the sheep, plays a specific role within your farm to make it the greatest and freshest it can be! 

Now go grow some fun!
_____________________________________________

Visit our official site at http://www.gameloft.com
Follow us on Twitter at http://glft.co/GameloftonTwitter or like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/Gameloft to get more info about all our upcoming titles.
Check out our videos and game trailers on http://www.youtube.com/Gameloft
Discover our blog at http://glft.co/Gameloft_Official_Blog for the inside scoop on everything Gameloft.
_____________________________________________

recentChanges: Various game performance improvements, optimizations and bug fixes.
comments: Used to really love this game! Animals are so cute! I cant log in to my original game since it freezes up. It made me start from beginning and now the only game it lets me log in to is the one where it started me back at the beginning to level 4. I was at level 12 or higher with Facebook login and that game is completely gone! My original account login is with a different email. So i decided to install with this account but still freezes up! Really disappointed! Uninstalling again!

I loved this game until I tried connecting to Facebook. This is the 2nd game from a different company I tried connecting to Facebook and have been unable to play ever since. I can't disconnect the app from Facebook now because the game tries to bring up the screen that says "continue with so and so" and then it goes away and then it comes back up and so on and doesn't give me enough time to hit the x to cancel it. I'd give it 5 stars if it worked properly.

So far so good. I like the game very much; so far no real money spent(I appreciate that). I do like it enough to spend a little bit of money on it. Some production times are a bit too long, but you, can purchase those things in the market. I really enjoy this game it's relaxing. Good job Gameloft
I think its a good game but when I try the login feature for Facebook, it shows the logging into facebook screen and keeps and disappearing. That is the only issue

Please add the ability to login to Google play for people how don't have Facebook and add the ability to add friends from your Android phone contact list please thank you so much for your work you are doing and fix your game from freezing up please thank you and remove the I. game ads that pop up on my screen when I am trying to feed my animals and it gets annoying please thank you

comments: Wish there was a website instead of just an app, and a widget for Android would be nice too since widgets have been around forever üò≠ CS doesnt answer questions properly and seems to pick pre made answers at random instead of reading your questions, and you can't reply to them once they answered, you have to create new ticket..

I bought the BTS membership February 1, 2020 and still haven't gotten my membership box to this day. I understand with covid there is a delay but I work for the postal service and its not that big of a delay anymore from overseas. No updated emails about delays, no communication. Hard to purchase certain shows too. Another 2 1/2 months later still nothing.

i purchased army membership in april 2020 but still not get my army membership kit..also everything i try to purchase (includes merch),there is a message showing"cannot be shipped ro India"..i mean its so frustrating as now international flights also started but they are always showing this that they can't ship in india anything

Overall a good app. It would be nice if completed orders listed an estimated shipping date!! Most items are presale with shipping dates months away & it's hard to keep track when you have multiple orders! I completely understand that shipment dates are subject to change but when there are multiple rounds of presales you can't even check the product listing for the right shipping information.

title: DIRECTV
description:
Download the DIRECTV app, a companion to your DIRECTV service, and enjoy a world of entertainment. Watch Live TV and recorded shows, catch up on the latest movies and shows with On Demand, and schedule recordings on your DVR‚Äîno additional equipment needed, at no extra cost. Plus now stream DIRECTV data-free on AT&T.

**WATCH**
‚Ä¢ Watch thousands of your favorite movies and shows, Live or On Demand
‚Ä¢ New! Data Free TV lets you stream DIRECTV on your devices‚Äîwithout using your data 
(Requires eligible DIRECTV & AT&T data services. Excl. & restr. apply. Content varies and must be streamed through the DIRECTV App. Use subject to wireless service terms including those related to data speed. Streaming may not work at reduced speeds.) 
‚Ä¢ New! Stream or download your home DVR recordings to your devices. 
‚Ä¢ Enjoy the latest releases from premium channels you subscribe to like HBO¬Æ, Cinemax¬Æ, STARZ¬Æ, ENCORE¬Æ, and SHOWTIME¬Æ 
‚Ä¢ Switch screens! Watch your favorite show on one device then tap a button to send it to the big screen. And vice versa‚Äîsend a show from your TV to your device!

**RECORD**
‚Ä¢ Record your favorite movies and shows from anywhere!
‚Ä¢ Content running long? Add extra time to your recording and don‚Äôt miss a second of your favorite content

**CONTROL**
‚Ä¢ Use your mobile device to pause, play, and rewind the program that‚Äôs playing on your TV
‚Ä¢ When you want to find a show, just speak up. Voice search can help you find exactly what you're looking for. You can even set it to display results on your TV
‚Ä¢ Set parental controls and enjoy peace of mind over what your kids are watching

**REQUIREMENTS**
‚Ä¢ Android phone running OS 5.0 or later
‚Ä¢ DIRECTV customers must have a Residential Home account registered on DIRECTV's website to access the DIRECTV app for tablets
‚Ä¢ Watching On Demand or select Live TV Streaming channels outside the home requires an active Wi-Fi or 3G/4G Internet connection. For best performance, connect to a strong Wi-Fi signal.
‚Ä¢ Available content is based on your current programming package and premium service. Not all content is available to stream at this time
‚Ä¢ Live TV Streaming in-home only channels and remote control requires a Wi-Fi connection to your home network and a DIRECTV Plus¬Æ HD DVR (models R22, and HR20 or higher) connected to a broadband Internet connection. Remote control also works with HD receivers (models H21, H23 or higher) connected to a broadband Internet connection
‚Ä¢ DVR streaming and downloading requires Internet-connected Genie HD DVR model HR44 or higher and compatible mobile device. To download, must be in-home on same Wi-Fi network connected to DVR
‚Ä¢ Data Free TV requires DIRECTV & AT&T Mobility postpaid data service or an eligible prepaid monthly plan. App download, advertisements and non-streaming app activity may incur data usage
‚Ä¢ Scheduling a recording requires a Wi-Fi, or mobile network connection and a DIRECTV Plus¬Æ DVR or HD DVR
‚Ä¢ Receivers do not require phone or Internet connection to schedule a recording
In rare instances, scheduled recording(s) may not be recognized. Only available on certain receivers.

For complete details on technical requirements, please visit: https://support.directv.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/3426

For more information on the DIRECTV App, please visit: http://directv.com/appfaq 

This DIRECTV App features Nielsen‚Äôs proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen‚Äôs TV Ratings. Please see the Nielsen Digital Measurement Privacy Policy at http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information about this Nielsen measurement feature.

Use of the DIRECTV App by DIRECTV customers is subject to the DIRECTV Apps End User License Agreement and DIRECTV App Privacy Policy, both of which can be found at http://www.directv.com/DTVAPP/content/support/agreements_policies.

developerAddress:
2230 E. Imperial Hwy
El Segundo, CA 90245
recentChanges: Bug fixes and enhancements
comments: For being one of the largest television providers, your app is hot garbage. Not easy to navigate or find what you're looking for. But the DVR functionality is the worst. The whole point of the app is to be able to watch what I pay for on the go, and be able to access my DVR. The app syncs to my box but as soon as I leave my wifi I can no longer access my DVR shows. Fix this immediately!

1. Difficulty logging on! 2. While watching a TV program. A commercial comes on. After the commercial the program puts me back to the beginning of the show. Then you have to toggle and try to find where you were. If you don't hit the right spot you go to another commercial and you have to wait again or go back to the beginning of the program. 3. The toggle to forward or reverse your position in a TV show is very sensitive and hard to use. I'm very surprised at DirecTV with such a sloppy program.

Absolutely the worst app ever. Every show I try to watch restarts from the beginning after the first set on endless commercials. When I try to return to where I left off, the app either freezes, starts fast forwarding, plays picture with no sound, or sound with no picture. Rediculous! And I'm only giving 1 star because you're forcing me to before letting me post.

I suppose it works to watch stuff On Demand if you missed something yesterday, same thing you can do on a computer. But, I don't comprehend how this app, for years, still has some sort of problem when watching your own DVR. It fails all the time. Today, I download an episode of a show. It finishes within 10 minutes. I open up my Downloads, it's not there. I download it again, the 10 minutes pass, again, and then it's finally marked as downloaded and ready. And yet. I click play, and it crashes.

Does a lot of buffering even when connected to wifi. Drives me nuts that it doesn't keep track of where I am in previously watched shows. Then if I try to skip forward to find where I left off, I have to sit through 3 mins of commercials. No matter if I skip forward 20 mins or 2 mins. Again, this could be avoided if the app did a better job of tracking previously watched shows.

title: Hulu: Stream TV shows & watch the latest movies
description:
Watch movies, new shows, Hulu Originals, sports, live news, and more with Hulu.

Stream TV shows your way. From anime to sports, watch shows, get live news and much more on your favorite devices. Stream live TV, browse episodes and watch shows with a plan that works for you‚ÄîHulu, Hulu (No Ads), or Hulu + Live TV*. Watch movies, stream TV shows, and enjoy your own personalized streaming library.

*Regional restrictions, blackouts, and additional terms apply.

Plus, Hulu is now the new home of FX Networks, with 40+ acclaimed shows as well as new FX originals.

Watch shows, stream movies, browse episodes, and more. Here‚Äôs what you have access to on all Hulu plans:

‚Ä¢ A personalized TV experience and streaming library‚Äîget recommendations when you watch TV shows or movies
‚Ä¢ Personalized profiles‚Äîcreate up to 6 profiles so everyone can keep track when they browse episodes, shows, and movies
‚Ä¢ My Stuff‚Äîadd shows and movies for quick access to your favorites
‚Ä¢ Watch movies or stream TV shows at home or on the go
‚Ä¢ Premium networks‚Äîdiscover and watch shows from HBO Max‚Ñ¢, SHOWTIME¬Æ, CINEMAX¬Æ, and STARZ¬Æ for an additional monthly fee
‚Ä¢ No hidden fees when you want to watch shows‚ÄîThere are no equipment rentals fees, or installation appointments
‚Ä¢ Watch acclaimed FX Originals on Hulu, the new home of FX Networks

Hulu

Our ad-supported plan lets you browse episodes, shows, and more in the largest streaming TV library. Stream over 80,000+ episodes of the shows you love, from award-winning Originals like The Handmaid‚Äôs Tale and The Act to other popular shows like This is Us and The Good Doctor. 

Hulu (No Ads)

Discover the plan that gives you everything you get with the Hulu plan in an ad-free* experience. Plus, you can download from thousands of titles to watch offline.**

*There are a few shows in our streaming library that are not included in Hulu (No Ads) due to streaming rights. Episodes of those shows will stream uninterrupted ‚Äî there will just be a quick ad before and after each video. **Selected content available for download.

Hulu + Live TV

Watch on-demand and live TV from 60+ channels, including live news, sports, and more. Plus, get unlimited access to the entire Hulu streaming library through our ad-supported plan. No cable required.

Whether you want to discover shows, watch live news, get sports updates or binge-watch your favorite anime show, with Hulu you choose the plan that works for you.

Download the Hulu app now to stream movies, anime shows and much more! 

Terms of Use: http://www.hulu.com/terms
Privacy Policy: http://www.hulu.com/privacy
Your California Privacy Rights: https://www.hulu.com/ca-privacy-rights
Do Not Sell My Personal Information: https://www.hulu.com/do-not-sell-my-info

This app features third party software which allows you to contribute to measurement statistics (e.g., Nielsen‚Äôs TV Ratings). To learn more about digital measurement products and your choices in regard to them, including opting out, please visit our privacy policy. Please see http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information about Nielsen measurement.

We may work with mobile advertising companies to help deliver online and in-app advertisements tailored to your interests based on your activities on our website and apps and on other, unaffiliated websites and apps. To learn more, visit www.aboutads.info. To opt-out of online interest-based advertising, visit www.aboutads.info/choices. To opt-out of cross-app advertising, download the App Choices app at www.aboutads.info/appchoices. Hulu is committed to complying with the DAA‚Äôs Self-Regulatory Principles for Online Behavioral Advertising and the DAA‚Äôs Application of Self-Regulatory Principles for the Mobile Environment.

recentChanges: Spooky season is in full swing, but it shouldn‚Äôt get in the way of your streaming. In this latest update, we‚Äôve gotten rid of some of those creepy crawly bugs to make sure you can continue watching your Huluween favorites. Update your Hulu app today and get back to streaming!.
comments: This app is great. Lots of options. However, it irritates the friggin piss outta me that even though the app has been around for years and they're mostly known for their TV shows, they still don't have a Skip Intro option! If I'm binge watching a show, I don't wanna have to watch the intro every single freakin time! Disney+ has it and they haven't even been out for a year yet! Like why hasn't that been added yet!?

Commercials commercialscommercials Maybe it is deliberate to drive you to buy the ad-free option. It just makes me despise Hulu. It makes even Netflix seem like a good app. If you want to rewind, it triggers commercials. Fast-forward? Commercials. Not infrequently, you get to see the same set of commercials. Sometimes, you get to watch them three times in a row. Over and over and over. Yay. (It's maddening.) And avoidable. And inept programming.

I've never had an issue with this program in all the years I've used it, however, NOW I DO and I need to uninstall and reinstall, but there is NO way that I found to do that, yet.... What a serious pain and it shouldn't be. This is my home computer, and this shouldn't be a national secret how to do this! I'm soooo damn annoyed. The program loads just fine, but soon as I click a play arrow it freezes everything. I looked at the tools/inspect page, it clear shows the play path has been altered somehow. I don't do computer coding or maybe I could fix this myself, but it should be a simple fix to uninstall and reinstall like you would on your phone. I'm 65 years old, I am running Windows 7 because I like it. This really shouldn't be happening.

Very convenient for listening to my news programs on ABC while out of town or otherwise away from home. But "watching" my shows on the Hulu app mean I can't multi-task on my phone. It would be nice to adjust settings so it continued to play while my phone is locked or if I go to another app. Like I do with audiobooks. And when I put my unlocked phone in my pocket with the app running, it always seems to bounce to another show on my "next up" list before the show I am interested ends.

I love Hulu I will always have it on my phone! I usually never have a problem and if i do, the app some how fixes its self. If i disconnect i just reload and its fixed. I have never had a issue that prevented me from watching my favorite adult cartoons. The price is good the content is awesome! I can always find something to watch for what ever situation. Hulu is doing everything right in my book!

title: Evernote - Notes Organizer & Daily Planner
description:
Capture ideas when inspiration strikes. Find information fast. Share notes with anyone. From meetings and projects to web pages and to-do lists‚Äîwith Evernote, everything‚Äôs in one place.
 
Evernote syncs to all your devices, so you can tackle action items on the go. Express yourself clearly with easy-to-use formatting options, and find what you need quickly with filtered searches and results as you type. 

Note: The new version of Evernote is available for Android version 9 and newer. Users of Android version 8 and older will receive the Evernote Legacy app. The new Evernote for Android will be made available for Android versions 6, 7, and 8 in a future update.
 
---

"Use Evernote as the place you put everything ‚Ä¶ Don‚Äôt ask yourself which device it‚Äôs on‚Äîit‚Äôs in Evernote" ‚Äì The New York Times
 
‚ÄúWhen it comes to taking all manner of notes and getting work done, Evernote is an indispensable tool.‚Äù ‚Äì PC Mag
 
---

CAPTURE IDEAS
‚Ä¢ Write, collect, and capture ideas as searchable notes, notebooks, memos, checklists, and to-do lists.
‚Ä¢ Keep journals capturing the events and milestones of your daily life.
‚Ä¢ Clip interesting articles and web pages to read or use later. 
‚Ä¢ Take notes and create notepads in a variety of formats: text, sketches, photos, audio, web clippings, and more.
‚Ä¢ Use the camera to effortlessly scan, digitize, and organize your paper documents, business cards, whiteboards, handwritten notes, and drawings.
‚Ä¢ Attach docs, PDFs, photos, and audio.
 
GET ORGANIZED
‚Ä¢ Create separate notebooks to organize your memos, receipts, bills, and invoices.
‚Ä¢ Find anything fast‚ÄîEvernote's powerful search can even find text in images and handwritten notes.
‚Ä¢ Set reminders to keep on top of activities and write to-do lists. 

ACCESS ANYWHERE
‚Ä¢ Sync your notes and notebooks automatically across any Chromebook, phone, or tablet.
‚Ä¢ Start your work on one device and continue on another without missing a beat.

EVERNOTE IN EVERYDAY LIFE
‚Ä¢ Make personal to-do lists to keep your thoughts organized. 
‚Ä¢ Go paperless by scanning receipts and important documents.

EVERNOTE IN BUSINESS
‚Ä¢ Keep everyone up to date by capturing meeting notes and sharing notebooks with your team.
‚Ä¢ Use it as your ultimate planner, organizer, and notepad at work.
 
EVERNOTE IN EDUCATION
‚Ä¢ Keep up with lecture notes so you don‚Äôt miss important details.
‚Ä¢ Use it as a planner and organizer to keep track of lecture notes, exams, and assignments.
 
---

Also available from Evernote:
 
EVERNOTE PREMIUM
‚Ä¢ 10 GB of new uploads each month
‚Ä¢ Unlimited number of devices
‚Ä¢ Access your notes and notebooks offline
 
Price may vary by location. Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your Google Play account. Where applicable, your subscription will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Subscriptions may not be cancelled for refund except as provided in Evernote's Commercial Terms. Manage your subscriptions in Account Settings after purchase.

---

Privacy Policy: https://evernote.com/legal/privacy.php
Terms of Service: https://evernote.com/legal/tos.php
Commercial terms: https://evernote.com/legal/commercial-terms

305 Walnut Street
Redwood City, CA 94063
recentChanges:
Fixed:
* We came; we saw; we conquered bugs.
comments: I have started to use the application in 2009. Then I liked it. In addition to this, I've decided to purchase for premium, created another account and shared my notebooks with my premium account. Then I couldn't see my shared notebooks on the web and mobile. I've been struggling with technical support for 2 weeks. They have promised for full technical support, I'm writing but they haven't returned for 5 days. Unfortunately, I'm switching back to Microsoft Onenote.

After the major update to the app, the note texts are not readable anymore. Looks like Evernote messed up the text color setting in Android. My noted works fine in iPad and on PC. I always leave the text color as default and never changed it. However, in Android, text is in dark grey in Dark Mode, and light grey in Light mode. So the text color is always very close to the background color no matter which mode I choose. And this MAJOR issue has been there for at least a week!

Ruined after the recent upgrade roll out: 1) Notes take ages to load up. 2) All the fonts which used to be available have now disappeared and all my notes are suddently in Sans Serif. At least it wasn't Comic Sans. 3) None of the desktop keyboard shortcuts I used to use which made this app efficient to use have disappeared. 4) It needs to be online to work - unnecessary and annoying Probably other things have gone wrong - it's only been a few hours since the upgrade. It wasn't broken - why try to fix it?? I've been a Premium subscriber for years - now considering cancelling & switching.

I used to love this app and I use it a lot for work and personal info organisation. The latest update is an utter disaster for me. It requires a constant internet connection, which I - and millions of other people on this planet - don't have. I used to be able to work on notes whether I was online or offline - a helpful little red exclamation symbol would appear on the sync item when the app couldn't sync because the internet was down, so I would be careful not to change to working on the same note on a different device. Now the app insists on me reloading the note when the internet is down and wipes out my latest edits. This is useless! I don't want to have to remove the sync setting as I do want the app to sync regularly when I'm online. If this continues to be a problem I will, finally, have to relinquish my subscription and migrate to a different tool. (NB the Windows 10 app update doesn't even appear to have the option to change the sync setting at all - in fact the settings menu seems to have disappeared completely!!!)

After the recent update, I've lost all my notes from the past 1 week simply because they had not automatically synced. The update was automatic btw. Pathetic experience, and quite stressful too. I was thinking of upgrading to premium but will definitely not do it now, after realizing my content can be deleted anytime without a fair warning.

title: ooVoo Video Calls, Messaging & Stories
description:
ooVoo Free High-Quality Video Calling, Messaging and Collaborative Stories: Keeping you connected with the people who matter most! Video chat live with anyone worldwide or send messages via video, photo or text! 
All NEW ooVoo CHAINS ‚Äî a bold new form of social chat and communication in a world of plain messaging apps
Chains are collections of short videos, images and text ‚Äî Record, edit, collaborate, and share the things you love with your friends anywhere in the world.
Use the new Chains feature to:
‚òÖ Create great content for the global ooVoo community ‚Äì Link your videos together to create great stories with your friends and anyone in the world
‚òÖ View top Trending chains and great chains your friends in your Network have uploaded
‚òÖ Easy to Upload ‚Äî Already have awesome content to upload? Easily upload pictures or videos straight from your camera roll, or add text to any chain you‚Äôd like to contribute to.
‚òÖ Discover amazing and interesting content, connect with your friends, and collaborate with members of the ooVoo community
Free Video Chat & Free Messaging
Use ooVoo for a 1-on-1 or group video call with up to 8 people at a time. Our robust, in-app messaging services allow you to send video messages, pictures, text and more!
Cutting Edge Technology! 
ooVoo's modern technology is superior to standard messaging apps:
Easily send messages or call friends and groups with the touch of a button.
Most free messaging apps work only on specific networks while ooVoo provides a crisp and clear video chat over a variety of different communication networks (WiFi, LTE, 4G, 3G)
The app comes with cross-platform, cross-device support ‚Äî Talk to all your friends from a phone, tablet, or computer. 
Share with friends. Share with family. Share with us! For any feedback, questions, concerns, or feature requests, shoot us an email at support@oovoo.com. 
Follow us on the social networks: 
Facebook - facebook.com/ooVoo 
Instagram - instagram.com/ooVoo

comments: Cant even get into the app!!! It just keeps saying error validating email or network error if you try to sign in or make an account!! Please fix!!!!!!!!!

This app has thus far been terrible both times I've tried to use it. When trying to register a new account it says "Network Error: Check your network connection and try again." There is nothing wrong with my network connection. I've tried from my cell connection, home WiFi and Starbucks WiFi and receive the same message with each. Going to the developer's website is not helpful either (and it is very unprofessional looking).

This app is supposed to be useful to make video calls for group chats, but it won't let me log back in, even if I put in the correct username and password! Also, when I try to sign in by using my Google account, and reset my password, it says to check my network connection and try again, even though it's really strong. It's not the network connection, it's the app not paying attention to it! You need to fix this immediately, or I will not install it again.
Very upsetting. I use to use ooVoo back in 2012. It was a good app back then. Now you cant even log in or make an account.
it will not let me register I have never used this before and it keeps telling me network error network error over and over and over again when there's nothing wrong with my network.

title: Mobile Security: VPN Proxy & Anti Theft Safe WiFi
description:
McAfee Mobile Security is the ultimate mobile security tool. Get secure, safe device and privacy protection from McAfee.

McAfee Mobile Security gives you everything you need to stay protected. Use McAfee‚Äôs Smart Security, Privacy Protection, antivirus tools & spyware protection to keep your private data away from prying eyes.

Personal safety from the Mobile Security app is made by a powerful security engine provided by McAfee Global Threat Intelligence. Spyware detector, WiFi Scanner, virus removal and mobile security features defend your device against phishing, risky apps and WiFi threats.

Enhance your phone‚Äôs performance through device optimization with a storage cleaner, memory booster, battery booster, and data usage tracking. Use Find My Phone to locate your device should you ever lose it.

Download the Mobile Security App to protect your phone with private WiFi access and personal safety features. McAfee Mobile Security protects you with the latest in antivirus, spyware removal, and WiFi security.

**McAfee LiveSafe and McAfee Total Protection includes McAfee Mobile Security Standard in their subscriptions**

Mobile Security Free Includes:

SECURE MOBILE DEVICES

‚ñ™ Mobile security with remote management from the web portal

ANTI THEFT APP

‚ñ™ Anti Theft Uninstall Protection: Keep a thief from uninstalling the Mobile Security app

FREE ANTIVIRUS APP SCANNER
‚ñ™ Antivirus Widget:* Stay up to date on your antivirus security status and fix issues with a tap
‚ñ™ Malware scan, virus cleaner and removal: Scans for malicious code from files, SD card, apps and downloads.

SAFE WIFI ACCESS + WIFI SCANNER
‚ñ™ Secure WiFi ‚Äì Maintain a safe connection online
‚ñ™ WiFi Protection ‚Äì Keep your personal data, online activities, IP addresses and physical locations private
‚ñ™ Free Wi-Fi scanner analyzes networks for security.

PHONE PERFORMANCE OPTIMIZATION

‚ñ™ Memory Booster: Free up memory (RAM) of background apps

‚ñ™ Phone Data Tracker: Set data limits and monitor usage

BACKUP CONTACTS

Mobile Security Standard includes all of the above, with:

SAFE WEB

DEVICE SECURITY
‚ñ™ Secure Lock: securely lock apps with sensitive content
‚ñ™ Guest Mode*: Control which apps your guest can see on your device
‚ñ™ Media Backup: Save and restore your media files

Mobile Security Plus includes everything with:

Unlimited Wi-Fi Guard VPN***
‚ñ™ Unlimited Wi-Fi Guard VPN protection to defend against unsecured public Wi-Fi hotspots.
‚ñ™ IP Proxy and no geo-restrictions for secure browsing.
‚ñ™ Maintain web security and access geographically restricted content.
‚ñ™ A secure Wi-Fi hotspot to browse safely on unsecured public Wi-Fi.
‚ñ™ PLUS package comes with all standard and free features.

AD TRACKER BLOCKING***
‚ñ™ Spam blocker stops ad trackers and targeted ads


*Android 5.1.1/6.0 users must grant accessibility to enable Widget, App Lock, & Guest Mode
**Thief-Cam and SIM-card lock features are not available on Android 10 (Q) devices
***Wi-Fi Guard VPN and Ad Tracker Blocking is not available in McAfee LiveSafe and McAfee Total Protection.
MMS uses the Device Administrator permission & Accessibility services

comments: Edit: After contacting support my problem was solved. Thank you, McAfee I paid $30 as a special fee for samsung users only to find out that my subscription is a trial. Then I had to subsribe for $14/monthly to upgrade it to standard membership. Would have been cheaper and easier if I had just purchased total protection from the website. I'd give them ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê because the app itself generally works fine! But... there is a failure that irritates me a lot..! The MS App lock feature..! I understand that applications should be locked, if I want them to be locked. But come on... it is a bit too pesky when you have to unlock them every single time, over and over, even if they were minimised. Please, add a feature/possibility to make some apps stay unlocked in session. Thank you.

I've tried the rest so I can say with experience that this is the BEST mobile security app on Google Play Store! Unlike the other apps their malicious website detection is superb. VPN feature needs improved security & IP masking because the Plus hefty fee increase doesn't justify it.

Can't access mcafee account after updating app and had no help from developer, except got redirected back to the app after which my code was regiven, only to be told by the app it wasn't valid and I payed for a year to be able to use the full app service, no other option to renew for another year was given either, what is the developer doing, give me the run around, so I give 1 star until problem is resolved. Thanks.

This app is amazing. I brought a new laptop and I got a McAfee Multi Device Subscription for up to 3 devices. I loved this app because of its simple interface, real-time scanning and anti-theft. I can also backup my contacts and media in it. It improves my machine performance and provided me high security. Thank You McAfee

comments: I love a quick game when I have a minute but lots of the newer ads force you to wait for 30 seconds or longer and when you try to close using the X it opens up the google play website. Not just once, but over and over again. Especially bad with 'playable' ads. I sometimes don't even bother waiting to play the game and choose another app. I can't click on your link from here, but I'm using Android 6.0.1 on an Asus tablet, if that helps.

Love love love this particular Spider Solitaire! I got to the point where I had to delete the app because I was playing it too much! The ads are fun, relative and short. Not very invasive. Gives you the option to delete ads and start the game or keep watching and play when done. Fun little goals to achieve within the app, as well. This is THE BEST. I'm sad I have to stay all over cuz I was like almost a year's worth of medals and trophies etc.. Haha. Thanks

Great but you've started to have ads that play sound even though my phone is on silent with media sounds off. This really should not be allowed. I can't play a game that does this as it annoys people around me. I should not have to use earbuds to avoid that. It's my phone and I choose, silence. If this continues then I delete this game.

When I first downloaded this game , over a year ago, I really liked it. I enjoyed playing the daily challenge and earning a jeweled crown. My crowns started disappearing overnight. I've contacted support several times , but they couldn't tell me why this happens. They gave me some crowns back, but that's beside the point. It continues to happen. I've even uninstalled the app completely, turned off my phone, and reinstalled. That doesn't help. I think I'm done.

playing 3 Mobility Ware games until recently. Had to delete free cell first. now it's spider that's glitches. Stops working, juddering, shuts down my phone. Shame. Will switch to other card apps. UPDATE Oct 2020. Reinstalled working ok. Now plagued by Asian ads you can't read so dare not click on as no idea where it will take you. Then game freezes.

comments: At first I viewed the pop-ups as an annoyance, but after awhile I began to click on the Fotoscapes & Lookbooks, which have very interesting pictures and articles, and found them to be quite enjoyable. Then I started trying out all the different games available, & found I enjoy playing them. I esp appreciate having access to all those games without having to download separate apps for each one. I look forward to seeing MetroZone when I turn on my phone now.

Love the stories, articles, and pictures that are available on this app. However if you hit back at the wrong time or click on another story, you have lost that great item of whatever you were looking at for that moment. . So many good stories I was looking at but lost them that way. And still haven't found them. . Is there a way to avoid this???or solution to fix this..

I absolutely HATE that every time I open my phone, this is popped up. And it's almost impossible to close with the combination of lag and the home bar not being on my screen. It'll click on an article when I try to swipe up to hit the home button. Then it takes ten years to finally close out the unwanted redirection. I'm seriously considering switching services because of this god awful pop up annoyance.

Some of the information is not appropriate to watch and some give too much details. Which takes too long to get to end of story. If you lose page accidentally it hard to get back to where you left off. That make you not want to open story to fine out how, what, why,and when it happens. So I find myself just reading the captions and doing the few selections of pictures. Thank you always for your variety of subject matter.

I did NOT ask for this app to automatically pop up once I unlock my phone!! It is extremely agrivating because I cannot just "uninstall this app!?!?" It is also very agrivating & annoying to try getting off of the app to get to my homescreen. I wish I had the option to use the app or not... Why even make a shortcut to access the app when it just (automatically) pops up???

title: Icing On The Cake
description:
From the makers of I Peel Good, Icing on the Cake is your next obsession. Put your cake decorating skills to the test! Relax and channel your inner baker in Icing on the Cake. So many fun pastries for you to rotate, pipe, decorate and smooth out? Can you make the perfect cake? Fun and easy to pick up but don‚Äôt miss a spot... Will you be the first one to finish them all?


Color and decorate the perfect wedding cake or birthday cake. The tasty end results will leave you feeling hungry for more! Any time is cake time.

Game Features:


1. Zen Out

Ice ice baby! Take your time and relax and create the perfect cake


2. Smooth Smooth Icing

The most realistic food simulation game there is. The realistic cakes will leave you hungry.


3. Bake ALL the cakes

Endless amount of cakes for you to ice and smooth. Can you put the icing on all of the cakes?


4. Feel the smooth

Play, relax, and feel satisfied with every cake you ice. Feel the realistic sensation of icing and spreading.


Whether you like icing, like smoothing or just want to spin and color, Icing on the Cake will take you there. This is the best and most zen cake simulation game there is. Good luck putting Icing on the Cake down!

comments: Good relaxing game but a lot of the challenges are on repeat or have multiple of the same ones. Currently on advanced level and keep seeing the same puzzles over and over again with each one i do. Wish there were larger more complicated ones with more variety. Its a bit too easy and a little boring. Still helps when im having anxiety though.

This game is amazing!! But there is a flaw, the ads ughh! Its really really annoying . But this game would be a perfect game without the ads l tried to turn off my internet but the game cannot play without the internet.On the another side you should try it,or tell others about this game because it is awesome,amazing and wonderful!!!!!!!!!!!BYEüíëüíÉüòªüíëüíëüíë

It's cool and relaxing, but the ads can be annoying. Hopefully, it's just 1$. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is cuz of the sound effect when you win a level. Early levels are a breeze but it gets very annoying. A relaxing game should have a relaxing sfx not an overused indie win sfx. Either that or complete silence. I like the sound of the blocks touching each other but the win? So unfitting. And you can't turn off that specific sound. It's all or nothing. Smh

The ads aren't really too bad. Unless there's been changes since some of the old reviews, you're looking at 1 ad every 3-4 levels (which can be skipped after 5 seconds) The game itself is a nice, satisfying mental workout. A good time killer and a bit addicting. Controls are fluid and intuitive, the difficulties are categorized properly, the quest for optimal solves is great. This is a hidden gem.

Good puzzle game . I play when I have a bit of mild anxiety and it helps me concentrate. There isn't many ads at all so I don't get annoyed with that . Overall it's a 10/10 peaceful game . For free I have no complaints at all . Thanks.

title: Amazon Shopping - Search, Find, Ship, and Save
description:
Product Features

* Customers are able to shop millions of products on any of Amazon's sites around the world from a single app
*Use Alexa to help you shop‚Äîjust use your voice to search for products on Amazon, track your orders, and reorder your favorite items. Tap the microphone icon and say ‚Äúwhere‚Äôs my stuff?‚Äù to access open orders. Reorder products by saying ‚Äúreorder paper towels‚Äù or ‚Äúbuy more batteries‚Äù.
* Take advantage of 1-Click ordering, customer support, Wish Lists, create or find a baby or wedding registry, order tracking, and more
* Scan product barcodes and images to compare prices and check availability using Scan It
* Check out Gold Box Deals - including the Deal of the Day and Lightning Deals, and get automatically notified when new deals become available
* Send and share links to products via email, SMS, Facebook, Twitter, and more
* Sign-up for automatic shipment notifications to know when your order ships and arrives
* Buy with confidence, knowing that all transactions are securely processed


Product Description

The Amazon Shopping app lets you shop millions of products and manage your Amazon orders from anywhere. Browse, shop by department, compare prices, read reviews, share products with friends, and check the status of your orders.
Compare prices and availability by typing in your search, scanning a barcode or an image with your camera, or using your voice. Never miss a deal with easy access to Lightning Deals and the Deal of the Day. You can also sign-up for shipment notifications to know when your order ships and arrives. You have full access to your Shopping Cart, Wish Lists, payment and Prime shipping options, Subscribe & Save order history, and 1-Click settings, just like on the full Amazon.com site. All Amazon Shopping app purchases are routed through Amazon's secure servers to encrypt and safeguard your personal information.


Important Note Regarding Permissions
Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app.
* Camera: Allows the Amazon app to access your camera on the device. You can use your camera to find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, to add gift cards and credit cards, or to add pictures in the product reviews.
* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant.
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast.
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone‚Äôs keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permissions is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

OS Requirements: Requires Android OS 5.0 or higher and a rear-facing camera. The Amazon App for Tablets is available on Google Play. Search for "Amazon Tablet" to install the app and begin shopping.
descriptionHTML:
Product Features

* Customers are able to shop millions of products on any of Amazon's sites around the world from a single app
*Use Alexa to help you shop‚Äîjust use your voice to search for products on Amazon, track your orders, and reorder your favorite items. Tap the microphone icon and say ‚Äúwhere‚Äôs my stuff?‚Äù to access open orders. Reorder products by saying ‚Äúreorder paper towels‚Äù or ‚Äúbuy more batteries‚Äù.
* Take advantage of 1-Click ordering, customer support, Wish Lists, create or find a baby or wedding registry, order tracking, and more
* Scan product barcodes and images to compare prices and check availability using Scan It
* Check out Gold Box Deals - including the Deal of the Day and Lightning Deals, and get automatically notified when new deals become available
* Send and share links to products via email, SMS, Facebook, Twitter, and more
* Sign-up for automatic shipment notifications to know when your order ships and arrives
* Buy with confidence, knowing that all transactions are securely processed


Product Description

The Amazon Shopping app lets you shop millions of products and manage your Amazon orders from anywhere. Browse, shop by department, compare prices, read reviews, share products with friends, and check the status of your orders.
Compare prices and availability by typing in your search, scanning a barcode or an image with your camera, or using your voice. Never miss a deal with easy access to Lightning Deals and the Deal of the Day. You can also sign-up for shipment notifications to know when your order ships and arrives. You have full access to your Shopping Cart, Wish Lists, payment and Prime shipping options, Subscribe & Save order history, and 1-Click settings, just like on the full Amazon.com site. All Amazon Shopping app purchases are routed through Amazon's secure servers to encrypt and safeguard your personal information.


Important Note Regarding Permissions
Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app.
* Camera: Allows the Amazon app to access your camera on the device. You can use your camera to find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, to add gift cards and credit cards, or to add pictures in the product reviews.
* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant.
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast.
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone‚Äôs keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permissions is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

OS Requirements: Requires Android OS 5.0 or higher and a rear-facing camera. The Amazon App for Tablets is available on Google Play. Search for "Amazon Tablet" to install the app and begin shopping.
summary: Browse, search & buy millions of products right from your Android device.
developerAddress:
AMZN Mobile LLC
410 Terry Ave N
Seattle, WA 98109
recentChanges: AmazonSmile customers can now generate donations for their favorite charity. Just open Settings from the menu and tap AmazonSmile.
comments: Two aspects worth a mention; 1. You can get wildly different search results from the app and the Amazon website on a PC so if you're searching for an unusual or rare item you may miss out on options and choices in your purchase if you don't conduct a search on both platforms, 2. Searching by title for a movie on DVD very often doesn't offer 'DVD' as a category in the 'category' filters; it always offers 'Prime Video' however which is an unacceptable hard sell.

Hi all! I am updating my review and hoping to report a new suggestion for the Amazon app. I like the new set up of filters on the top bar when shopping because I use certain filters on everything I search to find the best quality items from trusted sellers. However, the "category" filter option is too far over. It should be one of the first shown in the row. In order to filter for only items shipped and sold by Amazon, I must first select the Category. Please move the Category filter over. Thx!‚ò∫

You're app and pc site will not allow me to see pages. I keep getting captchas and errors constantly. I can't shop on the app because of my vision, but because I get the same on the pc, I'm always having to delete and download it again. I can't shop the way I want if I can't use the site anywhere... I'm shopping more elsewhere because no one will help me. The rating system is also so deceiving. I used to depend on reviews, now it's a joke! Everything has gotten rediculous. Please fix it.

This is the worst to search for anything or buy anything on! Doesn't allow you to choose the category you want and it doesn't even have a grid system so you can look at more items so it takes forever!! I only have this for updates on my shipping. This actually used to be a really good app about two years ago, but the more they update the worse they get!!

This app is very easy to navigate & has never failed me. Customer service is excellent at Amazon... Only Exception was during the lockdown when you could not get to a real person through customer service & had to use email. The 1 thing that drives me bonkers is in the Subscribe & save section if a product is not being delivered especially if you have had it on a monthly basis for over a year , there is no way to communicate with anyone in subscribe & save to address your issues.

title: Dailymotion - the home for videos that matter
description:
Are you a video lover searching for the next amazing story? Watch videos wherever life takes you, even when you're not connected to the internet.
‚Ä¢Explore the latest and greatest news, highest quality music, sports and more with our redesigned intuitive dailymotion app for Android.
‚Ä¢Immerse yourself in a world of videos delivered straight from the best publishers or tune into Daily Pulse, our daily selection of trending stories that the world will be talking about tomorrow.
‚Ä¢With dailymotion you can:
‚Ä¢Follow video updates from your favorite people, topics and channels
‚Ä¢Discover Daily Pulse, crafted for people who care about valuable news
‚Ä¢Save videos for later when you‚Äôre short on time
‚Ä¢Build and update your own video library
‚Ä¢Save data by taking your library anywhere for free with our offline mode
‚Ä¢Craft your own video playlists for a personalized video experience

developerAddress:
140 boulevard Malesherbes
75017 Paris, France
comments: I find that sometimes there are technical problems such as the the screen being pixelated(like a television screen type of pixalation) or the app itself not working/crashing without reason (I already checked my internet provider and it seems like it wasn't the source of the problem). I hope such issues would be resolved in the future. The design of the app is very neat and clean. Also, It's great that you've put your policies in the display.

Better than YouTube? Yes. Dailymotion has alot of content, movies to watch, a very clean interface and more up to date sleek channel design look, easy to browse, search filters for searching for videos. There are things which i would like to see for Desktop and Mobile. Dailymotion needs a night mode, the explore page needs a gaming and tech section, search filters needs to have more filters, bring back the thumb's up feature, the browse more section has too much sex and nudity kissing nonsense , that has nothing to do with what you're watching. Great site, but needs more features, but i do recommend Dailymotion over YouTube.

Giving this a 5 stat just because google reeeeeally wants me to delete the app. Whenever I get a notification about deleting apps to make room daily motion is always near the top of the list, despite the fact there are apps I haven't used in almost a year near the bottom. It seems if it's not owned by a big tech corporation Google thinks it's a waste of space on my phone. Couldn't possibly be that google doesn't like a YouTube competator being on my phone.

This actually regards the Smart TV app. It's horrible, logging me out often & we all know how tedious TV "keyboards" are for text entry. I have externally created playlists that do nothing. I can move to each playlist but clicking on it doesn't open it so all playlists are unplayable. Often, recommended videos start playing their audio stream in the background & can't be stopped. Other videos can't be played because unwanted, unstoppable content is already playing. Better 2 cast from Android app

Some, if not most of the videos require following a link to sign up with details. Its hard to find series that you can just watch direct. Plus not all seasons and episodes are available. But as im persistent I take my time to click many videos before I find a link free episode, then enjoy that, but it can be time consuming. Glad it's free tho!

title: Audible: audiobooks, podcasts & audio stories
description:
Find a listen for every moment.  Choose binge-worthy audiobooks, exclusive podcasts, bite-sized audio content and genre-bending Audible Originals. Listen to captivating storytelling, and make Audible a part of your daily listening routine.

Sign in securely with your Amazon account for your Audible Premium Plus or Audible Plus membership - your first 30 days are on us.

UNPLUG BY TUNING IN. 
Enjoy storytelling that transports you. Feel good with comedy podcasts, unwind with our meditation titles or tap into your detective skills with a new mystery or true crime podcast. You can download, stream and listen to audio books offline too.

Hear captivating audio books, listen to podcasts and relax with mindful meditation.  Make your Audible Library the listening routine you can‚Äôt live without.

LISTEN TO AUDIO STORIES ANYTIME. 
Our Library of audio entertainment is always open. So come on in and listen to bite-sized audio content such as true crime podcasts, daily news updates, and sci fi audiobooks as you cook, walk the dog, run, work or fold laundry. 
Your listening routine starts here.

Download and listen to books and podcasts offline. Dive into engrossing true crime thrillers, mysteries, fantasy & sci-fi stories, kids stories, meditation titles, memoirs, documentaries, and genre-bending Audible Originals.

With monthly credits, you can find the audio content you want, including bestsellers and new releases. Discover the latest and greatest in audio entertainment with your Audible Premium Plus membership.

Preview Audible Plus. New to Audible, the catalog offers thousands of audiobooks, podcasts and audio titles just for you. 

AUDIBLE PREMIUM PLUS
- Build your own Library and listen to the largest selection of audio titles from the entire Premium selection - titles purchased with credits are yours to keep, even if you cancel.
- Mysteries & thrillers, true crime, sci-fi stories, comedy podcasts, meditation and more - you get 1 monthly credit to pick any title that you want to keep.
- 30% off any additional titles from the catalog, plus access to exclusive deals and discounts. 
- If you don‚Äôt love a title purchased with a credit, you can swap it.
- And, access the entire Audible Plus catalog - thousands of binge-worthy audiobooks, exclusive podcasts and audio entertainment, with fresh audio content added every single week.
- Plus, you can listen offline to any title. You can download, stream or listen to books and other audio entertainment titles from both the Premium collection and the Audible Plus Catalog.

Listen how you want. And never lose your place with seamless cross-device listening with Whispersync, available with all audio book titles, podcasts and selections across your Library.

PREVIEW AUDIBLE PLUS - SELECTED AUDIO STORIES AND TITLES
- Explore the Audible Plus Catalog anytime you want, no credits necessary.
- Thousands of binge-worthy audio books, podcasts and Audible Originals.
- True crime podcasts, comedy podcasts, scifi audiobooks, kids books and thrillers. Listen to books and podcasts from thousands of titles.
- Fresh audio content and new listens added to the Catalog every single week. 
- Listen offline. You can stream and download all you want.

The most compelling stories. Told by inspiring voices. Listen to storytelling that speaks to you, anytime, anywhere. Fall in love with books all over again with Audible, an Amazon company.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and enhancements.
comments: I enjoy the ability to listen to a book as I drive, the only to toddler-free time I have. I love the book exchange, so I can keep the books I truly love. It doesn't make sense to me when you can buy an entire audiobook for one credit, but you only get a dollar off the ebook format. I wish that I could get the ebook for a discounted rate, not using my Audible Credit to only get a dollar per credit off.

While having some great content and a very good media player, this app is quite hard to navigate. The search function needs some serious work; the back button and the back arrow don't correlate so sometimes I want to go back a page and I end up loosing my whole search and there is no way to go from your search page to the main navigation menu. Being able to filter by multiple genres would be of great benefit as well.

The subscription is great if you listen to at least one book a year. Just make sure you're using your points on stuff that costs at least $15 and buying cheaper stuff. Once you're out of points you can buy 3 at once which is good if you're trying to get a whole series of books or just listening a lot. If you use it less you can use it without the monthly plan. There are discounts for members though so it's only cheaper without the subscription for people who don't use the app much.

Audible removed the controls that allow you to control the app (play/pause &back 30 sec) from notifications pane. For me this is a MAJOR loss in functionality for the app. Now I have to unlock my phone, go and open the app just to pause or play my audio book or go back 30 sec. I spoke with their tech support about this. They said the feature had been removed and that this was not a bug. BRING THE FRICKING FEATURE BACK!! Audible responded, said it was there under playback settings. NO, it is not.

Functional but bad. The app does what it's supposed to do at a bare minimum; play audiobooks. Sometimes it loses your place and starts you over from the beginning. Sometimes it doesn't sync with playback on other devices. Sometimes it just doesn't even play the audiobook. But for the most part it works. It doesn't respect your screen real estate in horizontal mode, it takes too many unnecessary taps to get to anything meaningful and it is hard to navigate. Recommendations are a total joke. C-

title: Brain It On! - Physics Puzzles
description:
Deceptively challenging physics puzzles for your brain!

Draw shapes to solve challenging physics puzzles. They're not as easy as they look. Care to give one a try?

‚óÜ Dozens of brain busting physics puzzles, with more being added all the time
‚óÜ Compete with your friends for the Brain It On! crown
‚óÜ Multiple ways to solve each puzzle, can you find the best solution?
‚óÜ Share your unique solutions and compare with your friends

All the levels can be unlocked for free by earning stars in previous levels. You can always find dozens of new player created free levels each day on the community screen. You can also purchase the game to remove all ads, unlock all hints, unlock levels early, and unlock the level editor.

Please note: purchasing the "No Popup Ads" option just removes the ads between levels, purchasing the "Full Game" will also remove the ads to get hints.

If you like this game, please rate it and leave a comment. As an indie developer your support is greatly appreciated. Thank you for your help! If you don't like something in the game, please email me at support@brainitongame.com and tell me why. I want to hear your feedback and comments so I can continue to make this game better.

You can find me on Twitter at @orbitalnine, see the latest news on the Facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/brainitongame, or get all the details on the website: http://brainitongame.com

I hope you enjoy Brain It On!
