Vancouver, BC, Canada
V6Z 2S1
recentChanges:
- Added a very hard difficulty levels tab on the community levels screen
- Added black borders to the hint shapes to help see overlapping shapes
- Bug fixes
comments: You will probably give up on some levels because you have no clue. Might even watch a hint still be unsure. Always room for improvement! It's rewarding when you figure it out. The physics overall work well, I had a few issues where the peices glitch through eachother. But it's rare and just requires a restart. No big deal. The levels start off easy, now I'm skipping some levels because I can't figure it out. If you want a challenge. Try this game. It's a lot of fun.

I love this game. Starting off drawing shapes to move balls around the screen, the game developes, becoming a balancing act of inginuity, precision and skill, without adding any additional mechanics. The level design is tight, teaching ideas organically, without becoming impossible, but hArd COrE GaMerS can enjoy trying over and over for full stars. The ads aren't infuriating, and although the objects can clip, it's rare enough to be funny, instead of infuriating.

"Gravity, to Copernicus, is the nostalgia of things to become spheres." - Annie Dillard ....... Sometimes an itch comes along that you just have to scratch. Impressed so far - still rather early in my experience of the game - but thinking a stylus would be quite helpful. Thanks to the developers.

It used to be an rxcellent brain trainer that fotces you to think outside the box. Now it's broken because it wants to force use of "Google Play Games" library to "enhance experience" with useless tie-in with farcebook and other useless social stuff. Uninstall as broken. I corrected, it wasn't "some games library" it's "Google Play Games". It forces me to the Google Play app to install it. I can provide screenshot.

I love it! It does not rush you, if you get it wrong you haven't wasted hours, only seconds.At the moment I feel educated, and with a greater appreciation for physical objects. On Premium you can delete it when you get angry, then reinstall months later unchanged, no penalty. You need a precision stylus if you use it on mobile phone (I must get one!) . The 'hints' and 'restart' buttons are badly placed for right handers, you can accidentally press them during play, I wish I could move them.

title: My Boo - Your Virtual Pet Game
description:
Meet Boo, your very own virtual pet! Enjoy countless hours of fun in this addictive and entertaining game brought to you by Tapps Games!

Each Boo is like a real pet that needs lots of attention, and your task is to take care of it in the best way possible. Feed it, wash it, take care of its health, put it to sleep and play with your Boo - while you have lots of fun with over 20 thrilling mini games that will surely keep you entertained and your Boo happy as a puppy! 

If your Boo is hungry, you can find an array of delicious and nutritious food in the pantry: from yummy tacos to some tender barbecue ribs, or even a portion of octopus sashimi if you‚Äôre in the mood for a more exotic food! Your sweet tooth will be satisfied with mouthwatering candies, such as pumpkin pies, milk shakes and colorful lollipops!

You can also dress up your boo any way you like! Go to his closet and style it like your favorite movie or book character! Choose its hair and accessorize, from top hats to a regal crown, or even a leprechaun hat! Choose your attire! From formal to fun - and every style in between! You can buy new accessories to customize your Boo as you level up!  

Your boo will get dirty from time to time, and like any other pet, a bath is necessary! Taking care of your pet also entails giving it some medication whenever needed, and you can play with magic potions and energy drinks! You can also decorate its house with fun posters and decorative rugs - not to mention redo the walls with beautiful wallpaper and some fancy flooring! You‚Äôll LOVE this BOOtiful game so much, you won‚Äôt be able to leave it alone!

HIGHLIGHTS
‚Ä¢ ADOPT your Boo, give it a special name and watch it grow up! It‚Äôs so cute!
‚Ä¢ DRESS it up with countless outfits to give your Boo the best look! Just they way you want!
‚Ä¢ FEED Boo with candy, cookies, fruits, pizza or even sushi for a treat! Yummy!
‚Ä¢ TICKLE, play keepie uppie, trampoline or jump rope with your Boo to keep it happy and smiling!
‚Ä¢ TUCK your Boo in when the day is over and Boo is tired!
‚Ä¢ BATHE your Boo to keep it clean and happy!
‚Ä¢ DECORATE every room of your Boo's house with dozens of awesome items!

And a lot more! There‚Äôs always so much to do in My Boo!
You will never get tired of your cute little pet monster!

MINI GAMES
Have fun with exciting mini games and earn coins to buy items and food for your Boo!

‚Ä¢ Boo Mix - Match Boos
‚Ä¢ Piano Boo - Tap the Boos and avoid the white tiles
‚Ä¢ Basket Boo - How many points can you score in this basketball game?
‚Ä¢ Matching - A match-3 style game to combine Boos
‚Ä¢ Bubble Pop - Launch and combine Boos of the same color

And many more!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

And a lot more! There‚Äôs always so much to do in My Boo!
You will never get tired of your cute little pet monster!

MINI GAMES
Have fun with exciting mini games and earn coins to buy items and food for your Boo!

And many more!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

comments: I love this game! It is so interactive. Its actually like having a pet because you have to feed it, play with it, clean it, and you have to let it sleep to get energy. I have this game on multiple devices. It is an awesome game. I really recommend it.

This game is awesome in my opinion you can care for it and play games most of them take finger and hand eye coordination so if you need to practice some of the games will help you can go outside and collect food from the trees just like animal crossing
I give this game 5 stars because it is super fun, easy and has so many ideas for clothing and boo games that you can unlock and enjoy plus you don't have to pay. So I will recommend this game. üòÄ
I love this app so cute and fun but the only thing I'm having problems with is that when I try to enter my age, it does not let me continue after I have put in my age. Please help. üíô
It's a great game but the amount of ads you put into the minigames now is driving me absolutely insane.

title: Airport City
description:
Airport City is much more than your average simulator. It takes the best of two worlds in just the right proportions: the sense of adventure from airplane games, and the need to plan strategically from the city building games. If you‚Äôre starting to think that there are things beyond farming, put your farm sim on hold and start building your town that will gradually become a city with the best airport in the world! We know how plane games can become repetitive over time, so we are constantly improving this city building sim, to ensure that our players are always engaged, both on the ground and in the air.
Whether you want to try out the role of an air tycoon or an airline commander, you‚Äôll find something to love about Airport City.
Build a modern international-class terminal to send an airplane to whichever corner of the world you want. Just get your plane in the air and choose where it lands. To make your travels memorable, you can bring back rare artifacts and unique collections. See how many souvenirs can fit in one plane!
But it‚Äôs not just a flight simulator‚Äîyou‚Äôll have to apply your outstanding management skills to develop all the supporting infrastructure too! Take care of an entire city next to it, to provide your airport all the required services. And if the Earth one day becomes too small for you, build a launchpad and send rockets to outer space!
If what you‚Äôre looking for in city building games is peaceful gameplay and interactions, this sim is exactly what you need. Here you start from a small town and develop it into a great modern city!
Social features are also an important part of the game. You can create alliances with other players to complete joint quests and participate in competitions. Just find a fellow airline commander from a neighboring city and make your gaming experience twice as much fun! The regular updates with new models of aircraft, buildings and new destinations, will become an infinite source of entertainment.
Download Airport City and see for yourself how this flight simulator stands out among other airplane games and city building games.
‚úî Test your airline commander skills and develop your own airport. Erect a huge terminal to send your planes to different parts of the world, then construct a launchpad to explore outer space!
‚úî Take on the role of the ultimate airline tycoon. Build a town, upgrade it to a unique city unlike all the others, and collect profits to support the needs of the airport. If you can handle a farm or a restaurant, you can surely handle an awesome terminal!
‚úî Enjoy managing an international transport hub, with lots of unique buildings and travel destinations. Improve infrastructure to increase the number of travelers.
‚úî Interact with like-minded players who enjoy flight simulators and airplane games just like you. Create alliances and participate in special events. Be the famous business tycoon you always wanted to be!
‚úî Explore the world with your plane. Travel to your favorite destinations and bring home unique collections.

comments: 4 stars only because planes can back into each other, bump into each other and sometimes go through each other depending on what planes and how many planes are in que. Also, making enough money to expand or upgrade is way too slow. The more I ply, the less I like this game. Getting what you need is really based on how much time you play the game at one time. Two stars now. This game is no longer fun to play. It's a chore.

This game has improved it is still slow going unless you spend real dollars but now the bonus is that every 14 days you get one game dollar so there is the chance to advance even thought it is slow, it is now possible. Bad thing for me is now I am tempted to spend real funds to get to my goals quicker.

I'm glad I didn't spend any money on the game for 2 reasons. 1)it really is not necessary to spend money if you're just a little patient. It does have advertising which you can watch instead of spending on the game. 2)I've got a Samsung Galaxy S9 Plus which is an above average smartphone in terms of its capabilities but the game frequently glitches necessitating closing & restarting which is a problem. Worse is that the developers don't acknowledge issues when reported. It's fun & addictive tho

Since the latest update I'm not able to use my own comfort classes, only the free ones in every few hours. There's no possibility to use mine outside these free times. Also hawk planes often get stuck at the end of the runway and I have to close the game to make them go away. Takes an awful long time to collect coins.

I LOVE this game. It is so involved and there is so much going on that once you level up a few times and you've got say 3 ore more planes and a couple of helicopters, you can literally stay busy constantly collecting passengers, money, exp. points etc...... that you can actually "play" the game for hours and your eyes and fingers never leave the screen. The special collections are so cool!! The only thing I don't like about it is a cost a lot of coins to upgrade buildings, buy aircraft etc.

title: Toy Blast
description:
IT‚ÄôS TOY BLAST TIME! THE ULTIMATE MATCHING PUZZLE GAME PLAYED BY MILLIONS OF USERS EVERY DAY!

Match the cubes of the same color and combine boosters for huge explosions to blast your way through thousands of levels!

Fun is at the tip of your fingers, with the most fascinating puzzles you will ever solve!

There are countless possibilities, and your talent in solving puzzles will be key in mastering Toy Blast.

Experience the greatest adventures through infinite episodes in the most colorful lands of Toy Blast.

TOY BLAST FEATURES:
‚óè Unique and simple gameplay - just tap the matching cubes
‚óè +3500 puzzles, easy and fun to play but challenging to master

recentChanges:
It's time for a green new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Gardening is a lovely hobby, and Mr. Mouse is enjoying it vigorously! You should see his little greenhouse! One can find all kinds of beautiful plants in there, and breathe in the fresh oxygen.

Be sure to update to the current version of Toy Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!
comments: Fun game...longest I have ever kept a game on my phone. LOVE that I don't have to sit through commercials in order to play or anything!! A few years, when I first started playing, I had the ability to win time...I miss that. Made it more fun to win an hour (up to 24 hrs) of free play time. Guess they lost too much $$ on people not buying items to help them pass a level. Oh well.

I love this game. Great way to pass the time. I do have a couple of things. What if for every 100 levels you get one of each boost and 25 coins? Maybe bring back challenge of unlimited lives for a 24 hours? Sometimes it sucks when it takes 3 days to complete one level, it gets frustrating and boring. I have spent many hours playing this game and spent some money and do really enjoy it.

I absolutely loved this game until it got to the higher levels (im on level 3564) I have spent plenty of money on this game because once you only get 5 free lives and when your out it takes 20 minutes to get another life. I understand the levels will get harder but I think its ridiculous to only get a new life every 20 minutes. I don't want to have to delete this app but I can't continue to spend $1.99-$12.99 just to be able to play continuously.

I actually really love this game. there's no ads (!!!!!!) and there's really no need to spend money if u are patient. it's pretty much entirely luck based so as long as u are patient and keep trying u can pass any level. my only complaint is some of the levels seem unnecessarily hard which can get very frustrating but other than that I would highly recommend this game

Play game all the time my only problem is that you have to continuesly have to update after doing 50 levels beyond 4000, and my Facebook friends dissappeared. Hey Doodle Bob I am a real person playing this game and yes I passed level 4000. I can honestly say, I have NOT spent any money on this game and do not plan on it. Just wait for lives to add up and continue to play.

title: Cisco Webex Meetings

Cisco Webex Meetings delivers over 25 billion meetings per month, offering industry-leading video and audio conferencing with sharing, chat, and more. Experience why Webex Meetings is the most trusted video conferencing solution today.

‚Ä¢	Join and present from any meeting, event, or training session

comments: App is decent for online meetings. I use it for group meetings as well as one on one collaboration. It is as good as zoom and some of the other platforms out there. I like that you can set the meeting to be open to anyone that has the link. unlike zoom the host doesn't have to add each individual to the meeting and you can also lock the meeting so no one else can get in if it's a private conversation, for instance an appointment with a therapist.

I was a first time user & was originally overwhelmed by all of the different options & directions. Also, I was attempting to use a "smart" phone which gave me limited screen usage. I would suggest that there be a test setup & a dummy call for novices; that way we can get practice before our actual conference call. We could also work out any kinks with our equipmemt. UPDATE: 6/17/20 I've used the system frequently over the past month. The system is a good option for those w/limited screen size.

I use this app for group virtual meetings at my government occupation. the app works wonderful, lots of video, audio, quality settings to chose from. my only issue would be that I had a great deal of difficulty initially learning how to join an active group. in fact I missed the first two meetings because I couldn't get it to work, and I am very technically proficient, from building barebones CPUs, html Java cyber security ect, and I still found the login to join meeting process very difficult.

As the parent of student, I've had to learn this app to support my child's education & I have to say, it's pretty decent. It could be a little less glitchy on audio. The video streamed rather smoothly. It wasn't exactly HDMI quality but it wasn't Commadore 64 pixelated either. There was a time delay of a few seconds with audio, that wasn't reflected in the video stream at all, when transitioning but it seemed as tho it would handle a few users at a time when speaking. Overall, very sufficient!

I have used Webex several times and have always been happy with the quality of voice and video. This time specially, there were some delays (5-10 seconds) on what presenter was sharing on his screen with attendees. He could see a new page, but we were still waiting to get it in our screen.

title: Calorie Counter - MyFitnessPal
description:
Whether you want to lose weight, tone up, get healthy, change your habits, or start a new diet MyFitnessPal has you covered. Our members have lost over 200 million pounds and 88% of people who track for at least 7 days on MyFitnessPal lose weight. Sign up for FREE and start living a happier and healthier life today!

See for yourself why MyFitnessPal is the world‚Äôs most popular health and fitness app.

‚ñåTRACKING FOOD IS FAST AND EASY 
‚ñ† Biggest Food Database -- 11+ million foods in our database including global items and cuisines. 
‚ñ† Barcode Scanner -- Simply scan barcodes to log foods. 4+ million barcodes recognized. 
‚ñ† Recipe Importer -- Easily import the nutrition information for the recipes you cook.
‚ñ† Restaurant Logging -- Quickly log menu items from your favorite restaurants.
‚ñ† Food Insights -- Learn how to make healthier choices about the foods you eat. 
‚ñ† Personalized Experience -- Create your own foods, recipes, and meals and save favorites. 
‚ñ† Calorie Counter -- We automatically calculate the calories in your foods, meals and recipes.
‚ñ† Macro Tracker -- We automatically calculate the macros (carbs, fat, protein) in your foods, meals and recipes.
‚ñ† Track All Nutrients -- Calories, macros (carbs, fat, protein), sugar, fiber, cholesterol, vitamins, and more.
‚ñ† Customize Your Diary -- Log breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacks or create your own meals. 
‚ñ† Water Tracking -- Log water in cups, ounces or ml. We save your recently logged amounts.

‚ñåREACH YOUR GOALS
‚ñ† Choose A Goal -- We support weight loss, weight gain, and weight maintenance goals.  
‚ñ† Goal Setting -- Create your own goals or let us create personalized goals for you, including calorie and macros goals.
‚ñ† Change Habits -- It's almost like having a nutrition coach right inside your pocket.

‚ñåLOG YOUR EXERCISE AND STEPS 
‚ñ† Connect 50+ Apps & Devices -- Syncing your workouts is easy and automatic.
‚ñ† Choose From 350+ Exercises -- Or create your own exercises and workouts. 
‚ñ† Log Cardio Exercises -- Including running, walking, biking, swimming, yoga, pilates and more. 
‚ñ† Log Strength Exercises -- Including sets, reps, and weight per set. 
‚ñ† Track Steps -- Set a daily step goal and see a graph of your step history. 
‚ñ† We connect with all your favorite apps and devices -- Including Fitbit, Jawbone UP, Garmin, MapMyFitness, Runkeeper, Strava, Runtastic, Misfit, Withings, HealthKit, UA Record and many more!

‚ñåGET SUPPORT AND MOTIVATION 
‚ñ† Add Friends -- Connect with friends for an extra layer of support and accountability.
‚ñ† Join Our Community -- Find motivation, support, tips, and advice in our active forums. 
‚ñ† Newsfeed Updates -- Share your accomplishments and see friend‚Äôs progress in the newsfeed.

‚ñåCELEBRATE YOUR SUCCESS 
‚ñ† Chart Your Progress -- Stay motivated with a graph of how you‚Äôre improving over time.
‚ñ† Progress Photos -- Add photos to your weight entries to see and celebrate your progress. 
‚ñ† Nutrition Reports -- View a history of your calories, macros, and nutrient intake. 
‚ñ† Share Your Progress -- Help inspire friends and family members on their own health journey.

Download MyFitnessPal and start living a happier and healthier life today!

For our full terms and conditions and our privacy policy, please visit: https://account.underarmour.com/privacy?locale=en
descriptionHTML:
Whether you want to lose weight, tone up, get healthy, change your habits, or start a new diet MyFitnessPal has you covered. Our members have lost over 200 million pounds and 88% of people who track for at least 7 days on MyFitnessPal lose weight. Sign up for FREE and start living a happier and healthier life today!

See for yourself why MyFitnessPal is the world‚Äôs most popular health and fitness app.

‚ñåTRACKING FOOD IS FAST AND EASY
‚ñ† Biggest Food Database -- 11+ million foods in our database including global items and cuisines.
‚ñ† Barcode Scanner -- Simply scan barcodes to log foods. 4+ million barcodes recognized.
‚ñ† Recipe Importer -- Easily import the nutrition information for the recipes you cook.
‚ñ† Restaurant Logging -- Quickly log menu items from your favorite restaurants.
‚ñ† Food Insights -- Learn how to make healthier choices about the foods you eat.
‚ñ† Personalized Experience -- Create your own foods, recipes, and meals and save favorites.
‚ñ† Calorie Counter -- We automatically calculate the calories in your foods, meals and recipes.
‚ñ† Macro Tracker -- We automatically calculate the macros (carbs, fat, protein) in your foods, meals and recipes.
‚ñ† Track All Nutrients -- Calories, macros (carbs, fat, protein), sugar, fiber, cholesterol, vitamins, and more.
‚ñ† Customize Your Diary -- Log breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacks or create your own meals.
‚ñ† Water Tracking -- Log water in cups, ounces or ml. We save your recently logged amounts.

‚ñåREACH YOUR GOALS
‚ñ† Choose A Goal -- We support weight loss, weight gain, and weight maintenance goals.
‚ñ† Goal Setting -- Create your own goals or let us create personalized goals for you, including calorie and macros goals.
‚ñ† Change Habits -- It's almost like having a nutrition coach right inside your pocket.

‚ñåLOG YOUR EXERCISE AND STEPS
‚ñ† Connect 50+ Apps & Devices -- Syncing your workouts is easy and automatic.
‚ñ† Choose From 350+ Exercises -- Or create your own exercises and workouts.
‚ñ† Log Cardio Exercises -- Including running, walking, biking, swimming, yoga, pilates and more.
‚ñ† Log Strength Exercises -- Including sets, reps, and weight per set.
‚ñ† Track Steps -- Set a daily step goal and see a graph of your step history.
‚ñ† We connect with all your favorite apps and devices -- Including Fitbit, Jawbone UP, Garmin, MapMyFitness, Runkeeper, Strava, Runtastic, Misfit, Withings, HealthKit, UA Record and many more!

‚ñåGET SUPPORT AND MOTIVATION
‚ñ† Add Friends -- Connect with friends for an extra layer of support and accountability.
‚ñ† Join Our Community -- Find motivation, support, tips, and advice in our active forums.
‚ñ† Newsfeed Updates -- Share your accomplishments and see friend‚Äôs progress in the newsfeed.

‚ñåCELEBRATE YOUR SUCCESS
‚ñ† Chart Your Progress -- Stay motivated with a graph of how you‚Äôre improving over time.
‚ñ† Progress Photos -- Add photos to your weight entries to see and celebrate your progress.
‚ñ† Nutrition Reports -- View a history of your calories, macros, and nutrient intake.
‚ñ† Share Your Progress -- Help inspire friends and family members on their own health journey.

Download MyFitnessPal and start living a happier and healthier life today!

For our full terms and conditions and our privacy policy, please visit: https://account.underarmour.com/privacy?locale=en

Whether you want to log your lowest weight in years, your first run in weeks, or your heart healthy afternoon snack, we know you count on MyFitnessPal to be working smoothly.

We hope you enjoy and happy tracking!
comments: The step synching with Samsung Health has stopped working. I thought it was a problem with my phone initially, but as my food entries were synching I realise it's a MFP issue and not the first time. So annoying! 16/10/20 One week later and still not working. What's going on? 29/10/20 Still not synching with Samsung Health. Why is it taking so long? 31/10/20 The new release is not working properly at all, it only syncs a fraction of the total number of steps taken. Just awful!

**UPDATE: I have been using the app since last July 2019. It's a great tool. I have lost 70 lbs. on the keto diet since then, I couldn't have been so successful without it! Helps keep me on track with my goals. **Step tracker is fixed! Thank you! I will say that it was a little frustrating getting an email(actually several) that said my problem was resolved, when it wasn't... their internal term for "yes, we know it's a problem and we're working on it" But it's fixed now, I am happy. !

When it works it helps keep me motivated, and there's a great database. However it wants to know why I haven't logged lunch at 8:10 AM (and yes my settings are on the correct time zone). It locks up often, failing to allow me to add goods in a timely manner. If the glitches don't improve I'll try a different app.

Downloaded the app on the recommendation of my trainer and am finding it very useful. The only frustrating part is trying to find certain foods when tracking meals. There is almost too much choice which makes it frustrating to have to scroll through a massive list if what is typed in doesn't match exactly. Other than that this app has been great. Still debating whether to pay for the premium features but only because I'm cheap.

It used to be amazing. Now, it's riddled with premium forced on you and location tracking prompts that don't stop with no way to say 'never show again.' it's not longer simple to use. Update: the intrusive ads are rediculous. You should not get an ad when you hit ad food, or other important actions. They are put in places to seemingly trick you into clicking them - they often appear just as you are going to naturally push a button.

title: Operate Now: Hospital - Surgery Simulator Game
description:
Operate Now is the most realistic surgery simulation game. Operate patients like a surgeon and build your own hospital from scratch. 

Fan of surgery simulator and life simulation? Perform realistic surgeries on patients! Start to build and manage your own hospital and operate and rescue patients.
Hurry, Doctor! You‚Äôre needed at the hospital, on the double! Your dedicated medical team is depending on you to manage them, improve their facilities, and even perform important surgeries that could determine whether a patient lives or dies!

These are just a few of the thrilling things you‚Äôll get to experience in Operate Now: Hospital, which has been downloaded over 20 million times by players all around the globe. They love the intense surgeries and exciting melodramas that have helped make it one of the most realistic and popular medical simulation games of all time. Are you ready to take on all the challenges that are waiting for you while you attempt to build a world-renowned medical center? 

HERE‚ÄôS THE FEATURES, DOCTOR !

‚òÖ Build, upgrade, and continually improve multiple hospitals and their facilities.
‚òÖ Fan of surgery ? Operate your patients!
‚òÖ Monitor your staff, hospitals, and more on the world map.
‚òÖ Help your patients by performing incredibly realistic surgeries.
‚òÖ Exchange duplicate staff members with the new CV feature.
‚òÖ Keep your progress up-to-date with the new Facebook save feature. 
‚òÖ Speed things up with the builder, a useful tool that will kick your construction projects into overdrive. 
 

BUILD YOUR DREAM HOSPITAL
Ready to create your own clinic? Building and managing several hospitals isn‚Äôt easy. You‚Äôll need to be a like a tycoon to construct and oversee vital departments like emergency rooms, intensive care units, and many more. You‚Äôll also have to hire talented staff like skilled surgeons in order to help your patients and create a truly impressive medical center in the process.

PERFORM REALISTIC SURGERIES
Even if you can‚Äôt tell the difference between a bone fracture and a tracheostomy, you‚Äôll definitely enjoy Operate Now: Hospital‚Äôs realistic surgery engine. In this game, you not only manage hospitals, you work as a surgeon in them as well. You‚Äôll get to fix broken bones, help people injured during disasters, and much more. Manipulate surgical tools to cure patients. You‚Äôll need steady hands to make flawless incisions while you carefully operate on your patients. So it‚Äôs time to throw on your scrubs and head down to the ER! What about doing some surgery now?

EXPERIENCE BREATHTAKING DRAMAS
Operate Now: Hospital features dramatic storylines much like the ones in your favorite medical show on TV. You‚Äôll get to work alongside staff members like Dr. Amy Clarke and learn more about their crazy lives both in the hospitals and outside them. You‚Äôll get to experience lots of drama firsthand in Seasons 1 and 2 while you learn more about all the intrigue surrounding the hospitals, their patients, and their staff as well. 

Just like in a real medical center, there‚Äôs never a dull moment in Operate Now: Hospital. So step through its doors when you‚Äôre ready, Doc, and prepare yourself for riveting medical adventures that you‚Äôll never forget! 
Have you played the old Operate Now games as a kid ? Let us know your best memories!

FOLLOW OPERATE NOW: HOSPITAL
https://www.facebook.com/OperateNow
http://www.operatenow.com
https://www.instagram.com/operatenowhospital

comments: With the latest Halloween Event and Staff Training Event there are glitches and it won't let you complete them. You only have a certain amount of days to play them. I haven't received a reply from customer service when I reported the bugs either. I guess its time to stop playing this game. A total rip off when you invest so much time, energy recharges and game money to play the events.

Was 5 stars... But with this new update, my game is laggy and damn near impossible to get on whether im on data, wifi, or both! Surgeries are especially laggy. I have amazing connection with all other apps! I spend money on this game and havnt been able to properly play due to this "connection issue" since the latest update! Not a happy customer.

PLEASE FIX THIS. On the Tasks where I have to recharge the energy of my staff members, it does not count up correctly. Per say, if I recharge 5 of my staff's energies, within a short amount of time the task showing how many I have recharged will decrease in value AND even go into the negatives or not even count them at all! This includes the side Tasks and also the Disaster Tasks! Also on a side note, why did you decrease the Stamina given from 100 down to 25? Will lower the stars if no fix!

Latest update is broken. Paramedic had 150 √©nergy before update and now its just 50, most of the common staff who has like 125-150 energy have lost 100 points and are at 25 and 50. Ads are now showing up more often but the ads for golden heart is still not in place. It takes forever to load. Ad count per hour or so are linked to all places even for energy buffs, please fix all these.

Not impressed with the latest update where most of my staff lost their training level and the amount of energy/stamina they had. Going from 175 to 75/125 to 25 etc, so training level 3/4 all the way back to level 1. I was already getting bored and only logging on here and there because I no longer enjoyed doing the exact same procedures over and over again, so if this is something that isn't fixable I am definitely uninstalling the app which is sad because I put money into this game.

title: Digital Secure
description:
Protect your private information from digital threats. 
Digital Secure is a one-stop suite of privacy and security tools for your mobile devices and home computers. Safeguard your internet connection and personal data with antivirus, anti-malware and identity theft protection so you can browse with peace of mind. 

Here‚Äôs what you‚Äôll get with Digital Secure.
You‚Äôll get free security and privacy tools, plus you can get advanced protection for $5/mo per line or $10/mo per account.

1. Security and Privacy
Protect your device from online threats and get around-the-clock peace of mind. 
Get warnings when connecting to an unsecure network, visiting risky websites or attempting dangerous downloads. Plus, you‚Äôll be able to see how installed apps are currently using your personal information. 

2. Safe Wi-Fi 
Connect with confidence to any public Wi-Fi. 
With Digital Secure, it‚Äôs easy to make any Wi-Fi connection private. You‚Äôll get an on-the-go secure VPN connection so you‚Äôll be able to keep personal data and online activities to yourself. 

3. Identity Theft Protection (IDTP)
Take control with always-on IDTP and social media monitoring, dark web surveillance and theft alerts.
24/7 cyber monitoring means you can be notified if we detect any personal information you‚Äôve asked us to monitor is shared online. You‚Äôll also get step-by-step guidance from recovery and replacement specialists if essential items such as credit cards and IDs are lost.

comments: Last update on Google play was sept 16, and today Oct 10 I am told my app is out of date. This is a security app, not tetris. Also, won't start automatically after restart sometimes. I have to manually start it (if I notice it's not running).

Hello, my phone has been spammed. I thought this app is supposed to protect against that. Now I don't know how to stop the spamming. I keep getting messages that my phone will be locked if I don't install and pay for Spam protection.

I haven't done the September update. I've read many customer comments and notice that the one common aspect to each one is the canned set of replies from the Verizon Care correspondent. Notably, that in each instance, the tone and tenor of the reply is condescending in a passive-aggressive manner. For example, inviting the dissatisfied customer to take yet another step, reaching out to customer care, to describe "your problem", again? It's a Verizon or digital secure problem. Start there eh?
Still kinda on the fence with this app since switching over from a very corrupt AT&T. I can say that because I've been with them for over 20 years. They went bad about 4 years ago. Thank you Verizon.
App doesn't allow Web security. You turn on 2 seconds later the app crashes I have no idea if I'm safe browsing on the Web > latest version 9/16 Issue still a problem !!!

title: GO SMS Pro - Messenger, Free Themes, Emoji
description:
GO SMS Pro - Nearly 100 Million users' choice, all time #1 messaging app to replace the stock! 

The brand new messaging app is simple, intuitive, personalizing and fun!

GO SMS Pro comes with beautiful themes, lovely stickers, private box, pop up windows, GO chat (send free SMS & MMS), dual sim support, and much more. We are committed to making GO SMS Pro faster, safer and tons of great features - messaging has never been so fun and efficient!
----------------------------------------------
Free Features:
‚ñ∫ Hundreds of personalized themes and lovely stickers (keep increasing) 
‚ñ∫ Private box to encrypt messages & protect your privacy
‚ñ∫ Sticky conversations help you focus on important contacts by sticking them at the top
‚ñ∫ Pop up new messages for quick viewing and replying
‚ñ∫ Dual SIM matching, supports 8,000+ dual SIM devices (keep increasing)
‚ñ∫ SMS blocker smartly block blacklist/keywords and filter spam messages 
‚ñ∫ GO chat support for free messages and group chat 
‚ñ∫ Delay to send give you opportunity to correct the wrong messages. 
‚ñ∫ Folded stranger messages Automatically categorize strangers conversations and keep your Inbox simplicity
‚ñ∫ Avatar popup Show the contact avatar above all apps when new messages arrive. It needs SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW permission to show the system level popup.
‚ñ∫Identify calls Identify unknown calls and block spam calls.

Pro Features:
‚ñ∫ Support disabling all sponsored messages
‚ñ∫ Advanced Private Box for renaming or hiding entrance, faking notification as well
‚ñ∫ Unlimited cloud storage space for message backup
‚ñ∫ Free to enjoy all paid themes (Upgrade to Themes VIP) 
--------------------------------------------------------------

GO SMS VIP offers you unlock all features, like themes, stickers, fonts, private box and ad-free experience. Subscription content will be
updated regularly and you can enjoy the updating content during an active period of
subscription. It is an auto-renewing subscription after your 3-day free trial. If you
choose to purchase GO SMS VIP, payment will be charged to your Google
Play account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to
the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the Play Store after purchase. The current subscription price starts at $9.99/month, $59.99/year. Prices are in U.S. dollars, may vary in countries other
than the U.S. and are subject to change without notice. If you don‚Äôt choose to
purchase GO SMS VIP , you can simply continue using it for free.

GO SMS Pro - Nearly 100 Million users' choice, all time #1 messaging app to replace the stock!

The brand new messaging app is simple, intuitive, personalizing and fun!

GO SMS Pro comes with beautiful themes, lovely stickers, private box, pop up windows, GO chat (send free SMS & MMS), dual sim support, and much more. We are committed to making GO SMS Pro faster, safer and tons of great features - messaging has never been so fun and efficient!
----------------------------------------------
Free Features:
‚ñ∫ Hundreds of personalized themes and lovely stickers (keep increasing)
‚ñ∫ Private box to encrypt messages & protect your privacy
‚ñ∫ Sticky conversations help you focus on important contacts by sticking them at the top
‚ñ∫ Pop up new messages for quick viewing and replying
‚ñ∫ Dual SIM matching, supports 8,000+ dual SIM devices (keep increasing)
‚ñ∫ SMS blocker smartly block blacklist/keywords and filter spam messages
‚ñ∫ GO chat support for free messages and group chat
‚ñ∫ Delay to send give you opportunity to correct the wrong messages.
‚ñ∫ Folded stranger messages Automatically categorize strangers conversations and keep your Inbox simplicity
‚ñ∫ Avatar popup Show the contact avatar above all apps when new messages arrive. It needs SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW permission to show the system level popup.
‚ñ∫Identify calls Identify unknown calls and block spam calls.

Pro Features:
‚ñ∫ Support disabling all sponsored messages
‚ñ∫ Advanced Private Box for renaming or hiding entrance, faking notification as well
‚ñ∫ Unlimited cloud storage space for message backup
‚ñ∫ Free to enjoy all paid themes (Upgrade to Themes VIP)
--------------------------------------------------------------

GO SMS VIP offers you unlock all features, like themes, stickers, fonts, private box and ad-free experience. Subscription content will be
updated regularly and you can enjoy the updating content during an active period of
subscription. It is an auto-renewing subscription after your 3-day free trial. If you
choose to purchase GO SMS VIP, payment will be charged to your Google
Play account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to
the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the Play Store after purchase. The current subscription price starts at $9.99/month, $59.99/year. Prices are in U.S. dollars, may vary in countries other
than the U.S. and are subject to change without notice. If you don‚Äôt choose to
purchase GO SMS VIP , you can simply continue using it for free.

comments: For an app that supposedly got "updated" recently it still isn't that great. My ringtone still doesn't work. So when I get a text I don't hear the text. If it sounds off it's only for a few seconds. Can you please fix or I'll uninstall this crappy app that I supposedly should "pay for". Even when it was free it worked better. Guess it went down the toilet. Oh, and your email doesn't work either. Should get that fixed too while you're at it.

I have been using Go Sms for a few years now and at the beginning I received read receipt reports when my messages was deliver and read. Now I do not receive that anymore. Could you please have a look into this as it is very important to me to get the notification that the messages I send has been received and opend on the other side. Your feedback would be much appreciated.

I have been using this app for years, even paying for the full version years ago. However, I just noticed I am unable to access or see the backup and restore settings. It is nowhere in the current version (7.92) of the app. I've checked every option available. I've searched troubleshooting articles. I attempted to reach out to the gosms feedback as listed in Google play store, however, the email bounced back stating the mailbox was full. The website doesn't work either. Time to switch!

I like it so far, I like that you can design your own background, text bubbles, color etc, but one thing I noticed is when I get a notification, pull it down and try to reply, the reply button does not appear. Pics wouldn't download after several hours. Update: Pics have been coming thru recently. Please make a way to search keywords in a rext conversation.

I thought I would give this another try. Had it for years and went to another app because of the continuous problems and no response from developer. It says you get a three day trial. But they IMMEDIATELY charged me $59.99. Google Play won't refund me and the developers email is full. If they respond to this review I will update the rating. Now I need to call my bank.

title: Draw Something Classic
description:
Draw Something is the ‚ÄúWorld‚Äôs Most Popular Drawing Game‚Äù. Have fun with your friends and family exchanging doodle art. Sketch a perfect work of art and participate in our contests. Pick up your brush and start painting now.

comments: I love the game, but hate the ads. I'd gladly pay to get rid of ads, but I won't randomly throw my Facebook friends under the bus, and that's the only way to get rid of ads - temporarily even. You can leave the option to watch ads to get extra coins or bombs, but let us pay to avoid the pushed ads! Game glitches and splits the drawing in half and doubles it. When trying to play a new player, 80% resign immediately.

30 second ads that you can't skip after EVERY turn is ridiculous. I played it years ago and picked it up again a few days ago. It was much more fun then. Now it's gone way downhill. The word bank is limited, you can't delete games if the other player doesn't take their turn, and it's full of bugs and crashes constantly. Unfortunately, I'll be deleting.

Ads are more intrusive and frequent than any other app. Game is fine, little outdated, but the ads are off-putting, and designed to make you "accidentally" click them often. It makes me not want to log in, knowing that over half of my time will be spent waiting for 30 second videos to end. Suggestions: 1) Less ads: offer a way to earn coins to PERMANENTLY remove them. 2) Make it easier to choose colour pallets. 3) Men instantly quit when playing with other men, which is slimy and embarrassing.

they've added a feature where you can run out of ink I have a galaxy note, meaning I have a fairly large screen and a touch pen, so I want to use this game to make elaborate drawings for my friends. For years I'd randomly pick up this game on occasion and always had fun until this time when I ran out of ink and had to send a masterpiece drawing incomplete.

Ads are never fun and this game seems child oriented. The problem is some of the ads may contain some mature target audience content. Good app though. Someone might be crass and draw something inappropriate and the recipient might not be very old which could be bad. Should be an age filter so adults can play with adults and children can play with children. I had some adult words (toyota? Kids not going to know that) and I was playing with my nephews (6 and 9).

title: Candy Crush Friends Saga
description:
The newest game from the Candy Crush Franchise!  With updated graphics, fun new game modes and a host of friends to help you blast through hundreds of levels!
 
Your Candy Crush Friends have been scattered throughout the Candy Kingdom - Join this match 3 puzzle game to find them! This friendly bunch have their own unique powers to help you to create sweet candy combinations and blastthrough blockers!
 
Switch and match candies to unlock rewards, friends, and sweet collectable outfits! The more candies you collect the greater your power on the game board!
 
This fun new Candy game is filled with delicious treats - cookies, jam, chocolate and more! Your favourite game modes, but sweeter than ever!
 
Candy Crush Friends Saga features: 
‚Ä¢	Hundreds of levels to play ‚Äì collect your favorite friends along the way! 
‚Ä¢	Your Candy friends are your allies ‚Äì they are ready to help you blast through levels!
‚Ä¢	Watch Yeti and his friends dance when you win levels!
‚Ä¢	Fun new game modes; dunk the cookie in the chocolate & free the octopuses and the mammoths!  
‚Ä¢	Keep your friends in a sticker book and change their outfits!
‚Ä¢	Explore sweet new worlds in 3D!
‚Ä¢	Easy to play but challenging to master!
‚Ä¢	Play whenever, online and offline. Easily sync the game between devices and access full game features when connected to the internet. 
‚Ä¢	Take on this epic saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!
 
If you need help and support, you will find helpful and extensive FAQs in our in-game Help Center, click the ? to launch it.
Share opinions and have sweet discussions with other members of the Candy Crush Friends Saga community. https://community.king.com/en/candy-crush-friends-saga/
Visit www.candycrushfriendssaga.com and discover delicious game guides and tasty blogs to satisfy your candy cravings.

Candy Crush Friends Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment with real money. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device‚Äôs settings. 
 
By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; https://king.com/termsAndConditions

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy.  If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in game help centre or by going to https://soporto.king.com/

comments: I have played this game now for around 2 years and loved it until last week. Every time you watch a video for extra items, lives or to play on at the end of a level the game crashes. I have completed everything they recommend and even reinstalling this and still crashes. I have now lost all my lollipop hammers (10 of each). Messaged them (King) and not willing to help or admit there is a problem which clearly there is from others comments below. Very disappointed after all this time.

Sometimes you can watch a video to either have a special candy or to get a few extra moves, however quite frequently when the watch video button is clicked, it just shuts the app down completely. It would be 5 stars if it wasn't for this really annoying bug. Please fix and I'll change my rating.

Game is always crashing. Sometimes I don't get rewards after watching adds. Events never work. And it's impossible to contact anyone about it. I've tried and I got a copie pasted email back. Useless. Update, a few days after writing my review I lost all my candy ( the lollipops) that I've been collecting for years. Literally Year. Gone

I have been playing this for a while now, and it does get tricky every now and then, but it is very playable . However this morning, when the game loads, then the level screen, then play, then watch video, the game shuts itself off! And then back to starting the app again, has this been caused by an update, as last night it worked perfectly. Overall my impressions are good, nice graphics, pleasing sounds, some levels do get annoying, but that is all part of the game, 85/100.

Great game with lots of free treats. You can get stuck for 2 or 3 days though, even on a classic level,. 7 months later I'm still playing but now it switches off when I try to download an ad. I've taken advice to switch off my tablet completely but it has not improved. Pity because it's a great game.

title: Drive Simulator
description:
Drive over 15 vehicles, operate large cranes and machines, complete easy and complex objectives and explore a large detailed open world environment. Drive simulator 2016 is like no other simulator,  it's the complete simulation package packed with variety of objective based levels such as: 

- Airport: Tow airplane, unload luggage and passengers, refuel plane etc..
- Construction: Demolish and build, transport machinery, operate large cranes etc..
- Depot: Remove and replace vents, transport light goods etc..
- Dockyard: Unload containers, operate large cranes, transport heavy cargo etc..
- Recovery: Recover broken down vehicles   

Features:
- Detailed 3D environment
- Over 15 Vehicles to drive
- 5 different Modes to choose from
- Operate cranes, machines, large trucks, trailers and trolleys
- easy controls

Minimum Requirements: dual core 1.0ghz - 1GB RAM

http://appforgegames.com/privacypolicy.html

comments: This game is the best.It has clear graphics which is my favourite and you can drive properly.The reason why I am giving this 4 stars is because there needs to be a map and there need s to be other SUV like ford ranger,Toyota hilux legend 50,amarok,landcruiser and more.there also has to be long trips like which take 2 hours to get there and some music please fix this problem and then I will give it a 5 star out of and I will follow you on Facebook and Twitter and I will send feedbacks.

This is cool game concept. Benifits include no time pressure. Great camera control, never thought I say it, but a little to touchy. Like many other drive sims, I have an issue with aggressive traffic. Some idot drivers are reality, but I hate that all cars on road,will crash into you if your to slow,and act like you can't get out of the way fast enough. Tone this down and you have a great sim w/great graphics. Just plain fun! After all part of the drive & haul world is being slow. Give it a try!

This game looks like it could be really fun. I've played drive simulators before, so I know the controls can be tricky on a phone, but this game is extremely difficult to control. Plus some have a steering wheel and others have left right buttons. Added 1 star for availability via Play Pass.

Very hard to control...You get stuck on everything.. Camera is very bad you can barely control it...If I was you I wouldn't get it...It's just bad...I would give it a zero star if there was one..I don't even no why it has 4. Stars.. everyone gives it a 2 or 1 star...No hate on the creaters on this game tho....I wouldn't get it if I was you..

The game is Too funny but hard also . The graphics are super but one problem is there the other vehicles are doing to bad . They are trashing to our car . Only this this problem is there.and all are good

title: Keepsafe Photo Vault: Hide Private Photos & Videos
description:
Download Keepsafe to join over 50 million people who have entrusted more than a billion pictures to Keepsafe: the most popular Photo Vault & album locker app on Android.

Keepsafe secures personal photos and videos by locking them down with PIN protection, fingerprint authentication, and military-grade encryption. It‚Äôs the best place for hiding personal pictures and videos. With Keepsafe, you can protect your privacy, secure your photos, and save phone space.

Keepsafe lets you:
üåü  Preserve special memories
üñº  Store family photos
üí≥  Protect copies of your driver‚Äôs license, ID cards, and credit cards
üìé  Organize important documents
üîí  PIN protect your Photo Gallery

Just look through your phone‚Äôs photo gallery and tap photos or videos to import into your Keepsafe Photo Vault. Once imported, you can choose to easily delete those photos from your phone‚Äôs public photo gallery while still view them in your Keepsafe Photo Vault.

Keepsafe Photo Locker Features:

‚Ä¢ Everything behind a lock - Your photos are secured via a PIN, pattern or your fingerprint.
‚Ä¢ Sync photos or videos across devices - Your encrypted Private Cloud securely syncs your photos, albums and videos across all your devices.
‚Ä¢ Backup photos & videos for easy recovery - Fear not if your phone is lost, stolen or damaged!
‚Ä¢ Face-down auto lock - In a tight situation? Have Keepsafe lock itself when your device faces downward.
‚Ä¢ Safe Send photo sharing - Share private photos with confidence: control how long the recipient sees your photo -- photos disappear 20 seconds after they are received.
‚Ä¢ Shared Albums - Create and share a private album with your significant other.
‚Ä¢ Keepsafe also doesn‚Äôt show up in your recently used apps list!

Install Keepsafe Basic to get free secure Private Cloud storage and also receive a free test drive of Keepsafe Premium!

Keepsafe Premium Exclusive Features:
‚Ä¢ Album Lock: Assign individual PIN codes to access particular albums
‚Ä¢ Break-In Alerts: Takes photos of intruders and tracks break-in attempts
‚Ä¢ Fake Pin: Creates a decoy Keepsafe with a separate PIN code

Manage Photos
‚Ä¢ Private Cloud: Stores up to 10,000 items in Keepsafe
‚Ä¢ Space Saver: Compresses photos and saves originals to the Cloud
‚Ä¢ Trash Recovery: Retrieves photos you‚Äôve mistakenly deleted

Personalize Keepsafe
‚Ä¢ Ad-Free: Keeps your photo-viewing experience distraction-free
‚Ä¢ Custom Album Covers: Sets album thumbnails to a specific image

---

üõ° About Keepsafe üõ°

Keepsafe helps you to protect your personal important data. We focus on making simple to use, secure apps and services that improve your digital life.

Need Help?
Find the FAQs in the Help & Support tab within Photo Vault, or contact us at support@getkeepsafe.com

Terms of Service:
https://www.getkeepsafe.com/policies/#terms

Privacy Policy:
https://www.getkeepsafe.com/policies/#privacy

comments: Great app for storing and viewing photos. Could use some more features like subfolders, or more slideshow settings (like changing speed, randomization), support for more video types (.wmv does not work at all), and the ability to rearrange your gallery. The only current way to get them into an order you want is moving them into a folder one at a time. Aside from all that it works great.

This is a great app! Keeps everything secured. I don't know if they have changed it yet, but the only reason I didn't give it a 5 star is when you upload multiple pics or documents, they do not stay in order. If you want them in order, you have to upload one at a time. Pain in the arse. If this has been fixed... Great!! If not, please change this.

Keepsafe seems to work just fine. I haven't had anyone try to unlock it though. I'm only using the basic service, so I do get an ad page from time to time. The ads are not very intrusive though... definitely not like the ads on YouT#be!! I'm happy with this app.

This app is really amazing... And so cool to keep files i love it... how i wish you could stop the access of redeeming codes and also premium access it would be better... Cause ain't everyone using PayPal or credit cards... I hope you see to this admin... please find another way, so many people could benefit from it also... Thanks for going through this.... O.T Zanyüëåüëåüòé

I'm gonna have to give this App 4 stars, something that is really missing is the ability to Move saved videos and pictures around in a folder so they can be in the order you want them to be in, also when you try moving multiple videos or photos from your gallery into the app they do not get sorted in the order that you chose them in. Which really sucks, I'm a basic user as I don't have money to put into an app on a monthly basis so that's a let down for those who struggle with finances.

comments: it's still buggy. getting worse, even. the more I use it, the more it crashes and lags. I would rather have that fixed than a new design. and now the coin purchase isn't working either, and sometimes tapping the heart to like does nothing. there was nothing wrong with the layout, please fix the bugs. I want to be able to read the comics. even now, I would like to be able to buy more coins and I literally can't

Firstly, I saw many, many advertisements on instagram for this app and decided to give it a shot. And I'm in love with webtoon now. No joke. There are a lot of other web comic apps, but this one seems to be the only one without a pay wall from what I have found. You can buy coins to read ahead with a fast pass, or be patient and wait for weekly updates on many of the series. Overall good experience and lots of amazing stories.

Honestly, while I do enjoy this app, I'm kind of annoyed that they removed the option to buy $20 worth of coins. That and I get they need to make money, but let's be realistic here, the whole "one free comic a day of comics that are completed and were once entirely free to read in a day" thing is kind of meh. You can pay to read them more often, even though the comics again were ENTIRELY FREE BEFORE. You wanna read a 70 chapter story? You have to do it over 70 days, unless you wanna pay.

I love the contents of this app, but I can't ignore the constant glitches. One of the worst ones is that I have participated in 2 seperate events for free coins, and when I went to collect my reward it glitches and I lose out on the free coins. As far as I can tell there is no way to contact them when something like this happens. A Google search for support just takes you to there FAQS forum which doesn't help. I guess use the app, but don't bother with the events.

I used webtoon nearly daily about 6 months ago, then my phone broke and I had to wait to get a new one. I forgot about Webtoon, but once I remembered it, I was excited. All my favorite storys must have gotten tons of new episodes. And then, the new Pass was revealed. I didn't mind fast Pass,Daily pass is stupid. Part of the charm to the comics is that you can spend 30 minutes sitting down enjoying your story chapter by chapter. Now imagine taking all of that away, to 1 chapter. Very short read.

title: Wattpad - Read & Write Stories
description:
Wattpad. Where stories live.
Discover the world's most-loved social storytelling platform. Wattpad connects a global community of 90 million readers and writers through the power of story. Download it today to start reading or writing original stories.

Get your story discovered
Have your own story to tell? Get it discovered through the power of community and technology on Wattpad. Share an original story on Wattpad and share it with our community who are there to cheer you on throughout your writing journey. Think your story could be the next blockbuster? Wattpad Studios discovers untapped, unsigned, and talented writers on Wattpad and connects them to global multi-media entertainment companies.

Read original stories
Discover stories in over fifty languages from writers around the world! Whatever you‚Äôre into reading‚Äîromance, science fiction, mystery, comedy, action adventure, fantasy, young adult fiction, or fanfiction‚Äîit‚Äôs all on Wattpad. So whether you‚Äôre looking for more LGBT meet-cutes, cyberpunk fairy tales, or new technothrillers to devour, you‚Äôll find it all, and so much more, on Wattpad.

Connect with a community of story-lovers
When you join Wattpad, you become a member of an international community of story-lovers. Connect with other passionate readers & writers, comment directly in stories as you read them, and support writers as they create and share their original stories. You can even read together and share your library or create reading lists so your friends always know what you‚Äôre reading.

Start your own free library
Save your favorite stories to keep them with you wherever you go. Hooked on a story? Simply sync your account to easily pick up where you left off, whether you‚Äôre on your laptop, tablet, Kindle or iPhone.

Read the stories that inspired blockbusters
If you‚Äôve seen The Kissing Booth on Netflix, streamed Light as a Feather on Hulu or read New York Times best-seller Anna Todd‚Äôs series After, you may not know‚Äîthese stories were first discovered on Wattpad. Join the platform the entertainment industry scours to find its next big hit, and start reading tomorrow‚Äôs box-office sensation today.



Already a Wattpad fan? Follow us on Instagram, Facebook and Twitter to stay up-to-date on your favorite writers, stories, contests, and more!

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wattpad/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wattpad/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wattpad

comments: I LOVE THIS APP. I've had it for about 2 years now and it works perfectly. The updates are working and I don't experience any glitches and problems. All my favourite books are written on the app and getting to know the writers and the rest of the Wattpaders is really awesome and fun. I can write my chapters properly, only problem is, I'm worried it does not save or publish properly as it gives me false information and can be confusing. But nonetheless, great reading app!! Highly recommended.

Helloooo. I'm writing this to say that I like the previous version of wattpad. When I open the app, it doesn't take long for the stories to appear. Now, I still need to open the internet to see my library which is a bit of a hassle. If I may recommend, please return the previous versions. The one without the need to download offline stories, because seriously, I don't like the update. I've been on wattpad since 2011 and so far, this is the worse update for me.

The app itself is good but lately, i have been experiencing a lot of events such as one time I was writing a story that was worth about 600+ words but then a warning popped up saying "wattpad has suddenly stopped" which as you may know, all of the things i written wasn't saved. It broke my heart because I've been wanting to finish i but I have to restart and write it again. I hope that you can fix this. If so maybe the problem is my device.

I'm using wattpad since 2014. Every year I saw how it changed. I'm missing the old wattpad when there is no Ads (every chapter), you can read different stories without paying for it, and you can add many stories in your library. Idk, what are the creators are thinking, lol. I just hope that the next update will get more better (lessen the ads and remove the limit of stories you can add in your library for offline reading)

I totally want the Old Wattpad back. Everything is far different of what I used to love about this app. I've been using this app for almost 10 years and I know that the creator wants to improve it and earned money from it but this is too much. I have been experiencing some moments when I can't read because I need to connect to Internet but I'm already connected and that confuse me...

comments: I have used both paid and free photo editing apps, and I have to admit this photo editing app is absolitely Awesome in comparison to all the free and paid P.E.A. combined!! It has nothing to do with it being mosty free, which is up to you to pay, but with all the free options, I have no idea what's included with the paid version! A MUST DOWNLOAD!! ABSOLUTELY NO REGRETS!! Thanks so much for such an awesome Photo Editing App!! Keep up the AWESOME WORK!!

besides the excessive ads and the impending fear of not being able to use the app at all (for the purpose I downloaded it for) thanks to the forceful hand of a monthly-paid membership,, this app works great. it's literally the only thing I've found where I'm able to edit moodboards the way I've been wanting to, so I thank it for that

This app is absolutely amazing. I have been using it for like 2 years now. If you understand all the features (which are so many), you won't ever need any other photo editing app. It has no logos after making a collage or editing, great layouts , different sizes with ratios and options while making collage to crop , swap , delete , anything. You can choose the border or just have no borders. it's just awesome. Thanks for the app makers.

Like flying for the first time. Like a pool on a hot summer day in Modesto. Like a cup of hot chocolate on Christmas. Like checking ALL the boxes on your daily to do list. Like having all the laundry folded after watching an episode of the magicians, except that towel you used to wipe your tears with. Like strawberry bingsu in loser angeles in August. Like hugging your mom. Like reaching Challenger in Starcraft. Like making before after pictures of when you finally clean. Like comment subscribe.

Very nice app ...I accidentally uninstall this up and I almost cry ..good thing after searching for days I found it..this is very useful in making invitations..I just wish you add more text options, calligraphy,and color like gliter effect on text .good thing this is update new effects were add..kudos to the developer..keep up the good work.

title: Big Big Baller
description:
"Where Am I? In a city?! Oh hi~ you little cute car! Oops, I'm sorry!"

The ball crushed a car accidentally, however, the ball seems to get bigger!

That's interesting, let's see how big it can get and crash everything in your sight!

You can also crash other player's ball which is smaller than yours! 

Now, time to roll over the amazing city!

Features:
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Simple rules but very attractive
* Lots of interesting challenges
* Beat other players and stay alive

comments: I love this game so much.. I play it all the time.. However I purchased coins twice for $4.99 and NEVER got them.. And just now I subscribed to become a VIP player and it didnt give me that either.. PLEASE FIX THIS!! Im spending my money and not getting ANYTHING.. I dont want to get rid of the game because of this issue!! Please!!

The game would have been 5 stars but lost all stars when I paid for a special pack with a "special" ball skin, coins and to remove adds, they took my money but never gave me the bonus ball skin, coins or stopped the adds.
Fun game. Needs games with more time, an endless mode, more maps. I'd pay for those things.
Not great for a Katamari clone. Simple controls. Really small map so you can swallow up everything in less than the timer.
Great game almost no ads!!! And such a simple home screen my favorite part!!! Thx

title: Pandora - Streaming Music, Radio & Podcasts
description:
Listen to songs hand-picked by some of the top athletes in the world on UNINTERRUPTED Radio. Their music, their vibes, their channel.

Pandora gives you a personalized listening experience that continually evolves with your tastes. 

Create stations from your favorite songs, artists or genres, search or browse to find recommended stations for your mood or activity, and discover podcasts that speak to you. Download today and get instant access to your favorite artists and podcasts, while staying up to date on the most recent singles and releases. From rap and pop to rock and country, play your favorite artists and stay up to date on today‚Äôs top hits and releases. Start streaming all of the current global hits and enjoy your own personalized music experience. 

Take Pandora with you wherever you go with Android Auto for your daily commute or your next road trip. Enjoy your own personalized music or podcast experience from anywhere on the world‚Äôs most powerful music discovery platform. The new voice mode lets you search, play, pause, skip adjust volume & thumb up music with a simple voice command. Start streaming your favorite artist, song, genre, or podcast instantly today for free in your car.

With Podcasts on Pandora, find your favorites and listen to personalized recommendations that actually make sense. Just search on your mobile phone or tablet and play to start listening, then tap + to add to your collection. Find something new by simply browse and tap recommended podcasts to find over 1,400 podcasts, including SiriusXM shows, on-demand whether you're on Pandora Premium, Plus or Radio.

Looking for more?

Meet Pandora Modes - The new way to customize your station experience. Choose from six different modes to switch up the kind of music you're hearing:
‚Ä¢My Station: The station experience you know and love.
‚Ä¢Crowd Faves: Hear the most üëçsongs by other listeners.
‚Ä¢Deep Cuts: Hear less familiar songs from station artists.
‚Ä¢Discovery: Hear more artists who don't usually play on this station.
‚Ä¢Newly Released: Hear the newest releases from station artists.
‚Ä¢Artist Only: Hear songs from the station artist.

Pandora Premium‚Ñ¢
Subscribe to enjoy personalized on-demand music and podcasts

‚Ä¢ Search and play your favorite songs, podcasts, albums and playlists on-demand
‚Ä¢ Create playlists, not worklists ‚Äì on your own or powered by Pandora
‚Ä¢ Download the music you want for offline listening
‚Ä¢ Unlimited skips and replays
‚Ä¢ Higher quality audio
‚Ä¢ Listen with ad-free music

Pandora Plus‚Ñ¢
Subscribe to enjoy personalized radio with ad-free music

‚Ä¢ Unlimited personalized stations and podcasts
‚Ä¢ Up to four stations for offline listening
‚Ä¢ Unlimited skips and replays
‚Ä¢ Higher quality audio
‚Ä¢ Listen with ad-free music

Pandora Plus subscriptions are $4.99 per month. Pandora Premium subscriptions are $9.99 per month. You‚Äôll be charged as a recurring transaction through your Google Play account. Pending trial eligibility, charges for Plus >($4.99/month) or Premium ($9.99/month) begin at the end of a free trial unless you cancel 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription month. Any unused portion of a free Pandora Plus trial period will be forfeited if you upgrade to Pandora Premium. You can manage your subscription, cancel or turn off auto-renewal through Account Settings in your Google Play account. Pandora is available to US customers only.

Some advertising exclusions apply. Skips, replays and offline features may be limited by certain licensing restrictions. Pandora may use large amounts of data, and carrier data charges may apply. For best results, we recommend you connect your device to trusted Wi-Fi networks when available.

comments: Ive been using Pandora for three years, and lately I've been having issues. Whenever I choose a specific song on my playlist it doesnt play it and ends up playing a different song on my playlist. I updated it and everything, and it still hasnt been fixed. I have no idea if it is a bug, but it needs to be fixed asap.

I've had continuous problems with pandora since I got it. I download songs and playlists, then when I try to play them, it says I haven't downloaded them. It never wants to open unless it has an internet connection, even though all I ever listen to is my playlists in offline mode unless I am actively searching for new music. And now today, with no warning or reason WHATSOEVER, it has erased ALL my music and playlists!!!!! My advice is don't waste your money.

I use it just about every day. The app will automatically close if I pause a song for 1 min to do something on my phone. The app will close and I have to restart it and the playlist. super annoying. I've un-installed and re-installed it, and that helped the crashes that everyone, including myself, used to have. It didn't help the pause and automatically closing issues...I've checked my phone settings on my old Samsung10 5g and they're cool...it is the app that is the issue.

I've been a Pandora subscriber for several years now. I love no ads. Since Last update, Pandora just stops working and closes. I thought it was my phone. Then I changed phones, for other reasons. Still plays for about 15 minutes before having to reopen the app. I hope that bug can be fixed. I have to see all that work fine tuning my stations be all for naught.

Used to work great but now it will shuffle through all songs without playing them , the songs will pop up then the next one will pop up while no music is heard or can be played. I've uninstalled multiple times and can't figure out the issue. I want my refund back because I can't use the app or listen to the song I want

title: AT&T Navigator: Maps, Traffic
description:
Beat traffic, find cheap gas price options easily, share your travel details, explore local places and more with AT&T Navigator.

No matter what the journey, navigate your way around traffic in real-time using AT&T Navigator, now powered by more than 100 million traffic sources; whether it‚Äôs your daily commute, shopping with friends or taking in local city attractions. Use AT&T Navigator to plan your trip with real-time traffic updates, GPS-enabled multi-route recommendations, one-touch traffic avoidance, commute times and more.

We‚Äôre making it easy to navigate when a GPS signal isn‚Äôt available with downloadable maps. When downloadable maps are active, this feature minimizes app data and battery usage. You can also easily share your journey from anywhere along your route with our Share ETA feature. Send your friends and family a temporary link displaying your ETA and a live map of your route so they get your travel details even before you arrive.

Powered with more than 142 million local reviews and ratings from Yelp and TripAdvisor, AT&T Navigator also lets you discover top local restaurants, best places for coffee and drinks, hotels and other recommendations. See what the Yelp and TripAdvisor communities have to say about shopping, restaurants, hotels, bars and nearby attractions. AT&T Navigator will be your trusted guide to help you explore your city with detailed maps and recommendations no matter if you want to eat, shop, drink or play.

SUBSCRIPTION CHARGES & OPTIONS
New to AT&T Navigator? Try AT&T Navigator for free* for the first 30 days and enjoy a robust set of navigation features. Unless cancelled, at the end of the 30-day period your account will automatically be billed $9.99 per month. You may cancel at any time. See Subscription Cancellation & Changes for additional information. 
A free**, limited features version of AT&T Navigator called Basic Maps is available after you download the AT&T Navigator app. 
**Data & messaging rates may apply for app download & usage. 
*First 30 days free for new subscribers only, otherwise $9.99/mo. Cancel w/in 30 days or you will be billed $9.99/mo. Cancel anytime at att.com/mobile purchases or call 800.331.0500 (or 611 from your mobile phone). Basic Maps option is avail. w/ no monthly subscription charge. Data & messaging rates may apply for app download & usage. Compatible phone w/elig. data plan req‚Äôd. Phone‚Äôs internal memory space is needed to use offline maps feature. App may use personal info, including location. Use governed by AT&T‚Äôs Privacy Policy found at att.com/privacy.  AT&T is not responsible for any third party content and services including coupons.  Participating merchants are solely responsible for the processing and redemption of coupons and related offers. Other charges & restr‚Äôs may apply. Visit http://att.com/navigator for additional terms & conditions.

You took the time to tell us what you love about AT&T Navigator, and what you want changed. We listened and made some updates. Let us know what you think. Send your comments to support@telenav.com, Subject: AT&T Navigator for Android.

We want to keep hearing what you love about the app and what we can do to make it even better for you.

comments: Quick,easy,eliminates the frustration of blind driving,"gives you an overhead view" Thanks.
this app can be really slow at times but for the most part i really like it and it is very helpfull
All of the directions given with the AT&T Navigator or exact! And if I hadn't had the Navigator I would never have found my way around out west and in Las Vegas!

I like that it gives you the location you are currently located in, upon opening the application for usage. The only reason I gave it 4 stars, is because if you are on the AT&T network, it would make more sense to not need to have paid for a monthly subscription, and also because the basic mode, that is free of charges to utilize, but only if you do not agree to the upgrade charging your phones billing account, does not use verbally (spoken) directions, to assist the device owner, or individual using the application for navigation, to hear the directions; you must look at the device you are using to see the navigational directions in this application, which I personally feel is a contradiction to the "It Can Wait" campaign.

this is a sleazy app. I just got off the phone with AT&t after finding out that I've had a 2-year reoccurring charge for this application. I have never used this app I only use Google maps, so when I ask for e-mail verification or some kind a verification where I would have agreed to the monthly charge they stated that sometimes it comes through text messaging so if you click on the link that is your agreement for your monthly payments. At least I got a $30 credit out the $240+ I already paid.
