comments: Used to be good. But the non stop ads with annoying loud noise everytime you open an image is unbelievably a waste of time. Its non stop and continuous. Uninstalled. Edited: Thanks, at least the auto noise is disabled but now, every time you try to edit, there's a pop up ad, even if you are still editing the same picture. That's just too inconvenient and waste of time. Too bad. Found new app that at least lets user "use" their app without interfering.

I loved this app so much that I paid for a yearly subscription only to be told that after three months I needed to repurchase. I followed the instructions and tried to contact the developer with no response. Stupidly I purchased again for the 2 year subscription ( stupid I know) only to have the exact same problem. I tried to problem solve again with no resolution to this problem. Tried to contact someone with no response. I am out nearly $40 and very frustrated. Won't make this mistake again

Money grabber, of course. Allows you to use premium features that it doesn't label as such and THEN hits you up to start a free trial. $25 a year is not horrible, but I like the apps that give you a GOOD free version. And this one doesn't seem to have a good free version. I haven't decided if I want to support this app or not. I'll keep looking for sure. It also makes you sign up immediately with no guest option that I saw.

I like this app , it's amazing and easy to use. It's very creative, adjustable, let.you choose from alot of different veiws how you can design your photo. I just really like it , I'm glad I finally found an app for my photo's I'm always looking for photo apps. I really.enjoyed working with it.

So much design,options, color choices, and fantastic frames. This app definitely keeps me up all night! And, you don't need to be an artist or color professional. Designs and makeup applications you choose and can be proud of. The shades and lighting blend so easily. And with a plethora of filters and effects you are sure to be pleased and proud everytime. And list option gives you the recipe for your looks and makeup Choices. From brands to shadow patterns, and brow shapes you chose.

title: Google Voice
description:
Google Voice gives you a phone number for calling, text messaging, and voicemail. It works on smartphones and computers, and syncs across your devices so you can use the app in the office, at home, or on the go.

NOTE: Google Voice only works for personal Google Accounts in the US and G Suite accounts in select markets. Text messaging is not supported in all markets.

  You're in control
  Get spam filtered automatically and block numbers you don‚Äôt want to hear from. Manage your time with personalized settings for forwarding calls, text messages, and voicemail.

  Backed up and searchable
  Calls, text messages, and voicemails are stored and backed up to make it easy for you to search your history.

  Manage messages across devices
  Send and receive individual and group SMS messages from all your devices.

  Your voicemail, transcribed
  Google Voice provides advanced voicemail transcriptions that you can read in the app and/or have sent to your email.

  Save on international calling
  Make international calls at competitive rates without paying extra for international minutes with your mobile carrier.

  Keep in mind:
  ‚Ä¢ Google Voice is currently only available in the US. Google Voice for G Suite users is available in select countries. Check with your administrator for access.
  ‚Ä¢ Calls made using Google Voice for Android can be placed through a Google Voice access number. All access number based calls use the standard minutes from your cell phone plan and may incur costs (e.g. when traveling internationally).

summary: A customizable phone number in the cloud
developerAddress: 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View 94043
recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Stability and performance improvements.
comments: Google Voice no longer works with the latest, official messaging app. Google is forcing us to use the Carrier Number, now. So, this app is no longer properly integrated with the Google ecosystem as it exists in 2020. It's so disappointing that I have to port my decade-old number BACK to the carrier just to use the latest default messaging app. What a mess, so frustrating, but I guess not the worst thing to happen in 2020 :/

I love Google Voice! When COVID-19 closed the schools I was able to keep in touch with my students and their parents without giving away my personal mobile number. I can call and send/receive texts on my phone and my computer. The best part is that I can copy text messages in their entirety and paste them directly into my Parent Contact Log. Indispensable!

Ive been with Gmail and Voice since they were in beta and invitation only. All they've done is improve over time. Always great call quality and its allowed me to always have the same number without caring about delays around porting my number when I've changed my carrier. Its the only number I give out. I never get spam or fraudulent calls. I suppose it's because of all that Google AI special sauce. Keep up the good work!

Works great on my primary mobile device, but will not receive calls on my spare phone. This appears to be a product defect, which limits GV's portability. Looking forward to a fix, which would earn it a full 5-Star rating from me. Update: Developer contacted me and it appears that I missed a key step. My bad. GV now rings through to both my primary, and spare phone. Upgrading to 4 stars. My secondary phone, LG Rebel 4, will vibrate only.

When people call, it goes straight to voice-mail. Even tho I have answered the call. They are leaving a message and I can here them and they can hear me and we both can hear the voice-mail recording but can't stop it. And 3 times I have been in the middle of a conversation with someone and it switches to a completely random person that I didn't call...and the person i did call can still hear our conversation (me and the new person) but we cant hear them. I will never use this service again.

title: Army Men Strike - Military Strategy Simulator
description:
Play like a kid, fight like a man in a war without limits! Recruit and train soldiers to build the most efficient army in history! Command the best warriors in this strategy game full of action.

Captain, the evil yellow army is at your door and outnumber your green soldiers. We need to prepare for war. Recruit, train and send troops and tanks against the military invasion.

Army Men Strike is the ultimate war game combining real-time strategy, tower defense, resource control and simulation gaming into a mobile experience! Based on the toy army of your childhood you must defend your flag against the enemy and attack using a powerful combination of tactics to win the miniature World War between your green army and the evil yellow toy warriors! Lead an epic army of green soldiers, remote-control planes, transformers and many other toys in RTS combat! Defend yourself against the yellow soldier army invasion and put your strategy to the test. Using your best survival tactics is the only chance to win.

Experience a great war game, recruit your toy soldiers, build fortifications to win territory and become victorious in this battle simulator. Target your enemy in this real-time military strategy challenge, take your warriors through tower defense battles, compete against other players to expand your territory until victory and earn prestige and glory in this story. Make your enemy go hopeless.
Let's go to the battlefield and start the military conquest.

Toy Tower Defense
‚Ä¢ Wage miniature RTS survival war.
‚Ä¢ Create headquarters, use the moneybox as your treasury, transport resources with your train, and collect metal with magnets in this battle strategy simulator. 
‚Ä¢ Adventurous and playful missions and battlefields make this war robots story interesting and fun.

Build Your Warriors Army 
‚Ä¢ Recruit the elite toys as heroes to lead your army and let the toy war clash commence. 
‚Ä¢ Use strategy power to build the best soldier army for each battlefield! Defeat any enemy in the frontline.
‚Ä¢ Upgrade armor, weapons, rifles and machine guns and promote your green soldiers and fighters to shooter flamethrowers, sniper men, tanks, artillery units, heroes and many more army troops.

Take Your Miniature Military Forces to Fight
‚Ä¢ Gather resources to upgrade your squad soldiers and shotgun warriors, shooter guns and base.
‚Ä¢ Create your tower defense with fortifications to keep war toy invaders hopeless at bay and increase your odds of survival. 

Real-Time Strategy and Army Tactics Adventure
‚Ä¢ Choose your military targets on every battlefield and plan your soldier hero conquest. Protect your territory.
‚Ä¢ Put your acting skills and strategy to the test against other players in the RTS survival combat simulator: This is not a toy war robot game, so use your best tactics.

Army Men Strike: Test Your Strategy to Win in the Front-line
‚Ä¢ Build and deploy your army battle troops and legion of military warriors to fight wisely in every adventure. 
‚Ä¢ Compete or cooperate with other alliances for the defense of your territory. Diplomacy or war, what do you choose, commander?

Your war toys are waiting for you to strike in this challenge.
It‚Äôs time to return to the battleground. Enjoy a toy game with worldwide players.

PLEASE NOTE.  Army Men Strike is free to download and play. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your mobile settings.

Under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 17 years to play or download Army Men Strike.
Terms of Service:https://privacy.volcano-force.com/html/tos/en.html
Official Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/ArmyMenStrike/

1. Fixed a display issue (After use) for Amaterasu's Active Skill-Oath.

comments: There is no strategy. Gather, do tasks, build. In the end the players that pay a lot of money have game buffs that cannot be earned. The designers deliberately degrade game performance at critical times requiring players to rebuild and thus spend more money to do it quickly. Update: It is obvious the developers do not test the operation of patches and new events. Each release has a fresh new list of bugs in the software and basic functionality doesn't work. Support is unable to resolve.

Seems a little like it was alot to throw at me at the begging but once I figured it out it seems like its going to be a game I will stick with and get into for a good while. Visionary wise it looks way more amazing then it did on the pictures so anyone who tries for a first time. Well if your reading this review and you haven't downloaded it yet it's a game you will regret not downloading if you pass it up.. Great game only reason its not a 5 star is because I just haven't seen enough yet!

So, it's an OK game for wallet warriors. Although stated in other reviews, one country in particular has a serious advantage, because the prices are high in other countries. Also, it is IMPOSSIBLE to be ahead of anyone whilst not spending money. This game also takes about half an hr everyday just to get most of the free stuff. There's a countdown of 105 minutes to get all the free stuff.... Time waster if nothing else. Just make sure you aren't a big spender. You'll lose thousands here.

After the major battlefield server merge I was left with my identity character name while all the levels that I had worked on earning for the past year and all my resources were reset back to zero with no instructions or notice on how to regain my resources my command center level was zeroed out from 24 to 0 what's the point if you're going to take everything from us that we've earned playing your game
Slows down tablets and crashes constantly. So much lagg and crashes it starting to get old fast. About to uninstall this game after 3 days of trying to play.

title: Microsoft Launcher
description:
Microsoft Launcher provides a new home screen experience that empowers you to be more productive on your Android device. Microsoft Launcher is highly customizable, allowing you to organize everything on your phone. Your personalized feed makes it easy to view your calendar, to do lists, and more. Sticky Notes on the go. When you set up Microsoft Launcher as your new home screen, you can either start fresh with your favorite apps or import your current home screen layout. Need to switch back to your previous home screen? You can do that, too!

This version of Microsoft Launcher has been rebuilt on a new codebase to make new features possible, including dark mode, personalized news, and numerous performance improvements (improved load time, less memory use, better battery performance, and fluent animation).
 
MICROSOFT LAUNCHER FEATURES 
Customizable icons: 
¬∑ Give your phone a consistent look and feel with custom icon packs and adaptive icons. 

Beautiful wallpapers: 
¬∑ Enjoy a fresh new image from Bing every day or choose your own photos.
 
Dark theme: 
¬∑ Comfortably use your phone at night or in low light environments with Microsoft Launcher‚Äôs new dark theme. This feature‚ÄØis compatible with Android‚Äôs‚ÄØdark mode settings.
 
Improved performance: 
¬∑ Microsoft Launcher now loads faster, uses less memory, is more battery efficient, and offers fluent animations.
 

TERM OF USE 
By installing this app, you agree to the Terms of Use (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=246338) and Privacy Policy (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=248686). 

Downloading Microsoft Launcher gives the option to replace the default launcher or to toggle between device launchers. Microsoft Launcher does not replicate the user‚Äôs PC home screen on the Android phone. Users must still purchase and/or download any new apps from Google Play. Requires Android 7.0+.

Microsoft Launcher provides a new home screen experience that empowers you to be more productive on your Android device. Microsoft Launcher is highly customizable, allowing you to organize everything on your phone. Your personalized feed makes it easy to view your calendar, to do lists, and more. Sticky Notes on the go. When you set up Microsoft Launcher as your new home screen, you can either start fresh with your favorite apps or import your current home screen layout. Need to switch back to your previous home screen? You can do that, too!

developerAddress: One Microsoft Way
comments: It's a good app. I like what Microsoft is going with it so far, with a productivity first approach. I would like to see some more customization options though, like App folder "Covers" in Action Launcher. You can have quick access to one app with a tap, while keeping the rest of the folders behind a swipe (or a long press). I like to keep a clean desktop, & that'd go a long way to cleaning clutter. I look forward to further updates & features.

Just seems to make sense so far after all the others that just come close but ever just get there. I've tried every one of them. They just seem to leave one particular area unattended to. This one just seems to basically cover everything. I'm sticking with it until I see something better. It's a delicate balance between form and function. It cannot be just about one or the other alone. All the others looked cool and all but, they seemed to have been uncompleted somehow.

I was bored of my system launcher after using it for 3 straight years. And eventually I came across Microsoft launcher and voila I loved it very much , it's very systematic and user friendly. There are few bugs and issues like "Your feed" doesn't load calendar events. But apart from that , it's the best launcher in the store.

Absolutely love this!! I love how we can customise literally EVERYTHING been trying to look for something like this for so long and never would've thought Microsoft has a launcher and it is this good! I downloaded it initially so I can sync the clipboard for the stuff I copied and pasted Little did I know this launcher is actually this amazing My fav is that the "subgrid", "your feed" and that I can swip vertically for my home pages Anyways 5/5 for sure!!

Absolutely brilliant. Clean simple and smooth. There is one thing I would like to see in a future update and that would be for an option to change the color of the gray overlay on left screen and the opacity. I personally would like to change this to a solid black to match my dark theme. Thank you for a wonderful launcher

title: Camera360 - Photo Editor + Camera & Sweet selfies
description:
1 billion people in the world are using this professional mobile phone App for photography and image processing!
Many stars and celebrities recommend this App for selfie and image processing!
20 years devotion to photography techniques, for the best of every photo!

[New Skin] Say good bye to exaggerated skin and say hello to tender and smooth skin. All details matter to give the best outcome.

recentChanges: [New] New Remover Pen, by touching with your fingers, the flaws on the photo can be eliminated
comments: I'm using this app for 5 years specially for picture editing, it used to be the best. But your update sucks. Hope you'll bring back the old, productive and useful interface.

I used to love it, now I hardly use it. Why fix something that's not broken. I don't like that they added unnecessary things to it. I enjoyed being able to put a natural filter, maybe edit out a blemish or two (which now I cannot seem to), and straighten my picture out. It was simple, easy to navigate and use. I don't mind the added filters because they're fun but the rest is too much. Leave the excessive retouching to Facetune, I don't need to make my face smaller, adjust the size of my lips, give myself a face lift, etc. Other have also mentioned the portrait mode, and fine adjustments that we could do back then like adjust separate colors, etc.

This was the only photo editing tool I needed until the update. All I had to do to get a "perfect" picture, was go to the facial editing section, put the smoothness to around 40, save & go. Every photo came out looking flawless and still real! Never overdone. Now, if it doesn't recognize a face, you can't even use the facial editing tools. Even if you could, the "smoothness" option is gone anyway. I have no use for this app anymore. I don't even know what to download instead. So disappointing.

Updated: This was far better before few updates. The filters were easy to access, there were multiple grain/particle effects in Adjust menu now there's only one; the overall user interface for photo editing was one of its kind before. So, this was my only favorite. Now it's more like other apps like Youcam and Picsart. Hope to see some old features back.

This app is useless. Take one photo, leave it for a few seconds, try to take another photo an dot freezes. Have to click the X 15 damn times to close it and then reopen only to have it crash again. Does the same tying on my other other, does the same thing even after I wiped out the phone three times, does the same thing no matter if I change the storage path from device to chip. The ads are annoying even when I subscribed. The popups for filters are annoying, if I want it I will select it.

title: BlockBuild: Craft Your Dream World
description:
BlockBuild is a game where you can put together a world to your liking. The only limit is your own creativity!
In this sandbox game you can explore the world, discovering amazing places and reassembling the cubes that form it however you wish.

To remove a cube, you only need to press and hold with your finger on top of it until it disappears. You need to be close!
You can select any cube from the inventory screen to lay down on the world. Then, just tap with your finger in the location you want to place it.

For any age, countless hours of fun!

You can create and save several worlds and create wonderful places.

Not only is this app for kids, but it's for all ages.

title: State of Survival: Survive the Zombie Apocalypse
description:
"It's been six months since the zombie apocalypse began. The virus has infected the city. Six months of terror, horror, survival, and fighting against zombies. You are a survivor and your friends are in a brave fight against monsters. Build a city that survives the constant waves of zombies. Welcome to the State of Survival. Ready for a strategy survival game!

The zombie infection has ripped across the country taking all of civilization with it. Now it is survival time, as the surviving military and government have gone underground. The world belongs to the infected now. It is time to build a city with a strategy to survive zombies and monsters. The plague is expanding faster, and the people need a hero! They need a survivor, since the only goal is to survive!
In this adventure, you can make friends or fight against other survivors. Shoot zombies with your sniper gun in fps mode. Death is coming and the battlefield is just for heroes, so build an army!
Do whatever you can to survive this horrible war. It won't be easy to win the battle. The infected are everywhere and you have a war against the zombie army on your hands! Resources are scarce and you must salvage what you can from the carcass of society. Build a new city, squad, and strategy to survive in this MMORPG. Become a zombie hunter! It's time for survival.

It's a new world out there. A new shooting survival multiplayer! Build a strategy and create your own story. You can plant a bomb or shoot the zombies in this strategy survival game! Gather gold, coins, and anything necessary to survive in this destructive time. Shooting is not always an option, you must build a PVP army! Target the zombies, end the horror, and survive the war! This game is completely different than other war games.

Rebuild
In the absence of the military, build up your settlement to form a safe haven for your survivors and the foundation for your post-apocalyptic zombie world. It is time for your tactics to become real! Fight vs. this virus of the walking dead! It's combat time and you need to fight the invasion! Survive if you can!

Rescue
In this survival game, you get to save survivors from the battle to increase your numbers and strength to fight each infected zombie. Locate those with special abilities, as they will be the heroes of the plague war! Shooting time!

Research
The zombie army disease is mutating rapidly. As a survivor you need to learn whatever you can to understand it and build your strategy before the invasion of the zombies. Whoever can control the infection controls the world! There's a war out there and it's all about survival! Stop the apocalypse!

Socialize
There is strength in numbers. Make allies and forge strategic partnerships to survive the horrors of the infected wilderness in this strategy survival game. Join armies to pulverize anyone who tries to take advantage of you in the battle and be ready for the war against the zombies and the apocalypse. Your survival is at stake!

Rip up the Rulebook
It's humanity 2.0. Rewrite the rules on how you want humankind to survive and defeat the invading army. This is a survival strategy versus zombies shooter game and there's no military to rescue you. It's completely different than other military war games.

Customer Service Email: sosgame@kingsgroupgames.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheSoSGame
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVSyGzN8MqTfZ9W3pHC5Htg"

comments: Good game, I hated seeing the ads all over the place making it seem like something else entirely, but I downloaded this because it would get me extra diamonds in the Animal Restaurant game. So far I love it but I'm at the point where it's taking hours to do tasks and soon it will be days and weeks according to what others have said. It's a shame, since it's a well made game but at least it's not as egregious as FFXV A new empire.

Great game to begin with but soon becomes boring when your settlement is constantly attacked by rival factions to bully you out of the game. I've got better things to do than play games with immature players who think it's clever to attack players who are weaker than them. There's insufficient opportunity to defend yourself against attack, and no control over more powerful players hitting weaker players over and over again. Plenty of aspects of this game need improvement. Not good for players.

Dont get me wrong, guys. I am still playing it to the very end (which is right after the corner) but i just cant give this game more than a one star. Why? Well... The game itself is good, if not for absurd donate system. There are certain items u just cant get without donations NO MATTER WHAT YOU DO. When i discovered this ( after like 2 months of playing) this fact alone just CRUSHED me, killing any joy and will to play, because no matter how long and hard i try, ftp player wont reach the top.

Good but after last update now game will not load. Tried to reload last update still have same issue. Version 1 9 42 1000 day 3 still does not work. I wonder if you are working on this problem. Just updated game t0 1 9 43 1014 still no change game stoped mid way in the load of base. Still can't load game, no new up dates. Nothing new game still will not finish loading. Hopefully the next update will work, this one was very poor.

Great game.. been playing for sometime now. However it be nice if we could expand more of our settlement with added features such as building vehicles to travel instead of always walking. Make first vehicle free but upgrades are earned same as hero's. Through progression of game play... second review still love the game but still think changes can be made for better game play.. thanks kingsgroup holdings definitely would recommend if these slight changes can be made

comments: It's a fun game most of the time. Addictive, too. But sometimes the game seems determined to take all your coins back, and I don't know if that's on purpose to make you buy more, or what? Edited: After gaining more experience in the games, and winning quite a bit, I do appreciate the "lifelike" experience, but still find certain things a little frustrating, such as a challenge to get 40 Sloto Card Stars to complete my Daily Dash, and taking until 11:59 pm to be awarded enough Cards to finish.

GLITCHY THEIVES! The game was fun until it started to glitch! Then the reels would spin and not stop. I updated it hoping it would be better but it just made it WORSE! I tried to turn in my stars for a spin on the Super Wheel, not only did the wheel not stop spinning but once the error message appeared my cards and stars were GONE! I didn't get any prizes for them or compensation! Like I said, GLITCHY THEIVES!!

It's good that there is no ads to worry about. The game flow is fine. But if I decide to put money into this game I find no real gain from it. Game goes into immediate lockdown. It will run me right out of the coins I paid real money for. This isn't a real casino. I dont stand to win real money. If I pay for chips I expect to get a boost out of the game instead of being shutout. Not a good business model. You can change your algorithms on your game. Make it worth players time. We pay. You don't.

As John Goodman says you never know what today will spin! It is an exciting game, the graphics are great and you are not constantly interrupted by ads! I count some of the people in my clan as friends, we play as a group on challenges and it is competitive fun! New games and challenges keep it fresh! Once you play Slotomania, you will not want to play other slots games. It's that good! The seasonal games and prizes are terrific! Grafics are terrific!!!

I'm through buying anything in this app. Real life happens to everyone. In the last three days of NOT buying, I've received a star spin in half hours and hour spins ONCE !!! can tell you when I was buying, it was almost Everytime spin stars. They let me know how they are I'm a level 2679 !!!! I'll still play with my clan, but No More Buying !!!!!

comments: I don't see the downside to this game it's fun you don't have to spend a dime it's your classic coin drop just with a chance for free stuff I don't know if it's real but they do have an Amazon gift card prize you get items from coin game to turn in to be entered for a chance to win the card. But mainly it's just a fun time waster with little quests added in for more fun

EDIT.. Well you've well and truly screwed up this update. Now when I have a prize available after collecting enough special coins I click on it to collect my prize. The coin walls pop up half way and all info dissappears off the screen like coins, level, boosts etc oh and when the coins fall off at the end.. They just stay there.. Building up in a great big pile. And you never did sort out the coin regeneration issue.. I should have well over 65 coin limit now.. But instead it's about 44.

Don't get all prizes won, been playing for months high level, only got 250 coins twice in spins. Was playing halloween game, everytime I tried to open it to get prizes the whole thing locked up, I finally got frustrated and uninstalled then reinstalled started from beginning lost all prizes, levels, dd and all levels, I'm not starting over I'm just going to uninstall and play coin pusher you always have plenty of coins. Very disappointed in this game very poorly designed.. bye
After update it's full of glitches, was fine before and would have scored much higher!
I can't collect my goddamn prizes because every time I click the button the walls don't even go all the way up to go halfway up and I lose the screen it's pathetic

comments: Change the distribution of the ads. Big block up front and, less ads in the middle. This layout is just really disruptive. If the app were glitch free it would be more acceptable but, it's full of bugs ON TOP of all these disruptive ads. I keep getting a buble notice about an "Error Changing Position."

Does not work. They wont let me sign up. I want to be a member, but it just keeps saying "we cannot create an account for you at this time." I even read and agreed to the terms and conditions of the app and they still wont let me. Also, when I try to play a movie, the ads are endless. And when they end, it's just a screen with the crackle logo. I would rate this -1/5 stars if there was an option to do that. Plz do not install. Download Tubi or Pluto instead.

This has to be the most bug filled app I've ever downloaded. There's actually some good content on here but actually being able to watch it after casting to the TV is near impossible. It often will start playing shows that are next to the one you click on and after ads will frequently restart the episodes.

Note to Samsung TV users: Do not DOWNLOAD the app! Please use smart view through your phone instead... You will have little or no freezing.... Downloading the app to your set, you will experience freezing (and a lot of it)!
Nice to have access to the content, but ad times a long AND if you pause at any point, it revert to the last Ad and replays all of them.

title: Last Shelter: Survival
description:
To survive or to turn into one of the walking dead, the choice is yours!

Unique Features

-World Wide War
Battle enemies across the globe, lead your Empire to greatness and fight until the last man's standing.

-Realistic Graphics
 Everything from the units to the maps to the heroes seems very realistic and creates a complete post apocalypse experience. 

-Build Your Wasteland Empire
Absolutely Free City Building, facilities upgrading, R&D, warrior and survivor training and powerful hero recruitment just for the sake of living a new day to conquer the new world!

-Hero System
Whether you like to attack your enemies from distance, defend at close quarters, or enjoy developing your base or farming, there are TONS of heroes that can help you with all that!

-Strategic Gameplay
One set of units just simply cannot conquer, Warriors, Shooters and Vehicles, you have to know your enemy and yourself to walk this World War Z kind of wasteland

-Alliance Warfare
Whether it's going against different servers, or fighting for the title of the president at home, your alliance will always be backing you up, as long as you find the right people of course.

Join us on Facebook & Twitter
https://www.facebook.com/LastShelterSurvival/
https://twitter.com/LastShelterSurvival"

comments: Overall it's fun. It's hard to advance quickly without paying. Joining a strong alliance is important, otherwise you become a farm for everyone, making it even harder to level up. The game can require a lot of your time, which makes it difficult to join a super active alliance if you want to have a real life. It would be nice to have a doomsday option available in lieu of eden.

Though most games design their algorithms to promote purchases to progress in the game but Last Shelter provides misleading information on their packages to sell which is highly unethical and malicious in nature. I tried to report the same few times but there is no support from the developers. You cannot even view your last purchases packages nor the complaints raised against them. There is literally no log or history of anything which is very weird. Finally, I have reported the same to Google and looking for a resolution. I strongly believe that the developers must follow some basic morals and not dupe its users openly. I still play this game as I have made a lot of friends here. Also, I believe that only if we persist against there kind of malpractices then only we can make the gaming industry reliable and fun. Thus would continue playing this game for my friends and continue fighting the battle. Cheers!

Updated review..... Some of the gameplay has changed for the better. However this is still a multi million pound Chinese based money maker and pay to win is still a key component. The tasks and battles are all Beijing times, daily reset is 3am in UK so I lose out on lots of stuff. My advise is to not take it too seriously and don't spend money until you know you like it, as there is no such thing as fair in this game, it's a full on war game, but very addictive, fun and annoying. 2 year player.

Avoid it. This a MMORPG game AND a 200% pay 2 win. Don't think going far without any penny. Of course, you'll always find ONE player who reached lvl 25 for free... He needed 8 months at least, 8 farms and... 6 hours/d without any day off. Welcome to your NEW no-life, at the expense of other games ! You'll see it when you reach lvl 25 and T10 (best permanent army so far), because if you play casual like me, (2 y), you'll still be upgrading and must shield your base each weekend (or run fast).

Fun game so far. You need patience and persistence to build a solid base. Spending money is bonus but not mandatory in early levels. I've been playing less then a month. Update: Now after several months of playing, you definitely need to invest either in game packages or more time building farms or both to grow and be competitive. Hard to grow beyond base 18-19 otherwise.

title: Voice Recorder
description:
Voice recorder
Voice recorder - Audio recorder
Best recorder for sound recording  with high quality
Voice recorder application is totally free. It is simple and easy to use. You can reliably record your meetings, personal notes, speeches, lectures, songs. There is no time limits. This application can record most of your sound and voice. You can record a business meeting, a lecture, an interview. This app is a best choice. Other names which you can call it: voice recorder, audio recorder, sound recorder.

1. record voice with high quality

- Format file: mp3, ogg
- Play, pause, stop audio file.

- Delete your recording right from the app.

- not support call recorder

Hope you love this application.

comments: Would be 5 but developer wanted feedback. Its a recording app. Only way to screw it up is to cram it with ads and push for feedback. Either way. Guess it's nice to get a pat on the back every now and then. And they do deserve it. It's a pretty good app with minimal ad interruption. So if you need to record something download the app. And to the creator. Thanks

Firstly, I don't know why people give this app less than 4stars. Something is really wrong with them . This voice recorder is overall a very good app. The best feature I think it has is the voice editor. It is a blessing for me because my phone's voice recorder is just bollocks.... thats ittt !! So yes...well done.

This is a great app I have enjoyed using. It provides clear recording sound, allows you to mix background sounds with the lead recording, you can trim your recordings add introduce a different voice to your original track. Your can do all these and many on a phone... It's a great thing that I recommend. If there's a PC version please send me the link to download, if there isn't then I suggest the developer should his/her way to get me one. The video recorder from you will be great too. Bravo!

Love the app! Very good at picking up audio (sometimes even too good, but that can be changed in mixing). Would rate 6 stars if it had built-in filters that change the sound. But I get that this is a recording app and I shouldn't expect or even hope for that, so I will still rate 5 stars. Also, make it so the app doesn't fall asleep. I have a fingerprint phone, so it hears the vibration it makes. Again, a spectacular app. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a good sound.

Very easy to use. Recording and playback functions are upfront. The ability to share to email and other methods is very easy. Minimal ads and for a free to use product, it was worth it to watch a commercial here and there. Overall, I would recommend this app if you need a simple option to record a message or note or in my case a briefing that I had to do.

title: Best Fiends - Free Puzzle Game
description:
Be the HERO of the story! Join over 100,000,000 people who are already playing this top rated FREE puzzle adventure! Solve thousands of fun puzzles, collect tons of cute characters, and beat the bad guys as you discover the magical world of Minutia in the award-winning, original BEST FIENDS game!

* SOLVE THOUSANDS OF FUN PUZZLES Enjoy casual levels that are easy to play but hard to master!
* COLLECT CUTE CHARACTERS Build a team, level them up, and discover their special powers!
* PLAY DAILY EVENTS Win something new every time you open the game!
* COMPETE AGAINST YOUR FACEBOOK FRIENDS Earn massive rewards!
* EXPLORE A WORLD ON YOUR MOBILE Immerse yourself in dazzling graphics and finger-tapping music!
* DISCOVER FEATURE-FILM QUALITY ANIMATIONS Watch awesome Best Fiends content!
* STAY TUNED Lookout for regular updates bringing new levels, characters, and surprises!

STORY:
The little creatures of Minutia lived in peace and harmony until the meteor smashed into Mount Boom, bringing with it a strange force that transformed the Slugs who lived there into an army of greedy, greenery-gobbling pests. Now, the Slugs are taking over the world, munching a path through Minutia and sliming up everything they touch!

But a brave band of heroes is fighting back! Left alone when the Slugs conquered most of Minutia, these unlikely champions are on an epic quest to solve the mystery of Mount Boom and beat back the Slug advance. 

To get to Mount Boom, they‚Äôll need to become‚Ä¶ the BEST FIENDS!

PLEASE NOTE! Best Fiends is completely free to download and play but some game items may be purchased for real money. To disable this, turn off the in-app purchases in your device‚Äôs settings.

summary: Match and blast your way through 4000+ fun levels in this puzzle adventure game!
developerAddress:
Kaivokatu 10 A
00100 Helsinki
Finland
recentChanges:
PUMPKIN PICKING!
-Complete 30 Challenges and earn the fang-tastic Count Edward!
TRICK OR TREAT!
-Help Reapert with all tasks and he‚Äôll magically appear in your team to lurk there forever!
DAY OF THE DEAD!
-Finish 30 Adventures with Calavera Carmen and she‚Äôll join your team permanently.
NEW LEVELS EVERY WEEK!
-Stroll through the historic streets of Liberty Old Town with 10 NEW levels every Friday, Saturday, & Sunday!
comments: I think the developers are bored with this game. They seem to just be spewing out rehashes of levels and the only updates appear to be efforts to wind back rewards and get as much money as they can out out of players before they cut and run. From a good game to one of the most boring in a few updates. Got a few months free play then zip, uninstall. Don't bother, money grubbers. Not worth it.

I loved this game starting out but now that I'm in the 3000 plus levels I hardly win. The earthworm challenges are almost impossible to beat. Theres some fun little challenges but unless you can beat at least 10 levels you dont get the rewards. Be ready to spend a lot of money to buy gold to be able to beat levels. I've been playing since 2017 but I haven't hardly played in the last couple weeks. Probably gonna be uninstalling it very soon. Feels like more work than fun anymore

This game has become unplayable without buying gold. I'm on level 3650. You can spend hours doing one level which is boring. If they added one move each time you failed a level it wouldn't be too bad, but you have to fail numerous times before a move gets added. The league tables are a joke as well , instead of being called the "Championship of Great Britain" it should be called the "Championship of Who Can Afford the Most Gold". I used to love this game to the point of obsession, not now tho'.

It's a really fun, cute puzzler and the challenge is good. However I disagree with some of the micro transaction tactics. Constantly being left at the end of a level being 1 move short due to the RNG of the blocks dropping from the top where you need them to line up is very frustrating and you are tempted to buy extra moves with real money which I disagree with. The fiend styles are pretty cool though and are maybe worth buying to support the game. Not extra moves!

OMG, you keep changing how the game scores making it harder to earn points. Stop changing how points are earned. After 3 years of playing, I'm about to quit. I play games for fun and pleasure, not to be fustrated by playing a level repeatedly that can't be skipped. I'm going on a long break from this game. Hopefully you make it fun again when I come back. Also, File size is getting too big.

title: Board Kings‚Ñ¢Ô∏è - Multiplayer Board Games
description:
Roll the dice and build a board city in Board Kings, the coolest multiplayer board game!
Board Kings is the ultimate in online board games: play with your friends and destroy their game boards, while you grab the goods!

- Roll the dice to move around your board. It's your board game to play... and win!
- Build your own board city, grabbing coins as you go!  
- Travel to other players‚Äô (and your friends‚Äô) boards...and‚Ä¶
- Steal their stuff! Go nuts and grab away! Until the next dice roll, that is...
- Unlock new boards from all that board hopping - Yellow Brick Road or the Train
- Add to your board game album - collect all the stickers for awesome prizes! 
- Upgrade your game board‚Äôs sections to level up to the next game board!
- Enjoy over 20 fun multiplayer board games, with more game boards added each update!

 Hourly Board Game Goodies, Freebies and more in Board Kings! 

Play the coolest free dice game and get board game goodies galore! Free rolls, coins, gems, special boards and more are up for grabs on every board game hop!

- Hourly free rolls every single day (and more board game goodies too)!
- Win special surprise bonuses as you play!
- Invite your friends for more goodies - it‚Äôs a social mobile board game!
- Roll the dice to build famous landmarks like the Eiffel Tower to your game board as you play

All is fair in love and board games - you could even call it a game of life! Board Kings is probably the best board game of all time! Play with your friends! 

 A Multiplayer Dice Game Where You Destroy (and Steal) Your Friends‚Äô Stuff! 

Board Kings is one of the only multiplayer dice games where you can play with friends, then destroy and steal their stuff (and they‚Äôll still probably talk to you. Maybe).

- Visit your friends‚Äô boards...and then destroy and steal their goodies and more!
- Watch out - they might plan a revenge attack! Keep your stuff guarded!
- Get board game prizes when invaders land on your game board‚Äôs landmarks!

There are board game prizes and more up for grabs - why aren't you playing Board Kings yet? It's the coolest board game online!

comments: This is a fun and addictive game. However, it's really buggy lately. Customer service is a crapshoot. When I got assigned David Jarryd, he only responded every 24 hours, didn't understand English and either only partly solved the problem or not at all. I made purchases that wouldn't include all of the items. Their response on here is to contact them on FB. I tried that, too. No response. I highly recommend that you avoid this game.

I love it but sometimes lose the connection. But still the best game ever. I love the events please keep them coming would love events every day and maybe make available the chance to win more rolls some how as I always run out. Love playing with my friends and family but can we get more prizes and more options to add more friends and be rewarded for having over 30. Play every day and enjoy everytime so thank you developers for creating an exciting wonderful game x

This game was good. Don't bother buying anything from the store as after you do the game doesnt let you land on good tiles ever! My friend and I are on the exact same board is board appears to work fine and actually allow him to make progress. All I get is rubbish. Fix the game you money hungry fake creators

To be very honest, I really love the game and its addictive too. But I don't like when the level and dice counts increases, the time doesnt decreases because of this it makes less interactive to the game. As it seems the real problem what I'm facing till now. I think you must decrease the time because it makes people uninstall more early. I feel like that but I dint want to do that. I love the game. You should think of this problem.

Overall it's a cute game to play whenever. But, I'm constantly get false notification. Like while im playing every few second, saying my dice cap is full or mini games is ending soon. Literally getting these while I'm actively playing. Im always getting kicked out. I have spent more on this game than I should, I feel like you don't get much for what your buying. Even though I have bought packs, I still haven't got my last card of my album. I've been trying to get the last card for over a month.

title: Microsoft Outlook: Organize Your Email & Calendar
description:
Easily organize with email, calendar, and files in one app with Microsoft Outlook. With intelligent email, calendar reminders and contacts, Outlook for Android lets you do more from one powerful inbox. Connect. Organize. Get things done.

Email friends, family and colleagues from multiple accounts on one app and see what matters most first with the Focused Inbox that keeps the important messages on top. Switch between your emails and calendar to schedule your next meeting or share your availability with anyone with just a few taps. Email a document from your Files list or a photo from your Gallery and attach it easily.

Microsoft Outlook provides seamless inbox management that enables you to stay connected on the go. Outlook includes Office, Word, Excel, PowerPoint and OneDrive integrations to help you manage and send files and connects with Teams, Zoom and other video calling providers without hassle.

Customize email and calendars so you can stay on top of your busy day. Listen to what‚Äôs new in your inbox, organize  schedules and more. Find what you need with Search- it‚Äôs only a tap away or you can use your voice and ask for what you need with language you use every day.

Outlook for Android works with Microsoft Exchange, Microsoft 365, Outlook.com, Gmail and Yahoo Mail.

 MICROSOFT OUTLOOK FEATURES:

 One Place ‚Äì Email, Calendar, Contacts & Files
‚Ä¢ Email, calendar, contacts and files are all together in one place.
‚Ä¢ Calendar and file access right from your inbox.
‚Ä¢ Connected experiences with Office, Word, Excel, PowerPoint and OneNote.
‚Ä¢ Microsoft Office documents are accessible from Outlook, stored locally, or on OneDrive or other cloud storage.
‚Ä¢ Create and join your online video calls and meetings with Teams, Zoom, BlueJeans and Webex.

Organized ‚Äì Email & Day Planner Management
‚Ä¢ Outlook helps you stay on top of your day with customized calendar and email capabilities.
‚Ä¢ Know what‚Äôs Up Next in your day from your calendar with a glance at your inbox.
‚Ä¢ Email inbox management displays your most important messages first and enables swipe gestures and smart filters.
‚Ä¢ Use as an organizer & share calendars to easily coordinate schedules.
‚Ä¢ RSVP to invitations from your inbox and send a personalized comment too.
‚Ä¢ Add schedules from Facebook or of your favorite sports & TV shows through Bing calendars.

Intelligent ‚Äì Calendar & Inbox Organizer
‚Ä¢ Outlook provides helpful ways for you to stay focused.
‚Ä¢ Use your voice to find people, contacts, emails, events and attachments with Search.
‚Ä¢ Use suggested replies instead of typing out your message responses to get things done faster.
‚Ä¢ Email manager highlights actions for you through @mentions.
‚Ä¢ Calendar automatically updates with travel and delivery information.
‚Ä¢ Focused Inbox keeps important emails and conversations front and center.
‚Ä¢ Email organizer groups same subject emails and conversations for easier tracking.
‚Ä¢ Listen to your emails with Play My Emails in English and catch up hands-free to get time back in your day.

Secure ‚Äì Safe Email Management & Spam Protection
‚Ä¢ Microsoft Outlook protects your information with security you can trust.
‚Ä¢ Simple, secure sign-on to authenticate and protect your identity.
‚Ä¢ Email management with built-in protection against viruses and spam.
‚Ä¢ Advanced protection to keep your messages safe from phishing attacks and other online threats.
‚Ä¢ Microsoft security and privacy keeps your email, calendar, contacts and files safe.

Get management for contacts, email, work schedule, files and more with Microsoft Outlook today.

summary: Microsoft Outlook is your personal organizer for your emails, calendar & files.
developerAddress: One Microsoft Way
recentChanges: Sick of that company-wide email that everyone is still replying all to? So are we. Stay focused on what's important by getting it and all future replies out of your inbox and straight into deleted items with our new Ignore Conversation feature.
comments: Love Outlook! Always have! I've used other formats & platforms over the years, when working at someone else's house or office, or using equipment not my own, but nothing has ever come close to matching the complete package that is Outlook. It's extremely user friendly & even the tech-challenged can usually sort their way through pretty much any function, with relative ease. I have always used Outlook & at 55 years old, don't imagine I'll be changing anytime soon.

I use this for work. There is often an extremely long delay between getting a notification for an email and actually being able to view it. The email will be instantly available in Outlook online, but can take up to 5 minutes to load in mobile. The app sends notifications for meetings 15 minutes in advance, but clearing the notification in any way just results in the app resending the notification. Oh, it does the same thing with "meeting has ended" notifications. Atrocious app design.

On my old Samsung phone I had the outlook app and NEVER had problems with it. I have had a new phone for 2 weeks and this app has had endless problems. It freezes, it doesn't load emails, it won't send emails and every variation in between. I have followed online suggestions to clear the cache and data and yes the problem is solved for no more than 1 day. I have also uninstalled and reinstalled the app and again the problem is solved for a day and then back to having the same issues. Woeful!

Whilst I love the features of Ms Outlook, the app has pitfalls. I will receive a notification of a new email, click to review said email and it will be no where to be found. Refresh, refresh, nothing! However, if I go on the desktop web version I will see everything as it is to date. ... This app defeats the purpose of having a mobile service if I always have to draw for my laptop to review emails.

This version of Outlook (mobile, Android) seems appropriately scaled down to suit small screen and "keyboard" use and appears to have been optimised for email. Most (or maybe all?) of its original functionality is there, but some features might need a bit of hunting, until you learn how to find them. . Great to be able to use full strength email via phone, with that robust corporate look & feel that Outlook is known for.

title: Download Manager for Android
description:
SPEED UP! THREE TIMES FASTER DOWNLOADS FOR ANDROID
Download Manager also allows you to download videos you like onto your device at lightning speed.
Download Manager helps you easily enjoy funny videos without internet.
You can open the videos everytime you want saving internet traffic! 100% free! 
Download Manager enables you to search and share funny videos, status videos, trending videos, and so forth
We added a new page channel of video status and stickers for you
The most recent version uses our unique self-developed U4 engine that performs 20% improvement in web connection, standard support, video watching experience, personal information security, stability, and storage management in comparison with our last version.
Our small window mode enables the video window to be moved apart from the webpage, and hanged on screen top, while you expect to chat with friends, shop online or participate in other activities without video watch interruption. 
Videos for all tastes
Download Manager allows you to watch movie and TV series. The menu categorizes videos in different tastes: humor, clips, girls, anime, trailers, or even war films.

‚òÜ Free Download Manager for video download or clip, free downloads any type of file. 
‚òÖ We support all types like APK, RAR, ZIP, MP3, DOC, XLS or other files.
‚òÖ Download everything, video downloader for facebook, helper, browser,tube functions

authentication, integrity checking, support for all file types and life cycle management,  making downloading just a breeze with our app!

Fast app, files and website downloading speed

title: Lucky Day - Win Real Money
description:
Lucky Day is a 100% Free Sweepstakes App! 

Lucky Day is a free mobile gaming app that allows users to win money and prizes, no purchase is necessary.

Lucky Day offers free scratcher, lotto, and raffle games for a chance to win real money and rewards. With daily opportunities to win up to $100,000 in cash instantly, earn rewards, or enter raffles! 

Lucky Day is a free lifestyle experience on your mobile device. We change lives daily by offering hundreds of games for our players to scratch and have a chance to win real money instantly.

Play your free daily lotto and scratch cards for a chance to win real money and prizes. New scratch cards are available daily for your chance to win up to $10,000 instantly. You can also enter sweepstakes contests, raffle giveaways, and the daily lotto. 

Our mission is to give everyone a free chance to have a Lucky Day because we believe you shouldn‚Äôt have to risk losing for the chance to win! 

Lucky Day is 100% free to download and play with no in-app purchases or deposits. 

Lucky Day Features: 

WIN REAL MONEY
‚úî Win the jackpot prize of $100,000 by entering the daily lotto!
‚úî Win up to $10,000 by matching 3 winning symbols on the instant win scratch cards!

EARN REWARDS 
‚úî Earn gift cards from top brands including Amazon, Walmart, Dunkin Donuts, Target, etc.
‚úî Enter cool raffle giveaways to win HUGE prizes! 

ENJOY PLAYING DAILY
‚úî Enter the daily lotto and reveal the results at 7 pm PT for your chance to win!  
‚úî New scratch cards daily at 12 am PT.  
‚úî Bonus scratch cards daily at 10 am PT and 6 pm PT.  
‚úî Play Lucky Day for 5 minutes a day to test your luck and get lucky.  

Over $5 Million in cash and rewards have been awarded to Lucky Day players, and we have 30,000 new winners every week! Lucky Day brings you free scratchers, lotto, and raffle games for a chance to win cash and prizes. With thousands of real winners daily, you could be next!

comments: Been playing for awhile and got enough coins to cash out for a voucher, however everything is showing as sold out. I'm using the UK version so maybe people will have a better experience in other countries. Update I have logged in several times through the day and all show as sold out. I also do not understand the new piggy bank, how do you collect nuts and bolts?, how do you heist from other players?

It was good. Then it was not so good, introduced piggy bank... A way to spend tokens in hopes of winning more. Prize was tokens and blackjack hands. New piggy is worse.. I don't even get tokens, just get jerked around by the piggy. I know I will never get the last nickel to cash out at$10, doesn't bother me, liked the gift cards. I know I will never get anything from the piggy. I just keep coming back hoping I will get one last gift card. And I cannot find your help center.

Worst app ever!!!. Once you are approaching the minimum withdrawal then they won't give you any cash anymore and, I am just 0.15 away.They just let you watch a lot of advertisements over and over again. I won't recommend this app. Now they have an update to heist from some other players too. Nah it just goes on in circles over and over again.No withdrawal has been made.I have been playing it for a while. Highly won't recommend this app.

Waste of time. Period. Deleting now with no regrets despite being $0.25 away from cashing out (For 1-2weeks of multi-daily check-ins to the app). My gut says I'll never see a dime and my time is better spent elsewhere on games and activities I actually enjoy. Download at your own risk, but don't say I didn't warn you! Edit: After that response, I'm confident that I'm right. They make vague and empty promises so they can make more money through their scam.

Has been slow for cash payouts but I have gotten a few gift cards.. Now this app sucks. Doesn't pay out. You get enough tokens and all of a sudden its sold out... used to be legit. Beats paying for scratchers but man change the payout system back to what it was a year ago and I will change my rating back to 5 stars. Took a legit app and made it a SCAM or just near damn impossible to get any gift cards. Fun to pass the time but doesn't pay out anymore üôÉ

title: Google My Business - Connect with your Customers
description:
Every day, millions of people search on Google for businesses like yours. Make your Business Profile stand out and turn those searches into your customers with the Google My Business app.
‚Ä¢ Respond to reviews, message with your customers, and see your followers in the Customers tab.
‚Ä¢ Make edits to your Business Profile and see those changes on Google in real time.
‚Ä¢ Upload photos, create enticing offers, and share what makes your business unique.
‚Ä¢ See in one glance how and how much your customers interact with your Business Profile right from the app's Home tab.
‚Ä¢ Get real-time notifications to know when a customer connects with your business on Google. Focus on what you love and rest easy knowing that Google My Business is on the clock helping you get more customers.
‚Ä¢ Manage multiple locations from one dashboard, and invite others to manage your listing.

 Permission Notice
‚Ä¢ Location: Needed to use your current location as your business location
‚Ä¢ Contacts: Needed to auto-complete email addresses when inviting others to manage your listing and to make Bookings for Customers stored in your device contacts
‚Ä¢ Storage: Needed to access photos taken at your business location

comments: Useful but painful. 1. Has no integration between multiple locations of the same business. Each common problem has to be dealt with separately for each location. 2. Has no option to categorize photos based on events or pin posts or inform customers of other locations. 3. Doesn't give notifications when a customer sends a message. Despite all my settings being optimal. 4. Doesn't provide any option to reject updates done by other people to the business information.

Messaging option does not automatically sync to your previous messages and sometime doesn't even appear on your chat. You receive an email saying someone have message you but there's no one of responding. Once you change your phone over all conversations and previous booking is lost and you can't really do anything to get it back. Please fix this.

Scans all cards, shows you what funds are on each and how to reload, acquire or transfer funds. One simple sign in. It also is a real esate trust which shows you where all of your owned assets are and tells you how to retrieve these. It also provides all contact details for rehabilitation clinics in the world and offers a go now pay later option. It provides current contact details for your children that only you can see. It details a simple plan with checklist on how to create a good life again

Everything was going fine, then I opened another Google business account & now I can't get into my first website, every time I try to log into my first website it goes straight into my second website, this is so annoying, I spent a lot of time loading photos writing tx etc. & now I can't get into it & don't know if anyone has left me messages or comments.Please fix this so that I can use my first website. It doesn't say that if you open a second website u won't get into the first website‚òπÔ∏èüò•

We can't get verified! We have requested the verification postcard many times but they never arrived. All our other mail arrives without a problem. There is no customer service available ti be contacted in Indonesia. try and fix the issue. If you can't get verified then the app and service is useless. A surprisingly poor experience from Google. They need to fix this. I have paid for a domain under google cache, but can't use it until now, because it's need to be verified.

comments: Wow! I am so impressed with this App! It's very easy to use. It shows you how to do the exercises and it even counts the seconds for you!!! It's definitely motivating! Thank you for such a great app!!! The only thing I can't work out is how to use it on my IPad or laptop. It connects with my google account and phone thats it..... Be great if someone could help me get it on one of those devices please! üôÇ

I LOVE this app. It's AMAZING! There are exervcises for every training. You can even do exercises in your bed and office. This is so convenient and it also tracks your exercise and reminds you to drink water. I absolutely reccomend this app. It also helps you loose weight and keep you fit. Definitely recommend downloading this! Keep up the great work! üëç

Fantastic app with great fitness features! Way better than an app I paid 20$ for 3 months for. Ladies, give this a try. I'm finding myself doing a bit more and more each day. It's fun, easy, and comprehensive, yet challenging when you're comfortable taking that next step and increasing your duration and intensity. Very user friendly: great pause/stop functions and additional direction when you need a move or pose explained in greater detail. I should of just went with this!

Best of all. I have came across several apps to give me a proper plan to stick on. Out of all this is the best. Honest opinion. I wondered how it got high ratings and I downloaded. Ended up giving high ratingüòÇ Pretty sure you will fall in love with this app. Ads aren't that disturbing and the UI is pretty descent. Be honest with the app and it will give u a very good result. Go on with it.

I thoroughly like this app, I do have one issue but it isnt enough to drop a star in my rating. I would like the option to enter in workouts I have done not on the app. I do 20 minutes of cardio every morning and would like to track that with the rest of my things on the app. I will add the water reminder is incredible to have. I hate water and will go days without 1 sip other than to brush teeth so this is a huge help. Over all I enjoy using the app.

comments: I like this app. I really do. But I'm sorry, the watermark thing has to go. It's pointless, for what? Too much ads as well. I cant even download a pic without getting 2 or more ads. Have been a user since 2014.. please stop this watermark thing no one does this it's insane I love this app but that's too much .. listen to your users. Thank you

I have three suggestions: 1. Make your interface look better. It's a really early 2000s look going on and you can do better. 2. When you refresh your discover page it really does nothing but give you the same feed just with 3 or 4 new pictures at the top. I'm pretty sure you're not having a shortage of pictures or something so please improve upon this. 3. The watermark thing has to go. Period. Y'all wildin.

I used to LOVE this app to the point I was a heartist for 3 years in a row, I had deleted it for a while to come back to it being a money pit; want to download so many pictures you have to buy a membership, don't want ads buy the membership, ect. its ridiculous, the app used to be a fun outlet for creativity and now half my pictures are under review and its things like plants and art, I really miss the way it used to be, dont bother getting it anymore unless you want to spend $$ over pictures üò¢

title: Love Collage Maker - Photo Editor & Heart Frames
description:
Turn your favorite photos into a beautiful collage!

Love Collage is a photo collage app that will turn your pictures into a masterpiece. All that you need is fantasy. Create your own unique picture collage, decorate it with photo frames, try original effects and share it with your beloved or friends. Add a special caption to photo - it will show them your care and will make them smile.

Our photo collage maker has an inspiring and usable interface that will help you to reveal your creativity. With our various filters and frames, the creation of love photos will be easy and exciting. Just open the app and start: edit layout, add text to photos, make a pic collage, select filters, add stickers, use photo effects - enjoy! Don‚Äôt forget to write a few warm words or place some text on photo, express your feelings!

For example, you miss your beloved and want him or her to know about that. Browse your photos, place them in a colorful frame and add love quotes. You can even create a gift card for your mother not only on Mother‚Äôs day using our beautiful collage maker.

You can send your love pictures via messengers or social networks instantly! Moreover, you can print your photo montage and get a real gift card for a special case. 

Fancy photo collage editor will give positive emotions to you and your dearest. Become a collage maker, edit pictures and share your love images!

You haven't been a guru in photography? Develop your photo edit skills - creating your future masterpiece because our pictures editor is extremely easy to use and offers a lot of features to stitch your pics and make them look awesome!

Wanna surprise your sweetheart at St. Valentine's day? Our new collection of Valentine's Day romantic frames, stickers and emoticons is perfect for lovers, for couples, and for all people who cherish their feelings. Edit pics with love!

Create a love card with various love quotes like ¬´I love you¬ª, etc. It will be a nice surprise for your beloved! It's so easy to do ‚Äì just choose a photo frame you like as a base for your love card, choose a font and color, then add love quotes and, finally, send this amazing love card to your beloved via SMS, E-mail, Messengers or share via social networks.

Main features of the app:
- Tons of photo frames 
- Photocollage frames 
- Photo grids 
- Photo effects (sepia, 70's, 80's filters & more) 
- Stickers, emoticons & clipart 
- Text on the photo
- Photo frames and editing photo features: mirror, crop, rotate, brightness/contrast/sharpness adjustments & more
- Easy sharing via E-mail, SMS, Instagram, Facebook, WhatsApp & more
- Totally free

Love Collage is a fantastic photo editing software and collage maker for pictures that you would like to post online or share with friends. Let your fantasy unwind!

comments: My experience with this app has been a very positive one. This is my fall back app to watch movies when cable TV gets stale. I like to escape in an entertaining movie and can usually find that here. Many older and off the wall movies which works perfectly for my taste. Also some newer movies available. The ads are few and placed about every 20 minutes or so with 1 to 3 at a time. Much better than any other service period. Broadcast TV and cable TV should learn from this. Highly recommended !

Tubi is a good app. I had to change to a tablet, and why did I do that. Now I cannot watch anything without that condemned little circle going round and round every 10 secondsü•∂üò¨üò¨ Now I know we already have at least 3 ads going on in between recesses. These are still ok. But that blasted circle really gots*to*go. I don't know how its gonna happen, but its gotta go. If I cannot watch the movies, it makes no sense keeping the App. Same thing happened on a different phone. I'm hoping for the best

I like that I can pause or fast forward. I miss being able to hit the continue watching part because I usually have limited time and then have to start the show over. For example I was in season six of my kitchen rules and for whatever reason the continue watching part was removed and now I have to rewatch episode one or fast forward several seasons to get back to where I was.

I'm surprised by this app. I didn't think I would like it, but, thanks to the new chromecast with Google tv, I'm trying streaming apps I wouldn't have before. The ads aren't too frequent, and they don't last more than 2 minutes total. And the content is pretty diverse -- a nice supplement to the paid subscriptions I have. I just wish 1. The navigation was a bit smoother/more intuitive, and 2. I could exclude certain types of ads (such as political) from my account.

It was a great app I had no trouble. I for some reason the app is not working you should delet it and intall it again. Other wise it is juast google play. It happened to me and I just donlowed it again and it worked. The other time it was every thing in google play that was not working so the app is perfectly fine and great. I am giving it five stars.

title: myCricket
description:
Need a new life hack? Download the myCricket App!

Redesigned with you in mind, the myCricket App is simple, seamless and FREE. It gives you the freedom to manage your Cricket Wireless account anywhere, anytime with just the tap of a button.

What to Expect:

Account Home Screen
No need to wonder about the status of your wireless account because we‚Äôve made it easy to stay up to date on payments, plans, data, due dates, and exclusive offerings. 

Payments
Want to make a payment without the hassle of phone calls and store visits? Consider it done! Check out all of the easy ways to pay and save up to $60/year with the Auto Pay credit.

‚Ä¢	Credit/Debit Card
‚Ä¢	Cricket Refill Card
‚Ä¢	Gift Cards
‚Ä¢	Google Pay
‚Ä¢	Samsung Pay

Plans and Features
Our range of plans and features lets you choose what best fits your budget and lifestyle. Use the app to customize each based on your needs.

Data Usage
Tired of going over your data each month? Our data usage gauge and countdown clock will keep you updated so you‚Äôre always in the know about how many gigs of data remain each month and how many days of service you have left in your current billing cycle. 

Support
Maybe you need a question answered or maybe you‚Äôre little curious. We can handle both! Organized by categories and popular topics, we provide answers to frequently asked questions. If you hit a snag, one of our talented support reps are here to help troubleshoot. 

And lastly‚Ä¶our newest addition to the app:

Shopping
If you have an unlocked device and wish to switch from your current carrier to the Cricket network, we‚Äôll guide you through the seamless process of transferring your phone over ‚Äì all through the myCricket App!

Due to its user-friendly interface and useful features, people may experience the following:

Excessive smiling
Reduced stress
The urge to leave amazing Ratings & Reviews
A sense of accomplishment

But don‚Äôt take our word for it. Download the app for yourself and have something to smile about.

‚Ä¢ We‚Äôve gotten rid of those pesky bugs!

comments: Always easy to use and very helpful tips and things in the app. Also very easy to contact if you need to but you can find the answer to almost anything you need right am the cricket app. Super easy to change plans and features and it gives you the option to start changes today or at next billing cycle which I love. I have loved the cricket experience so far and I've been a customer for about six months now and would recommend anyone with a contract to think about switching. Low monthly plans.

EDITED Review: Initially it worked great. Five dollars off with auto pay via app. Cool, ty. Then it started saying my debit card wasnt up to date (its 2 months old) when all was correct. To pay over the phone or in person there is a "customer service" fee. So between the 5 I would get from auto pay savings and the fee I pay 10 additional dollars per month because of this faulty app. Essentially I have been repaying 1/3 of my bill due to their error.

Data stinks and my phone slows to fast and I have access unlimited data. U can't even get a new phone. I rather go to simply mobile or metro pcs. The phone I bought was from rent a center years ago, it's a Samsung galaxy J7(2016) version. So it's not a cricket model, I haven't had a cricket phone since several years because I was having problems with every phone. Metro will let you get a free phone for Switching. I'm on a very tight budget and fixed income.

Besides the fact that the app sometimes won't work. There is the issue that when you have a phone that's not working it's hard to get in contact with anyone. I've even tried the customer service line for my cell phone. But without being able to review the items that we purchase through cricket, they aren't really able to know when a company is providing crappy product. I've also had an issue with the last two devices that I've purchased not being able to connect to wifi!

Their websites don't work, their app doesn't work! Made faithful payments for over four years. Missed my payment on the 1st But it wasn't due till the 2nd. Tried to make payments all day on the 2nd and couldn't get through. Then I get charged $15 because I make the payment 9 hours late the day after. When you called to complain the manager will just hang up on you! Even if you don't swear! Worst company! Most of them don't understand English!

title: ZINIO - Magazine Newsstand
description:
ZINIO is the world‚Äôs first and largest digital newsstand, giving you access to magazine content from the best publishers across the globe. For over a decade, Zinio has delivered over half a billion digital issues in over 200 countries.

Download ZINIO‚Äôs award-winning Android app, trusted by millions of magazine readers around the world. With over 6,000 magazines available, you can browse magazines and articles on your favorite mobile or desktop device. Access your magazines anytime, anywhere - read them online or save them to read offline!

Featuring the best in Tech & Science, Food & Home, News & Business, Art & Photography, Lifestyle & Hobbies, Fashion & Entertainment, ZINIO connects you with the stories that shape our world from the magazines that matter to you.

Subscribe or buy single issues of your favorite magazines, or read free articles curated every day by our editors, from the most popular magazines across the world.

KEY FEATURES:

‚Ä¢ OPTIMIZED FOR YOUR DEVICE: Easily toggle between the traditional magazine layout and the innovative text mode for a seamless reading experience, built for your Android device

‚Ä¢ DISCOVER, SHOP, AND ENJOY: The largest collection of digital magazines from around the world

‚Ä¢ EXPLORE FREE ARTICLES: Read select articles for free

‚Ä¢ OFFLINE READING: Download your magazines to your device to read them whenever and wherever you want, even without an internet connection

‚Ä¢ EXCLUSIVE SAVINGS: Access deals exclusive only to Zinio and save on your favorite magazines

‚Ä¢ BOOKMARK AND SHARE: Bookmark articles to read later, or share them with your friends

‚Ä¢ NEW ISSUE ALERT: Be the first to read the latest issues of your favorite magazines with new issue reminders

‚Ä¢ GLOBAL NEWSSTAND: Our magazines come from all of the best publishers worldwide, including USA, Canada, UK, Australia, Africa, Asia and Europe


CONNECT WITH US ON YOUR FAVORITE SOCIAL CHANNELS
Like us on Facebook (facebook.com/zinio) & follow us on Twitter (@zinio).
