comments: Constant download errors until update fixed the problem. Works as advertised now! Thanks for fixing.

Almost unusable. My subscriptions expired, but I never received an email informing me about that. When I ran the app it never notified me about expired subscriptions. When I tried to open a magazine, it simply wouldn't open - no error message, just eternal spinning waiting icons. I only realized what the problem was when I was able to open older issues but not newer ones. I tried to purchase a new subscription, but wasn't able to find any way to accomplish the task - I could only find an option to buy an individual issue, which was NOT what I wanted. I've had it with this really crappy app. I'm switching to Readly.

I have been using Zinio for quite awhile now. Magazines downloads are high quality. No problem there. The reason I am leaving Zinio is the constant barrage of offers and sales notifications. If you want to be notified when a magazine is ready for download you also get their marketing notifications. It's constant and there is no way to opt out from them.

Just like everyone else, cannot log in after a factory reset, says a unexpected error has occured and check conection when conection is 100% ok. Also need the ability to store magazines on sd card as this app eventually will fill internal memory so you have to ditch previous magazines that you have paid for to read new editions. Just not good enough. The app also says that if i log out all previous magazines will be lost, WHY? We need to have the choice to SAVE with the option to save as a pdf

I can redo the review as Zinio did sort out a problem that meant I could not get recent editions like several other reviewers. Unexpected error try again, network. All reviewers got the same cut & paste answer After uninstalling and re- installing 3 times over several days it finally worked again. Seeing the app version numbers my suspicion is a faulty update caused the problems. The last re install had a different app revision. Zinio could have been more upfront if this was the problem.

title: T-Mobile Scam Shield
description:
Scam Shield protects every customer with T-Mobile's advanced scam-blocking technologies‚Äîfor FREE. And with our Scam Shield app, you can easily manage your anti-scam features. Plus, everything is saved on our network, so your settings will stay, even if you remove the app or get a new phone.



Features included with the T-Mobile Scam Shield app:
‚Ä¢	Scam Block: helps keep all likely scammers off your phone entirely, so you can answer more confidently.
‚Ä¢	Scam Reporting: identifies suspicious callers or fraudsters and helps prevent their calls from being received by you‚Äîor others‚Äîin the future.
‚Ä¢	Caller ID: reduces unidentified calls by displaying a caller's information, even if they're not in your contact list.
‚Ä¢	Scam Counter: shows you the number of likely scam calls blocked and kept off your phone when Scam Block is turned on, and the number received when it's turned off.
‚Ä¢	Mark Your Favorites: ensures that calls from important numbers always come through‚Äîeven if they've been labeled as Scam Likely.



Upgrade to Scam Shield Premium to enjoy even more call protection features. 

T-Mobile Scam Shield Premium features:

‚Ä¢	Manage your block list and send calls to voicemail.
‚Ä¢	Send categorized call types to voicemail.
‚Ä¢	Get information with reverse number lookup.
‚Ä¢	Get voicemails texted to you automatically.*
And more!

*Requires additional activation via My T-Mobile or app download.

https://www.t-mobile.com/customers/scam-shield-app

Upgrade to Scam Shield Premium to enjoy even more call protection features.

T-Mobile Scam Shield Premium features:

‚Ä¢ Manage your block list and send calls to voicemail.
‚Ä¢ Send categorized call types to voicemail.
‚Ä¢ Get information with reverse number lookup.
‚Ä¢ Get voicemails texted to you automatically.*
And more!

*Requires additional activation via My T-Mobile or app download.

https://www.t-mobile.com/customers/scam-shield-app
summary: Your call control center.
developerAddress: 12920 SE 38th St, Bellevue, WA 98006
recentChanges: Authentication/Login improvements and minor copy changes.
comments: Was working great but I didn't realize it was blocking phone calls from doctor's office, and similar places. No option to program it not to block those numbers so I have to turn the blocking off. Also everything prompts you to go premium...I thought the last uncarrier move said this would be free? Now it just feels like a additional ploy to get money out of us...sneaky.

It's been a long time coming for this app and finally its here Thank you T-mobile I no longer have to go through phone call after phone call. I would get more phone calls from scammers more than my own personal calls on a daily I never wanted to answer my phone cause I just knew it was probably a scam of some sort I can't explain how annoying that is. So thank you so very much T-mobile....

**Response to developer: Scam block is already turned on, it just doesn't work very well. Make the app better instead of blaming your customers please.** Doesn't block very many calls, but has blocked calls from contacts. That can be fixed by adding them to favorites, but it's still annoying. I liked it better when the TMobile system would say "scam likely" which seems to have been discontinued after this app launched. It sounds good but doesn't work very well.

Useless, reroutes spam callers to voicemail. Basic app notifications are locked behind paywall. Just download Google Phone cause unlike this it's free, it works, and you can mark callers as spam from the phone app immediately, unlike this where you wait hours . App has a problem where voicemail calls and unknown numbers call don't appear, so you cannot mark them as spam. The entirety of this should be free for all T-Mobile customers. Better yet opensoure it, so people can fix it.

At first this worked great. I wasn't getting any calls that ever said scam likely. Until the last few weeks I have been receiving four or five calls a day from a number that has the same area code and prefix as my number. I block the number, just to get another call from the same area code and prefix. Of course I don't answer. I block, they change the last four digits in their number and call again within 10 minutes.

title: Tumblr
description:
Tumblr is where your interests connect you to your people. It is a place for freedom of expression‚Äîto say what you want, however you want. If you want an easy and free app to share your artwork, thoughts, original GIFs, or edits and remixes of your favorite celebs, download Tumblr. It‚Äôs a place to find and foster a community where your interests are shared and respected. Tumblr is part of your journey. It‚Äôs a canvas to express your individuality and be who you really are, or what you want to be.

Tumblr makes it easy to find the things you like and stay connected with the stuff that matters to you.


Express yourself.
What do you find interesting? Tumblr is your canvas. It has video, photo, and GIF maker tools. You can also make text posts and add original audio or search for existing songs from popular streaming services like Spotify.

Be yourself.
Customize your blog‚Äôs colors, fonts, layout‚Äîeverything! Follow whatever topics you‚Äôre interested in. Find new ones you didn‚Äôt even know exist. Stay up-to-date with the latest memes, blogs featuring your favorite animals, and fandoms about your favorite TV shows, or bands (Kpop is huge on Tumblr!).

Connect with your people.
It‚Äôs a whole big world in here. Join millions of people in millions of communities across millions of #tags. See something you love? Reblog it to your Tumblr and start a conversation. You can privately chat with your friends in one-on-one messaging, or start a public group chat with your other people on Tumblr. Or just lurk, if you‚Äôre feeling shy. No big deal.

recentChanges:
Thanks for choosing Tumblr, a place to connect with others over shared interests.

There were some Explore bugs. Now there are not. Carry on.

Follow changes.tumblr.com for further updates and bug fixes.
comments: I recently switched to a Samsung phone. I'm an avid tumblr user. although the app for iPhone works perfect, so far my experience here has been terrible. I can't scroll through my feed without it glitching a hundred times! Whenever I reblog I'm pushed back all the way to the top of my feed and I lose my spot. plus anywhere you touch on the screen, it will start glitch out and do the opposite of what you want to do. I've been able to make it work, but they need to fix this immediately! üëé

Laggy, blurry images, and buggy. Even for just browsing, I run into problems. Reblogging anything takes you back up to the top of the page w/endless scrolling. All images are blurry and poor quality, plus there's some serious lagin loading them at times. Posting options are extremely limited and many core functions are missing. Overall it's clunky, frustrating and disappointing.

the app is basically unusable. Every time you reblog a post or even so much as open an image your dashboard will refresh and scroll all the way to the most recent post. Oh you were zooming in on a photo you wanted to reblog after 10 minutes of scrolling? Too bad it's gone now! Please for the love of god fix this, I know I'm not the only one with this issue :/

Please for the love of god fix the feature that skyrockets me back to the top of my dashboard every time I click on a picture, video, notes or reblog something. If you're going to have endless scrolling then maybe make sure that it doesn't lose its place every time I try and interact with a post. Sick of starting at the top and trying to scroll down to find my place again. And while I'm at it, how about fixing the video player so I can watch a 6 second vine without it buffering 10 times.

I like Tumblr as a website, but this app is terrible and has been for as long as I've had a Samsung. Each update only seems to make things worse. Less convinient, more clunky to navigate, and more glitchy. My notifications have NEVER worked properly, sometimes it just sends you back to the top of your feed, and the new tagging interface is an inconvenient pain. Please get everything working properly before adding useless interface changes we have to readjust to for no reason and LESS convenience

title: Matchington Mansion
description:
Decorate your mansion with a match-3 makeover puzzle game! Design new home decor & furniture by matching candy, power-up with levels and renovate your entire house, including your kitchen & garden. Download Matchington Mansion for match 3 makeover madness!

Match candy and play Matchington Mansion, an adventure filled fun game! Hone your interior design skills while protecting your house from a mischievous cousin, unlock new rooms, renovate your kitchen or garden and discover secrets hidden among the furniture ‚Äì all with a cast of quirky characters in tow. You can even spy on the neighbors and check out their room design choices. Are you ready to navigate this challenging match-3 home decor puzzle game?

Room Design & Match 3 Makeover Madness: Top 5 Reasons to Download:
Match & swap candy in a fun game to innovatively decorate your mansion!
Secrets, rewards and an intriguing narrative ‚Äì piece together all the hidden objects & learn new secrets
In-game characters to meet and interact with ‚Äì follow their interesting stories while you play
Play levels with tons of room design options & thousands of DIY Decorations ‚Äì unlock hidden areas for rewards
Power-up combos, incredible boosters, and tons of levels in a fun game of matching!

Decorate your mansion, power-up, and deck out your kitchen & garden in style. Unlock hidden areas for rewards, makeover each room with new furniture, and interesting home decor. Puzzle out Matchington Mansion adventure stories with innovative matching gameplay, aided by your friend Tiffany, quirky characters, and a house cat or pet dog along for the ride! 

Play Matchington Mansion for FREE, with optional in-game items for purchase. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device‚Äôs settings.

Download our match-3 adventure puzzle game ‚Äì the MM team sincerely hopes that you like it! We are working very hard on perfecting it, so if you run into any issues while playing or you have any suggestions, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out to us at mm@firecraftstudios.com.

More ways to learn about Matchington Mansion:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/matchingtonmansion/
or¬†search @Matchington Mansion to follow us.

comments: Good. Could be better. Typical match 3 game, tho it makes you think it's a strategy game. At least if you get stuck it won't take you weeks to progress like Candy Crush. But it seems like I have completed the same room multiple times. And it costs too many coins for purchases; especially since you can only accumulate them a few at a time.

Fun and exciting. U never know what's coming next. I'm about to change my mind, not so fun now. Using up all my points to greet people, pet dog, or find a key, and can't decorate the mansion. Crazy. Should not loose your points for stuff like that. Where's the decorating? Another thing, removing and adding a new sign should b on the same points.

Now I'm changing my review based on a weird bug. I won unlimited lives for an hour and 20 minutes and as soon as 20 minutes was up the game froze and refused to progress for no reason. When I pushed on the button for the next puzzle the UI disappeared. So I thought maybe it was a problem with the game installation and reinstalled it. Now I have zero progress at all and lost my halloween decorations which I was almost complete with. Uninstalled until you fix it and restore my account.

I love the game but some boards have taken me weeks, it's driving me crazy! But other then that it's a great game! I really like my Group!! Keep up the great work maybe make a few boards just a little easier!! I wish we could get another chance to do rooms we didn't finish!! I've been Playing this for over a Year and I still play everyday! Just a few fixes would make this Awesome! TY

It's a fun game. I've just started it, but so far, I've found it gives you a fair chance to win without buying coins, plenty of challenges to win rewards and extra playing time, and it decorates much more quickly than similar games, which is satisfying. Hopefully this trend will continue as I move up levels.

title: Last Empire - War Z: Strategy
description:
World BOSS is coming, let‚Äôs focus fire!
Gather the crowds! It‚Äôs killin time!

Protect your empire by shooting and battling the zombie army that wants to steal your resources in Last Empire - War Z, a strategy RPG and base building war game. Build an army with other players from around the globe and plan an attack with your own zombie army! Develop your kingdom and befriend empire allies to combat both zombie and human enemies. Do you have what it takes to be the strongest commander?

Last Empire - War Z is a zombie-themed free-to-play war strategy game. Combat Zombie troops and survivors to protect your empire against the upcoming zombie war. Team up with friends from around the world to build an army, increase your zombie defense strategy and participate in special events. Take part in brutal zombie warfare and build an army to grow your empire ‚Äì surviving the zombie apocalypse is in your hands in Last Empire - War Z!

Last Empire - War Z Features:

Strategy War Games & Empire Defense¬†
*Strategy war games pit you against an endless zombie horde!
*Empire building games ‚Äì Base building strategy that encourages players to work together and achieve powerful bonuses!
*Build a zombie defense strategy during in-game events and regular survivor challenges for great rewards!

Combat Zombie Troops with Alliance Members
* Combat zombie troops and other survivors during the zombie apocalypse.
*Attack zombies in real time on the world map and chat with alliance members worldwide!
*Empire allies battle with you to destroy zombie troops and other survivors to expand your empire.

Build an Army with Zombie & Human Troops
* Build an army of deadly Zombie Troops to destroy your enemies and defend your empire!
* Zombie apocalypse survivors can be recruited and upgraded with unique war skills and strategy.
* Strategy is everything. Varied Skill Trees allow players to enhance their heroes.

Build an army of zombie troops, battle to survive the zombie apocalypse, and defend your empire in Last Empire - War Z! 

PLEASE NOTE! Last Empire ‚Äì War Z is free to download and install. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in¬≠-app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.

Under our Terms of Services and Privacy Policy, Last Empire ‚Äì War Z is allowed for download and play only for persons 12 years or over of age.

comments: I am a late player to this game and i find this game very hard to play. People who are early players are very hard to catch up to and you will need to spend alot of money. It basically a pay to win...
Love the game, just takes way to long to upgrade stuff. Also the amount of diamonds to upgrade the zombies is just way to much.
If pay to win had a definition, I'm very confident this would be it. I've tried to play but when the dude who spent $200 on the game comes after you it's impossible to do anything.

The game is fun, but a lot of money is necessary in order to be competitive. Additionally, customer service is HORRIBLE! Because of glitches in the game, events are often dysfunctional. And even when screenshots are provided, customer service denies everything and never satisfies the customer. Additionally, when the desert oasis was "upgraded", I had bought a package that provided 10 additional territories, but I was only given five. I showed them multiple screenshots of their own ad, &.

I have been part of the Lewz community since November 2016. There has always been a gap between money players and those just grafting for rewards. It was manageable and we had fun. However, over the last nine months the additions and changes to the game have been vast and heavily weighted towards big spenders. Not only that. Previous purchases and efforts are being devalued drastically, particularly in the desert oasis event, re gold coins. Only option: REPORT to Google Play!

comments: Sorry folks,got to down grade my review. First: New players don't fall into the Facebook trap it's more trouble than it's worth. Second: I agree with other players in regards to the time it takes to get results back from tests, and to many ads. If you're that hard up for $ make the sponcers pay not the players. Third: come on guys, make this more player friendly and more people will play. That's a no brainer

I love this game! I've been playing it for many years. What I don't understand is why it says I have to download a separate app (for Travel in Time) when, in the past, it's let me use just the 1 app for all the chapters (Pacific Bay, Save the World, Mysteries of the Past & the Conspiracy). I would rather be able to use the same app like I have been this whole time than have to not only download another app but not have all of my XP, stars, energy & money not be carried over

They are now putting ads in between plays. Never had them before. Nevertheless love playing CC. I broke down and bought the ad removable app. It works but when I go to send out anything I get..Invalid access_ code when trying to do it. I have contacted Facebook and Criminal Case. They are telling me that I need to contact Google play cause that was the card I purchased the ad remover using. Google play is to fix the problem. So google play.....fix it! Been 3 weeks.

I love this game and the only reason it isn't getting five stars is because recently, the videos to recieve extra time and daily rewards will not play. If this glitch can be fixed, I will gladly change my review. Thanks. This problem still occurs. So I have changed my review to two stars. I will change it to five if and when it is fixed. It is a true disappointment in an otherwise great game.

Was running fine & progressing nicely until it tried to force me to accept a Facebook policy, I cannot accept the cookies as screen won't drag to press accept as screen size has changed, so it means I'm no longer able to send help/ items to friends or ask for help with reports at the end of each case, also feeding pets has changed to adverts only which now takes forever....really disappointed & frustrated so please change it back to 5 min timers & cut the excessive adverts for everything

title: Onnect - Pair Matching Puzzle
description:
ONNECT is a connection-based PAIR MATCHING GAME with challenging levels.

Find the matching tiles, connect the pairs with up to three lines. Remove all tile pairs before the time is over. Become an expert level by level. Enjoy the collections of lovely animals, delicious sweets, nice shoes, yummy fruits, cool vehicles, interesting professions, exciting emojis and more.  


GAME FEATURES

Well-designed challenging levels
Arcade & leisure modes
Easy to play
Hint & shuffle boosters
In-game score bonus
Tile movements
Levels with timed bomb cards
Revive after fail
Autosave, continue playing where you left off.
Various image collections
Classic "onet connect" game mechanics
Improves memory, focus, attention and concentration.
NO ADS - package purchase removes the banner and interstitial ads.
POLISHED - with satisfying and stimulating visual effects. 
IN YOUR LANGUAGE. The app support English besides Arabic, Chinese, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Turkish, and Vietnamese.   


HOW TO PLAY?

Aim is to REMOVE ALL TILES before the time is over.
Find two IDENTICAL IMAGES and tap on to connect them.
Tiles can be connected with up to 3 STRAIGHT LINES where there is no other tile blocking the line path.
Use HINT button to reveal a connectable pair.
Use SHUFFLE button to rearrange tiles.
You can turn off the ARCADE MODE for little ones to play.


Onnect is the most colorful and sparkling game among the FREE PUZZLE GAMES, especially the ones that have ONET CONNECT game mechanics. It can also serve as an ATTENTION TEST. Everyone of all ages can solve CHALLENGING MATCHING PUZZLES.

comments: I absolutely love this game have been playing for a few month now but the last update has caused nothing but trouble it freezes shuts down when it wants way too many ads UPDATE much improved still the odd glitch but i can live with that big thanks to whoever fixed the bugs in the game im back to playing daily and its back to being my fav game üëçüòäüòä

I love this game so much but the ads are ruining it lately. When you end a level, the game shows you what you earned. Before you can receive it, you have to watch an ad. (Wasnt a problem until recently) some ads will let you skip after a few seconds but lately if you try to skip the ad it takes you to google and then when you try to go back to the game it restarts onnect and you loose everything you earned on the previous level. Very frustrating. I love the game other than that.

The game is just entertaining enough to keep going back, but the 30 second ads are ridiculous. Some other games have 5 second ads which don't interrupt the flow of the game. But this game has a 30 second ad after every puzzle which is irritating. I'm not sure the game is entertaining enough to keep putting up with the long ads.
Bleh. One level the movements operate a certain way, the next level it won't move the same way. If the game is so damned moody why give it a time limit? That's kinda dumb.

A very mindless game, perfect for playing while commuting, on the bus, waiting for someone or something etc. Easy play, but not unchallenging, with ads removed most times i don't need to watch commercials, unless you don't ƒèefuse the bomb! A basic match two game, but don't think it's a pushover, the concept is easy, playing it is a different matter!

title: Booking.com: Hotels, Apartments & Accommodation
description:
Travel and save on the world‚Äôs best hotels with Booking.com! Find great deals on hotels or apartments to rent and book accommodation for your next trip in just a few minutes.

Hotels, apartments, hostels, vacation rentals, motels & more - browse over 27 million options across the world! Discover daily deals and save on your next hotel, apartment, or villa booking. 

Vacations to go! Find accommodation, compare hotel deals & save with our free app. Here are 5 reasons you‚Äôll love using the Booking.com app to find hotels the next time you travel:

recentChanges: We added some important info about our properties. Our listings now include details on each accommodation's cleaning practices, social distancing measures, and other health and safety policies.
comments: Good app. Finally showing room sizes in the search results. Please add room size filters to save time searching. Hotel star rating often does not match the real rating, for example many 5 stars properties are actually 4 stars or unrated. Prices can often be misleading as they do not include fees and taxes until the final step of booking, and then the final price can end up to be significantly higher. Final prices should be listed at early stages and we should be able to filter by them too.

I made a booking and then I found a cheaper price though someone else at the same property. I tried to cancel the booking and have the cancellation fees waived and when it came time for me to hit the confirm the fee waiver button it went straight to cancelled for $65.00. I literally found the other price less than five minutes later and immediately cancelled the booking.......smh. Bad Business.

Terrible app. Too many bugs to list, and I couldn't even write them to tell them about it because the Google Recaptcha just kept asking me to select images over and over again. Oh, and after trying 5 different times to book a flight, I got "reservation failed" with no explanation. One time, when I went back to reserve, the same flight I tried to book initially went up $70. Oh, and you'll have to scroll back about 420 times to enter your DOB cause you can't enter it manually. What a joke.

Frankly the app is really great. I usually check the googles and find hotels online. Then i open up booking and compare prices. 90% of the time the mobile booking app has deals and tends to be cheaper by $10 to $30. Not much but that extra $10 can go towards a meal or something else like the mini bar. I love it and i recommend to all my travel buddies.

Fast to download, every bit of information you could possibly need is right there so you don't have to search elsewhere for numbers & dates & times, and extremely easy to use & understand. Very pleased with this app.

title: Candy Crush Soda Saga
description:
Download Candy Crush Soda Saga for free now!

From the makers of the legendary Candy Crush Saga comes Candy Crush Soda Saga! Unique candies, more divine matching combinations and challenging game modes brimming with purple soda and fun!

This mouth-watering puzzle adventure will instantly quench your thirst for fun. Join Kimmy on her juicy journey to find Tiffi, by switching and matching your way through new dimensions of magical gameplay. Take on this Sodalicious Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Show your competitive side in the Episode Race! Compete against other players to see who can complete levels the fastest and progress the quickest. Or work as a team in the Social Bingo feature where players work together for Sodalicious rewards!

Candy Crush Soda Saga Features:

üç≠  Over 3000 match 3 Sodalicious levels

üç≠  All new game modes bubbling with fun and unique candy:

Soda ‚Äì Switch the bottles and match candies to release purple soda to save the Candy Bears

Frosting ‚Äì Match candy to smash the ice and set the Candy Bears free

Honeycomb ‚Äì Match candies next to honeycomb to release the trapped Candy Bears

Jam ‚Äì Spread the jam across the board

üç≠  All new candies and scrumptious new matching combinations:

Match 4 candies in a square to make a Swedish Fish!

Match 7 candies for the all new Coloring Candy!

üç≠  Explore juicy new worlds and levels with even more characters!

üç≠  Social Bingo

üç≠  Episode Race

üç≠  Mouth-watering new graphics, Candy Crush looks even tastier!

üç≠  Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master

üç≠  Players that Facebook Connect will have access to leaderboards where you can challenge your friends and compare your highscores!

üç≠  Easily sync the game between devices to unlock the games full features when connected to the internet

Candy Crush Soda Saga is completely free to play, but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

comments: Constantly crashing...... this app would allow you the odd video for a booster or extra few moves, but every video link crashes the app which means you lose where you were, and can't progress anywhere. I get the whole idea is to encourage you to buy etc, but the app should still function. Really tempted to just give up. Shame, had been a good boredom buster up to this point.

Candy Crush Soda Saga is the best and fun game i've ever played...it has so so many levels that you can play...some are hard and some are easy to play...i really never thought that i could play this game as i'm playing it now..level 920 isthe hardest level in the game but is fun to play it again and again...

I used to enjoy the game. But, as you progress the levels, the fish are of no use. It seems like they deliberately go to the wrong places when you are in the final moves of any hard level. This leads to the loss of streak as well. Why are the fishies acting all weird?!!

At first is a interesting game, but once you've got to hard level, became really bad and boring for that reason your lucky that i give you 1 star. ..but I won't spend my money buying, life's, this game really this game really sucks cause freeze every time once you reach higher level. ..fix the problem if you're charging all those gifts..what about golden reward? I I hate it when I get to higher level past 100 it freezes and I have to uninstal the game..

Its like when you are playing the game, it wants you to use their moves, which may be way up at the top of the board., and its ludicrous to use their moves, that they are trying to make u use. Thats using up your tries. Makes no sense to use their moves suggestions. And if you don't use their suggestion, they make it difficult to try your own moves, it will get stuck until u use their moves. Almost said their dumb suggestions, because they want you to fail. I earned 13 gold bars, r gone. .

description:
Filmigo Video Maker is a powerful video editing tool to make stylish slideshow, video, photo and vlog. Provide newest Halloween material! With minimum operations, a spark video combined with popular themes, special subtitles and hot music will be shown. You'll look vivacious and charming in the video.

Key Features of this video maker/photo editor
üìå Professional Editing Tool: 
Filmigo video trimmer offers powerful tools for you to quickly reverse/rotate/trim/split/ duplicate your clips and cut the movie. You can cut a video in parts, merge images from your gallery or album, and compress video without losing quality like a professional video producer. Also, you can zoom in/speed up/speed down the video to make a super interesting piece of art.

üìå Exquisite Themes: 
Filmigo video maker has various free themes and unique transitions. It only takes one tap to create an awesome music video and make you look vivacious. Video Maker & Video Editor makes it easy for you to grab attention and gain more followers and likes on social media.

With this movie editor/slideshow maker, creating a video with photos, music, and other elements become easy and fun. You can beautify your videos with subtitles, themes, transitions, stickers and almost anything you want in a creative and personalized way.

title: Foursquare City Guide
description:
Foursquare City Guide will lead you to the perfect spot -- anywhere in the world.  Get helpful, positive tips from our trusted global community and keep track of where you you've been and where you want to go, all in one place.

Looking to check in or become Mayor of your local coffee shop? Download our sister app, Foursquare Swarm. 

With Foursquare City Guide you can:
-Join a community of people just like you who love to explore and seek out hidden gems. 
-Read short tips written by real people all over the world. (No negative rants or businesses paying for positive reviews.)
-Make lists for any occasion! Keep a running to-do of neighborhood hot spots, or places you want to try while traveling.
-Add tastes, rate places, and lifelog where you‚Äôve been to get hyper-personalized recommendations.
-Follow friends, brands, and influencers and uncover the best experience possible with millions of tips about off-the-menu items, speakeasy entrances, wifi passwords, and much more.
-Keep a history of the places you‚Äôve been. Never forget a memory, photo, or the name of that incredible pizza place you went to while visiting Rome. 
-Find exactly what you‚Äôre looking for. Faster.

A note on battery:
We've spent years developing the location technology that powers Foursquare City Guide, making it extremely power efficient. But, as with all apps of this type, please note that continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

By using Foursquare you agree to the Terms of Service (http://foursquare.com/legal/terms), Privacy Policy (http://foursquare.com/legal/privacy) and Cookie Policy (http://foursquare.com/legal/cookiepolicy).

comments: Man, this app has problems. Created a list of places, but when I click on the on the icon to view it on a map it says "Hm, something went wrong. Try again." It also says that I have not been to any of these places even though I have clicked that I HAVE been to said places. The lists is kind of the whole reason I downloaded this app. It will only allow you to sign up using a Facebook or Google sign-in. If you don't have one of those, or don't want to use one, then tough luck! Probably uninstall..

I can't upload photos of the places, successfully! The updates about the places are not reflected/ reflecting after giving enough time say more than 24 hours! And so, rated only 3 stars! Fixing the issue i might ready to give 5 rates, for this app!
Love the app. However, it is missing one major component, which I think would be extremely useful and helpful... Adding "pet friendly" to the list of filters.

The best tool for browsing bars, restaurants and other interesting POIs, my daily driver. If some place exists on this planet, you can bet it will be shown in Foursquare. Used to have a perfect integration with both Navigon and Sygic Truck navigations. Sadly, it has been removed from Sygic Truck lately, making my life much harder, as I depend on pois due to my job. Amazing app, 6 stars if possible!!!

I have been using the app for more than 2 years. I wish the visuals were updated and screens became more intuitive. For example I cannot access my menu when browsing, I have to go back to the home screen. Also there is a bug if you want to upload a photo of a cafe. I have a feeling the app was never touched/improved since 2 years.

title: Clumsy Ninja
description:
Meet Clumsy Ninja, the most hapless ninja ever to grace a touchscreen!

Train him, throw him, tickle him, and even tie balloons to him. Everything you do will make Clumsy Ninja more skillful, and help him find his missing friend, Kira.

Clumsy Ninja is the next generation of interactive characters! He can sense, feel, move, and react uniquely every time. Prepare to be amazed‚Ä¶oh, and please take good care of him!

BELT UP
Train your ninja to learn new tricks and super-special Ninja Moves! Impress his sensei and earn new Ninja Belts on your way to find Kira, or just have fun with over 70 unique interactive items, including trampolines, punch bags, ball guns, a chicken, and‚Ä¶ a squirrel!

ADVENTURE TIME
You and your ninja will travel to new locations, play new games, meet new characters, complete quests, and unlock fun new items to play with. How many will you discover?

CUSTOMIZE
Customize Clumsy Ninja‚Äôs suits, belts, and headbands to match your style. Take photos of your ninja‚Äôs craziest stunts. Keep your eyes peeled: there are many surprises waiting for you!

UNFORGETTABLE MOMENTS
Clumsy Ninja is a living virtual friend who thinks and acts with real intelligence - and a lot of clumsiness! You‚Äôll experience unique moments with your ninja and his companions every time you play!

FIRST ON TOUCH DEVICES!
Clumsy Ninja is the first game on touch devices to ever use the EUPHORIA simulation technology ‚Äì producing the most believable character you've ever seen.

Requires Android OS 2.3 or later. 

PLEASE NOTE! Clumsy Ninja is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money.
To prevent unauthorised purchases, select ‚ÄúSet or Change PIN‚Äù from the Google Play settings menu, create a PIN, then enable the ‚ÄúUse PIN for Purchases‚Äù option. You will then be required to enter your PIN before every transaction.

Requires Android OS 3.x and above

Clumsy Ninja is published by NaturalMotion Games Ltd
descriptionHTML:
Meet Clumsy Ninja, the most hapless ninja ever to grace a touchscreen!

Train him, throw him, tickle him, and even tie balloons to him. Everything you do will make Clumsy Ninja more skillful, and help him find his missing friend, Kira.

Clumsy Ninja is the next generation of interactive characters! He can sense, feel, move, and react uniquely every time. Prepare to be amazed‚Ä¶oh, and please take good care of him!

BELT UP
Train your ninja to learn new tricks and super-special Ninja Moves! Impress his sensei and earn new Ninja Belts on your way to find Kira, or just have fun with over 70 unique interactive items, including trampolines, punch bags, ball guns, a chicken, and‚Ä¶ a squirrel!

ADVENTURE TIME
You and your ninja will travel to new locations, play new games, meet new characters, complete quests, and unlock fun new items to play with. How many will you discover?

CUSTOMIZE
Customize Clumsy Ninja‚Äôs suits, belts, and headbands to match your style. Take photos of your ninja‚Äôs craziest stunts. Keep your eyes peeled: there are many surprises waiting for you!

UNFORGETTABLE MOMENTS
Clumsy Ninja is a living virtual friend who thinks and acts with real intelligence - and a lot of clumsiness! You‚Äôll experience unique moments with your ninja and his companions every time you play!

FIRST ON TOUCH DEVICES!
Clumsy Ninja is the first game on touch devices to ever use the EUPHORIA simulation technology ‚Äì producing the most believable character you've ever seen.

Requires Android OS 2.3 or later.

PLEASE NOTE! Clumsy Ninja is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money.
To prevent unauthorised purchases, select ‚ÄúSet or Change PIN‚Äù from the Google Play settings menu, create a PIN, then enable the ‚ÄúUse PIN for Purchases‚Äù option. You will then be required to enter your PIN before every transaction.

Requires Android OS 3.x and above

Clumsy Ninja is published by NaturalMotion Games Ltd
summary: Train the world's clumsiest ninja for free on Android now!

6 Agar Street
London WC2N 4HN

This update includes:
‚Ä¢ Bug fixes and improvements
comments: A great, funny game, I have decided to revisit it after several years, but why is it so much harder to make the ninja stand on top of a tower or a crate than before? It gets annoying when he keeps on tripping himself for 5 minutes and can't stand straight. I have tried a lot of ways(Throw him/Gently place him, etc) sometimes it just comes to luck if he can stand or not, please fix this, thank you.

Honestly, this game was going so well for me personally till the controls and that started messing up bad. When you try and put your ninja on one of the towers you jump off, he wont stay there. He would stand there then walk off it without you telling him to walk somewhere. The camera with it is bad as well. If you try and put the ninja on the tower to jump onto a crate, the camera will move forward and make him stand on that instead, which is rather annoying.

Hi Clumsy Ninja Team. I love this game a lot but as many people's are facing this problem that progress doesn't save. Today I open it and played it I am on Level 29 and going to level 30 but when i opend it again then it get me back to level 1 please fix this issue. I have gain many progress coins all of other stuff please give my Progress back. I didn't expect this as i love this game and today this happened with me. Please Clumsy Ninja Team Fix It.üôèüôè

Love this game, played when I was little. Keep trying to improve the game. Anyone can enjoy even if they are 60 (lol). nothing else to say, but great game, I can see why its called clumsy ninja I've never seen a ninja this funny and clumsy. AMAZING!

The title of this game describes it perfectly. Be prepared for frustrating controls as the ninja flails and falls alot. It doesn't help that it can take quite a few seconds to recover his footing, even longer if he gets stuck in items as he rolls over. Get to the beams and it becomes much worse. Problematic depth detection and a small space to place the ninja resulted in over 5mins just to complete a beam session. Not recommended game unless you have a lot of patience and tolerance for failures.

comments: The best launcher ever, thanks a lot. I have ZenFone that I can assure you no one will buy this mobile phone! bC its launcher is the worst of all and the brand known as "crash". I have tried lots of launchers instead, yet I didn't experience the 'smooth' one. Your great app really follows your slogan "smooth", and you also fix the bugs that others was annoyed based on their comment.
The newest update made it where the app is literally unusable. It crashes each time I try to make it my default homepage. I tried restarting my phone and it still won't open. Please fix this!!

CRASH CRASH AND CRASH AGAIN! ü§¨ I've had this app for a long while now. Used to work great. Now every damn minute or so I get the annoying app keeps closing alert. I couldn't figure out what was wrong with it and even wondered my other apps maybe interfering & causing it to crash. But then I thought "I wonder if anyone else is having the same problem" so I come on the play store, look at the reviews and big surprise its happening to everyone. THEY NEED TO UPDATE THEIR LAST "UPDATE"! VOILA.

A very good app. Everything is simple and clear. Makes it without any confusion. I have used other launcher hola launcher very similar to solo launcher for many years it was my favourite but now not existing ; better in that range one and only is the Solo launcher. But now it is crashing in REDMI NOTE 9 pro max. And Samsung also. Need to sort it out immediately. Originally I rated five Star. But continuous crashes it is down rated.
It just won't stop crashing I had a layout that i loved and now its all gone because I can't use the app after the "update"

comments: Mobile check deposit feature seems to have a bug, where it doesn't read the camera's orientation correctly after the first picture taken. It looks like the image is getting rotated again, so it's really squashed and not at the correct aspect ratio. You have to take the other picture manually, as the automatic feature doesn't really work when it gets into this state.

I was loving this app for depositing check, since my company doesn't have direct deposit. But lately, after I take the photo of one side of the check, I can't get a photo of the other side, because the app wants to take the photo in a long skinny "letterbox" format. It's quicker to get in the car and drive to an ATM than it is to get this to work. It makes the app useless to me.

This app just sucks. Rarely do I get the notifications that I set up in the app for alerts and if I do get them it's not until several hours later. Sometimes the app will open itself back up after I've already checked it and closed it out. Very frustrating to use. I've had several other banking apps and none have given me the problems BoA does. May be time for a new bank but until then my review of this app stays the same.

This App is wonderful and allows me to have a full banking experience. It even includes a chat feature which guides you through different topics of questions or concerns you have. It's very convenient that you can request a call from Customer service in the App so that you have zero wait time on hold and you generally receive a call within 5 minutes Max.

Terrible check capture. Clearly now a bug where you can only capture one side of a check. All subsequent attempts shows a skewed camera view and nonsensical pop-ups that renders it impossible. Only solution is to close and reopen the app, but you still can't capture both sides. Great timing when people don't want to visit branches in person. No QC at all during the pandemic?

title: Bloomberg: Market & Financial News
description:
Get comprehensive access to global business, stock market and finance news, and trending topics like bitcoin and cryptocurrency.

You can customize the app to monitor your personal portfolio and receive continuous alerts on global stock positions and summarized financial, economic, and corporate information that meets the needs of the global business and financial professional. 

Whether you need to monitor your stock portfolio or just want to discover breaking financial news, Bloomberg provides the news and analysis you require, whenever and wherever you need it. 

FEATURES:

- News: Featured and trending stories in Markets, Industries, Technology, Politics, Luxury, Personal Finance, Opinion and more. 

- Market Data: Latest market data on your customizable portfolio and personalized for your region including Equity Indexes, Futures, Bonds, Commodities & Currencies. 

- Watchlist: Easily track your portfolio by adding a security (stocks, mutual funds, ETFs, currencies, etc.) to your personal Watchlist(s).

- Video: Watch Bloomberg Television Live without the need of any Cable or Satellite subscription. Watch featured videos specifically chosen for top news categories.

- Audio: Listen to interviews and analysis from around the world by the smartest names in Global Finance, Business, Economics & Investment from our radio shows and podcasts.

More Features: 

Markets data in your region and a Watchlist summary with leaders and laggers. Introducing a bold, new look for Businessweek including issue downloading for offline reading.

Download the app now for accurate and concise finance news, stock market intelligence alerts and everything you need to know about currencies, commodities and futures‚Ä¶

A subscription to the Bloomberg app gets you unlimited access to all Bloomberg content within the app and on the website (after linking your account). You can start with a 30 days free trial and then a monthly subscription for $34.99/month.

Your payment will be charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. You may manage your subscription and auto-renew may be turned off by going to Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. 

Terms of Use: https://www.bloomberg.com/notices/tos
Privacy Policy: https://www.bloomberg.com/notices/privacy

Visit us at:

http://www.bloomberg.com

comments: Content great but app very clunky and slow, and loads of ads despite subscription. Main missing feature for me is ability to replay, pause & fast forward interviews. I watch it for an hour or two day, more some days. Ads feel like 30%, and I assume they are filling the time between interviews. Mostly I don't need to watch the interviews live; they should all be available to watch later, skipping the ads, or most of them. (They only have a repertoire of 4 or 5 ads, endlessly repeated)

The app will not get past the loading screen upon opening. It just continually loads and never opens. I read businessweek primarily on my phone and since the new app doesn't open it makes it pointless to have a subscription. Shame because content itself is great.

The app has no dark mode. Big No-No in today's day&age! The app has no video PIP - so I am stuck in it. They should take inspiration from YouTube's PIP allowing one to switch over to another app to read other news in app, or take notes in another app while watching the Live TV. The app's ads are a problem. It starts with 6-10 ads but it horrible because the button of 'Skip ads' has no effect. üòÇ The ads are repeated again if you had to leave app, go to another app and come back. üòÇ
I love watching Bloomberg in the mornings it helps me understand the market before I do my daily analysing also the app makes it easy to be on the move and still keep and eye out on critical news

Intelligent productive news experience Well sourced and a calm effective vocal experience with a neutral voice command ..made the news not only sound archaic but also progressive at the same time ..broad appeal .and yet I'm not a fan of apps in general .I'm not addicted to tech as much as most tech companies and apps for $ think the common occasional user ..I'm not addicted to updates but if I was ..I would be listening to your voice cast

If I want to start watching prime time etc from the beginning, I have to go alllll the way back through all the episodes.. Could be a lot better, I was still getting ads even though I'm a subscriber, I can't listen to shows in the background as if you leave the app it pauses the video you where watching the app needs significant improvements because of how much it's missing when compared to other streaming services

I love the network..ive never had a problem with it and have been a member since 2014..how come its not letting me go on it. Ive refreshed a bunch of times and have gotten the same results which has been just lag and errors. Please help a loyal fan and customer out. Thanks

Horrible. The ap will not allow me to choose Bell as my subscription option. There fore I cannot watch anything live on my phone. I use Google Chrome and still I get a 400 error message when I click on Bell. Very frustrated and unhappy

title: FrostWire: Torrent Downloader & Music Player
description:
FrostWire is an easy to use yet feature packed torrent client for Android. Unlike other torrent downloaders, it has a true built-in torrent search, an advanced download manager, music player and a media library. 

All these features are wrapped into one free app, so you can find what you love easily, download music, movies and video directly to your phone or tablet - fast & with no download size or speed limits, and then create playlists to play your music offline without wi-fi or mobile data.

FrostWire downloads super fast using a distributed peer-to-peer  (P2P) file sharing torrent network. By splitting the file into multiple chunks and downloading from many sources at the same time, it allows you to download media files as large as high-quality (Flac or wav) full songs or entire music albums, HD movies and 4K video many times faster than conventional methods. As a true free file downloader, FrostWire downloads all file types, so even though it is designed with primarily audio and video in mind, it can also download books, pdf documents, games, software, images and more!

NOTABLE FEATURES:
‚úî  True built-in torrent search
‚úî  Easy one-tap download & seed (share)
‚úî  Play while you download (sequential downloading)
‚úî  Open any .torrent file or paste magnet link in Transfers to download any file you want
‚úî  Select File Storage Location (Internal Storage or SD Card)
‚úî  Download on Wi-Fi only (preserve mobile data)
‚úî  Auto-pause downloads with VPN drop
‚úî  Built-in fully featured music player with gesture support
‚úî  Built-in media browser (rename and delete your files from within the app)

For more detailed list of features see http://bit.ly/frostwirefeatures.

USERS NEW TO TORRENTING
FrostWire is a torrent downloader - it is not a content provider. The search results provided come from multiple torrent indexes across the web. If you can‚Äôt find what you are looking for, do a Google Search with a .torrent appended to it. Download your .torrent file or copy a magnet link and open it in FrostWire. 
The content availability in search and the download speed greatly depends on your internet connection. For best results use non-public stable Wi-Fi connection.


ABOUT FROSTWIRE
As an open source community based project, FrostWire has been a quality choice among the best mp3 music downloader apps and torrent clients alike for over 10 years. You can find all Android and desktop versions & download them FREE from our website - http://www.frostwire.com or contribute to the code at http://github.com/frostwire. 


SUPPORT
FrostWire is a community based project - your feedback is very important to us! 
Don‚Äôt hesitate to shoot us an email at support@frostwire.com if you have any issues or feature requests! We can help especially if you are not getting enough search results.

If you are rating us less than 5 stars, please leave a review telling us what you didn't like in the app so we can fix it.

Looking for FAQs or guides to get started? Check out http://bit.ly/1aAzcIw or support.frostwire.com. You can also get support from our online Community Forum http://forum.frostwire.com or via chat http://www.frostwire.com/chat

CONNECT WITH US:
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FrostwireOfficial
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/frostwire
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/frostwire/
descriptionHTML:
FrostWire is an easy to use yet feature packed torrent client for Android. Unlike other torrent downloaders, it has a true built-in torrent search, an advanced download manager, music player and a media library.

All these features are wrapped into one free app, so you can find what you love easily, download music, movies and video directly to your phone or tablet - fast & with no download size or speed limits, and then create playlists to play your music offline without wi-fi or mobile data.

comments: Overall a killer app. Have not found very many artist that are not available, including full albums and discography. This has been my go to app for anything music related! I would like to see a feature that allows only the actual artists to come up in a search instead of covers, clips, and demos. Not very many complaints overall. Keep up the great work, particularly on Android based phones!

I use to use this app all the time to download music to my phone. Use to work great but now it sucks. I tried uninstalling the app and redownloading it to see if that would help but still can't find any music I'm looking. This app needs fixed or it will be permanently removed from my phone
It sometimes gets stuck on one song, so I need to reset the whole app, reload my playlist so I can continue to listen to my music. Outside of that, it's a good app.

This app was good in the beginning but niw it just makes me beyond sad I cant fins any of the latest kpop songs on here. Please fix it, this app was so reliable at one stage, it was my goto music dowloading place now I have to try 4 different apps just to get the songs I want.
I've had this app for years and downloaded many songs without a problem... but now for the last few weeks I can't download anything. This app now sucks!
